GSP28durdhpru:6: [1] ūṃ namaḥ sarvajñāya -- BEHN / nāsti AP.
GSP28durdhpru:8: samyagjñānapūrvikā sarvapuruṣārthasiddhir iti tad vyutpādyate I-1
GSP28durdhpru:15: [1b][[2]sūtrabhidharma]vinayāḥ sugatasya vāco bādhā vinā dbhutatayā satataṃ jayanti /
GSP28durdhpru:19: ābhānti darpaṇa iva pratibimbitāni tattvāni yatra sakalasya padārtharāśeḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:20: śrīdharmakīrtyabhimukhāni jagaddhitāni dharmottarasya vipulāni padāny amūni /
GSP28durdhpru:21: samyakprakāśya sukṛtaṃ samupārjayāmi tenāpi duḥkhajaladher jagad uddharāmi //
GSP28durdhpru:27: nyāyabinduṭīkāṃ cikīrṣur eṣa dharmottaro bhagavatpūjāpuṇyayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvam atīndrayam īdṛśi viṣaye gatyantaravirahād abhyupeyaprāmāṇyād āgamād avagamya,
GSP28durdhpru:35: dṛṣṭaśiṣṭācāro 'py anupālito bhaviṣyatīty abhisandhāya vāgvijayākhyānadvārāṃ bhagavataḥ pūjāṃ stutimayīm ārabhate /
GSP28durdhpru:36: syād etat -- pūjāyāḥ puṇyopajananamātraprayoja[5][nasya sampādakat]vād āripsitārambhāt prāk kāyamayīm eveṣṭadevatāpūjām āracyya,
GSP28durdhpru:38: athocyate -- tatpūrvikāyām api pravṛttau `stutipūjaiva pravṛttipuraḥsarī kiṃ na kṛtā' iti codyam āpadyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:39: tathā cāśokavanikācodyasadṛśam idam iti nānuvādyam api viduṣām iti /
GSP28durdhpru:41: evaṃ hi [kāyapūjāyāracane stuti]padāni prayuñjānasyā 'tadvyākhyānabhūtasyāsya ślokasyāprakṛtasya karaṇaṃ nāpadyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:46: atrocyate -- syād evaitad yadi svārtham uddiśya stutir īdṛśī pūjā vidhīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:47: kiṃ tarhi? śrotṛjanā[rtham uddiśyāpi] bhagavato guṇakīrttane kṛte śrotṛbhir antataḥ kāvyaguṇajijñāsayāpi ślokao 'vaśyaṃ jñātavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:48: tajjñānāt tathāgataguṇās tāvat kālaṃ tāvac chotṛsantānam adhyāsate /
GSP28durdhpru:49: tatra ye tāvad bhagavati prāgatiprasannamanasas teṣām evaṃvidhaguṇātiśayaśālini `sthāna evāsmākaṃ manaḥ prasannam' iti niścinvatāṃ sthe[6][mānam āsādayate cittam /
GSP28durdhpru:50: ] ye ca madhyasthās teṣām `evaṃbhūtaguṇaratnālaṅkṛte mahato mahīyasi cittam āvarjayitum ucitaṃ svahitāvahitaiḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:51: tad vayam iyantaṃ kālaṃ pramādyanta evodāsmahe sma' iti nirvidyamānānāṃ cittaṃ pratiṣṭhate /
GSP28durdhpru:52_0: ye 'py anatiprasannās teṣām api -- `evaṃvidhaguṇaniketane kim asmābhir akasmād vidviṣyate'
GSP28durdhpru:52_1: iti mananān manāgāvarjanaṃ mādhyasthyaṃ vā[7][syād ity atiprasannamadhyastha]yoḥ
GSP28durdhpru:54: mādhyasthye tu bhagavadvidveṣopacayopaneyanarakeṣv anatipatanaṃ vidveṣopaśamād bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:55: asatyāṃ tu stutimayapūjāyām itthaṃ trividhaśrotṛjanaprayojanaṃ yat tan na kṛtaṃ syāt -- iti svaparārtho[2a]ddeśena stutimayī pūjā vidhīyata iti sthitam /
GSP28durdhpru:58: [7] pratau duṣkhāni ity evaṃ varttate -- saṃ-
GSP28durdhpru:60: tatrānena ślokena bhagavān svārthasampadā parārthsampadupāyasampadā parārthsampadā ca stūyate /
GSP28durdhpru:62: tathā hi cirakālābhyāsasātmyīkṛtamahākṛpasya bhavataḥ parārthasampat pradhānaṃ prayojanam,
GSP28durdhpru:64: ānuṣaṅgikaṃ tathāgatattvam apīti sā tāvad avaśyābhidheyā /
GSP28durdhpru:67: sā copāyasampadam antareṇāsambhavinīti tad abhidhānam apy āvaśyakam /
GSP28durdhpru:68: iyañ cānadhigatasvārthasampado na sidhyatīti tad abhidhānam api niyatam āpatitam /
GSP28durdhpru:70: “tīrṇaḥ svayaṃ yāti jagat samagraṃ mārgopadeśe 'dhikṛto hi nāthaḥ /” iti /
GSP28durdhpru:71: tatra svārthasampannasya parārthasampādanopāyasampat tatsādhyā ca parārthasampādanasampad iti prathamaṃ jātityādinā sugatasyety antena svārthasampattir uktā /
GSP28durdhpru:74: iti tadanuvāca ity anena parārthopāyasampad uktā /
GSP28durdhpru:76_0: idañ cānuṣṭheyam' ityādirūpeṇa dharmadeśanaiva hi bhagavato jagaddhitāvagamanalakṣaṇaparārthasampādanopāyasampad
GSP28durdhpru:77: tad anantaraṃ tadupāyasampattisādhyā parārthasampad anyena padenoktā /
GSP28durdhpru:82: utkarṣaś ca sajātīyāpekṣayeti sāmarthyād īśvarādivacanebhyaḥ prakṛṣṭā bhavantīty arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:87: teṣāṃ tu tadvaiparītyād iti buddhisiddhaṃ kṛtvā kevalam etad atroktam /
GSP28durdhpru:88: viniściyaṭīkāyāṃ punar anena `yuktiprabhāve'tyādi hetubhāvena viśeṣaṇam upāttam /
GSP28durdhpru:89: kasya tā ity ākāṅkṣāyām āha -- sugatasya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:97: atha vā gatyarthānāṃ jñānārthatvād api praśastaṃ gataḥ jñātavān ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:104: punarāvṛttiśabdavācyayor janmadoṣayor ātmadarśanabījopaghātena bhagavatā samūlaghātaṃ nihatatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:108: niḥśeṣaṃ yāvad gantavyaṃ tāvad gataḥ prāptaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:112: tasya sugatasya kimbhutasyety āha -- vijetuḥ abhibhavituḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:114: vijayaś ca jagadapekṣayā paramapadaprāptyā tasya prakṛṣṭatvaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:117: na punā rājavijaya iva rājāntarāpekṣayā kāyāditiraskāro 'bhibhavo 'vaseyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:123: jātir eva vyasanam ity antarnītaniyamaḥ samāsaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:124: tṛṣyann eva hi prāṇī tat tad ācarati yena saṃsāre saṃsarati /
GSP28durdhpru:125: tatas tayaivāsau itastata utpādadvāreṇa vyastaḥ kṣipto bhavatīti saiva vyasanaṃ yuktam /
GSP28durdhpru:126: atha vā jātau utpattau nikāyaviśiṣṭāyāṃ vyasanam āsaktiḥ `vidyādharo 'haṃ bhūyāsaṃ',
GSP28durdhpru:135: evañ ca prabandhaprasūtiśrutisahitaṃ hetupadam upādadānaḥ paramatanirākaraṇañ cābhipraiti /
GSP28durdhpru:139: [8] pratau duṣkhāni ity evaṃ varttate -- saṃ-
GSP28durdhpru:141: tātparyārthaḥ -- jadad evānanyasattvaneyaṃ svayam eva tathā tat tad ācarati yena tathā saṃsāre saṃsarati /
GSP28durdhpru:147: itarathā jātivyasanāśrayasyeti tadanyaviśeṣaṇasahitam eva brūyād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:153: ata evāsau tataḥ prakṛṣṭo bhavati vijetā tasya /
GSP28durdhpru:154: atha vā rāgādyarāter iti jagato viśeṣaṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:155: rāgādayo 'rātayaḥ pratipakṣā nityam upaghātakā yasyeti kṛtvā /
GSP28durdhpru:156: tadā tu tadvijetā bhavān sugatatvād eva boddhavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:157: jagato ye rāgādayas teṣām arāte ityādivyākhyānaṃ tu kliṣṭatvāt noktam /
GSP28durdhpru:158: kiṃviśiṣṭā vāc ity āha -- mana ityādi /
GSP28durdhpru:160: tac ca manaso vikalpavijñānasya kayācid vyapekṣayā dharma iva bhinnaḥ kathyate /
GSP28durdhpru:161: vastutas tu kliṣṭam eva jñānam avidyā /
GSP28durdhpru:162: yad vā kliṣṭaṃ mana eva tama iva tamaḥ pūrvavat /
GSP28durdhpru:163: kecit tu manastama iti śabdasamudāyam ajñānārthavācakam ācakṣate /
GSP28durdhpru:164: tasya tānavaṃ tanutvaṃ mandībhavanam ity arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:166: tānavagraḥaṇena cedam ācaṣṭe -- na bhavato vācaḥ sarvathā jagadajñānam upaghnanti,
GSP28durdhpru:168: kin tu tiyantaṃ kālam ālocyamānāḥ samudācārato mohasya māndyāpādanena taṃ tanūkurvantīti /
GSP28durdhpru:169: atha vā anyathā vyākhyāyate -- tā vācas tamo jayanti abhibhavanti[9] ...................... ............... [3a]....................................mohapracāram ādadhānāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:174: yad vā manasi tamo yasya sa manastamā mūḍha uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:184: kevalam idam ālocyatām -- tathāgatam abhistuvatā dharmottareṇāsyaiva vijayo mukhyavṛttyā kiṃ na kathitaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:191: yad vā yasya vāca eva tathā jayanti tasya vijayo daṇḍāj jayanyāyenātiśayena pratipāditaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:195: atha vāgamikānāṃ matena nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛto bhagavān /
GSP28durdhpru:196: parinirvṛtasyāsya pravacanam ayam eva vapur vidyata iti āgamiko vāgvijayam eva pratipādayate smeti /
GSP28durdhpru:198: tasyā yat prayojanaṃ puruṣārthasiddharūpaṃ tad ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:199: na ca samyagjñānavyutpatteḥ samyagjñānaparijñānaṃ prayojanaṃ na puruṣārthasiddhir iti śakyam abhidhātum /
GSP28durdhpru:202: sā katham ātmana eva prayojanaṃ bhaved ity abhiprāyeṇa vyākhyātavantau vinītadevaśāntabhadrau /
GSP28durdhpru:203: tad vyākhyānam avamanyamāno 'bhidheya prayojanam ucyate iti vyācaṣṭe /
GSP28durdhpru:204: avajñāne cāyam āśayaḥ -- asyedaṃ prayojanam iti khalv anvyavyatirekābhyām avadhāryate /
GSP28durdhpru:207: samyagjñānavyutpattim antareṇāpi gopālāṅganādīnāṃ bhavantī sati samyagjñāni(-ne)
GSP28durdhpru:208: , satyām api tadvyutpattau asti samyagjñāṇe manīṣiṇām abhavantī na tadvyutpatter anvayavyatirekāv anuvidhatte /
GSP28durdhpru:209: kiṃ tarhi? samyagjñānasyeti tasyaiva payojanaṃ bhavitum arhatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:210: samyagjñānetyādinā vākyena karaṇena prakaraṇābhidheyasya samyagjñānalakṣaṇasya prayojanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ puruṣārthasiddhilakṣaṇam ucyate vārttikakṛtā karttrety arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:211: nanu ca yatrābhidhāvyāpāraḥ samāpyate sa vākyārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:215: yady api śabdābhidhāvyāpārāpekṣayā tat samyagjñānaṃ vyutpādyate śiṣya iti śiṣyasamyagjñānaviṣayā vyutpattikriyā prādhānyād vākyārthaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:217: tathā hi tadvyuptattim evāsau kim ati kāryate?
GSP28durdhpru:219: yatra punar abhidhāviṣaya evārthaḥ sambhavī na tu tātparyārtho [3b][14].../
GSP28durdhpru:220: s tatra sa eva vākyārthaḥ kalpyate /
GSP28durdhpru:221: dvitayasambhave tu yat paraṃ vākyaṃ tathā ca tasyārtha ity ārthena nyāyenābhidheyasya prayojanaṃ puruṣāthasiddhir vākyārthatvenocyata iti vyākhyāyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:226: kecit punar idaṃ dharmottarīyaṃ vākyam anyathā vyācakṣate /
GSP28durdhpru:227: nātra payojanaśabdena phalam abhipretaṃ kiṃ tu prayujyate pravarttyate 'neneti,
GSP28durdhpru:230: abhidheyasya hi samyagjñānasya puruṣārthasiddhihetutvena prayuktaḥ puruṣaḥ pravarttata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:232: ata eva -- atra cetyādivākye sarvapuruṣārthasiddhihetutvaṃ prayojanaṃ pravarttakam uktam iti spaṣṭīkaraṇaṃ ghaṭata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:234_0: tathā hi atra ca prakaraṇābhidheyasya samyagjñānasya puruṣārthasiddhhihetutvaṃ prayojanam
GSP28durdhpru:234_1: uktam iti vakṣyamāṇena vyaktīkṛtatvād ihāpi abhidheyasya prayojanam iti ṣaṣṭītatpuruṣo 'vaśyakāryaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:236: tad dhi puruṣārthasiddhihetutvaṃ nābhidheyasya samyagjñānasya pravarttakam api tu puruṣasya /
GSP28durdhpru:241: na hi yajñadattaputro bhṛtyatvādinā rupeṇa devadattasambandhī bhavan devadattaputra iti ṣaṣṭīsamāsasya viṣayo bhavitum arhati /
GSP28durdhpru:242: atha bhāvapradhānatvān nirdeśasya prayojanaṃ prayojakatvam ity athaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:243: tac cāśritasya prayojakatayā abhavati sambandhīti samarthavidhiḥ kalpyate /
GSP28durdhpru:244: nanu yadi samyagjñānagataṃ puruṣārthasiddhihetutvaṃ prayojanaṃ prayojakatvaṃ tarhi samyagjñāṇaṃ prayojanam ity āpannam /
GSP28durdhpru:245: yato na prayojanatvam eva prayojanaṃ bhavitum arthati /
GSP28durdhpru:246: na ca samyagjñānena prayuktaḥ puruṣaḥ samyagjñāne pravarttate,
GSP28durdhpru:250: na ca vṛddhaiḥ prayojakaḥ saty api prayojayitṛtve prayojaka iti samyagjñānavyutpatteḥ prayojanam ucyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:251: anyathā samyagjñānaṃ vyutpadyamānānām ātmānaṃ karttuṃ pravarttamāna ācāryaḥ prayojaka iti samyajñāṇayutpatteḥ prayojanam ucyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:252: yo 'pi kaṭaṃ kurvantaṃ karttuṃ prayuṅkte so 'pi tat prayojanam ucyetety evaṃvādī na laukiko na praīkṣaka ity upekṣaṇīya eva /
GSP28durdhpru:253: api ca kim etad anyathā nopapadyata eva yenaivaṃ mṛtvā śīrtvopapādyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:255: prayojakatvam iti nirdeśe ca dharmottaraḥ kiṃ gauravaṃ paśyati yenaivam avācakam ācakṣīta?
GSP28durdhpru:257: kiṃ ca yad īpsañ jihāsan vā puruṣaḥ pravarttate tad upādānaparityāgābhyāṃ pravarttito bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:258: yathāha akṣapādaḥ -- yam artham adhikṛtya pravarttate tat prayojanam[NSū 1,1,28]iti /
GSP28durdhpru:260: na ca samyagjñānasya bhinnaṃ sad api puruṣārthasiddhihetutvam īpsan jihāsan vā pravarttate /
GSP28durdhpru:261: kiṃ tarhi? hitāhitaprāptiparihārāv uddiśyeti tāv eva prayojane yukte /
GSP28durdhpru:262: kiñcid ajihāsor anupāditsor arthanirīha[4a]sya saty api puruṣārthasiddhihetutve apravarttanāt /
GSP28durdhpru:263: smaraṇād abhilāṣeṇa vyavahāraḥ pravarttate ity alaṃ śabdamātrasamarthanadṛṣṭer arthatattvānavagāhino vacane 'ndhādareṇa /
GSP28durdhpru:267: na hi puruṣārthasiddhihteutvena prayuktaḥ puruṣaḥ samyagjñānalakṣaṇe abhidheye pravarttate kiṃ tu prakaraṇe pravarttate -- granthaśravaṇalakṣaṇāṃ pravṛttim anutiṣṭhati /
GSP28durdhpru:269: evam apy asau śabde 'bhidheye ca samudāye pravṛtto bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:271: atha punar ayam artho 'sya prakaraṇasyābhidheye 'rthād abhidhānābhidheyasamudāye prayojanaṃ pravarttakam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:272: tathā ca prakaraṇe pravarttakam ity asaṅgatam uktaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:273: yadi coktayā vyutpattyā prayojanaśabdena prayojakaṃ tathābhūtam asya bubodhayiṣitaṃ bhavet tadā samyagjñānapūrviketyādinā abhidheyaprayojanam ucyata ity uktaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:274: mukhyaś ca sambandhī puruṣaḥ puruṣasyeti darśitaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:275: na caivam, tasmāt prayojanaśabdena phalam evāsyābhipretam atrottaratrāpi /
GSP28durdhpru:276: athocyate / phalārthī cet pratipattā phala eva kiṃ na pravarttate?
GSP28durdhpru:279: anyathā visaṃvādanam ātmīyam āśaṅkamāna iti kā kṣatiḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:280: phalapakṣe tu puruṣapravṛtty upayogi cāsyābhidheyam iti tad darśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:282: dvividhaṃ hi prakaraṇaśarīram -- śabdaḥ, arthaś ca /
GSP28durdhpru:286: abhidheyaṃ tu yadi niṣprayojanaṃ syāt tadā tatpratipattaye śabdasandarbho 'pi nārambhaṇīyaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:290: tat katham etad vyākhyāyata iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:292: kevalaṃ na puruṣārthasiddhihetutvaṃ samyagjñānasyātmana eva prayojakaṃ kiṃ tu puruṣasya /
GSP28durdhpru:294: abhidheye prayojanam iti vigrahe ca bhūyān doṣo darśitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:295: tasmāt tathābhūtavyutpattināpi prayojanaśabdenātra na tathābhūtaṃ prayojakaṃ cāvādyam,
GSP28durdhpru:296: api tu phalam eveti sarvam avadātam /
GSP28durdhpru:297: nanu ca prakaraṇe śrotṝn pravivarttayiṣur ayam abhidheyaprayojanam abhidhatte tad anenāsyaiva tad ākhyātum ucitam /
GSP28durdhpru:298: tac ca yathāsvam abhidheyapratyāyanalakṣaṇam ity āśaṅkyāha -- dvividhaṃ hi ityādi /
GSP28durdhpru:299: hir yāsmād dviprakāraṃ prakaraṇasya śarīraṃ svabhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:300: tad uktaṃ kāvyālaṅkāre “śabdārthau sahitau kāvyaṃ“[15][kā 1,16] iti /
GSP28durdhpru:308_0: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- śabdārthayor avacchedyāvacchedakatvena sthitayoḥ prakaraṇatvaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:309: yady evaṃ śarīratvāviśeṣāt abhidheyasyevābhidhānātmano 'pi tat kiṃ nocyate?
GSP28durdhpru:310: kiṃ ca, na niṣkṛṣṭarūpe 'bhidheye puruṣaḥ pravarttate kiṃ tu grantha eva śravaṇalakṣanāṃ pravṛttim ācarati abhidheyajñānāya /
GSP28durdhpru:311: tad asyaiva prayojanaṃ vācyam iti pūrvapakṣadvitayaṃ paśyann āha -- tatreti nirdhā[4b]raṇe caitat /
GSP28durdhpru:312: nānyad iti puruṣapravṛtty upayogi ayam asyāśayaḥ -- na hi śabdasya svārthapratyāyanalakṣaṇaṃ phalam astīti śabdasandarbha ārabhyate śrūyate vā,
GSP28durdhpru:316: tarhi abhidheyasyāpi tat kim ucyata ity āha -- abhidheyaṃ tu ityādi /
GSP28durdhpru:318: apiśabdo nārambhaṇīya ity asmāt paro draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:319: tad ayam arthaḥ -- tatpratipattaye śabdānāṃ sandarbho nārambhaṇīyo 'pi syāt,
GSP28durdhpru:322: yathā kākadantaprayojanābhāvāt na tatparīkṣā ārambhaṇīyā prekṣāvatā /
GSP28durdhpru:323: tasmād asya prakaraṇasyārambhaṇīyatvaṃ darśayatā abhidheyaprayojanam anenocyate /
GSP28durdhpru:325: tasmāt tatpratipattaye idam ārabhyata ity ayam atra vākyārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:326: atra ca prakaraṇābhidheyasya samyagjñānasya sarvapuruṣārthasiddhihetutvam prayojanam uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:328: yathaitad darśitaṃ tadvat sarvaṃ draṣṭvyam iti yathāśabdārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:331: parīkṣaṇaṃ vā parīkṣā vimṛṣyāvadhāraṇaṃ tādarthyāt śāstram api tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:333: vacanena tv anena kiṃ kriyata ity āha -- tasmād ityādi /
GSP28durdhpru:334: yasmān niṣprayonanābhidheyaṃ nārabhyate tasmād ārambhaṇīyatvaṃ darśayatā ārambhayogyam evedaṃ mayārabhyata iti prakāśayatā,
GSP28durdhpru:335: ārambhaṇīyate ca darśite śravaṇīyatvam api nimittasāmyād darśitaṃ bhavatīti te pravarttitā bhavanti /
GSP28durdhpru:336: nanu ca samyagjñānapūrvikā sarvapuruṣārthasiddhir ity anenaikadeśenābhidheyaprayojanam uktam,
GSP28durdhpru:338: tat katham anena “vākyenocyate” ity ucyate? ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:339: vākyaṃ hi nāmaikasminn arthe prādhānyena pratipādye guṇaguṇibhāvam anubhavatām arthadvāreṇānyonyāpekṣiṇāṃ sambaddhānāṃ padānāṃ samūha ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:340: tatra yadi sarveṣāṃ padārthānāṃ prādhānyaṃ syāt tadā parasparānupakārāt sambandha eva padānāṃ na syād iti vākyarūpataiva hīyeteti sūktam aneneti /
GSP28durdhpru:341: abhidheyaprayojanābhidhānam evāsya samyagjñānetyādipadasamūhātmakasya yathā tathā yasmād ityādinā kaṇṭhoktaṃ karoti /
GSP28durdhpru:343: etac ca tad vyutpādyata ity asya sāmarthyāvasthitārthakathanaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:345: idamā ca buddhisiddhatvena tad evāṅgulīvyapadeśayogyam iva darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:348: ata eva cārthena nyāyena puruṣārthasidder vākyārthatvam /
GSP28durdhpru:349: śābdyā tu vṛttyā śiṣyasamyagjñānaviṣayā vyuptattikriyā vākyārtha iti darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:350: nanu samyagjñānetyādinā vākyena samyagjñānasya purṣārthasiddhau hetubhāvaḥ paraṃ pradarśito na punar idaṃ tasya prayojanam iti darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:353: tāvatāpi na jñāyate kasya kiṃ tad abhidheyaṃ kiṃ ca tasya prayojanam ity āśaṅkyāha -- atra cetyādi /
GSP28durdhpru:354: atha samyagjñānasya puruṣārthasiddhihetutvaṃ prayojanam ity avadyam /
GSP28durdhpru:356: tathā hi puruṣārthasiddhim evācāryīyaṃ samyagjñānetyādivacanaṃ prayojanam anujānāti na tu puruṣārthasi[5a]ddhihetutvam /
GSP28durdhpru:357: avayavārthavyākhyāne tasya tām eva prayojanatayā vyaktīkaraṣyati /
GSP28durdhpru:358: na ca hetutvaṃ hator bhinnam iṣyate yujyate vā /
GSP28durdhpru:361: asmiṃś cārtha ucyamāne sambandhaprayojanābhidheyāni uktāni bhavanti /
GSP28durdhpru:366: na ca rājaśāsanaṃ sāmānyaṃ kiñcid asti yena bhāvapradhānaḥ prayojanaśabdaḥ kalpyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:368: satyam / na puruṣārthasiddhihetutvaṃ samyajñānasya prayojanam abhipretam /
GSP28durdhpru:372: tato yasmāt prakaraṇābhidheyasya samyagjñānasya puruṣārthasiddhihetutvam uktam,
GSP28durdhpru:373: tasymāt prayojanam uktam iti dvir āvartanīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:375: samyagjñānasya tāṃ prati hetutvoktau ca sā prayojanam ukteti kiṃ sākṣād vācakena padena kriyata iti bhāvaḥ etāvataiva tāvad idaṃ sādhīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:377: sarvā puruṣārthasiddhir yato hetutvāt tat sarvapuruṣārthasiddhi,
GSP28durdhpru:378: tathāvidhaṃ hetutvaṃ yatra prayojanaṃ tat tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:381: kasya tādṛśam ity apekṣāyām idam uktam -- prakaraṇābhidheyasya samyagjñānasyeti kecit pratipadyante /
GSP28durdhpru:383: [16]āditve prayojanam asyāstīti matvarthīyamataṃ vidhāya pradhānavan nirdeśaṃ vivakṣitvā prayojanavattvam iti pratijānate /
GSP28durdhpru:384: evaṃ cārtahṃ samarthayanti -- yata eva puruṣārthasiddhiḥ samyagjñānasādhyā tata eva sā prayojanam /
GSP28durdhpru:385: tasyāpi yad eva tām prati hetutvaṃ tad eva prayojanavattvam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:389: eka tu yataḥ samyagjñāne sati puruṣārthasiddhihetutvaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
GSP28durdhpru:390: tataḥ pramāṇaphalavad vyavasthāpy avyavasthāpanabhāvam āśriyedam uktaṃ tato na kiñcid avadyam iti mayante /
GSP28durdhpru:391: apare tu caśabdaṃ bhinnakramaṃ kṛtvā puruṣārthasiddhihetutvam uktam,
GSP28durdhpru:393: itare tu puruṣārthasiddhihetuśabdena kāraṇe kāryam upacarya puruṣārthasiddhim evābhidadhati /
GSP28durdhpru:395: kecit tu nibandhakṛtaḥ kathañcid apīdaṃ samarthayitum anīśānāḥ sahitaśabdapātāt pramādapāṭhā eveti varṇayanti /
GSP28durdhpru:397: syād etat / yathā pravṛtty aṅgatayā abhidheyaprayojanam ucyate,
GSP28durdhpru:398: tadvat sambadhādikam api kiṃ nocyata ity āha -- asmiṃś ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:401: tathā hi prurṣārthopayogi samyagjñānaṃ vyutpādayitavyam anena prakareṇeti bruvatā samyagjñānam asya śabdasandarbhasya abhidheyam,
GSP28durdhpru:403: prakaraṇam ca idam apāyo vyutpādanasya ity uktam bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:405: na tv idam ekaṃ vākyaṃ sambandham,
GSP28durdhpru:408: ekaṃ tu vadat trayaṃ sāmarthyāt darśayati / tatra
GSP28durdhpru:409: kathaṃ punar anyasyoktānyad uktaṃ bhavatīty āha -- tathā hi iti /
GSP28durdhpru:410: nipātasamudāyaś cāyaṃ yasmād ity asyārthe sarvatra varttate /
GSP28durdhpru:413: evaṃ sati kiṃ siddham ity āha -- tasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:421: tathā sambandhādīny api kiṃ nocyanta ity āha -- na tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:423: ayam āśayaḥ -- yadi sarve padārthāḥ prādhānyam aśnuvīran,
GSP28durdhpru:425: tato vākyam ekārtham abhidheyatayā upādātuṃ kalpyate nānekam /
GSP28durdhpru:429: na sākṣāt samartham iti tarhi na vācyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:440: tathā ca kasya kiṃ vādakaṃ padam ity āśaṅky āha -- tatra ityādi -- teśu abhidheyādiṣū /
GSP28durdhpru:444: prayojanaṃ ca atra vaktuḥ prakaraṇakaraṇavyāpārasya cintyate,
GSP28durdhpru:446: tathā hi -- sarve prekṣāvantaḥ pravṛttiprayojanam anviṣya pravartante /
GSP28durdhpru:447: tataśa ca ācāryeṇa prakaraṇaṃ kim arthaṃ kṛtam,
GSP28durdhpru:448: śrotṛbhiś ca kim artham śruyata iti saṃśaye vyutpādanaṃ prayojanābhidhīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:449: samyagjñānaṃ vyutpadyamānānām ātmānaṃ vyutpādakaṃ kartuṃ prakaraṇam idam kṛtam /
GSP28durdhpru:450: śiṣyaiś ca ācāryaprayuktām ātmano vyutpattim icchadbhiḥ prakaraṇam idaṃ śruyata iti prakaraṇakaraṇaśravaṇayoḥ prayojanaṃ vyutpādanam /
GSP28durdhpru:452: yato vyutpādyata ity atra lakāraḥ prayojyakarmaṇi vihito na prayojyakriyākarmaṇīti /
GSP28durdhpru:453: vākye 'pi loke padyate gamyate 'nenārtha iti vyutpattyā padaprayogo dṛśyate /
GSP28durdhpru:454: tato vyutpādyata iti prayojanapadam ity āha /
GSP28durdhpru:456: yad vā vyutpādyata ity atreti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:459: kathaṃ ca tad anyatocyata ity āha -- prayojanaṃ cātra iti /
GSP28durdhpru:461: tad ayam arthaḥ -- noktaṃ prayojanam iti cintyate kiṃ tu guṇabhūtārthaprayojakapadasya vyutpādyata ity asya prayojanam /
GSP28durdhpru:462: tadvyutpattiḥ kriyata iti ṇicaḥ kiṃ prayojanam iti praśne tasya prayojanaṃ cintyata iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:464: nanu kasmād iyam āśaṅkā -- `vaktrā kimarthaṃ krityate,
GSP28durdhpru:466: tau khalv evam eva pravartteyātām ity āśaṅkyāha -- tathā hīti yasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:467: atha katham ubhayor vyutpādanaṃ prayojanam ucyatge?
GSP28durdhpru:468: yady ato vyutpadyate tasya vyutpattiḥ prayojanam /
GSP28durdhpru:469: yas tu vyutpādayati tasya vyutpādanam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:471: prayojakavyāpāravatī hi vyutpattiḥ prayojanam iṣṭety ubhayor vyutpādanam eva prajyojanam /
GSP28durdhpru:473: kathaṃ nāma madvyāpāravaśena śrotṛsantānavarttinī vyutpattir bhūyād iti ācāryaḥ pravarttate /
GSP28durdhpru:474: ata eva svaprayojakavyāpārādhiṣṭḥitā śrotṛsantānavārttinī vyutpattḥ karttuḥ prayojanam /
GSP28durdhpru:478: ata evācāryavyāpārādhiṣṭḥitā vyatpattiḥ śrotur api prayojanam /
GSP28durdhpru:483: prekṣāvatā hi samyagjñānāv avyutpādanāya prakaraṇam idam ārabdhavatā ayam eva upāyo na anyaḥ iti darśita eva upāyopeyabhāvaḥ prakaraṇaprayojanayoḥ sambandha iti /
GSP28durdhpru:484_0: bhavati / tato vyutpādanaṃ prayojakavyāpāravaśavarttinī vyuptattir dvoyor api prayojanam
GSP28durdhpru:484_1: iti itiśabdaṃ hetupadaṃ kṛtopasaṃharann āha -- prakaraṇakaraṇaśravaṇayoḥ prayojanaṃ vyutpādanam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:485: nanu ca ṇici kṛte vyutpādanaṃ katham ubhayoḥ prayojanam,
GSP28durdhpru:488: samyagjñānavyutpattau kathañcin nimittamātrāt dadhibhojanāder ācāryasyāsādhāraṇakāraṇatāpratipattiḥ prayojanam /
GSP28durdhpru:489: ayam arthaḥ -- asti paryojakavyāpārapradarśane samyagjñānavyutpattāv upayogitvamātreṇa svāsthyādinā sāmyam ācāryasya darśitaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:491: sa kathāṃ nāma pratīyeteti ṇicā nirdeśaḥ kṛta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:492: atha bhojanādes tadvyutpattau sākṣād vyāpārā 'sambhavād ācāryavyāpāraḥ pratipatsyata iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:494: evaṃ hi vyākhyātṝṇām idaṃ pratipādanakauśalaṃ syān na karttur iti nyāyyo ṇicā nirdeśaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:495: nanūktam -- abhidhānasya prayojanaṃ na nirūpyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:496: tat kim idānīṃ tad eva vyājāntareṇa nirūpyate? satyam /
GSP28durdhpru:497: kevalaṃ vākyārthatvena na nirūpyata ity abhisandhinā` `tan na nirūpyate' ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:499: samyagjñānaṃ vyutpadyamānām ity asādhur ayaṃ śabdaḥ -- `vyutpattyarthasya pader akarmatvād' iti bhāgavṛttikāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:501: jñānārthasya padeḥ sakarmakasya `vyutpannaḥ saṅketaḥ' ityādau bahuśaḥ prayogadarśanāt /
GSP28durdhpru:504: tpannasaṃkentam asti tena sa cen mata[PV II 143]iti /
GSP28durdhpru:506: sambandhas tarhi kasya padasyārtha ity āha -- sambandheityādi /
GSP28durdhpru:510: kathaṃ sāmarthyād ity āha -- prekṣāvatā iti /
GSP28durdhpru:518: anarthāśaṅkopasthāpitānyayoganirāse tu karttavye sāmarthyagamyam avadhāraṇāntaraṃ kāryam /
GSP28durdhpru:520: nānya iti ca nānya evety avaseyam /
GSP28durdhpru:522: nanu ca prakaraṇaśravaṇāt prāg uktāny api abhidheyādīni pramāṇābhāvāt prekṣāvadbhir na grahyante /
GSP28durdhpru:524: satyam / aśruyate prakaraṇe kathitāny api na niścīyante /
GSP28durdhpru:525: ukteṣu tv apramānakeśv apy abhidheyādiśu saṃśaya utpadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:528: evaṃrūpasya sambandho vyutpādyata iti prayojanābhidhānād eva darśatam / tad uktam --
GSP28durdhpru:535: abhidheyādiprakāśanadvāreṇādivākyaṃ pravarttakam iti asahamāna āha -- nanu ca iti /
GSP28durdhpru:538: śravaṇānantaraṃ teṣāṃ prākśabdāśrayeṇa pravarttamānam anumānam anyad vā śabdasyārthanāntarīyatāyāṃ pravarttayitum arhati /
GSP28durdhpru:541: ācāryasya cāptabhāvo durbodho yenāptopadeśatayā śabdo 'rthatathātvaṃ pratyāyayed iti /
GSP28durdhpru:546: yadi satyam idaṃ kimarthaṃ tarhi [6b] te kathyanta iti? ukteṣu iti /
GSP28durdhpru:548: anenaitad āha -- sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāve yena rte vyāhārāt pratiniyatādhikaraṇo yauktaḥ saṃayo bhavitum arhatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:551: anyathā kiṃ sapramāṇakeṣv api saṃśayo jāyate yenāpiśrutiḥ samgacchet /
GSP28durdhpru:553: pravṛttiś cen nāsti kiṃ saṃśayenotpāditenāpīty āha -- śaṃśayāc ca iti /
GSP28durdhpru:555: atha ye tāvan madāḥ śraddhayā vā ''cāryam upasannās te tadvacanād arthaṃ niścityaiva pravarttamānā na saṃśayāt pravarttante /
GSP28durdhpru:556: ye 'pi tadviparītāḥ saṃśerate teṣām api na śaṃśayāt pravṛttiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:557: pravṛttau vā prekṣāvattvahānir ity āśaṅkyāha -- arthasaṃśayo 'pīti /
GSP28durdhpru:559: śakyaniścaye hi niścayam antareṇa pravarttamānāḥ prekṣāvattāyā hīyeran /
GSP28durdhpru:562: yadi ca yuktyā dvitīyākārānupraveśena saṃśayānasya na kvacit pravṛttiḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:563: tarhi na kasyacid vacanāt kvacit pravarttitavyam iti bhūyān vyavahāro vilupyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:571: anarthasaṃśayo 'pi nivṛttyaṅgam ata eva śāstrakāreṇa eva pūrvam sambandhādīni yujyante vaktum /
GSP28durdhpru:572: vyākhyātṝṇāṃ hi vacanaṃ krīḍādyartham anyathā api sambhāvyate /
GSP28durdhpru:573: śāstrakṛtāṃ tu prakaraṇaprārambhe na viparītābhidheyādyabhidhāne prayojanam utpaśyāmo na api pravṛttim /
GSP28durdhpru:575: anukteṣu tu pratipatṛbhir niṣprayojanam abhidheyaṃ sambhāvyeta asya prakaraṇasya kākadantaparīkṣāyā iva,
GSP28durdhpru:578: ato vā prakaraṇāt laghutara upāyaḥ prayojanasya,
GSP28durdhpru:582: yady avaśyaṃ vaktavyānyabhidheyādīni tarhi vyākhyātāra eva tāni vakṣyanti /
GSP28durdhpru:583: tat kiṃ śāstrakṛto vyāhāreṇetiy āha -- śāstrakāreṇaiva na vyākhyātṛbhiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:585: abhidheyādyanabhidhāne tu pravṛtter evāsambhavāt kathaṃ sambhavino vyākhyātāro yenāśaṅkya teṣāṃ vyāhāram ayaṃ nirasyatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:587: na sarvathā 'bhidheyādiprakāśanaṃ kenacin na karttavyam eveti codyaṃ pravṛttam,
GSP28durdhpru:588: kin tv ādivākyaṃ tadarthaṃ na karttavyam ity abhisandhinā /
GSP28durdhpru:589: tatra ye tāvat sākṣād ācāryopasannās teṣāṃ tadvacanād eva tatpratītau pravṛttijñānayoḥ sambhavāt sambhavi vyākhyātṛtvam /
GSP28durdhpru:590: tebhyo 'pi tad upasannānām iti kim avadyam?
GSP28durdhpru:591: nanu ca na śāstrakṛdvacanam api prasahya pravarttayati,
GSP28durdhpru:593: tac ca vyākhyātṛvacane 'pi sambhavatīti kim ucyate śāstrakāreṇaivety ata āha -- vyākhyātṝṇāṃ hi iti /
GSP28durdhpru:595: śāstrakāreṣv apīdaṃ samānam ity āha -- śāstrakṛtām iti /
GSP28durdhpru:597: viparītaṃ ca tad abhidheyādyabhidhānaṃ ceti vigraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:598: atha vā viparītaṃ ca tadasatyatvād abhidheyañ cābhidheyatayā prakāśanāt /
GSP28durdhpru:601: anenaitad āha -- teṣām api tathābhidhāne kim asmākaṃ bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ?
GSP28durdhpru:602: kevalam eṣāṃ mahīyasāśayena śāstraṃ praṇetum icchatāṃ parārthapravṛttānāṃ naitat sambhāvayāma iti /
GSP28durdhpru:604: etac ca prayojanādyabhidhānaniyatasannidher yathābhūtārthacintāvidhānaviṣayasya kālasya nirdeśo na tu prakaraṇasya [7a] madhe 'vasāne vā tat sambhavati saprayojanaṃ ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:606: etāsu ca anarthasambhāvanāsv ekasyām apy anarthasambhāvanāyāṃ na prekṣāvantaḥ pravartante /
GSP28durdhpru:607: atha yady evaṃvidhā pravṛttiḥ śāstrakṛtāṃ dṛśyate,
GSP28durdhpru:608: tvayāpy asya kiṃ na sambhāvyata ity āha -- nāpi iti /
GSP28durdhpru:610: tad evotpaśāma iti sambhadhyamānam iha paśyāma ity asyārthe sambaddha(-bandha)vyam /
GSP28durdhpru:612: anenaitad āha -- tathāpi sambhāvayāmo yadi teṣām īdṛśī paśyāmo na tv evam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:613: ato hetos teṣv abhidheyādiṣu yad vā teṣu śāstrakāreṣu vaktṛṣu satsu tadukteṣv abhidheyādiṣv iti prakaraṇāt saṃśayo 'rthonmukha iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:614: nanu saty apy arthasaṃśaye 'rthatvābhāve pravṛttir nāsti /
GSP28durdhpru:615: tannimittā tu sā saṃśayamātrād api bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:616: tanmātrañ ca sādhakabādhakavirahād apy arthe siddham /
GSP28durdhpru:617: tat kiṃ tadutpādārthena vākyenety āha -- anukteṣu -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:619: nirgataṃ prayojanaṃ yasmān niṣkāntaṃ vā prayojanāt /
GSP28durdhpru:621: te ca na kvacit puruṣārtha upayujyante /
GSP28durdhpru:626: tasyā ratnaṃ ratiṃ tanotīti viśiṣṭaṃ vastu /
GSP28durdhpru:630: sator vā saprayojanaśakyānuṣṭhānatvayor asya prayojanam anabhimatam evāstikānāṃ sambhāyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:631: mātur vivāhasya kramaḥ paripāṭir upadiśyate yena pārasīkaśāstreṇa tadvat /
GSP28durdhpru:632: pārasīkaśāstreṇa hi mṛte pitari mātā prathamam agrajena putreṇa pariṇetavyā,
GSP28durdhpru:634: ato vā prakaraṇāl laghur alpagranthaḥ prayojanasya samyagjñānavyutpattilakṣaṇasya /
GSP28durdhpru:637: sambhāvanā ca sarvā varṇitā 'narthonmukhā pratipattiḥ yuktyā dvitīyākārānupraveśāc ca saṃśayapadābhilāpyā pratyetavyā,
GSP28durdhpru:639: tathāvidhā 'narthasambhāvanāyāś ca bījam idam asatyādivākye -- yady asya prayojanādikaṃ bhaved bahubhir anyair ivānenāpy ādāv uktaṃ bhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:641: kāmam amūr anarthasambhāvanā bhavantu kā no hānir ity āha -- etāsv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:643: prayojanādyanabhidhāna iva yady abhidhāne 'pi bhavanti tās tadā kim abhidheyādibhir abhihitair apīty āha -- abhidheyādiṣu iti /
GSP28durdhpru:646: atha katham anayor arthānarthasambhāvanayor virodho yataḥ sambhāvanā saṃśaya ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:649: abhidheyādiṣu tu ukteṣv arthasambhāvanā anarthasambhāvanāviruddhā utpadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:650: tayā prekṣāvantaḥ pravartante iti prekṣāvatām pravṛttyaṅgam arthasambhāvanā kartuṃ sambandhādīny abhidhīyanta iti sthitam /
GSP28durdhpru:651: śāvalambana ity anyonyasyām anyākāro 'stīti kutaḥ sahānavasthānam /
GSP28durdhpru:657: yuktes tv anathākārānupraveśa ity ubhayor apy anyonyavaiparītyenānubhavād katham avirodhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:663: turīyāṃ tu paramavivekaśālina ācāryasya prakaraṇārambhasāmarthyān nirasyate /
GSP28durdhpru:664: tathā hi na samāne 'py upāyāntare sambhavati mahato mahān ayaṃ prekṣāpūrvakārī prakaraṇam īdṛśam ārabhate,
GSP28durdhpru:666: atha syāt -- samasamayasambhavī deśāntaravartī ca kaścad etadagrato laghūpayāntarakākaḥ(-taragranthaḥ?) syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:669: prekṣāpūrvakāritvād eva tathābhūtāt tenāsmin nāryāvarte 'nyatra vā loke nedānīntanenaitadarthaṃ prakaraṇaṃ praṇītam iti bahudhā 'nusarttavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:670: anusṛtya dṛṣṭvā tal laghur upāya iti ca niścityedaṃ praṇetum ucitaṃ nānyatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:671: sarvatraiva prakaraṇe saty ādivākye laghūpāyāntaranirāse gatir iyam eva /
GSP28durdhpru:672: na hi anyatrāpy abhidheyatatprayojanādiprakāśanam antareṇa laghūpāyāntaranirāsābhidhānam astīti kiṃ nānumanyate?
GSP28durdhpru:673: yady evam itarāsām apy anarthasambhāvanānām evam evāstu nirāsas tat kim ādivākyena? naitat /
GSP28durdhpru:674: na hi sūcīpraveśa ity eva mūṣa(mūsa)
GSP28durdhpru:676: tathā hi -- asaty ādivākye prekṣāpūrvakāriprayuktatvam eva prakaraṇasya na śakyate kalpayitum,
GSP28durdhpru:678: dṛśyante hi prekṣāpūrvakāriṇaḥ prakaraṇādau sarvatra prayojanādyabhidhāyakam ādivākyaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:681: tasmān nāyaṃ prakaraṇakāraḥ prekṣāpūrvakārīti saṅkalpād u(-n no)
GSP28durdhpru:684: sā cen nāsti kiṃ tayotpannayāpīty āha tayā -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:685: yady arthasambhāvanā prakaraṇe puruṣasya pravarttayitrī tarhi kim abhidheyādy abhidhīyata ity āha -- iti -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:686: yasmād arthasambhāvanayā pravarttante itis tasmād arthasambhāvanāṃ karttum /
GSP28durdhpru:688: aṅgādiśabdānām asati bahuvrīhau paraliṅgāgrahaṇāt svaliṅgena nirdeśaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:692_0: loke ca pūrvam upadarśitam arthaṃ prāpayan saṃvādaka ucyate. tadvaj jñānam api [svayaṃ][18]pradarśitam
GSP28durdhpru:692_1: arthaṃ prāpayat saṃvādakam ucyate. pradarśite cārthe pravartakatvam eva prāpakatvam,
GSP28durdhpru:698: evam anena prabandhena samyagjñānetyādivākyasya samudāyārtha vyākhyāyāvayavārtham idānīṃ avisamvādakam ityādinā vyācaṣte /
GSP28durdhpru:705: agṛhītaprāpaṇād vā samyagjñānatve jalajñānam apy upadarśitamarīcikāḥ prāpayatīti na kiñcit samyajānaṃ na syād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:706: siddhāntavādy apy amīṣāṃ pakṣāṇām anabhyupagamena nirāsaṃ manyamānaḥ -- avisaṃvādakatvaṃ samyaktvaṃ vivakṣitam iti [8a] darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:709: tatpratiṣedhasya vidhirūpatvāt samvādaka evāvatiṣṭḥata iti saṃvādakārtho 'visaṃvādakaśabdaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:710: tad ayam arthaḥ -- avisaṃvādakaṃ pravṛttiviṣayavastuprāpakṃ smyagjñānam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:715: tat kutas tatra saṃvādakaśabda ity āha -- loke ca /
GSP28durdhpru:718: ayam āśayo yathā loke satyādiśabdapravṛttinimittasyopadarśitārthaprāpaṇasya puruṣe sambhavāt saṃvādakaśabdaḥ pravarttate,
GSP28durdhpru:720: athocyate nopadarśitārthaprāpaṇanimittakaḥ puruṣe saṃvāda[ka]śabdaḥ kin tu pratijñātārthaprāpaṇamittakaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:725: kvacid adhyavasāyenā[19] ............pi kvacid vastupratibhāsapūrvakeṇa kvacid anyathā vṛtteneti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:729: [19] pāṭḥo 'tra paścād vardhito dṛśyate kin tu sūkṣmatvāt na paṭḥyate /
GSP28durdhpru:731: prāpayan iti[20]lakṣaṇahetvor iti hetau śaturvidhānāt prāpaṇād ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:738: api tv arthe puruṣaṃ pravartayat prāpayaty artham. pravartakatvam api pravṛttiviṣayapradarśakatvam eva. na hi puruṣaṃ haṭhāt pravartayituṃ śaknoti vijñānam.
GSP28durdhpru:740: nanūpadarśitārthaprāpakaṃ saṃvādakam iti bruvatā jñānasyaikasyopadarśakatvaprāpakatve pratijñāte /
GSP28durdhpru:741: pravṛttim antareṇa prāpter anupapatter arthataḥ pravarttakatvam api /
GSP28durdhpru:744: anyat pravarrttayati yad anantaraṃ pravṛttim ācarati,
GSP28durdhpru:745: anyac ca prāpayati yataḥ prāptyābhisambadhyate puruṣa ity āśaṅkyāha -- pradarśite ca -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:747: pravarttakatvam eva prāpakatvaṃ bruvato 'yam abhiprāyaḥ -- yady apy arthaṃ sākṣātkṛtyānurūpaṃ niścayaṃ janayat pradarśakaṃ kiñcit,
GSP28durdhpru:748: aparaṃ pradarśayad vā bāhyāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ kāraṇāṃ bhavat pravarttakam,
GSP28durdhpru:749: itarat pravarttanadvāreṇa bāhyāyāḥ prāpter nimittaṃ bhavat prāpakaṃ vyapadiśyate,
GSP28durdhpru:750_0: tathāpi sa eva bāhyapravṛttikāraṇabhāvaḥ pravarttayitṛtvādiprayojakavyāpārarūpo jñānasya
GSP28durdhpru:750_1: puruṣapreraṇenārthajananena ca pravarttanaprāpaṇayor asambhavena pradarśanād anyo
GSP28durdhpru:750_2: nopayujyata iti vastutaḥ sarvasyaiva jñānasya niścayānugatasyādhigamān nāparau pravarrtanaprāpaṇavyāpārau /
GSP28durdhpru:751: ata eva tatrādyam eva jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
GSP28durdhpru:754: ata evaite pradarśakapravarttakaprāpakaśabdāḥ kṛtakatvānityatvādivan na paryāyā iti /
GSP28durdhpru:755: syān matam -- kiṃ punaḥ prayojanaṃ yena pravarttanāt nā'paraḥ prāpaṇavyāpāro jñānasya,
GSP28durdhpru:756: adhigamāc ca nānyat pravarttana prayatnena sādhyate?
GSP28durdhpru:758: tadā gṛhītagrāhitaiva tan niṣetsya[8b]tīti kiṃ tadarthena prayāseneti? atrocyate /
GSP28durdhpru:759: yadi pravarttayitṛtvaṃ prāpayitṛtvaṃ ca pradarśakatvāt paramārthato 'nyat syāt,
GSP28durdhpru:760: tadā gṛhītagrāhitaiva na śakyate pratipādayitum iti kena prāmāṇyaṃ niṣedhyeta?
GSP28durdhpru:761: tathā hi -- na taj jñānaṃ gṛhītaṃ gṛhṇāti,
GSP28durdhpru:764: tathākāriṇoś ca bhinnopayogatvāt prāmāṇyaṃ katham apākriyate?
GSP28durdhpru:765: yadā tu pravarttanān nāparaḥ prāpaṇavyāpāro jñānasya pradarśanāc ca nānyat pravarttanam,
GSP28durdhpru:766: prathamenaiva ca pratyakṣānumānakṣaṇenārthakriyāsamartho vastusantānaḥ pravṛttiviṣayīkarttuṃ niśacayāt śakyate,
GSP28durdhpru:767: tadottareṣāṃ tatsantānabhāvinām abhinnayogakṣematayā prāmāṇyam apāsyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:768_0: etena tad api pratyuktaṃ yat kenacid abhyadhāyi dharmottare -- “yady upadarśakatvam
GSP28durdhpru:768_1: eva prāpakatvaṃ tarhi yad uktaṃ upadarśitam arthaṃ prāpayat saṃvādakam iti tasyāyam
GSP28durdhpru:770: tathā hi yadi paramārthato 'rthābheda ucyate tadā na kiñcid avadyam /
GSP28durdhpru:773: kṛtakatvam anityatvaṃ pratipādayatīty api na vaktavyam,
GSP28durdhpru:775: atha śabdapravṛttyapekṣayā 'rthābheda ucyate tadā 'sāv asiddho vyāvṛttibhedasya darśitatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:776: tenāyam arthaḥ -- upadarśitaṃ sākṣātkṛtya janitānurūpaniścayam arthaṃ pravarttanadvāreṇa bāhyāyāḥ prāpteḥ sākṣād yojyatayā vā nimittatāṃ gacchat saṃvādakam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:777: vāstavas tu pravarttakaprāpakayoḥ prameyādhigatilakṣaṇāt pradarśanavyāpārād anyo vyāpāro nāstīti na pravarttayitṛtvaṃ pāpayitṛtvaṃ ca prayojakavyāpāro 'nayor bhinnaḥ” iti /
GSP28durdhpru:779_0: ata eva ca arthādhigatir eva pramānaphalam. adhigate cārthe pravartitaḥ puruṣaḥ prāpitaś
GSP28durdhpru:779_1: cārthaḥ. tathā ca sati arthādhigamāt samāptaḥ pramāṇavyāpāraḥ. ata eva cānadhigataviṣayaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:779_2: pramāṇam. yena eva hi jñānena prathamam adhigato 'rthaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:780: tena eva pravartitaḥ puruṣaḥ prāpitaś ca arthaḥ. tatra eva ca atha kim anyena jñānena adhikaṃ kāryam?
GSP28durdhpru:783: syān matam -- yady adhigatir evottareśām api phalaṃ syāt tadopayogāntarābhāvād bhaved aprāmāṇyaṃ yāvatā pravarttakasya pravṛttiḥ phalam,
GSP28durdhpru:784: prāpakasya prāptir iti phalabhedaniṣpatter bhinno vyāpāra ity āha -- ata eva -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:786: yataś ca na prasahya preraṇena pravarttanam,
GSP28durdhpru:787: ata evāsmād eva kāraṇād arthasyādhigatiḥ paricchittiḥ phalam,
GSP28durdhpru:791: na cādhigatāv api pravṛttiprāptyor abhāve sa parisamāpyata ity āha -- adhigate ca -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:793: yasmād yenārthaḥ samyagjñānena darśitas tatra tenāpravarttito 'pi puruṣaḥ pravṛttiyogyopadarśanāt,
GSP28durdhpru:794: tadgatasya ca vyāpārāntarasyābhāvāt pravarttita ity ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:796: jñānena tāvat pravṛttiyogyaḥ kṛta iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:797: astu puruṣas tathā pravarttito 'rthas tu na prāpitaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:798: tathā ca vyāpārāntaram anyāśrīnam astīty āha -- prāpita iti /
GSP28durdhpru:800: artho 'py asāv aprāpto 'pi śakyaprāptiko darśita iti prāpita ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:801: ata eva prāpaṇaśaktir eva jñāṇasya prāmāṇyam /
GSP28durdhpru:803: yato [9a] yena pravarttate tad api prāpaṇayojyam eva /
GSP28durdhpru:804: śaktiniścayas tv arthakriyānirbhāsasya sarvasyānumānasya ca svata eva /
GSP28durdhpru:805: pravarttakādhyakṣasya ca kasyacit svata eva yad abhyāsena parito nirastavibhramāśaṅkam,
GSP28durdhpru:806: yan nidrādyanupaplutaṃ sad āsannadeśam anāśaṅkya vyañjakādhīnā 'nyathābhivyakti ca vastu gṛhṇāti /
GSP28durdhpru:808: kasyacit tu parato 'rthakriyānirbhāsātmakāt svataḥ pramāṇād anyato vā yataḥ kutaścin nāntarīyakārthadarśanān madhyakālavarttibhrāntiśaṅkāpanodena niścīyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:810: sa tu yuktarūpaḥ pravṛttiyogyīkaraṇāt pravarttitaḥ prāpyārthopadarśanāt prāpito 'rtham ity ekavākyatayopadarśanāt /
GSP28durdhpru:811: evam uttaratrā'py eṣa eva pāṭho 'vadāta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:812: tathā ca sati tasmiṃś ca prakāre sati /
GSP28durdhpru:814: tasamād adhigamasya phalatvaṃ yuktam iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:817: ato 'smāt kāraṇād anadhigato jñānāntareṇāparicchinno viṣayo 'rtho yasya tat pramāṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:818_0: nanu adhigataviṣayam udīcīnaṃ jñānaṃ tatrārthe kiñcid adhikam ādadhānaṃ pramāṇaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:818_1: bhaviṣyati. na hi viṣayabhedād eva pramāṇabhedo 'pi tūpayogabhedād apīty āha -- yenaivaiti.
GSP28durdhpru:818_2: hir yasmāt. pūrvād yogyatayā pravarttitaḥ prāpita iti coktaṃ tatraiva pūrvajñānād
GSP28durdhpru:818_3: adhigate kim adhikam atiriktaṃ kāryaṃ karttavyam?
GSP28durdhpru:821: sa pratyakṣeṇa pravṛttiviṣayīkṛtaḥ. yasmāt yasminn arthe pratyakṣasya sākṣātkāritvavyāpāro vikalpena anugamyate,
GSP28durdhpru:823: tasmāt dṛṣṭatayā jñātaḥ pratyakṣadarśitaḥ. anumānaṃ tu liṅgadarśanān niścinvat pravṛttiviṣayaṃ darśayati.
GSP28durdhpru:825: na kiñcit / ādyenaiva karttavyasya kṛtatvād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:826: ato 'smād hetor adhigataviṣayaṃ[21] tadadhigantṛsajātīyaṃ vijātīyaṃ vā na pramāṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:827: tena pramāṇasamplavo nāma nāsty eveti prakāśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:831: nanu ca prabandhenānena pravṛttiviṣayopadarśakaṃ samyagjñānam iti darśītam /
GSP28durdhpru:833: tatra yadi samānam anayoḥ pravṛttiviṣayopadarśanaṃ tad idaṃ pratyakṣaṃ satpramāṇaṃ,
GSP28durdhpru:834: idam anumānaṃ sad iti bhedo na syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:835: atas tad anayor asamānaviṣayatvam eva kathitavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:836: evaṃ ca kasya kathaṃ tad iti vaktavyam ity āha -- tatra iti /
GSP28durdhpru:837: tayoḥ pratyakṣānumānayor madhye dṛṣṭatvena jñāto niścitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:838: yadi jñāta ity eva kriyate tadā 'numeyo 'pi niścitaḥ san pratyakṣeṇa pravṛttiviṣayīkṛtaḥ prasajyeteti dṛṣṭatveneti kṛtaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:839: atha yo dṛṣṭa iti kiṃ nocyate? nocyate /
GSP28durdhpru:840: kṣaṇiktatvāder api dṛṣṭatvena pratyakṣaviṣayatvād anumānāvatārābhāvaprasaṅgād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:841: nanu na pratyakṣasya niścayanād prahaṇam api tu pratibhāsāt /
GSP28durdhpru:842: tat kim ucyate jñāto niścita ity āśaṅkyāha -- yasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:847: evaṃ bruvataś cāyam abhiprāyḥ -- sāṃvyavahārikasya pramāṇasyedaṃ lakṣa[9b]ṇam ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:848: tato vastuvṛttyā prakāśamānam apy anurūpavikalpenāviṣayīkṛtaṃ sad apratibhāsamānaṃ nātiśete,
GSP28durdhpru:850: evaṃ tad grāhakam api tathāvidhavikalpenānanugamyamānavyāpāraṃ vyavahārayitum aparyāptaṃ sat tṛṇasyāpi kubjīkaraṇe 'samartham agrāhakaṃ nātivarttate /
GSP28durdhpru:851: tena yad uktaṃ pradaṛśakatvam ekatvam eva pravarttakatvādīti,
GSP28durdhpru:852: yac coktam -- adhigatir eva phalam iti tad anurūpaniścayānugatavyāpāram anurūpaniścayānugatāv iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:853: evaṃ yatra yatrocyate pratyakṣaṃ vastūpadarśakaṃ vastugrāhakam ityādinā śabdena tatra sarvatrānurūpaniścayānugatavyāpāram eva boddhavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:854: athaivaṃ sati vikalpasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ prasajyeteti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:855: etat svayam eva dharmottareṇāśaṅkya nirākariṣyata iti nehocyate /
GSP28durdhpru:856: yadi pratyakṣam evaṃ pravṛttiviṣayam upadarśayati anumānam apy evaṃ tadā
GSP28durdhpru:858: tathā ca pratyakṣaṃ pratibhāsamānaṃ[22] niyatam arthaṃ darśayati. anumānaṃ ca liṅgasambaddhaṃ niyatam arthaṃ darśayati. ata eva niyatasya arthasya pradarśake. tena te pramāṇe,
GSP28durdhpru:864: prāptuṃ śakyam artham ādarśayat prāpakam. prāpakatvāc ca pramāṇam.
GSP28durdhpru:869: pratyakṣaṃ na svayaṃ niścinvat pravṛttiviṣayaṃ darśayati kin tu niścāyayat /
GSP28durdhpru:870: anumānaṃ tu svayam eva niścinvad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:871: katham aprtibhāsamānaṃ niścetum īṣṭe tad ity āha -- liṅgadarśanād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:873: darśanaṃ ca svarūpagrahaṇapūrvakaṃ `sarvatredaṃ sādhyāvinābhūtam iti' jñānam,
GSP28durdhpru:874: `sarvatra sādhyāvinābhūtam iti' smaraṇapuraḥsaraṃ vā kvacit svarūpagrahaṇam iha vivakṣitam /
GSP28durdhpru:875: nanu ca pratyakṣānumānajñānavad anyasyāpi jñānasya yathā pravṛttiviṣayapradarśanaṃ tathā kiṃ na pradarśyate?
GSP28durdhpru:879: tarhi pratyakṣānumānyor api tathātvena prāmāṇyaṃ na syād ity āgūrya jñānāntarād[:
GSP28durdhpru:880: -antarada] bhedam anyayor darśayann āha -- tathā ca -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:882: pravṛttiviṣayapradarśanaprakāre[23] ..................m anyadā liṅgadarśanāt svayaṃ niścayena pravṛttiviṣayapradarśanaprakāre /
GSP28durdhpru:883: pratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ pratibhāsamānaṃ svarūpeṇa prakāśamānaṃ niyatam arthakriyākṣame bhāvarūpa eva vyavasthitaṃ darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:884: tena nānarthaṃ nāpy aniyataṃ darśayatīty ākūtam /
GSP28durdhpru:886: caḥ pratyakṣeṇa samam anumānaṃ niyatapradarśakatvena samuccinoti /
GSP28durdhpru:888_0: tad ayam arthaḥ -- yasmāl liṅgaṃ vijātīyavyāvṛtte 'rthe 'rthakriyākāriṇi tādātmyena
GSP28durdhpru:888_1: tadutpattyā vā sambanddham āyattaṃ tasmāt tatprabhavam apy anumānaṃ niyataṃ darśayati adhyavasyatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:889: tenānumānam api nānarthaṃ nyāpy aniyataṃ bhāvātmany abhāvātmani vā darśayatīti prakāśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:890_0: iyāṃs tu viśeṣo 'numānaṃ sambandhagrahaṇakāladṛṣṭasādhāraṇaṃ rūpam āśrityodayamānaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:890_1: svalakṣaṇam adhyavasyad api na santānāntarāsādhāraṇam adhyavastyatīti pravṛttiviṣāpekṣam
GSP28durdhpru:891: pratykṣaṃ tu pravṛttiviṣayāpekṣam apy asādhāraṇāviṣayam eva /
GSP28durdhpru:898: aumānaṃ tu parokṣārthasyāsākṣātkaraṇāt kathaṃ niyataṃ darśayati?
GSP28durdhpru:901: taṃ sāmastyaniṣedhavādinaṃ pratyupasaṃharann āha -- ata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:903: parokṣasyāntarā sākṣād anavabhāse 'pi tatsambaddhatayā cānumānaṃ kāryasvabhāvajam ekāntaniyataṃ bhāvam,
GSP28durdhpru:905: ato 'smād hetor ete dve api tathārūpe /
GSP28durdhpru:908: niyatam arthaṃ pradarśayato 'ta ete niyatārthopadarśake ity arthaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:909: etc ca parisphuṭasyaiva sphuṭīkaraṇam anarthakam āpadyeteti
GSP28durdhpru:911: ābhyāṃ pramāṇābhyām anyena ca darśito 'rthaḥ kaścid atyantaviparyastaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:912: yathā marīcikāsu jalam. sa ca asattvāt pāptum aśakyaḥ. kaścid aniyato bhāvābhāvayoḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:913: yathā saṃśayārthaḥ. na ca bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ yukto 'rtho jagaty asti. tataḥ prāptum aśakyas tādṛśaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:914: sarveṇa ca aliṅgena vikalpena niyāmakam adṛṣṭvā pravṛttena bhāvābhāvayor aniyata
GSP28durdhpru:917: pramāṇe tu katham ity āha -- tena -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:920: saty api tasmin kathaṃ tat syād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:921: anayoḥ prvṛttiviṣayapradarśanaprakāropadarśane tadanyasya jñāṇasya ca tadapradarśane yad buddhistham āsīt,
GSP28durdhpru:923: nānyad vijñānaṃ pramāṇam iti vacanavipariṇāmena sambandhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:924: yady evaṃ jñānatvāviśeṣād amū api pramāṇe mā bhūtām ity āha -- prāptum iti /
GSP28durdhpru:925: ādarśayad iti hetau śatur vidhānād dhetupadam etat /
GSP28durdhpru:926: tenāyam arthaḥ -- yataḥ prāptuṃ śakyam artham ādarśayati tena prayakṣādikaṃ prāpakam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:928: pramāṇaṃ tu kasmād ity āha -- prāpakatvād ca -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:930: nanu ābhyāmanye nāpi darśito 'rthaḥ śakyaprāpaṇa eva tatas tadupadarśakam api kiṃ na prāpakaṃ prāpakatvāc ca kiṃ na pramāṇam ity āha -- pramāṇābhyām iti /
GSP28durdhpru:933: tathāvidho 'pi kiṃ na prāpyeta ity āha -- sa ca iti /
GSP28durdhpru:937: tadupadarśakaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīty ata āha -- kaścid iti /
GSP28durdhpru:939: `sthāṇur vā puruṣo vā' iti hi pratyayaḥ sthāṇum ullikhya puruṣo vety ālambayaṃs tadabhāvam ullikhati /
GSP28durdhpru:941: bhāvāvyabhivāriṇaṃ ca sthāṇum avasyann abhāve nāpy abhāva(ve)
GSP28durdhpru:942: niyataṃ sthāṇuṃ puruṣaṃ vā darśayatīti bhāvābhāvayor aniyataṃ darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:943: yata evāyam ekāntaniyataṃ darśayitum anīśāno dolāyate,
GSP28durdhpru:944: tata eva saṃśaya ity upapadyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:946: ayaṃ tu kasmān na prāpyata ity āha -- na ca iti /
GSP28durdhpru:948: nanu bhavatu saṃśayaviparyayayor aprāmāṇyaṃ [10b] kiṃ naś cchinnam?
GSP28durdhpru:949: etad atiriktaṃ pratyakṣānumānābhyām anyat pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āśaṅkyāha -- sarveṇa ca -- ityādi /
GSP28durdhpru:953: eva artho darśayitavyaḥ. sa ca prāptum aśakyaḥ. tasmād aśakyaprāpaṇam atyantaviparītaṃ bhāvābhāvāniyataṃ ca arthaṃ darśayad apramāṇam anyaj jñānam.
GSP28durdhpru:954: arthakriyārthibhiś ca arthakriyāsamarthavastuprāptinimittaṃ jñānam mṛgyate. yac ca tair mṛgyate,
GSP28durdhpru:955: tad eva śastre vicāryate. tato 'rthakriyāsamarthavastupradarśakaṃ samyagjñānam.
GSP28durdhpru:957: anumānasyāpi tathātvaṃ syād ity āha -- aliṅgena -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:958: nāsya liṅgam utpādakatvena vidyata ity aliṅgam /
GSP28durdhpru:959: yady aliṅgena sarveṇa tat karaṇīyaṃ tadā pratyakṣapṛṣṭḥabhāvino 'pi vikalpasya tadā ''yātam ity āha -- niyāmakaṃ iti /
GSP28durdhpru:960: viṣayādhīno hi niyatārthaparigraho jñānasyety artho niyāmakaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:962: nanu kiṃ pratyakṣapṛṣṭḥabhāvy api niyāmakam arthaṃ dṛṣṭvā pravarttate,
GSP28durdhpru:963: yena tādrūpyavirahād anyeṣāṃ vikalpānāṃ tathātvam āśaṅkyate /
GSP28durdhpru:967: tathā ca sati pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvī vikalpo niyāmakaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva pratyakṣeṇa pratyayena pravarttyata iti tathātvena parihṛto bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:968: itare tv aliṅgavikalpā yena pravarttyante jāyante na tena sākṣān niyāmako dṛṣṭa iti teṣāṃ tathātvānuṣaṅgaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:969_0: anye tu anumānanivṛttyartham aliṅgeti yojayitvā kathaṃ punar avasāyātmakenāpy aliṅgena
GSP28durdhpru:969_1: tenaivaṃ karaṇīyam ity āśaṅkya niyāmakam adṛṣṭvety asya tu hetubhāvena viśeṣaṇatvān
GSP28durdhpru:971: yady api śabdādijanmāno vikalpā nobhayapakṣasaṃsparśena dolāyante,
GSP28durdhpru:972: tathāpi te niyāmakānāśrayeṇa pravarttamānā na yaukti(-kta)
GSP28durdhpru:975: sarvasya tasya samudācarator viruddhayor ākārayor abhāve 'pi yuktyā dvitīyākārānupraveśāt saṃśayarūpatvena bhāvābhāvāniyatārthopadarśakatvam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:976: eke tu niyāmakaṃ vikalpayitavyaṃ vastunāntarīyakaṃ vastv adṛṣṭvā pravṛtteneti yojayanti /
GSP28durdhpru:982: aniyatārthapradarśakam api tatprāpakaṃ syād ity āha -- sa ca iti /
GSP28durdhpru:984: aśakya ity asyānantaraṃ sa avadhāraṇārtho draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:985: so 'niyato 'rtho na prāptuṃ śakyo 'śakyatvād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:986: nanu ca tādṛśaṃ sarvaṃ mā bhūt prāpakam,
GSP28durdhpru:987: pramāṇaṃ tu kasmān na bhavatīty āśaṅkya pūrvoktam evopasaṃharati tasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:993: kaścid aniyata ityāder yathākrāmam upasaṃhāraḥ -- anyaj jñānam iti nānyaj jñānam ity asya /
GSP28durdhpru:996: tad eva prāpaṇīyam. arthādhigamātmakaṃ hi prāpakam ity uktam.
GSP28durdhpru:998: syād etat -- śakyaprāptikārthopadarśakam eva samyagjñānaṃ [11a] nānyad iti nirnimittam idam /
GSP28durdhpru:999: tathā cānyad api kiṃ na parīkṣyata ityāha -- arthakriyārthabhiḥ -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1004: etair arthakriyāyāṃ śaktasya vastunaḥ prāpter yan nimittaṃ tan mṛgyate 'nviṣyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1005: arthakriyārthitvād eva ca tad anveṣaṇam eṣām avaseyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1006: taiś ca prekṣāvadbhir iti prakaraṇād draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1007: itarathārthakriyārthibhir apy prekṣāvadbhir mithyājñānam api nibhālyata iti tatparīkṣā 'py āpatet /
GSP28durdhpru:1008: yadi nāma tais tan mṛgyaṃ tathāpi tad itarad api jñānaṃ kiṃ na parīkṣyata ity āha yac ca -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1011: īdṛśaṃ tat samyagjñānaṃ pravarttakaṃ yad anusaranti bhavanta iti vibhajya pratipādyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1012: ayam asyāśayaḥ -- na vyasanitayā ''cāryeṇā jñānaṃ vicāryate /
GSP28durdhpru:1014: te tathābhūtam eva jñānaṃ mṛgayante nānyad iti tad eva vicāryata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1015: tad eveti ca mukhyavṛttyabhiprāyeṇoktam na tu mithyājñānaṃ śāstre 'smin na vicāryate eva /
GSP28durdhpru:1016: prasaṅgāt tu tasyāpi kalpanāprabhṛtau vicārasambhavād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1017: nanu śakyaprāpaṇārthopadarśakam eva samyagjñānārthopadarśakam eva samyagjñānaṃ kuto vyavasthāpyate praśne kim idam aprakṛtam ucyata ityāha -- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1021: tato 'rthakriyāsamarthasya vastunaḥ vastunaḥ pradarśakaṃ samyagjñānaṃ nānyad iti arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1023: tat punar anyad upadarśya anyat prāpayad api kiṃ na samyagjñānaṃ tat pramāṇaṃ vyavahriyate?
GSP28durdhpru:1029: khādijñānam apy aṃśe saṃvādāt pramāṇam iti yat kaiścid iṣṭiṃ tad api samyagjñānavyavacchedyam iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:1035: na ca tena śuklaśaṅkhavastu marīcivastu vā jñātam /
GSP28durdhpru:1036: yathā tu jñānāntarād eva tathāvidhārthaprāptir na tatas tathā anenaiva prāmāṇyaparīkṣāyāṃ nirloṭhitam iti nehocyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1040: bhinnakālaṃ ca. viruddhadharmasaṃsargād dhi adyad vastu. deśakālākārabhedaś ca viruddhadharmasaṃsargaḥ.
GSP28durdhpru:1041: tasmāt anyākāravad vastu grāhi na ākārāntaravati vastuni pramāṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:1042: yathā pītaśaṅkhagrāhi śukle śaṅkhe. deśāntarasthagrāhi ca na deśāntarasthe pramāṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:1043: yathā kuñcikāvivaradeśasthāyāṃ maṇiprabhāyāṃ maṇigrāhi jñānaṃ na apavarakasthe maṇau. kālāntarayuktagrāhi ca na kālāntaravati vastuni pramāṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:1044: yathā ardharātre madhyāhnakālavastugrāhi svapnajñānaṃ na ardharātrakāle vastuni pramāṇam.
GSP28durdhpru:1046: tad eva tena prāpaṇīyam iti kuta evad ity āha -- arthādhigameti /
GSP28durdhpru:1048: uktam iti pradarśanādīnāṃ vastuto 'bhedaṃ pratipādya ato evārthādhigatir eva pramāṇphalam iti anena prakāśitatvāt,
GSP28durdhpru:1053: kathaṃ punar adhigatir eva phalam ity anena tathātvam asyoktam?
GSP28durdhpru:1056: atha vā prāptuṃ śakyam artham ādarśayat prāpakam ity anenaivam uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:1057: tathā hi tādṛśam artham ādarśayad iti paricchindad ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1058: paricchedaś ca prāpakatvān na bhidyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1060: yat tu tad eva prāpya vastu śaṅkhādikaṃ pītarūpatayā pradarśayati tatkatham asamyagjñānam ity āha -- tatra iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1062: pradarśatād rūpād bhinnākārādi sad vastv anyad ity anyatvaṃ vidheyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1064: tad evedam ity adhyavasāyād ity āha -- viruddheti /
GSP28durdhpru:1070: bhavatv evaṃ tathāpy ākārādibhinnagrāhijñānam ākārānntarādiyogini vastuni kiṃ na pramāṇam ity āha -- tasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1071: yasmāt samyagjñānena yad eva hi darśitaṃ tad eva prāpaṇīyam,
GSP28durdhpru:1073: kim iva kva na pramāṇam ity āha -- yatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:1075: kiṃvan na pramāṇam ity āha -- yatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:1079: bhinnakālagrāhiṇaḥ kā vyavasthā ity āha -- kālāntareti /
GSP28durdhpru:1080: upadarśanakālād anyena kālena vyāvahārikeṇā yuktaṃ sambaddhaṃ tadgrāhi bhinnakālavastugrāhīti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:1081: caḥ pūrvavat pūrveṇa sahedam aprāmāṇyena samuccinoti /
GSP28durdhpru:1083_0: ayam asyārthaḥ -- adharātre nidrāṇasya madhyāhnakālapratibhāsam anubhavato vaṇijyāgatasutavastudarśanahṛṣitaromṇa
GSP28durdhpru:1083_1: eva jhaṭiti bodhe kākatālīyanyāyena ca saty api putropalambhe tajjñāṇaṃ na pramāṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:1084: tat khalu paramārthenārdharātrakālasambanddhaṃ madhyāhnakālākalitaṃ ca pratītam iti madhyāhnakālatvenāvabhāsanād eva ca madhyāhṇakālaṃ tad vastūktam /
GSP28durdhpru:1086: nanu ca deśaniyatam ākāraniyataṃ ca prāpayituṃ śakyam,
GSP28durdhpru:1088: tatkālaṃ na śakyaṃ prāpayitum. na ucyate -- yasminn eva kāle paricchidyate,
GSP28durdhpru:1089: tasminn eva kāle prāpayitavyam iti. anyo hi darśanakālaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1090: anyaś ca prāptikālaḥ. kiṃ tu -- yatkālaṃ paricchinnam,
GSP28durdhpru:1091: tad eva tena prāpaṇīyam. abhedādhyavasāyāc ca santānagatam ekatvaṃ draṣṭavyam iti.
GSP28durdhpru:1093: ardharātraḥ kāla āgamanakālo yasya tasmin na pramāṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:1094: atha vā yo 'rdharātre supto 'hno madhyam udgate savitari putram āgataṃ dṛṣṭavā prabhātāyāṃ rātrau sampanne madhyandine tasminn eva ca deśe tam eva suta(-taṃ)
GSP28durdhpru:1096: tasya taj jñānaṃ saṃvādamātrabhāg api na pramāṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:1102: tadā tv ardharātraḥ paramārthataḥ pratibhāsakālo yasya madhyāhnakālayuktavastuna iti yojyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1103: etena suptasya kenacit paṭhyamānaṃ granthaṃ śṛṇvato jñānam asatyārthaṃ vyākhyātam avaseyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1104: yasmād deśakālabhinnātmānaṃ śrotāraṃ granthaṃ ca śrotavyaṃ paśyati nidropahataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1106: yaddeśakālau ca stas tathā na gṛhṇātīti /
GSP28durdhpru:1107: anayaiva ca diśā vājisvapno 'pi vyākhyāto draṣtavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1108: yatas tatrāpi ghoṭakasvapne yatkāladarśanavi[12a]ṣayā bhāvā dṛśyante na tathā santi,
GSP28durdhpru:1109: yatkālāś ca santi tatkālā na dṛśyante /
GSP28durdhpru:1112: tasmāt svapne keṣāñcid anubhūtānāṃ atyantam abhāvād arthakriyāyā nāsti sattvam /
GSP28durdhpru:1113: kecit tu arthakriyākāritayā abhimatāh saty asvapne viṣayā dṛṣṭakālabhedavyabhicāriṇo na santy eveti prakaraṇārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1114_0: idam īdṛgviśiṣṭaṃ svapnajñānam udāharato dharmottarasyāyam āśayaḥ -- evaṃvidhasya
GSP28durdhpru:1114_1: svapnajñāṇasya sadarthatvābhimānaḥ keṣāñcit satyasvapnavādinām astīti tad abhimānaśamanāyedaṃ mayodāharaṇīkṛtam /
GSP28durdhpru:1115: na tv asmād anyasya svapnajñānasya kaśicd viśeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1117: idānīṃ `paricchidyamānasya yatkālaṃ paricchedanaṃ tatkālam eva prāpyamāṇasya prāpaṇaṃ abhimatam' -- evaṃ bruvata iti matvā 'syārthasyānupapattiṃ codyati -- nanu ca -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1118: deśe niyatam ākāre niyataṃ ca śakyaṃ prāpayitum ity abhidadhāno 'nayor avipratipattim āha /
GSP28durdhpru:1119: idaṃ tu na sambhāvyata ity āha -- yatkālaṃ tu -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1121: yaḥ kālo sya paricchedanasya tad yathā bhavati tathā paricchinnam /
GSP28durdhpru:1122: sa kālo yasya prāpaṇasya tad yathā bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:1124: yasmin kāle paricchinnam tasmin kāle na śakyate prāpayitum ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1125: evaṃ ca bruvatā 'nena kālāntaragrāhīti yad uktaṃ tad ayuktam iti darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:1130: samyagjñānam pūrvaṃ kāraṇaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathā uktā /
GSP28durdhpru:1131: kāryāt pūrvaṃ bhavat kāraṇaṃ pūrvam uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:1135: tat kiṃ tvayaivaṃ nocyata iti pārśvasthaṃ praty asyaivābhiprāyaṃ prakāśayati -- anyo hi -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1137: yady evaṃ nocyate tarhi kiṃ nāmocyata ity āha -- kin tu -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1140: na hi yad eva paricchinnam ity asti yenaivam ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1141: yatkālaṃ tu prariccchinnaṃ tatkālam iti tu yuktaṃ vaktum,
GSP28durdhpru:1145: yatkālam ity anena hi takālam iti prāptam,
GSP28durdhpru:1146: tad eveti tacchabdena vastuviṣayo yacchabda ākṛṣyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1147: tato 'yam arthaḥ -- yatkālaṃ paricchinnaṃ yad vastu takālaṃ tad eva vastu prāpanīyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1153: tathā hi pūrvapakṣāvasthāyāṃ yatkālaṃ tatkālaṃ iti cātra bahuvrīhiṇā paricchedanalakṣaṇā prāpaṇalakṣaṇā ca kriyā 'bhidhīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1155: yad vastu yena kālena sambaddhaṃ paricchinnaṃ tad eva tena kālena sambaddhaṃ svarūpeṇa prāpaṇīyaṃ tadā 'nyadā vā /
GSP28durdhpru:1156: paricchedasya yādṛśaḥ kālas tasmin kāle yad vidyamānaṃ tad eva prāpaṇīyam iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:1157: tataś ca paricchedakā[12b]lā 'sato yad grāhakaṃ tan na pramāṇam ity avatiṣṭhate /
GSP28durdhpru:1158: nocyate yasmin kāla ityādinā ca yad etad uktaṃ tad bāhyaprāpaṇābhiprāyeṇa draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1159: paramārthatas tu jñānasya pradarśanād anyaḥ prānapaṇāvyāpāro nāstīti yasminn eva kāle paricchidyate 'rthas tasminn eva kāle prāpyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1160: etac cānantaram evānenaiva vistareṇa pratipāditam iti svavacanavyāghāto 'nyathā 'sya syād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1161: nanv evam api paricchedakālavarttinaḥ prāpaṇaṃ na sambhavaty eva /
GSP28durdhpru:1163: tathā copadarśitārthaprāpakatvaṃ nāma kasyacid api jñānasya nāstīty asambhavitaiva samyagjñānatvalakṣanasya syād ity āśaṅkyāha -- abhedeti /
GSP28durdhpru:1166: ayam asya bhāvaḥ -- sāṃvyavahārikasyeha pramāṇasya lakṣaṇām ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1168_0: tatra yady api vastusthityā paricchinnaprāpyayor nānātvaṃ tathāpi vyavaharttāro nirantarāparāparotpatter
GSP28durdhpru:1168_1: avidyāvaśāc ca hetuphalarūpaṃ kṣaṇapracayaṃ tad evedam ity ekatvenādhimuñcanti tataḥ
GSP28durdhpru:1170: tad anena prabandhena samayagjñanapadaṃ vyākhyāyādhunā pūrvaśabdaṃ vyācikhyāsus tena sādharmasya vigraham āha -- samyagjñānam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1175: tad iha parīkṣyate. tac ca pūrvamātram. na tu sākṣātkāraṇam. samyagjñāne hi sati pūrvadṛṣṭasmaraṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:1178: pravṛtteś ca prāptiḥ. tato na sākṣāthetuḥ.
GSP28durdhpru:1181: tathā ca samyagjñānakāraṇiketi vaktum ucitaṃ tatkim evam uktam ity āha -- kāryād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1182: anena vyavasthāvācī sann eva pūrvaśabdaḥ kāraṇe varttata iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:1183: bhavad iti `lakṣaṇahetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ' [pāṇini 3.2.126] iti hetau śatur vidhānāt hetupadam etat /
GSP28durdhpru:1184: yady evaṃ kāraṇaśabda eva kriyatām ity āha -- kāraṇeti /
GSP28durdhpru:1188: na ca mukhye sambhavati amukhye pratyayo yujyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1189: tato yad eva jñānam avyavadhānena puruṣārthasiddher nibandhanam,
GSP28durdhpru:1190: tad eva kāraṇaśabdena pratīyeteti. yadi pūrvagrahaṇe 'py evaṃ pratyayas tadā ko viśeṣa ity āha -- pūrvaśabda iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1191: tuḥ kāraṇaśabdād viśeṣam asyāha -- pūrvamātram iti sākṣātkāraṇam itaraś ca /
GSP28durdhpru:1194: sarvasyaiva puruṣārthasiddhiṃ prati sākṣātkāraṇatvād ity āha -- dvividhaṃ ca -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1196: kathaṃ dvaividhyam ity āha -- arthakriyeti. nirbhāsate 'sminn iti nirbhāsaḥ. arthakriyāyā nirbhāso yasmāt tat tathā. yataḥ sādhanajñānād anantaraṃ dāhādipratibhāsajñāṇam utpadyate,
GSP28durdhpru:1198: kecit tu kṣaṇena kāryakāraṇāvyavahārasyārvāgdarśanena karttum aśakyatvād dāhādipratibhāsam eva jñānam evaṃ bruvate /
GSP28durdhpru:1203: anyoḥ kiṃ parīkṣyata ity āha tayoḥ -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1204: pravarttakam api sākṣātkāraṇaṃ tat ko 'nyatra vidveṣo yenedam eva vicāryate?
GSP28durdhpru:1205: kiṃ vā pūrvaśabdenety āha -- tac ca iti. co yasmāt.
GSP28durdhpru:1206: ayam āśayaḥ -- yataḥ pravarttante tat sarvam arthaprāpter vyavahitaṃ kāraṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:1207: ataś ca sambhavat pratibandhaṃ tat pravṛttyaṅgatvāt pūrvamātram,
GSP28durdhpru:1210: amum eva draḍhyann āha -- na tu -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1212: kuta etad ity āha -- samyagjñāna iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1217: tataḥ pravṛttiḥ pravarttakajñānopadarśitam arthaṃ prāptukāmā vyāpārasahāyā buddhiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1219: yasmāt smaraṇādinā vyavadhānaṃ tataḥ tasmāt na sākṣāṭ hetuḥ prāpter upāyaḥ puruṣārthasidder iti prakaraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1222: tathā api tan na parīkṣaṇīyam. yatra eva hi prekṣāvanto 'rthinaḥ sāśaṅkāḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1223_0: tat parīkṣyate. arthakriyānirbhāse ca jñāne sati siddhaḥ puruṣārthaḥ. tena tatra
GSP28durdhpru:1223_1: na sāśaṅkā arthinaḥ. atas tan na parīkṣaṇīyam. tasmāt parīkṣārham asākṣātkāraṇaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:1223_2: samyagjñānam ādarśayituṃ kāraṇaśabdaṃ parityajya pūrvagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam.
GSP28durdhpru:1229: yadi paramparayā 'pi prāptihetuḥ parīkṣyate tarhi sākṣāt hetur atitarāṃ parīkṣaṇīya ity āha -- arthakriyānirbhāsam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1231: yada prāptihetur iti pāṭhas tadā arthakriyānirbhāsam ity asyāntyavyākhyānapakṣe bhinnā santoṣādiprāptir lokādhyavasāyasiddhā yā tasyā hetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1235: kasmāt tat na parīkṣyata ity āha -- yatraiva hi -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1239: evaṃ bruvataś cāyam āśayaḥ -- na vyasanam etac chāstrakṛto yena jñānam aprīkṣamāṇaḥ svāsthyam alabhamānaḥ parīkṣate /
GSP28durdhpru:1242: tato yatraiva te tathāpravṛttayas tad eva parīkṣyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1243: arthakriyānirbhāse 'pi te tathāvṛttaya ity āha -- arthakriyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:1249: vyākhyānadvaye 'pi arthakriyānirbhāsaśabdavācyadvaye sthite dvayam etat śaṅkāyāḥ kāraṇam -- anantaraphalādarśanam,
GSP28durdhpru:1251: tadabhābe tu kathaṃ śaṅkerann iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1252: mā bhūvaṃs tatra sāśaṅkās tat kiṃ siddham ity āha-- ata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1253: yadi vyavahitaṃ pravarttakaṃ puruṣārthasiddher na kāraṇaṃ tarhi katham uktam -- `kāryāt pūrvaṃ bhavat kāraṇaṃ pūrvam uktam' iti?
GSP28durdhpru:1254: asākṣātkāraṇe cākāraṇe kāraṇa[13b]viśeṣaṇaṃ sākṣād iti nirarthakam ity āśaṅkyāha -- tasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1255_0: yasmāt sākṣātkāraṇam āśaṅkānāspadaṃ sad aparīkṣaṇīyaṃ tasmād yad asākṣātkāraṇam ata
GSP28durdhpru:1255_1: eva ca parīkṣārhaṃ parīkṣkṣāyogyaṃ pravarttakaṃ samyagjñānam ādarśayitum ādarśayiṣyāmi
GSP28durdhpru:1255_2: -- iti kāraṇaśabdaṃ vihāya pūrvagahaṇaṃ kṛtam ācāryeṇety arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1256: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- yo 'yaṃ kāraṇaśabdo vyavahite kāraṇakāraṇe varttate nāyaṃ tatrābhidhāyakatvena varttate karotīti kāraṇam iti vyutpatteḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1259: puruṣasya arthaḥ puruṣārthaḥ. arthyata ity arthaḥ kāmyata iti yāvat. heyo 'rtha upādeyo vā. heyo hy artho hāntum iṣyate,
GSP28durdhpru:1260: upādeyo 'pi upādātum. na ca heyopādeyābhyām anyo rāśir asti. upekṣaṇīyo hy anupādeyatvāt heya eva. tasya siddhiḥ hānam upādānaṃ ca. hetunibandhanā hi siddhir utpattir ucyate,
GSP28durdhpru:1261: jñānanibandhanā tu siddhir anuṣṭhānam. heyasya ca hānam anuṣṭhānam,
GSP28durdhpru:1262: upādeyasya ca upādānam. tato heyopadeyayor hānopādānalakṣaṇānuṣṭhitiḥ siddhir ity ucyate.
GSP28durdhpru:1264: syād etat -- saty api kāraṇagrahaṇe vicārārham eva samyagjñāṇaṃ pratipatsyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1268_0: tena pradhānānurodhāt tacchabdo varṇitayā nītyā mukhyasya kāraṇasya samyagjñānasya
GSP28durdhpru:1269: yathā mañcāḥ krośantīty atra pradhānānurodhāt mañcaśabdaḥ krośanakriyākarttṛtvānupapatteṛ mukhyam arthaṃ tyaktvā lakṣaṇayā tātsthyabhūtayā pratyāsattyā puruṣeṣu varttata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1271: kevalam evaṃ sati vyākhyātṝṇām idaṃ kauśalaṃ syān na śāstrakṛta iti sarvam anavadyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1272: idānīṃ puruṣārthasiddipadaṃ vivariṣuḥ puruṣaśabdena sārdham arthaśabdasya vigraham,
GSP28durdhpru:1274: arthyata ity ācakṣāṇo[25]`artha yācñāyām' ity ato ṇijantāt karmaṇyacaṃ darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:1275: arthyata ity asyārthaṃ spaṣṭayati -- kāmyata iṣyata ity anena yāvān evārthaṃ uktas tāvān evārthyata ity anenāpīti iti yāvad ity asyārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1278: {Nach Ausgabe in Böthlingk ist es in 10,357}
GSP28durdhpru:1280: ko 'sāv arthaṃ ity āha -- heya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1283: na tarhi heyo 'rtha ity āha -- heya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1285: heyo hātuṃ tyaktum iṣyate tasmād arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1287: atra yady api svīkaraṇecchā nāsti tathāpi parihārecchā tāvad astīti /
GSP28durdhpru:1288: yadi hātum iṣyamāṇo 'rthaḥ katham upādeyo 'rtha ity āha -- upādeyo 'pīṣyate kevalam upādātum /
GSP28durdhpru:1289: na kevalaṃ heya iṣyate ity apiśabdaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1290: nanu ca na heyopādeyāv artho 'pi tv anyo 'pi /
GSP28durdhpru:1291: tataḥ so 'pi kasmān na pradarśyata ity āha -- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:1294: yatra na pravṛttir yataś ca na nirvṛttiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1295: tat katham anubhavasiddhasyāpahnva ity āha -- upekṣaṇīya iti / hir yasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1297: tattra yady anupādeyatvād dheyas tadā 'heyatvād upādeyaḥ kiṃ na bhavati” iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1298: sādhūktaṃ tena bhadantena kevalaṃ heyaśabdārthavicāre mano na
GSP28durdhpru:1300: sarvā cāsau puruṣārthasiddhiś ceti. sarvaśabda iha dravyakārtsnye vṛttaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1301: na tu prakārakārtsnye. tato na ayam arthaḥ -- dviprakārā api siddhiḥ samyagjñānanibandhanā eva iti. api tv ayam arthaḥ -- yā kācit siddhiḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1302: sā sarvā kṛtsnā eva asau samyagjñānanibandhanā iti. mithyājñānād dhi kākatālīyāpi nāsty arthasiddhiḥ. tathā hi -- yadi pradarśitam artham prāpayaty evam tato bhavaty arthasiddhiḥ.
GSP28durdhpru:1310: tena ahiviṣakaṇṭakādīnām api hānaṃ tatrā [14a] 'pravṛttir eva /
GSP28durdhpru:1312: tathā ca yadi tasya svīkāro bhavet,
GSP28durdhpru:1314: na ca tat svīkriyata iti vyaktam ayaṃ hetur asiddhas tasya /
GSP28durdhpru:1317: athānubhavasiddhasya tṛtīyarāśer upekṣaṇiyasyāsvīkaraṇamātrād dheyena sārdham aikyapratipādanam ayuktam iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:1319: na hi vayam api prasiddhyor heyopekṣaṇiyayor arthayor ekasvabhāvatām ātiṣṭhāmahe /
GSP28durdhpru:1320: kin tu kriyānimittena heyaśabdenaikābhidhānam tathā 'svīkaraṇārthena hānaśabdenopekṣāyā abhidhānam iti kim avadyam?
GSP28durdhpru:1322: adhunā siddhiśabdasyārthapadena vigrahaṃ bruvann artham āha -- tasya -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1324: yathaudanasya siddhir iti. tat katham evaṃ varṇyata ity āha -- hetunibadhaneti. hetuḥ kāraṇaṃ nibaddhyate 'sminn iti nibandhanaṃ pratibandhaviṣayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1325: hetur nibandhanam asyā iti vigṛhya hetupratibaddhety artho vaktavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1326: yadi janakanibandhanā siddhir īḍṛśī tarhi jñānanibandhanā kīdṛśī bhaviṣyatīty āha -- jñāneti /
GSP28durdhpru:1327: tuḥ pūrvasyāḥ siddher asyā bhedaṃ darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:1328: evaṃ ca vyācakṣāṇa arthapadavyākhyāne “arthaḥ prayojanaṃ dāhādi“,
GSP28durdhpru:1329: siddhipadavyākhyāne ca “tasya dāhāder niṣpattiḥ” iti yad vinītadevaśāntabhadrau vyācakṣātāṃ tad dvayam apy apāsyati /
GSP28durdhpru:1330: yataḥ svahetor eva vahnyāder dāhāder niṣpattir na tu jñānāt tasya tadakārakatvād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1332: tarhi hānam upādānaṃ siddhir ity āha -- heyasya ca -- iti. co hetau,
GSP28durdhpru:1333: avadhāraṇe vā hānam ity asmāt paro draṭavyaḥ. dvitīyaś cakāraḥ samuccayārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1334: kim evaṃ sati siddham ity āha -- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1335: yato jñānanibandhanā siddhir īdṛśī tatas tasmāt kāraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1336: puruṣārthasiddhiśabdānāṃ vigraham arthaṃ vyākhyāya samprati sarvaśabdaṃ vyākhyātuṃ vigraham āha -- sarvā ca -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1337: evaṃ ca vigṛhṇan yad vinītadevena vyākhyātam -- “sarvaś cāsau laukiko lokottaraś cāsannadeśo dūradeśaś ca puruṣārthaś ceti,
GSP28durdhpru:1341: pradarśitaṃ ca prāpayat samyagjñānam eva. pradarśitaṃ ca aprāpayat mithyājñānam. aprāpakaṃ ca katham arthasiddhinibandhanaṃ syāt. tasmād yan mithyājñānam,
GSP28durdhpru:1342: na tato arthasiddhiḥ. yataś ca arthasiddhiḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1343: tat samyagjñānam eva. ata eva samyagjñānam yatnato vyutpādanīyam. yatas tad eva puruṣārthasiddhinibandhanam,
GSP28durdhpru:1345: vyākhyāyamāne sarvaśabdena puruṣārthasiddher aviśeṣaṇād mithyājñānāt kākatālīyārthasiddhir nivāritā syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1351: sarveṣāṃ vā puruṣāṇām arthas tasya siddhiḥ” iti vyācaṣṭe,
GSP28durdhpru:1353: nanu sarvaśabdasya prakārakātsnaryavṛtter api darśanān na jñāyate kiṃ vṛttir atrābhipreta ity āha -- sarvaśabda iti. dravyasya niḥśeṣatāyāṃ vṛttaḥ pravṛtto vācakabhāvena /
GSP28durdhpru:1355: dravyaśabdena cedaṃ tad iti vyapadeśayogyaṃ grahītavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1356: na tu vaiśeṣikasiddhāntaprasiddhaṃ pṛthivyādi / tad uktam --
GSP28durdhpru:1358: dravyam ity ucyate so 'rtho bhedyatva vivakṣitaḥ” iti
GSP28durdhpru:1361: tathāvṛtter asya grahaṇād anyavṛttitayā prasiddhasyāpi pratiṣedhaṃ kaṇṭhoktaṃ karoti /
GSP28durdhpru:1365: prakārakārtsnyavṛtter agrahaṇe ko guṇa ity āha -- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1367: tathāpi katham ayam artho bhavatīti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:1368: bhavati hi prakārakārtsnyavacane sarvaśabde saty ayam arthaḥ -- na so 'sti puruṣārthasiddheḥ prakāraḥ phalalakṣaṇo vā yo na samyagjñānanibandhana iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1369: sati caivaṃ dviprakārā 'pi siddhiḥ samyagjñānapūrvikety ayam artho bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:1370: nanu cāsminn apy arthe prakāradvitayasya saṃgṛhītatvāt kim asaṃgṛhītaṃ nāma yenāyam artho yatnena mahatā hīyata iti?
GSP28durdhpru:1371: kathaṃ na hīyatāṃ kasyāścit tatprakārāntaḥpatitāyā hānavyakte[26].....................na hi ṣaḍ api rasaprakārān bhuñjānaḥ kaścin madhurāmlādirasavyaktīḥ sarvā eva bhuṅkte /
GSP28durdhpru:1372: na ca tathā 'kurvan sarvarasabhoktā na bhavatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:1376: yady ayaṃ nārthaḥ kas tarhīty āha -- api tu -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1377: nipātasamudāyo 'yaṃ kin tvat yasyārthe sarvatra varttate /
GSP28durdhpru:1378: nanu kṛtsnaivāsau samyagjñānanibandhanety ucyamāne mithyājñānāt kākatālīyā 'py arthasiddhir nāstīti darśitaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1380: yato yady api mithyājñānān niyamavatī nāsty arthasiddhīh,
GSP28durdhpru:1382: yathā kaścit dahanoparivarttiṃ maśakavarttiṃ dhūmam avasāyāgnim anumāya yadi pravṛttyā 'gnim āsādayati /
GSP28durdhpru:1386: samyagjñānasya tu niyamenārthasiddhinibandhanahetutvāt samyagjānam eva yatnato vyutpādyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1387: na tv etāvatā mithyajñānān nāsty evārthasiddhiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1390: na tu tatprakārāntaḥpātinyāḥ kasyāścit siddhivyakter mithyājñānasādhyatvam /
GSP28durdhpru:1391: na ca hānopādānavyaktayaḥ pratyekaṃ prakāraśabadavācyāḥ prakārānantyaprasaṅgāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1392: tasmāt sarvaśabadaḥ prakārkārtsnyavṛttir eva prahītavyaḥ -- iti purveṣāṃ matam āśaṅkyāha -- mithyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:1396: tad api prāpayaty evety āha -- pradarśitam iti / co yasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1398: tataḥ samyagñānam evety avadhāraṇam ayuktam ity āha -- pradaṛśitam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1399: co 'vadhāraṇe aprāpayad ity ataḥ paro draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1404: mithyājñāṇasya hīdam eva tattvaṃ yat pradarśitāprāpatvaṃ nāma /
GSP28durdhpru:1405: prāpake tu mithyājānavyapadeśaḥ samāropitaḥ syād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1407: tad arthasiddhes tu bibandhanaṃ kiṃna syād ity āha aprāpakam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1410: yasmād upadarśitāprāpakam eva mithyāñāṇam tasmād yat kiñcn mithyāñāṇaṃ tataḥ sarata eva nārthasiddhiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1411: yaḥ punar akasmād vahner upari maśakavarttiṃ dhūmam avasāya vahnim asvasyati,
GSP28durdhpru:1412: so 'py anumākālāt pūrvaṃ yāvan maśakavarttyādibhyo vyāvṛttaṃ vahnikāryaṃ niyataṃ dhūmarūpaṃ nirūpya vivecitaṃ tadānīm anumānakāle nānusarati,
GSP28durdhpru:1416: saty adhūmadarśane 'pi sandigdhavahnikāryatvāt kathaṃ niḥśaṅko nāma sacetanaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1418: anyasmāt tv ekāṃśāvagraho 'py anivartitaśaṅkāhetuḥ saṃśaya eva /
GSP28durdhpru:1419: saṃśayaś ca bhāvābhāvāniyatasyārthasyāśakyaprāpaṇasya darśako nārthasiddher nibandhanam /
GSP28durdhpru:1420: jñāṇātarād eva tu sā prāptir ity asyābhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1421: evam anyatrāpi mithyājñāne yathā prāmāṇyaṃ na yujyate,
GSP28durdhpru:1422: yathā ca jñānāntarād eva sā prāptis tathā dharamottareṇaiva viniścayaṭīkāyāṃ vipañcitam iti neha pratanyte /
GSP28durdhpru:1423: kutaścid arthasiddhir api syād ity āha -- yataś ca -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1425: arthasiddhinibandhanaṃ mithyājñānam ācāryasyāpi nābhimatam iti sāmarthyād darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:1432: ata evety enena yad eva hetutvenāpekṣitaṃ tad eva yata ityādinā sukhapratipattyarthaṃ kaṇṭhoktaṃ karoti /
GSP28durdhpru:1433: ayam āśayaḥ -- yady ācāryo mithyājñānād apy arthasiddhiṃ bhavitrīm abhipreyātm tadā na samyagjñānam eva prastāreṇa vyutpādayet /
GSP28durdhpru:1436: nanu samyagjñānapūrvikaivety avadhāraṇe sati mithyājñānād arthasiddhir nāstīti labhyate. na copāttam avadhāraṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:1437: tat katham ayam artho labhyata ity āha -- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1440: tato yāvad brūyāt -- yā kācit puruṣārthasiddhiḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1442_0: tāvad uktaṃ sarvā sā samyagjñānapūrvikā iti. itiśabdas tasmād ity asminn arthe. yattadoś
GSP28durdhpru:1442_1: ca nityam abhisambandhaḥ. tad ayam arthaḥ -- yasmāt samyagjñānapūrvikā sarvapuruṣārthasiddhiḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1444: yady api ca samāse guṇībhūtam samyagjñānam,
GSP28durdhpru:1445: tathā api iha prakaraṇe vyutpādayitavyatvāt pradhānam. tatas tasya eva tatśabdena sambandhaḥ.
GSP28durdhpru:1448: vṛttau sati sarvā kṛtsnā puruṣārthasiddhiḥ samyagjñānapūrvikā,
GSP28durdhpru:1449: na tu kācid vyaktir asti yā na tatpūrvikety ayam artho labhyate,
GSP28durdhpru:1450: tataḥ kāraṇāt pūruṣārthasiddhiḥ samyagjñānanibandhanaiveti sāvadhāraṇaṃ vākyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1451: yat parimāṇam abhidheyaṃ brūyād vaktuṃ śaknoti,
GSP28durdhpru:1452: tāvat parimāṇam uktam sarvā samyagjñānapūrvikety anena /
GSP28durdhpru:1454: kva punar yatśabdo 'sti yena vakṣyamāṇārthasaṅgatir ity āha -- yad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1455: co [15b] vyaktam etad ity asminn arthe /
GSP28durdhpru:1456: śabdayoḥ sākṣād anyonyāpekṣābhāvāt yattadarthayor iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1458: evaṃ sati kīdṛśo 'rtho vyavatiṣṭhata ity āha -- tad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1460: tat kathaṃ tasyāpradhānasya pradhānapratyavamarśinā tacchabde parāmarśaḥ syād ity āha -- yady api ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:1461: yady api ceti nipātasamudāyo viśeṣābhidhānārthābhyupagame varttate /
GSP28durdhpru:1464: vyutpādayitavyatvāt pradhānam ity abhidadhato 'yam āśayaḥ -- dvedhā hi prādhānyaṃ śabdato 'rthataś ca /
GSP28durdhpru:1465_0: tatra śābdena nyāyenāsaty api prādhānye samyagjñānasya vyutpādayitavyatayā buddhyantareṇopasthāpitasya
GSP28durdhpru:1465_1: svatantrasyā''rthena nyāyena prādhānyaṃ ko 'pahastayed iti tacchabdena tasya parāmarśo
GSP28durdhpru:1465_2: na viruddhyata ity evaṃ vyācakṣāṇo vinītadevavyākhyāṃ tiraskaroti /
GSP28durdhpru:1466: evaṃ hy asau vyācaṣṭe -- “tad iti napuṃsakaliṅgena nirdeśāt samyagjñānaṃ parāmṛśyata” iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1467: samyagjñānasyāprādhānyena parāmarśānupapattau talliṅgaprahaṇasyaivāyogāt katham asiddhena sādhyatām ity āśayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1470: caturvidhā ca atra vipratipattiḥ saṃkhyālakṣaṇagocaraphalaviṣayā. tatra saṃkhyāvipratipattim nirākartum āha --
GSP28durdhpru:1472: dvividham iti -- dvau vidhau prakārāv asya iti dvividham. saṃkhyāpradarśanadvāreṇa ca vyaktibhedo darśito bhavati.
GSP28durdhpru:1474: tacchabdena sambandhanaṃ sambandhaḥ svīkāra iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:1475: tato 'yam arthaḥ -- tat samyagjñānaṃ karamabhūtaṃ vipratipattinirākaraṇena pratipādyate bodhyate śiṣyajana ity arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1476: ata eva tad iti dvitīyāntam etad iti sopapattikam āha /
GSP28durdhpru:1479: vipratipattinirākaraṇena pratipādyata iti bruvatā lakṣaṇaṃ na virudhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1486: nanu vārttikādinaiva samyagjñānasya vyutpādanāt katham asya na vaiyarthyam iti cet saṃkṣiptarucīn prajñān adhikṛtyedaṃ prakaraṇaṃ praṇītam ity adoṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1487: atha kā 'tra vipratipattiḥ yannirākaraṇenedaṃ pratipādyata ity āha -- caturvidheti /
GSP28durdhpru:1494: tathā hi saṃkhyāvipratipattis tāvat pratyakṣam evaikaṃ pramāṇam iti lokāyatikānām /
GSP28durdhpru:1496: ārṣasya jñānasya pratibhāpranāmnaḥ kadācid iha laukikānām utpadyamānasya pratyakṣānumānayor ekatrāpy antarbhāvāpradarśanāt pratyakṣānumānārṣāṇy eveti cirantanavaiśeṣikāṇām /
GSP28durdhpru:1500: lakṣaṇavipratipattir api -- savikalpakam eva pratyakṣam iti vaiyākaraṇabārhaspatyādīnām /
GSP28durdhpru:1502: pītaśaṅkhādijñānaṃ bhrāntam api pratyakṣam ity aṃśavādavādinām /
GSP28durdhpru:1507: viṣayavipratipattir api -- sāmānyaviṣaye pratyakṣānumāne iti naiyāyikamīmāsakādīnām /
GSP28durdhpru:1511: tatra tāsu madhye saṃtkhyā tv ajātyā nirdhāryate /
GSP28durdhpru:1512: tato nirdhāraṇe yuktaṃ dvau vidhau prakārāv asyeti vigṛhṇan vidhaśabdo 'py asti prakāravācīti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:1515_0: dve eva samyagjñānavyaktī iti. vyaktibhede ca pradarśite prativyaktiniyataṃ samyagjñānalakṣaṇam
GSP28durdhpru:1515_2: ekam na śakyaṃ vaktum. tato lakṣaṇakathanāṅgam eva saṃkhyābhedakathanam. apradarśite
GSP28durdhpru:1515_3: tu vyaktibhedātmake saṃkhyābhede lakṣaṇabhedasya darśayitum aśakyatvāt. lakṣaṇanirdeśāṅgatvād
GSP28durdhpru:1523: anekārthatvāt tasya prakāravācino 'pi prayogasya “catasṛṣu caiveṃvidhāsu tattvaṃ parisamāpyate” [nyāyabhā- pṛ- 2] ityādāv anena prāyaśo dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1524: nanu kathaṃ nāma pramāṇād eva pravartteya nāpramāṇād iti pravarttitumanāḥ pramāṇasya lakṣaṇam eva jijñāsate,
GSP28durdhpru:1525: na saṅkhyām. tato lakṣaṇam eva vyutpādyaṃ na saṅkhyā. tac ca lakṣanaṃ yady ekasyaivāsti,
GSP28durdhpru:1526: tad ekam eva pramāṇam. atha bahūnām,
GSP28durdhpru:1527: tadā pramāṇabāhulyam anivāryam eva. atha tal lakṣaṇaṃ naikasyaivāsti nāpi bahūnām,
GSP28durdhpru:1528: tarhi lakṣaṇavyutpattau sāmarthyāt saṃkhyāvipratipattir nirākṛtā bhavatīti kiṃ pṛthak saṃkhyāvipratipattinirākaraṇenetiy āha -- saṃkhyeti. co yasmādarthe. dvāram upāyaḥ.
GSP28durdhpru:1529_0: kenākāreṇa darśito bhavatīty āha -- dve iti. itinā vyaktibhedasya svarūpam āha. vyaktibhedenaiva
GSP28durdhpru:1529_1: darśitena kiṃ prayojanam ity āha -- vyaktibhede ceti. co yasmādarthe. yady adarśite
GSP28durdhpru:1530_0: tathāpi kiṃ darśitenety anvayamātrād apratipatter vyatirekam api darśayitum āha --
GSP28durdhpru:1530_1: apradarśita iti. tuḥ pradarśanapakṣād apradarśanapakṣasya bhedam āha. sakalavyaktyanuyāyīti
GSP28durdhpru:1530_3: aśakyatvāt. lakṣaṇam ucyamānaṃ sakalavyaktyanuyāyi tad ekaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1533_0: nanu kim ucyate -- sakalavyaktyanuyāyi vaktum aśakyam iti yāvatā 'visaṃvādijñānaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:1533_1: pramāṇam ity asti lakṣaṇam ekaṃ suvacam apīti. satyam. kevalaṃ jñānānāṃ yat prātisvikaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:1534: tad upalakṣaṇaṃ nāstīty abhiprāyād adoṣaḥ. yad vā vipratipattinirākaraṇapravaṇaṃ yatsādhāraṇaṃ lakṣaṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:1536_0: na tena vipratipattir nirākṛtā bhavati. anyatrāpi parair avisaṃvāditvasyeṣṭatvād
GSP28durdhpru:1536_1: ity anenābhiprāyeṇoktam -- na śakyam ekaṃ vaktum iti viśeṣapratiṣedhasāmarthyāt śeṣavidhisiddhau
GSP28durdhpru:1536_2: ca tathābhūtasya sādhāraṇasya sambhavād eva sakalaśabdo 'yam upayuktakārtsnye pravartta[16b]nīyaḥ.
GSP28durdhpru:1537: pradarśitavyaktibhedātmakadvividhānaumānānuyāyi trirūpaliṅgajatvaṃ śakyaṃ vaktum iti. yadi nāmaivam,
GSP28durdhpru:1538: tataḥ kim ity āha -- tata iti. yato 'pradarśite na śakyam ekaṃ tathāvidhaṃ darśayitum,
GSP28durdhpru:1539: tatas tasmāt. lakṣaṇakathanāṅgam iti prativyaktiniyatalakṣaṇakathanāṅgam ity avaseyam.
GSP28durdhpru:1541: kiṃ punas tad dvaividhyam ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:1544: atha tathāvidhaṃ lakṣaṇam ekaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyatāṃ nāma /
GSP28durdhpru:1545: kim ataḥ? kevalam adarśite 'pi saṃkhyābhede lakṣaṇabhedo darśayituṃ śakyatām /
GSP28durdhpru:1546: tat kasmāt tatkathanāṅgaṃ saṃkhyābhedakathanam ity āśaṅkyānvayamukhenoktam arthaṃ draḍhayituṃ vyatirekamukheṇāha -- lakṣaṇeti /
GSP28durdhpru:1548: kadā darśayitum aśakyatvaṃ yata evaṃ bhavatīty ākāṅkṣāyām -- apradarśita iti paścād yojanīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1551: nanu ca na saṃkhyābheda eva vyaktibhedaḥ,
