GSP28durdhpru:1552: tat kathaṃ vyaktibhedātmka ity ucyata iti cet. vastutaḥ saṃkhyeyād anyasyāḥ saṃkhyāyā vāstavyā abhāvena saṃkhyāsaṃkhyeyayor ekatvavivakṣayā caivam ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1555: saṃkhyāsamkhyeyayor ekatvavivakṣayaiva ca saṃkhyeyavipratipattir eva nirākṛteti /
GSP28durdhpru:1557: bhedas tadātmā tathāvidhaḥ kalpanāśilpinirmito yasya saṃkhyābhedasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1558: paramārthato bhinne hi vastuni saṃkhyābhedaḥ kalpyata iti vāstavarūpānuvādam idam uktam iti kim avadyam?
GSP28durdhpru:1560: tad uktam -- pravṛttikāmānām upayogitvāl lakṣaṇam eva vaktuṃ yuktaṃ tad etat tv anyathā na śakyam ākhyātum iti saṃkhyābhedapradarśanam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1561: nanv asaty api dvividham iti saṃkhyābhedapradarśane tat samyagjñānaṃ cety ukte 'pi vyaktibhedo darśito bhavaty eva /
GSP28durdhpru:1562: sati caivaṃ lakṣaṇābhdedākhyānam api sukaram iti kṛtaṃ dvividhaśabdeneti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:1563: siddhe satīdaṃ vacanaṃ dvividham eveti niyamārtham iti brūmaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1564: itaratheha tāvad etāvadvyuptādyatayā prastutam anyatra punar anyad apy asti vyutpattyaṃ samyagjñānam ity āśaṅkāhatya na nirākṛtā syād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1565: yat punar uktam -- tarhi lakṣaṇavyutpattyaiva saṃkhyāviprtipattir nirākṛtā bhavatīti tad atyantam asaṅgatam /
GSP28durdhpru:1569: na coktam iti tathā kartum īṣṭe /
GSP28durdhpru:1570: yatas tad īdṛśaṃ pratyakṣam anumāṇaṃ cety etat kartuṃ śaknoti /
GSP28durdhpru:1571: na tv ābhyām anyan na samyagjñāṇam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1573: tad api tathāvidhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ vaktum aśaktyam iti kena tathā kriyatām?
GSP28durdhpru:1574: na ca tenoktenāpi tādṛśī vipratipattir nirākriyata ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:1575: athāpi syāt -- dvividham ity ukte 'pi katha[17a]m ābhyām anyasyāsamyagjñānatvavi(-tvādhi)
GSP28durdhpru:1577: ye tāvad ācāryapramāṇakā vyutpatsavas te tadvacanamātreṇaiva vivakṣitam arthaṃ bodhyante /
GSP28durdhpru:1578: ye te yuktyanusāriṇas tebhyo 'pi prakaraṇāntareṣūpapattir udāhṛtā /
GSP28durdhpru:1579: prajñajanādhikāreṇa cāsya prakaraṇasya prārambhāt svayam eva tair upapattir ukteti na saṃkhyāvacanam anupādeyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1581: ādau tu kasmād ucyata ity āha -- lakṣaṇa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1583: yathākathañcid dvaividhyasambhave pṛcchati -- kiṃ punar iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1586_0: pratyakṣam iti pratigatam āśritam akṣam. atyādayaḥ krāntādyarthe dvitīyayā[Vā 4 ad
GSP28durdhpru:1586_1: Pāṇ 2.2.18]iti samāsaḥ. prāptāpannālaṅgatisamāseṣu paraval liṅgapratiśedhād abhideyaval
GSP28durdhpru:1586_2: liṅge sati sarvaliṅgaḥ pratyakṣaśabdaḥ siddhaḥ.[29]akṣāśritatvaṃ ca vyutpattinimittaṃ śabdasya,
GSP28durdhpru:1587_0: na tu pravṛttinimittam. anena tv akṣāśritatvena ekārthasamavetam arthasākṣātkāritvam
GSP28durdhpru:1587_1: lakṣyate. tad eva śabdasya pravṛttinimittam. tataś ca yatkiñcid arthasya sākṣātkāri
GSP28durdhpru:1589: [29] nanu cāsyāṃ vyutpattau indriyajñānasyaiva pratyakṣaśabavācyatā syād na yogijñānāder ity āha -- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:1594: kena ca sūtreṇety āśaṅkya sukhapratipattyarthaṃ vipratipattinirākaraṇārthaṃ cāha pratigataṃ ityādi /
GSP28durdhpru:1597: evaṃ ca vigṛhṇan[29*]akṣam akṣaṃ prati varttataA iti vyutpattiprakāreṇāvyayībhāvaṃ nirasyati /
GSP28durdhpru:1600: kena sūtreṇāyam ity āha -- atyādaya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1601: āhopuruṣikayāyam prakāras tvayā darśito na tv asya kaścid guṇo 'stīty āha -- sarvalinga iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1602: avyayībhāvapakṣe pratyakṣo vṛkṣaḥ pratyakṣā mṛgāś ceti na syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1603: pratyakṣasyeti śrutiś ca na syād ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1604: kathaṃ punaḥ sarvaliṅgatā 'syety āha -- abhidheyavad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1607: tat tathā. tasmiṃś ca saty ayaṃ pratyakṣaśabdaḥ sarvaliṅgaḥ.
GSP28durdhpru:1611: nanu ca paraval liṅgaṃ dvandvatatpuruṣayoḥ[Pāṇ 2.4.26]iti samastena pratyakṣaśabdena pratiśabdo(-bdā)
GSP28durdhpru:1612: pekṣayā parasthānasthitasyākṣaśabdasya liṅgaparigrahāt katham asyābhidheyaval liṅgatety āha -- prāpteti.
GSP28durdhpru:1614: na tāvat prāptāpannālaṅgatisamāsena teṣāṃ svarūpagrahaṇāt tatra. atra ca tadabhāvāt. gatisamāsād iti cet,
GSP28durdhpru:1616: upasargāḥ kriyāyoge[Pāṇ 1.4.59]ity ataḥ kriyāyoge varttamāne gatiś ca[Pāṇ 1.4.60]ity anena kriyāyoga eva gatisaṃjñāvidhānāt. na cāyaṃ pratiśabdaḥ kriyāyogī,
GSP28durdhpru:1617: na ca gamanakriyāyogo 'trāstīti vācyam. pratiśabdasyaiva tatrārthe varttamānā(-natvā)
GSP28durdhpru:1619: gatigrahaṇena tatra yeṣāṃ gatisaṃjñā dṛṣṭā teṣāṃ arhaṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1620: pratyādīnāṃ sā dṛṣṭeti teṣām api tathātvena saṅgraha iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1621: yady evaṃ samāsas tarhi katham ācāryadignāgena akṣam akṣaṃ prati varttata iti prayakṣam[NMu]ity uktam?
GSP28durdhpru:1624: yadi tv akṣāśritatvam eva pravṛttinimittam syād indriyavijñānam eva pratyakṣam ucyeta,
GSP28durdhpru:1626: yathā gacchati gauḥ iti gamanakriyāyām vyutpādito 'pi gośabdo gamanakriyopalakṣitam ekārthasamavetaṃ gotvaṃ pravṛttinimittīkaroti /
GSP28durdhpru:1627: tathā ca gacchaty agacchati ca gavi gośabdaḥ siddho bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:1631: gṛhīte pakṣadharme smṛte ca sādhyasādhanasambandhe 'numānaṃ pravartata iti paścātkālabhāvy ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1633: atha pratigatam āśritam akṣam ity asyām api vyutpattau mānasasvasaṃvedanayogipratyakṣāṇāṃ na syāt pratyakṣaśabdavācyatety āha -- akṣāśritatvam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1638: kiṃ tarhi pravṛttinimittam ity āha -- anena -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1639_0: tunā vyutpattinimittād asya bhedaṃ da[17b]rśayati. yattador nityam abhisambandhāt
GSP28durdhpru:1639_1: yad akṣāśritatvenārthasākṣātkāritvam arthāparokṣīkaraṇam upalakṣyate tad eva tu pratyakṣaśabdasya pravṛttinimittam /
GSP28durdhpru:1640: kathaṃ punar anyenāsambaddhenānyasyopalakṣaṇam? mā bhūd i(a)
GSP28durdhpru:1641: tiprasaktir ity āha -- ekārthasamavetam iti hetubhāvena viśeṣaṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1642: yata ekārthasamavetaṃ tato lakṣyata ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1643: ekasminn arthe jñānalakṣaṇe 'rthasākṣātkāritvam akṣāśritatvena samaṃ samavetam /
GSP28durdhpru:1644: yady api paramārthataḥ samavāyasamavāyinau na staḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1645: tathāpi tadvyāvṛttinibandhanayos tathābhūtavastvāśrayeṇa kalpitayor akṣāśritatvārthasākṣātkāritvayor ekārthasamavāyasya ca kalpitasya sambhavād evam abhidhāne ko virodhaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:1646: paraprasiddhyā vā evam uktam iti kā kṣatiḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:1647: evam api kathaṃ pūrvadoṣātivṛttir iya āha -- tataś ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:1649: caśabda eva tasmād idam ucyata ity arthaṃ dyotayati /
GSP28durdhpru:1650: akṣāśritatve pravṛttinimitte ko doṣa iti pārśvasthasyāśrutacodakavākyasya vacanam āśaṅkyāha -- yadi-- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1652: athābhidhīyate -- yad arthasākṣātkaraṇam akṣāśritatvena samavetaṃ tad evānenopalakṣāṇīyam iti tadavasthe(-stho)
GSP28durdhpru:1655: akṣajatvasyopalakṣaṇatvenāprādhānyād arthasākṣākāritvam upalakṣyamāṇaṃ pradhānam upalakṣyaiva nivṛtter adoṣa eva /
GSP28durdhpru:1656: yathā kākebhyo dadhi rakṣyatām ity atra /
GSP28durdhpru:1661: tac copalakṣitam iti tad anyato 'pi dadhirakṣocyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1662: arthasākṣātkāritve 'pi samānam iti kathaṃ na mānasādeḥ pratyakṣaśabdābhilāpyatvam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1663: kiṃ dṛṣṭam idaṃ yad anyatra vyutpādito 'pi śabdo 'nyatra tatpravṛttiviṣayīkarotītyāha -- yatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:1665: kevalam apir avadhāraṇe gotvam(m ity a)
GSP28durdhpru:1671: yathā arthāvinābhāvitvād arthaṃ prāpayat pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:1672: tadvad arthāvinābhāvitvād anumānam api paricchinnam arthaṃ prāpayat pramāṇam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1674: tatra iti saptamy arthe vartamāno nirdhāraṇe vartate /
GSP28durdhpru:1675: tato 'yam vākyārthaḥ -- tatra tayor pratyakṣānumānayor iti samudāyanirdeśaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1678: tatra pratyakṣam anudya kalpanāpoḍhatvam abhrāntatvaṃ ca vidhīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1679: yat tat bavatām asmākaṃ artheṣu sākṣātkāri jñānaṃ prasiddhaṃ tat kalpanāpoḍhābhrāntatvayuktaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1682: na tu saty api nimittāntare yathoddeśam eva vyākhyānaṃ yuktam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1683: pratyakṣapadaṃ vyākhyāyādhunā 'numānapadaṃ vyācikhyāsuḥ mānaśabdasya tāvad artham ācaṣṭe mīyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1684: evaṃ vyutpāditenānea śabdena kiṃ pratipādyata iti? karaṇeti /
GSP28durdhpru:1689: yady evaṃ kathaṃ tarhi kvacit “trirūpālliṅgād yad anumeye jñānaṃ tad anumānam” iti?
GSP28durdhpru:1690: sārūpyopalakṣitaṃ jñānam eva tathā 'bhidhāsyata iti ko virodhaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:1692: anumānaṃ tu katham ity āha -- paścād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1693: anena paścād arthavṛttenānuśabdasya mānaśabdena saha “gatiprādaya” ity anena tatpuruṣasmāsaṃ darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:1694: na ca mānasya paścād iti [18a] vivakṣtiam,
GSP28durdhpru:1696: atra hi mānam eva pakṣadharmagrahaṇādeḥ paścādbhāvi vivakṣitam /
GSP28durdhpru:1699: kin tv anu mānasyeti ṣaṣṭhī ca na śrūyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:1701: “ṣaṣthy atasarthapratyayena” [pāṇini -- 2.3.30] ity anena paścāt śabdayoge ṣaṣṭhīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1702: katham etad dvayasya paścādbhāvy anumānam ity āha -- gṛhīta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1707: na caivaṃ prāpaṇe prāmāṇyāvahe kaścid viśeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1709: evaṃ bruvataḥ pratyakṣam apy adhyavasitam eva santānaṃ prāpayat pramāṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:1710: idam api tatheti katham asya na tathātvam iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1712: pratyakṣasyāpi yad arthāvinābhāvitvaṃ tat tadutpattinimittakam eva /
GSP28durdhpru:1713: tac cānumānsyāpi samānam iti arthāvyabhicāreṇāpi nimittinā samānena bhāvyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1715: na ca etan mantavyam -- kalpanāpoḍhābhrāntatvam ced aprasiddham,
GSP28durdhpru:1716: kim anyat pratyakṣaya jñānasya rūpam avaśiṣyate yat pratyakṣaśabdavācyaṃ sad anūdyeteti /
GSP28durdhpru:1717: yasmād indriyānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyyartheṣu sākṣātkārijñānaṃ pratyakṣaśabdavācyaṃ sarveṣāṃ prasiddham,
GSP28durdhpru:1721: anena “pratyakṣam ekaṃ pramānam” iti bruvāṇaś cārvākaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1723: kaniṣṭhaṃ ca tatpramāṇam” ity ācakṣāṇo mīmāṃsakaś ca nirastaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1725: yatra tv arthaviśeṣe varttate sa kathyata eva /
GSP28durdhpru:1727: kevalam indriyajñānādipratyakṣānuyāyitvāt pratyakṣatvākhyā jātir yā vyavahārasiddhā tayeti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1728: tatrety ayam evaṃ vyavasthite satīti vākyopanyāse /
GSP28durdhpru:1729: evaṃ cānuvādavidhikrameṇa yad anyad anyena vyākhyātam “pratyakṣam iti saṃjñā kalpanāpoḍhatvādi saṃjñy eva /
GSP28durdhpru:1730: tena saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhaḥ pratipādyate” iti tad vipratipattinirākaraṇe prastute 'prastutam /
GSP28durdhpru:1732: yad apy apareṇa vyākhyātaṃ “pradeśāntaraprasiddhayoḥ kalpanāpoḍhtvābhrāntatvayor anuvādena pratyakṣatvaṃ vidhīyate” iti tad api na caturasram iti pratipādayate /
GSP28durdhpru:1733: yataḥ prasiddhe lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāve lakṣaṇānuvādena lakṣyaṃ vidheyam,
GSP28durdhpru:1734: aprasiddhe tu lakṣaṇavākyena lakṣaṇam eva vidheyam,
GSP28durdhpru:1736: anyoś ca pakṣayor yāvān samarthanadūṣaṇaprakāras tāvān anenaiva viniścayaṭīkāyāṃ svayaṃ vivecita iti nehocyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1739: anena pūrva prasiddhasya paścāc chabdenābhidhānam anuvāda iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:1740: tad evaṃ draṣṭavyam iti vidadhāno 'jñātasya śabdena jñāpanaṃ vidhir iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:1744: tathā hi prathamaṃ yat tad indriyānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitayā pratyakṣaṃ prasiddham iti pratipādyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1745: tadanu yadīdam indriyāśritaṃ jñānaṃ bhavatāṃ pratyakṣaṃ prasiddhaṃ tatrāpi pratyakṣaśa[18b]bdapravṛttāv arthasākṣātkāritvam eva nimittaṃ jānīte iti pratipādate /
GSP28durdhpru:1747: yat kalpanayā 'poḍhaṃ rahitaṃ tat kalpanāyā apoḍham apagataṃ bhavatīty arthābhedaṃ matvā kalpanāyā apoḍham iti karttari niṣṭhām āha /
GSP28durdhpru:1748: na tu kalpanāpoḍham iti karttari niṣṭhaiva /
GSP28durdhpru:1749: evaṃ hi tayā rahitam ity ācāryavivaraṇavirodhaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1753: tatra yan na bhrāmyati tad abhrāntam /
GSP28durdhpru:1754: nanu kim ekasmin jñāne jñānāntarasambhavo 'sti yenāyaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ śobheta?
GSP28durdhpru:1755: kalpanājñāne 'pi ca kalpanāntaraṃ nāstīti tad api kalpanāpoḍhaṃ prasajyeteti vacanāvakāśaṃ paśyan kalpanāsvabhāvene[30]tyādinā 'sya vivikṣitam arthaṃ sphuṭyati /
GSP28durdhpru:1757: [30] dharmottare sarvatra pratiṣu `kalpanāsvabhāvarahitam' ity eva pāṭho labhyate na tu `kalpanāsvabhāvena rahitam' iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1759: evañ ca bruvan kalpanā'poḍham ity atrācārye lakṣaṇavākye bhāvapradhāno 'yaṃ kalpanāśabdaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1760: tena kalpanātvena rahitam ity artha iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:1762: ubhayathā 'pi `kalpanāsvabhāvarahitam ity arthaḥ' ity asya sphuṭīkaraṇasya ghaṭanāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1764: evaṃ ca śabdārthaṃ sphuṭayatā 'nena yad ācāryadignāgīyapratyakṣalakṣaṇadūṣaṇāvasare -- “kalpanā nāmajātyādiyojanā /
GSP28durdhpru:1766: jātyādinā ca na vyapadiśyate viṣayabhedānuvidhāyi yaj jñānaṃ tatpratyakṣam” [nyāyavā- pṛ- 41] ity arthaṃ parikalpya “atha pratyakṣaśabdena ko 'rtho 'bhiddīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1768: atha na pratyakṣm avācakas tarhi pratyakṣaśabdaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1773: kalpenāpoḍhaśabdenāpi yadi tad ucyate kathaṃ na vyāghātaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:1776: na cābhidheyam iti ko 'nyo bhadantād katum arhati” [nyāyavā- pṛ- 41] ityādi yad avādīd uddyotakaras tat sarvaṃ kalpanāpoḍhaśabdārthā'parijñānavilasitaṃ tasya tapasvin iti sūcitam
GSP28durdhpru:1779: yogācāramatam api sagṛhītaṃ bhavatī“ti pūrvayākhyānam avamanyamāno 'bhrāntaśadasyārtham āha -- abhrāntam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1780: abhrāntam arthakriyākṣame 'viparyasyas taṃ yat tad ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1781: na tv avisaṃvādakam iha grahītavyam iti buddhisthaṃ paścād vyaktīkartavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1782: anartho 'pi vastutayā 'dhyavasīyata ity arthakriyākṣama iti viśeṣeṣaṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:1790: sa upādhir viśeṣaṇam yasya varṇasya vastuśabdavācyasya śuklādiparamāṇusaṃghātasya tathotpannasya sa tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:1791: sanniveśaviśiṣṭasyaiva varṇasyānvayavyatirekābhyām arthakriyāyām upayogadarśanād etad āha /
GSP28durdhpru:1792: sa evātmā svabhāvo yasyeti tat tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:1796: na bhrāmyati na viparyasyati -- anyathāgrāhi na bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:1797: syāt etat -- paramāṇvartha eva bhavanmate bāhyaṃ vastu /
GSP28durdhpru:1801: tat kathaṃ kiñcid abhrāntaṃ nāmeti? atrocyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1802_1: rahitatvān nirantaratvena pratibhāsa eva deśavitānāvabhāsātmā sthaulyaṃ nāparaṃ kiñcit /
GSP28durdhpru:1803: tatra tathābhūtaparamāṇusamudāyaniṣṭhaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ vijñānaṃ kathaṃ bhrāntaṃ syāt?
GSP28durdhpru:1804: yady ekaikaṃ paramāṇum anekadeśāvaṣṭambhena gṛhṇīyān na punar anekam anekadeśāvaṣṭambhena gṛhṇat /
GSP28durdhpru:1805: ito 'pi viparyasyed yadi bhinnadeśān paramāṇūn ekadeśān gṛṇīyāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1808: ekadeśagrahaṇe hi piṇḍo bhāseta aṇumātrako na tu vitatadeśaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1811: tad ayam arthaḥ -- ekajñānagrāhyās tathāvidhā bahavaḥ paramāṇavaḥ sthūla iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1812: eko 'yaṃ sthūla iti tu tathābhūtapratibhāsāśrayeṇa vyavasthāpyamānatvāt pratibhāsadharma ity ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1814: pratyekam aparisamāpter ity alam iha vistreṇa /
GSP28durdhpru:1815: nanu caivam apy anyonyam asaṃsṛṣṭasvabhāvān pramāṇūn saṃsṛṣṭān gṛhṇad vijñānaṃ katham ivāviparyastaṃ nāmeti /
GSP28durdhpru:1823: tatra yadi nānārūpatvam asaṃsṛṣṭatvam iṣṭaṃ tadā na kaścit saṃsṛṣṭagraho nāma sambhāvati yato 'saṃsṛṣṭā eva paramāṇavaḥ sarvadā gṛhyante /
GSP28durdhpru:1828: atha nānādeśatvam asṃsṛṣṭatvam abhipretaṃ tad api natarām saṃsṛṣṭagraho yato nānādeśā nīlā paramāṇavo nānādeśā eva ca gṛhyante /
GSP28durdhpru:1829: ekadeśatvabhāsane hi piṇḍo bhāsetāṇumātraka ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:1830: atha rūpeṇaiva vijātīyena vyavahitatvam asaṃsṛṣṭatvaṃ vivakṣitam;
GSP28durdhpru:1831: tadā tu tad asambhavād eva na tad viparītagrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1832: yato rūpāntaravyavadhānarahitā eva nirantarā nīlāḥ paramāṇāvaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1833: bhāsante ca tathābhūtā iti kathaṃ vibhramaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1835: atha cchāyālokaparamāṇur utpadyamānaḥ kena pratibaddho yato notpadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1836: na ca śakyaṃ vaktum -- madhye paramāṇvor nāsti paramāṇvantarasyāvakāśa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1837: yato niravayavaḥ paramāṇuḥ sarvatra sāvakāśa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1839: kevalaṃ nāvakāśābhāvāt tad anutpattir api tu hetvabhāvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1843: tadā saṃsṛṣṭān paramāṇūn gṛhṇāti vijñānam iti indriyāntaragrāhyaśūnyān gṛhṇātīty uktaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:1845: tathā hi yadi nāmendriyāntaragrāhyasparśādir na gṛhyate tathāpi nīlarūpaṃ tāvat svadeśasvabhāvasthitaṃ gṛhyata eva /
GSP28durdhpru:1846: na ca bhinnendriyagrāhyaśūnyānāṃ svarūpaṃ gṛhyamāṇaṃ viparītaṃ gṛhītaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:1857: tataś cākāśam antaram ity anyavastv antaraṃ na kiñcid
GSP28durdhpru:1862: tathā nirantarāḥ paramāṇava ity uktaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:1863: tato nirantarāś ca paramāṇavo nirantarā eva bhāsante /
GSP28durdhpru:1866: yat khalv atyantam asat śaśaviṣāṇaprakhyaṃ tat kathaṃ bhāseta?
GSP28durdhpru:1867: nanv ākāśātmano 'py antarasyābhāve rūpasaṃsargaḥ paramāṇūnāṃ prasajyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:1869: nāsmābhir ucyate rūpam ekaṃ paramāṇūnāṃ deśo naika iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1870: api tu bhinnarūpadeśā utpannā madhyavarttivijātīyarūparahitās tathaiva bhāsanta iti tat kathaṃ rūpasaṃsargaprasaṅgaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:1872: tataś cātad deśaṃ taddeśatayā gṛhṇad vijñāṇaṃ katham abhrāntaṃ nāmeti?
GSP28durdhpru:1874: yadā deśaḥ pratibhāsate tadā tasmin deśe pratibhāsamāne yaḥ pratibhāsate 'rthaḥ sa deśaviśiṣṭa ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1875: yadi ca rasādiś cakṣurvijñāṇe pratibhāseta tadā taddeśavyāpini nīle gṛhyamāṇe syād bhrāntaṃ vijñānam /
GSP28durdhpru:1879: nīlam eva hi bhāsamānaṃ deśaḥ nāparo deśaḥ kaścid ābhāsate /
GSP28durdhpru:1884: tato deśakālākārāṇām ekasyāpy aparityāgān nīlābhāsaṃ vijñānam abhrāntam eva /
GSP28durdhpru:1885: sarvaṃ caitad grāhyatattvaṃ viniścaye dharmottareṇaiva nistareṇa nirūpitam iti neha pratanyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1886: nanv evam abhrāntatve yogācāramatam asaṅgṛhītaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1888: tat kathaṃ pūrvavyākhyānāvajñā na kriyata iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:1892: na ca sarvaṃ vijñānavāde yojayi[20a]tuṃ śakyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1896: dvicandrādinirāsaḥ katham iti cet samyagjñānaṃ sad evam ity abhiprāyād adoṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1902: kalpanā'poḍhagranaṇaṃ tu anumānanirāsārtham iti” yat pūrvakair vyakhyātaṃ tad vyaktam evāpahastayann āha -- etac ca -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1907: nanu kim ucyate na tv anumānanivṛttyartham iti?
GSP28durdhpru:1912: tato nānumānanivṛttyartham iti nānumānanivṛttyartham eveti sāvadhāraṇaṃ niṣidhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1913: yadi tu vipratipattinirācikīrṣayā kriyamāṇam anumānaṃ vyavacchinatti na tadartham eva dvayam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1914: nanu nedaṃ lakṣaṇadvayam anumānavyavacchedārthaṃ pūrvakair vyākhyātam /
GSP28durdhpru:1920: tatra asaty abhrāntagrahaṇe gacchadvṛkṣadarśanādi pratyakṣam kalpanāpoḍhatvāt syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:1921: tato hi pravṛttena vṛkṣamātram avāpyate iti saṃvādakatvāt samyagjñānam,
GSP28durdhpru:1922: kalpanāpoḍhatvāc ca pratyakṣaṃ iti syād āśaṅkā /
GSP28durdhpru:1927: ato gacchadvṛkṣadarśanādi mithyājñānam iti uktaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:1928: `yataḥ kalapnāpoḍhagraṇenaivānumānaṃ nirvarttitam' ity ucyata iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:1930: kevalaṃ yady abhrāntagrahaṇaṃ vyavacchedārtham eva tadānumānavyavacchedārtham eva yujyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1933: tathā hi dvididhaṃ samyagjñānam iti prastutya lakṣaṇam idaṃ vidhīyamānaṃ tad adhikāreṇaiva vihitaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:1934: nanv evaṃ sati kalpanāpoḍhagraṇenaiva nivṛtte abhrāntagrahaṇam atiricyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1936: na tu dvicandrādijñānanivṛttyartham idaṃ yujyata iti dharmottarasyāśayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1937: yady etad artham abhrāntagrahaṇaṃ na bhavati tarhi kim anenety āha -- tatra -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1938: nanu gacchadvṛkṣadarśaṇādeḥ kalpanāpoḍhasyāpi visaṃvādakatvena samyagjñānatvābhāvād eva vyavacchede siddhe kim etad arthenābhrāntapadenety āha -- tato hi -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1943: na hi yad eva samyagjñānam tad eva pratyakṣam ity āśaṅkya pūrvoktam eva prasaṅgenāha -- kalpanā -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1949: yadi saty api syāt tadā kim anenety āha -- tannivṛttyartham iti śaṅkānivṛttyarthamātram /
GSP28durdhpru:1950: anena etad darśati -- yady api paramārthataḥ samyagjñānādhikārād evamādijñānaṃ vyavacchedyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1951: tathāpy aṃśasaṃvādavādinām āhatya vipratipattinirākaraṇārthaṃ ka[20b]rttavyam evābhrāntagrahaṇam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:1953: yenaitad vipratipattinirākaraṇārthaṃ bhavatīty āśaṅkāyāṃ dūrasthitam api gacchadvṛkṣadarśanādi mithyājñānam ity uktaṃ bhavatīti yojanīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1956: kuto mithyājñāṇaṃ tad uktam ity apekṣāyāṃ prathamam uktaṃ tad iti yojanīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1957: hir yasmāt tato 'yam arthaḥ -- yasmāt tad gacchadvṛkṣadarśanādibhrāntatvāt na pratyakṣam,
GSP28durdhpru:1960: anumānarūpatve tv anirvarttate katham asya tathātvam ity āśaṅkāyāṃ yojyam,
GSP28durdhpru:1965: tathāpi kathaṃ mithyājñānam ity āśaṅkāyāṃ vācyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1969: nanv anumānādirūpanirākaraṇe yady abhrāntagrahaṇasya vyāpāro bhavet,
GSP28durdhpru:1971: yathā svayam upapattyaivānumānādibhāvo vyudastas tat katham abhrānta
GSP28durdhpru:1973: yadi mithyājñānaṃ kathaṃ tato vṛkṣāvāptir iti cet,
GSP28durdhpru:1979: yaddeśaś ca avāpyate sa na dṛṣṭa iti na tasmāt kaścid artho 'vāpyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1982: tathā abhrāntagrahaṇena apy anumāne nivartate kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇaṃ vipratipattinirākaraṇārtham /
GSP28durdhpru:1983: grahaṇena tan mityājñānam ity uktaṃ bhavatīy ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:1985: kin tv anumānādirūpatānirākaraṇahetunā dattasāhāyakena satā 'bhrantagrahaṇena tan mithyājñānam ity uktaṃ bhavatīty uktam iti boddhyavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:1987: tat kim anumānādirūpatānirākraṇam aprakṛtaṃ kṛtam iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:1988: apratyakṣatvapradarśane prasaṅgena kṛtam iti kā kṣatiḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:1990: kevalaṃ tata iti gacchadvṛkṣadarśanarūpān mithyājñānāt paricchinno dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1991: vṛkṣa iti vṛkṣatvena prathanād ucyate na tv asau tathā 'vabhāsamāno vṛkṣa eva /
GSP28durdhpru:1995: nanu tato 'pi pravṛttasyāsti cchāyādyarthakriyākārirūpasya pādapasya prāptis tatkatham apahnūyata iti?
GSP28durdhpru:1998: tatra mithyājñānam arthinaḥ pravṛttimātrahetur na tu vṛkṣaprāpakam iti saṃkṣepārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:1999: yadi mithyājñānatvapratipādanārtham abhrāntagrahaṇaṃ na tarhi vipratipattinirākaraṇārtham ity āha -- evam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2002: etādṛśam api pratyakṣam iti virudhāyāḥ pratipatter nirāsārtham abhrāntagraṇām iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2005: uktaṃ ca dvayam etat tannirāsārtham ity āśaṅkyāha -- tatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:2007: vipratipattinirākaraṇārtham iti pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvino 'pi vikalpasya vyāvahārikalokādhyavasāyenābhrāntasya yat pratyakṣatvaṃ kaiścid iṣṭam,
GSP28durdhpru:2009: tatrāsati kalpanāpoḍhgrahaṇe ghaṭo 'yam ityādijñānaṃ pratyakṣam abhrāntatvāt syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2010: tato hi pravṛttena ghaṭādir arthaḥ prāpyata iti saṃvādakatvān samyagjñānam abhrāntatvāc ca pratyakṣaṃ syādā[d ity ā]śaṅkā /
GSP28durdhpru:2015: abhrāntam hi anumānaṃ svapratibhāse 'narthe 'rthādhyavasāyena pravṛttatvāt [PVin II 2,8] /
GSP28durdhpru:2016: pratyakṣam tu grāhye rūpe na viparyastam /
GSP28durdhpru:2017: na tv avisaṃvādakam abhrāntam iha grahītayam /
GSP28durdhpru:2018: yato samyagjñānam eva pratyakṣam, na anyat /
GSP28durdhpru:2019: tatra samyagjñānatvād eva avisaṃvādakatve labdhe punar avisaṃvādakagrahaṇam niṣprayojanam eva /
GSP28durdhpru:2020: evaṃ hi vākyārthaḥ syāt -- pratyakṣākhyam yad avisaṃvādakaṃ jñānaṃ tat kalpanāpoḍham avisaṃvādakaṃ ca iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2022: tasmād grāhye 'rthakriyākṣame vasturūpe yad aviparyastam tad abhrāntam iha veditavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2023: kīdṛśī punaḥ kalpanā iha gṛhyate ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:2027: abhilāpena saṃsargaḥ abhilāpasaṃsargaḥ ekasmin jñāne 'bhidheyākārasya abhidhānākāreṇa saha grāhyākāratayā
GSP28durdhpru:2032: ato ghaṭo 'yam ityādijñānam asamyagjñānaṃ bhavatīti pūrvavad vacanīyaṃ yojanīyaṃ ca /
GSP28durdhpru:2034: yadi nāma visaṃvādakatvalakṣaṇam asamyagjñānatvaṃ nāsti tathāpi gṛhītārthagrāhiṇo 'syāpūrvādhigamābhāvāt karaṇārthābhāvarūpam asamyagjñāntvaṃ smaraṇāder iva kiṃ nānumanyate?
GSP28durdhpru:2036: idam anyatra vistareṇa nirastam ity āstāṃ tāvad iheti /
GSP28durdhpru:2037: svapratibhāsa ityāder granthasya tu satyam arthaṃ viṣayavipratipattinirākaraṇavākyavivaraṇaṃ vivecayiṣyanto vivecayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2038_0: samprati yad doṣadarśanāt pūrveṣāṃ vyākhyānam avamanyānyathā 'yam abhrāntārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe
GSP28durdhpru:2038_1: taṃ kaṇṭhoktam karttuṃ teṣām abhimatam abhrāntārthaṃ pūrvaṃ sāmarthyān niṣiddham
GSP28durdhpru:2038_2: api sākṣān niṣedhann āha -- na tu -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2040: yata ityādi veditavyam ity antaṃ subodham /
GSP28durdhpru:2043_0: atha grāhyagrāhakabhāvena pravarttamānaṃ jñānaṃ kalpanā tadā sarvam asarvajñajñāṇaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:2043_1: tathā pravṛttam iti kim avaśiṣyate yad avikalpakaṃ syād ity abhipretya kalpanāyāḥ
GSP28durdhpru:2049: tato yadā ekasmiñ jñāne 'bhidheyābhidhānayor ākārau saṃniviṣṭau bhavatas tadā saṃsṛṣṭe abhidhānābhidheye bhavataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2050: abhilāpasaṃsargāya yogyo abhidheyākārābhāso yasyāṃ pratītau sā tathā ukatā /
GSP28durdhpru:2053: kācit tv abhilāpena asaṃsṛṣṭā api abhilāpasaṃsargayogyābhāsā bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:2055: tatra abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭābhāsā kalpanā ity uktāv avyutpannasaṅketasya kalpanā na saṃgṛhyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:2057: yady apy abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭābhāsā na bhavati tadaharjātasya bālakasya kalpanā,
GSP28durdhpru:2059: yā ca abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭā sā api yogyā /
GSP28durdhpru:2061: kālena dṛṣṭena rūpeṇaikyam āpādito 'ntarjalpākāras tathā pratibhāsamāno vācyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2062: saṃsargapadena sārdham asya vigrahaṃ prāha -- abhilāpena -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2067: kathaṃ punar vācyavācakayoḥ saṃsargaḥ sambhavatītyāha -- ekasimin iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2068: grāhyākāratayā milanam ity ekajñānagrāhyākāratayā 'vasthānam iti vācyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2069: arthākāraś ced vācakaśabdākāreṇa sahaikajñānārūḍho bhavati tadā vācyavācakayoḥ saṃsarga iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:2072: yena tad grāhi vijñānaṃ savikalpakaṃ syād ityāśaṅkyopasaṃhāravyājenāha -- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2073: yadākārau saṃniniviṣṭau pratibhāsitau bhavatas tadā saṃsṛṣṭe tathātayā sambaddhe bhavataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2074: ekasmin jñāne viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇatvenākārapratibhāsa evānayor vācyavācakatvagrahaṇam iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2075: abhilāpasaṃsargāya yogya ity arthakathanam idaṃ [21b] kṛtam /
GSP28durdhpru:2076: samāsas tv abhilāpasaṃsargasya yogya iti karttavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2078: yady evam abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭapratibhāsety evāstu kiṃ yogyagrahaṇenety upālambhaṃ paśyan yathā 'sya sāphalyaṃ tathā darśayitum upakramate -- tatreti /
GSP28durdhpru:2082: `idam asya vācyam idam asya vācakam' ity ubhayāṃśāvalambijñānaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:2084: asaty abhilāpasaṃsarge kuto yogyatā avasitir iti ced /
GSP28durdhpru:2087: grāhyo hy artho vijñānaṃ janayan niyatapratibhāsaṃ kuryāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2088: yathā rūpaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ janayad niyatapratibhāsaṃ janayati /
GSP28durdhpru:2092: vyutpanno jñātaḥ saṃketo yena sa vyutpannasaṃketaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2093: tasya yadi sarvaiva tādṛśī tadā kācid iti na vācyam,
GSP28durdhpru:2094: yogyagrahaṇean ca na kiñcid ity āha -- kācid iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2098: yady abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭābhāseti kṛte 'pi tathābhūtāyāḥ pratīteḥ saṅgrahaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:2100: tayor madhye 'vyuptannasaṃketasya yā sā na saṅgṛhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2102: arthapradarśanatvād asyābhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭābhāsā pratītiḥ kalpanety uktau vacane satīty arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2105: yadi saty api yogyagrahaṇe tadasaṃgrahas tathāpi kiṃ tenety āha -- yogyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:2110: kathaṃ punar yogyagrahaṇena tasyāḥ saṅgraha ity āha -- yady apīti /
GSP28durdhpru:2113: ahni vā jāta utpanna iti tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:2115: yady evaṃ vyutpannasaṅketasya sā kathaṃ saṅgṛhyata ity āha -- yā ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2117: yadi sā tatsaṃsargayogyā na syāt kathaṃ tatsaṃsargam anubhaved iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2122: tat kathaṃ yogyatā kalpyatām ity abhisandhinā asatītyādinā pūrvapakṣam utthāpayati /
GSP28durdhpru:2123: evaṃ codayitvā 'numānataḥ sā siddhyatīti manvānaḥ sādhanam āha -- aniyateti /
GSP28durdhpru:2125: prakaraṇāpanne sādhye hetau cābhihite sukaraḥ sādhanaprayoga iti prayogaṃ na jagau /
GSP28durdhpru:2127: prayogas tv evam iha karttavyaḥ -- yo 'niyatapratibhāso vikalpaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:2129: bālasya vikalpa eva kutaḥ siddho yenedam uttarāṇi caitadaṅgāni sādhanāni nā[22a]śrayāsiddhāni syur iti?
GSP28durdhpru:2132: tat punar anumānam anena sujñātatvān nopanyastam iti veditavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2133: evaṃ tad draṣṭavyam -- yā niyamavatī pravṛttiḥ kvacit prāṇinaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:2136: niyamavatī ca taditaraparihāreṇa stanādau pravṛttir bālakasyeti kāryahetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2137: sā ca tādṛśī pravṛttiḥ pratyakṣādhigateti svasiddhau na pramāṇāntaraṃ
GSP28durdhpru:2139: kutaḥ punar etadvikalpo rthān na utpadyata ity arthasannidhinirapekṣatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2140: bālo 'pi hi yāvad dṛśyamānaṃ stanaṃ sa eva ayam iti pūrvadṛṣṭatvena na pratyavamṛśati tāvan na uparatarudito
GSP28durdhpru:2142: na punar anena bālo 'pi hītyādinā vikalpasādhanam upanyastam iti mantavyam,
GSP28durdhpru:2145: nanu ca parokṣatvāt tasyāniyatapratibhāsatvasandehe sandigdhāsiddho 'yaṃ hetur iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2148: pratibhāsasya jñānākārasya niyamaḥ -- arthākāra evāyaṃ śabdākāra eva vā,
GSP28durdhpru:2149: rūpākāra evāyaṃ rasākāra eva vetyātmako vā tasya hetur janakaḥ tasmād /
GSP28durdhpru:2151: bhavanaṃ bhāva utpādas tanniṣedhād abhāvo 'nutpāda eva /
GSP28durdhpru:2152: pratibhāsaniyamahetor abhāvād -- avidyamānatvād iti vyākhāne tu yathāśruti vyadhikaraṇāsiddho hetuḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2153: anyathā hetuvacane tu kriyamāṇe tatrārthe hetur anabhihita eva syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2155: kutaḥ punar etad vikalpo 'rthān notpadyate iti ca pūrvapakṣaḥ sūtthāno na syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2156: mṛtvā śīrtvā yathā kathañcit sarvasyāsya samarthane ca vaktur akauśalaṃ syād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2157: nanu pratibhāsaniyamahetur yaḥ kaścana sa ca tatra bhaviṣyati /
GSP28durdhpru:2159: vaktavyas tadā 'sau yataḥ sakāśād anutpādāt tathātvaṃ jñātavyam ity āha -- grāhya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2160: yady artha ity eva kriyate tadendiryam apy artho jñānaṃ janayatīti tasyāpy ākāraniyāmakatvaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2171: niyatapratibhāsam iti śabdākāraparihāreṇārthākāradhāryeva rasākāraparihāreṇa rūpākāradhāryeva ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2173: tato niyatapratibhāso bhaviṣyatīty āśaṅkya pūrvoktam eva prasaṅgena smārayati -- vikalpeti /
GSP28durdhpru:2175: evaṃ tu prayogaḥ kāryaḥ -- yad arthān notpadyate jñānaṃ tanniyatapratibhāsaṃ na bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:2178: notpadyate cā[22b]rthād bālakasya vikalpa iti vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2179: nanu bālavikalpasya parokṣatvāt tat utpattir anupattir vā na śakyate niścetum /
GSP28durdhpru:2180: ato 'yaṃ sandigdhāsiddho hetur ity abhipretya codayati kuta iti sāmānyahetoḥ praśnaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2183: tena na kutaściddhetor idam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2185: evaṃ tu prayogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ -- yaj jñānaṃ svotpattāv arthasannidhinirapekṣaṃ tad arthān notpadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2188: asiddhim asyāḥ parihattu bhūmikāṃ racayann āha -- bālo 'pi hi -- ityādi /
GSP28durdhpru:2191: pūrvadṛṣṭāparadṛṣṭaṃ ca artham ekīkurvad vijñānam asannihitaviṣayam,
GSP28durdhpru:2200: tena yo mayā pūrvaṃ kṣutpratighātahetutvena pratipannaḥ sa evā'yam iti pratyavamarṣasya rūpam ācaṣṭe /
GSP28durdhpru:2203: uparataṃ ruditaṃ yasmāt sa tathā san nāyarpati /
GSP28durdhpru:2204: sarvair eva svasantatāv evamādivyavahārasya dṛṣṭadṛśyamānayor ekīkaraṇakāraṇātvenāvagatvād evam ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2205: tasyaiva cānyatra loṣṭādau ḍhaukite 'pi tathā 'darśanāc ca /
GSP28durdhpru:2206: nanu bālasya karaṇānām apāṭavāt saṃketāgrahaṇāc ca nāntarjalpākāro 'pi śabdaḥ sambhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:2208: tat katham evaṃ yāvan na pratyavamṛśati -- ity ucyate? ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2209: anyaiva hi bhaṅgyā asti sā kācid dṛṣṭadṛśyamānayor ekīkaraṇāvasthā yā tatra nimittam iti pratipādyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2210: sā ca śabdena pratipādyamānā abhyastenāmunā śabdena pratipādyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2211: na punar evam evāsau pratyavamṛśatīty ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2212: nanu dvitīyādidarśanakāle bhavatu pūrvadṛṣṭāparadṛṣṭayor ekīkaraṇena mukhārpaṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:2214: na khalu stanam adrādṣīd asau yena dṛṣṭena dṛśyamānam ekīkṛtyārpayet /
GSP28durdhpru:2217: na cādimān saṃsāra iti kā kṣatiḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:2221: mā ca bhūt sarvathā paścād vyutpatsyamānena viśiṣṭena śabdena saṃsṛṣṭārthapratibhāsaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:2222: na bhavati tasya vikalpapratyaya ity ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2226: co 'vadhāraṇe kurvad ity asmāt paro draṣṭāvyaḥ/
GSP28durdhpru:2228: tenāyam arthaḥ -- yasmāt pūrvadṛṣṭam ekīkaroty eva tasmād asannihitaviṣayam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2229: tathā kurvad api katham asnnihitaviṣayam ity āha -- pūrvadṛṣṭatvasya[32] -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2231: nivṛtte ca pūrvadarśane pūrvadarśanaviṣayatvaṃ vastuno nāsti /
GSP28durdhpru:2232: tad uttarakālabhāvinā jñānena pūrvajñānaviṣa[23a]yatvam asannihitam eva vatuno dṛśyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2234: arthasannidhinirapekṣaṃ tu kathaṃ siddham ity āha -- asannihiteti /
GSP28durdhpru:2238: īdṛśas tu prayogo jñātavyaḥ -- yad asannihitaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ tad arthasannidhinirapekṣam,
GSP28durdhpru:2240: pūrvadṛṣṭatvena pratyabhijñānāc ca bālavijñānam asannihitaviṣayam iti svabhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2243: kin tv atra pradīpānusārī pāṭho gṛhītaḥ / -- saṃ-
GSP28durdhpru:2245: samprati śiṣyāṇāṃ sukhapratipattyarthaṃ yathottarottarasya hetoḥ siddhau pūrvapūrvasya hetoḥ siddhir bhavati tathā darśayati -- anapekṣaṃ ca -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2250: ata eva svalakṣaṇasya api vācyavācakabhāvam abhyupagamya etad avikalpakatvam ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2251: yady api hi svalakṣaṇam eva vācyaṃ vācakaṃ ca bhāvet tathā apy abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭārthavijñānaṃ savikalpakam /
GSP28durdhpru:2252: na ca indriyavijñānam arthena niyamitapratibhāsatvād abhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsaṃ bhavati iti nirvikalpakam /
GSP28durdhpru:2253: śrotrajñānaṃ tarhi śabdasvalakṣaṇagrāhi śabdasvalakṣaṇaṃ ca kiṇcid vācyaṃ kiñcid vācakam ity abhilāpa
GSP28durdhpru:2257: saty api svalakṣaṇasya vācyavācakabhāve saṅketakāladṛṣṭatvena grahyamāṇaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:2258: nanu kim aniyatapratibhāsatve sādhye 'rthanirapekṣatvaṃ hetur yena tathā sad aniyatapratibhāsam ity ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2259: pratibhāsaniyamahetor iti ca madhyavarttī ca granthaḥ kathaṃ neyaḥ? ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2263: anapekṣam arthasannidhinirapekṣaṃ satpratibhāsaniyamaheto anutpannam iti pratibhāsaniyamahetor abhāvād ity asya sāmarthyād vākyabhedaṃ kṛtvā /
GSP28durdhpru:2264: tataḥ pratibhāsaniyamahetor abhāvād anutpādād aniyatapratibhāsam iti yojanīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2266: co vaktavyam ity etad ity asminn arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2267: sarvam etad indriyajñāne 'pi praraḥ kadācid āśaṅkayed iti tannirāsārtham āha -- indriyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:2270: iha pūvavyākhyātṛbhiḥ “asāmarthyavaiyarthyābhyāṃ svalakṣaṇasya saṃketayitum aśakyatvād avācyavācakatvam /
GSP28durdhpru:2273: anyathā 'py avikalpatvasya susādhatvāt kim anyāpohānayanenāprakṛteneti manyāmāna āha -- ata eva -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2274: yasmād indiryajñānaṃ niyatapratibhāsam -- ata eva asmād eva hetoḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2277: vācyagrahaṇe katham avikalpakam ity āha -- yady api hi -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2278: yady api hīti nipātasamudāyo `yadi nāma'śabdasyārthe varttate /
GSP28durdhpru:2281: evaṃ bruvato 'yaṃ bhāvaḥ -- koṣṭhaśuddhyā vācyam astu svalakṣaṇaṃ tathāpi tadindriyajñāṇaṃ kevalam eva svalakṣaṇam ātmany ādarśayati,
GSP28durdhpru:2282: na tu vācakam apīti katham abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭārthapratibhāsatvaṃ vikalpakatvam ātmasāt kuryād iti?
GSP28durdhpru:2284: svalakṣaṇaṃ vācyaṃ vācakaṃ ca gṛhītaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2285: na ca saṅketakālabhāvi darśanaviṣayatvaṃ vastunaḥ sampraty asti /
GSP28durdhpru:2286: yathā hi saṅketakālabhāvi darśanam adya viruddham,
GSP28durdhpru:2287: tadvad tadviṣayatvam apy arthasya adya na asti /
GSP28durdhpru:2288: tataḥ pūrvakāladṛṣṭatvam apaśyac chrotrajñānaṃ na vācakabhāvagrāhi vācyavācakabhāvagrāhi/
GSP28durdhpru:2289: anena eva nyāyena yogijñānam api sakalaśabdārthāvabhāsitve 'pi saṅketakālasṛṣṭatvāgrahaṇān nirvikalpakam /
GSP28durdhpru:2292: yat punar etaddvayapratibhāsīndriyajñānaṃ tad dvayapratibhāsād vikalpakaṃ prāptam ity abhipretya codayati -- śrotreti /
GSP28durdhpru:2294: sarvam indriyajñānam avikalpakam iti na kṣamyata etad ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2298: śabdagrāhiṇo 'pi vācyāgrahaṇe kathaṃ tathātvam ity āha -- śabdeti [23b] /
GSP28durdhpru:2303: astu tathāpratibhāsaṃ kim ata ity āha -- tathā ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2304: tathā ca sati tasmiṃś coktaprakāre sati /
GSP28durdhpru:2305: evaṃ caitad draṣṭavyam -- yadaikena taraptamapau saṃjñināv uccāryete tadaiva ca kathañcid anyena `ghaḥ' iti saṃjñoccāryate /
GSP28durdhpru:2306: tadā tad dvitayam ekena śrotrajñānena pratiyataḥ puṃsaḥ śrotradhīr vikalpikā prasajyeteti /
GSP28durdhpru:2307: kathaṃ tarhi naiṣa doṣa ity āha -- saty apīti /
GSP28durdhpru:2308: co yasmāt tad evedaṃ yan mayā saṃketakālatvena gṛhyamāṇaṃ tathā gṛhītaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:2309: yady evam astu saṃketakāladṛṣṭatvena grahaṇam ity āha -- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2315: tadbhāve nigaḍākarṣaṇanyāyena prāktanadarśanasyāpi sthitiḥ prasajyeteti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2316: mā grahīt saṃketakāladṛṣṭatvaṃ tayor gṛhyamāṇayoḥ śabdayos tathāpi kathaṃ na vācyavācakabhāvagrāhi tajjñānam ity āśaṅkyopasaṃharann āha -- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2317: yataḥ samketakālatvena gṛhyamāṇaṃ vācyaṃ vācakaṃ ca gṛhītaṃ bhavati tataḥ kāraṇāt śrotravijñānaṃ na vācyavācakabhāvagrāhi /
GSP28durdhpru:2319: kim ataḥ? etat punar enaṃ tathaiva grahīṣyatīty āha -- pūrveti /
GSP28durdhpru:2321: syād etat -- saṃketadṛṭātvenāpi na grahīṣyate 'rthaḥ śabdo vā /
GSP28durdhpru:2322: atha ca viśiṣṭavācakavācakatvena viśiṣṭārthavācakatvena ca grahīṣyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2324: evaṃ hi bruvatedam abhipratam -- yena jñānena yo arthaḥ saṃketakālopalabdho yac chabdasaṃsargiṇā rūpeṇa naikīkriyate,
GSP28durdhpru:2326: tathā gojñānena saṃketakālopalabdhāśvaśabdasaṃsargiṇā 'śvarūpeṇa sahaikatvenāpratīyamāno gaur nāśvaśabdavācyo gṛhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2327: śrotrajñānena saṃketakālopalabdha`gha'śabdasaṃsargiṇā ca rūpeṇa naikīkriyete ca tadā taraptamapāv iti vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2331: tayā kalpanayā kalpanāsvabhāvena rahitaṃ śūnyaṃ sajjñānaṃ yad abhrāntaṃ tad pratyakṣam iti pareṇa sambandhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2333: na pratyekam iti darśayituṃ tayā rahitaṃ tat pratyakṣam iti lakṣaṇayoḥ parasparasāpekṣayoḥ pratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ darśitam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2336: yathā gośabdajñānena saṃketakālopalabdhāśvārthasaṃsargiṇāśvaśabdena sahaikatvenāpratīyamāno gośabdo nāśvārthavācako gṛhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2337: śrotrajñānena saṃketadṛṣṭataraptamabarthasaṃsargiṇā rūpeṇa naikīkriyate ca tadā `gha'śabda iti saiva asiddhir anubhavena nirākṛtā /
GSP28durdhpru:2339: yadā tu pūrvadṛṣṭatvena graho 'sti tadā tajjñānam abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭārthapratibhāsaṃ sad vikalparūpam eveti sarvam avadātam /
GSP28durdhpru:2340: śrotrajñāṇe yathā 'bhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsatvaṃ coditaṃ tathā yogijñāne 'pi codayituṃ śakyam iti tatrāpy amum eva parihāram atidiśann āha -- aneneti /
GSP28durdhpru:2341: yaj jñānaṃ saketakālaviṣayatvaṃ gṛhyamāṇasya na gṛhṇāti,
GSP28durdhpru:2342: na tad vācyavācakabhāvagrāhīty anena nyānena yuktyā yogijñānaṃ vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇāṃ sakalaśabdārthāvabhāsitve saty api nirvikalpakam /
GSP28durdhpru:2344: asya tu sarvaśabdārthagrāhiṇaḥ kathaṃ tathātvam ity āha -- saṃketeti /
GSP28durdhpru:2345: tathā 'grahaṇam uktena nyāyena yoginaṃ praty api pūrvadarśanaviṣayatvasyāsattvād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2346: tayā rahitaṃ ity ācāryīyaṃ vivaraṇaṃ vyāca[24a]ṣṭe -- tayeti /
GSP28durdhpru:2348: tatas tasyāpi kalpanāpoḍhatvaṃ kiṃ na bhavati?
GSP28durdhpru:2349: atha kapanayā rahitam iti yan na vikalpyate ity ucyate,
GSP28durdhpru:2350: tad api kalpanāpoḍham ity anenaivākāreṇa vikalpyata iti katham etad ucyata iti paśyan kalpanayā rahitam ity asya vivakṣitam artham āha -- kalpanāsvabhāveneti /
GSP28durdhpru:2352: yathā viṣāṇī kakudmān prānte vāladhir iti viṣāṇādimatā(-to)
GSP28durdhpru:2354: tadvat kalpanākhyena dharmiṇā dharmo 'bhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsatvākhyo nirdiṣṭa iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:2355: ata eva cācāryadignāgīyapratyakṣalakṣaṇe kalpaṇāpoḍhatvākhye yad uddyotakaracodyam ihaiva pūrvam upadarśitaṃ tat khalu dharmakīrticodyasadṛśam iti sthitam /
GSP28durdhpru:2356: pareṇeti paradeśasthitena tad anāhitavibhramaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣam ity anena /
GSP28durdhpru:2357: abhrāntagrahaṇasyaiva tad vivaraṇaṃ iti abhrāntagrahaṇam iha /
GSP28durdhpru:2358: dūrasthitena sambandhakaraṇe kim prayojanam ity āha -- kalpanāpoḍheti /
GSP28durdhpru:2359: militayor anayos tallakṣaṇatvāt pratyakṣalakṣaṇam ity ekavacanena nirdeśaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2361: kathaṃ parasparasāpekṣatety āha -- tayā rahitaṃ yad abhrāntaṃ tat pratyakṣam vyavahartavyam iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2369: mandaṃ hi bhramyamāṇe 'lātādau na cakrabhrāntir utpadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2373: gacchantyāṃ nāvi sthitasya gacchadvṛkṣādibhrāntir utpadyate iti yānagrahaṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:2376: vātādiṣu hi kṣobhaṃ gateṣu jvalitastambhādibhrāntir utpadyate etac ca adhyātmagataṃ vibhramakāraṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:2377: sarvair eva ca vibhramakāraṇair indriyaviṣayabāhyādhyātmikāśrayagatair indriyam eva vikartavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2379: ete samkṣobhaparyantā ādayo yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2385: tair anāhito vibhramo yasmiṃs tathāvidhaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣam /
GSP28durdhpru:2391: yady api mandaṃ bhramyamāṇasyālātasya vibhramakāraṇatvādarśanād āśubhramaṇaṃ labhyate,
GSP28durdhpru:2392: tathāpi śāśtrakṛtā svakīyavacanākauśalaparihārārtham āśugrahaṇaṃ kṛtam ity avaseyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2393: pūrvasmād etadbhedena katham uktam ity āha -- etad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2396: mandaṃ hi gacchantyāṃ nāvi na gacchadvṛkṣādidarśanaṃ bhavatīty anubhvasiddham etat /
GSP28durdhpru:2398: etat kasmāt pṛthag uktam ity āha etac ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2402: sa keṣām ity ākāṅkṣāyām āha -- vāteti /
GSP28durdhpru:2403: nāsau vibhramakāraṇam ity āśaṅkām apanudann āha -- vātādiṣu -- iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2405: kṣobhaṃ prakopaṃ gateṣu saṃkṣubdheṣv iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:2407: nauyānādīnāṃ tu kathaṃ satsv api teṣu tadavasthatvād indriyasyety āha -- sarvair eveti /
GSP28durdhpru:2408: indiryagatasya timirāder indriyavikāratvena sammatasyāpy upādānaṃ dṛṣṭāntārtham /
GSP28durdhpru:2410: tathā anyair api tadvikurvadbhir eva vibhramahetubhir bhāvyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2411: kasmāt punar amībhir indriyavikāro 'vaśyakartavya ity āha -- avikṛta ityādi /
GSP28durdhpru:2416: tad eva lakṣaṇam ākhyāya yair indriyam eva draṣṭṛ kalpitaṃ mānasaprayakṣalakṣaṇe ca doṣa udbhāvitaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:2419: teṣāṃ vipratipattinirākaraṇārtham prakārabhedaṃ pratyakṣasya darśayann āha --
GSP28durdhpru:2425: indriyajabhramakāraṇaṃ tad indriyaṃ vikaroty eva tathā timirādi /
GSP28durdhpru:2427: evaṃvidhasya jñānasya bhramarūpatvaṃ bādhavaśād avasitam indriyānvayavyatirekānuvidhānāc cendriyajatvam /
GSP28durdhpru:2430: eta ityādi vibhramahetavo gṛhyanta ity antaṃ subodham /
GSP28durdhpru:2435: tair anāhito vibhramo yasminn iti vigṛhṇaṃs tripadaṃ bahuvrīhiṃ darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:2436: anāhitao vibhramo yasmiṃs tattatheti prasādhya teṣām anāhitavibhrama iti ṣaṣṭhītatapuruṣaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2438: yo hi tair anāhitavibhramaḥ sa teṣāṃ bhavatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:2441: sampraty ācāryasyāvāntarapratyakṣabhedavyutpādane nimittaṃ darśayann āha -- tad evam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2442: nipātasamudāyaś cāyam uktena prakāreṇetiy asyārthe varttate /
GSP28durdhpru:2447: tataḥ cakṣuḥ paśyati rūpāṇi abhidha- 1.42] ityādi vādibhir indriyam eva draṣṭṛ kalpitam /
GSP28durdhpru:2448: yair mīmāṃsakair ācāryadignāgīye mānasapratyakṣalakṣaṇe gṛhītagrāhitvalakṣaṇo 'prāmāṇyanimitto doṣa udbhāvitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2451: yaiś ca mīmāṃsakaiḥ kumārilamatānusāribhir naiyāyikavaiśeṣikaiś ca svātmani kriyāvirodhena svasaṃvedanaṃ nābhyupagatam /
GSP28durdhpru:2452: yaiś ca cārvākamīmāṃsakair yogina eva na sambhavanti,
GSP28durdhpru:2453: kutas teṣāṃ jñānam iti vādibhir yogijñānaṃ ca nābhyupagatam iti vartate /
GSP28durdhpru:2455: teṣām amīṣāṃ tatra tatra yā vimatis tan nirākaraṇārthaṃ pratyakṣasyoktalakṣaṇasya prakāro viśeṣas tasya bhedaṃ nānātvam,
GSP28durdhpru:2458: tatraikaṃ tāvad indriyajñāṇam uktaṃ vyācakṣāṇa āha -- indiryasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:2461: mānasapratyakṣe parair yo doṣa udbhāvitas taṃ nirākartuṃ mānasapratyakṣalakṣaṇam āha --
GSP28durdhpru:2464: indriyaṃ ca tajjñānaṃ ceti kṛtvā śakyam indriyajñānam iti vaktum,
GSP28durdhpru:2465: tat kathaṃ vipratipattir nirākṛtety āśaṅkām apākartum indriyajñānam ity atrācāryasyendriyasya jñānam iti ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣo vivakṣita iti darśayati -- indiryasya jñānam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2466: yad indiryeṇa janyate tad indriyasya bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2467: nanu cendriyānumānam api kāryaprabhavaṃ bhavatīndriyasya jñānam /
GSP28durdhpru:2468: tatas tasyāpi pratyakṣatvaṃ prāpatam ity āha -- indriyāśritam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2469: āśritaṃ janyatayā tasmin saty eva bhāvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2471: yena tasya pratyakṣatvaṃ syād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2473: indiryasya jñānaṃ pratyakṣam iti kathayatā nendiryasya draṣṭṛtvam iti darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:2475: nanu indriyajñānasya draṣṭṛtve tasyāpratighatvād vyavahitasyāpi grahaṇaṃ prasajyeteti tair ukto doṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2476: sa kathaṃ parihṛto yena vipratipattir nirākṛteti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:2477: ayam āśayaḥ -- na jñānaṃ gatvā gatvā 'rthaṃ gṛhṇāti,
GSP28durdhpru:2479: kin tarhi? yadākāram utpadyate tad gṛhṇātīty ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2481: tat kathaṃ tasya tena graha iti sujñānam etad iti kim atropapattyābhihitayeti?
GSP28durdhpru:2485_0: evaṃ ca darśayatā vārttikakāreṇa yadvendriyaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt tasya vārthena saṅgatir[ŚV
GSP28durdhpru:2485_1: 4.60]ityādi vacanāt tasyāpi yā pratyakṣapramāṇatā mīmāṃsakādibhir abhyupagatā sā nirastā veditavyā /
GSP28durdhpru:2492: yataś cāvyavadhānena pravṛttiḥ sa eva pravarttakatvāt pramāṇaṃ yuktam /
GSP28durdhpru:2497: pramā ca nīlasyeyaṃ na pītasyeti viśiṣṭenaivādhikaraṇenāvacchinnā pratīyata iti tatkaraṇaṃ bhavitum arhati /
GSP28durdhpru:2498: yata iyam avyavadhānā tādrūpyeṇa vyavasthāṃ labhate /
GSP28durdhpru:2500: svabhedena kriyābhedanibandhanaṃ ca karaṇaṃ tato jñānātmakam eva sārūpyam adhigatikriyābhedavyavasthāṅgaṃ pramāṇaṃ yujyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2508: sva ātmīyo viṣaya indiryajñānasya tasya anantaraḥ -- na vidyate 'ntaram asya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2509: antaraṃ ca vyavadhānaṃ viśeṣaś ca ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2510: tataś ca antare pratiṣiddhe samānajātīyo dvitīyakṣaṇabhāvyupādeyakṣaṇa indriyavijñānaviṣayasya gṛhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2511: sa sahakārī yasya indriyajñānasya tat tathoktam /
GSP28durdhpru:2512: dvividhaś ca sahakārī -- parasparopakārī ekakāryopakārī ca /
GSP28durdhpru:2513: iha ca kṣaṇike vastuny atiśayādhānāyogād ekakāryakāritvena sahakārī gṛhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2514: nanu caturvidhapratyakṣābhidhāne nimittam uktam eva dharmottareṇa tat kathaṃ tad eva mānasetyādinā punar ācaṣṭe /
GSP28durdhpru:2515: athācāryasya catuṣṭayābhidhāne nimittaṃ yad āsīt buddhisthaṃ tat prāg uktam,
GSP28durdhpru:2516: tad eva tu yathāyogaṃ pratyakṣavyaktiviśeṣābhidhāne 'bhidhānīyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2517: tarhi yair indriyaṃ draṣṭṛ kalpitaṃ tannirākaraṇārtham āha -- indriyajñānam iti tathā 'nyatrāpi svasaṃvedanādau tattannimittam anena kinnoktam?
GSP28durdhpru:2518: tad atrāpi mānasaṃ vyākhyātum āheti vaktuṃ yuktam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2520_1: evāsya lakṣaṇākhyāne nimittaṃ nānyad iti pratipādyitum uktam eva nimittam anūditam
GSP28durdhpru:2521: athendriyajñānasyāpi lakṣaṇa[25b]m anyeṣām iva kiṃ noktam? noktam /
GSP28durdhpru:2524: syān matam / abhimataṃ caturvidhaṃ pratyakṣaṃ darśayitavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2525: tac caikadā vaktum aśakyatvāt krameṇa vacanīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2526: kramaś caivaṃvidho 'stv anyādṛśo vā kim atrādareṇeti indriyajñāṇādir īdṛśaḥ kramaḥ kṛtaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:2529: tathā hi sarvasya sarvavyavahārāṅgam indriyajñānam iti tadādito 'bhihitam /
GSP28durdhpru:2530: tenaivendriyajñānena tathābhūtena mānasaṃ janyata iti tadanu mānasaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP28durdhpru:2531: tasya paścāt pratyātmavedyatayā 'stivena śakyaniścayatayā ca svasaṃvedanam uditam /
GSP28durdhpru:2532: tataḥ sarvajñajñānasya sāmagrīmātrapradarśanataya'ntimapuruṣārthatayā cānte yogijñānam upadarśitam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2534: tac ca tat tathoktam ity etad antaṃ sugamam /
GSP28durdhpru:2535: nanv anukārakasya sahakāritve 'tiprasaṅgād upakāriṇā sahakāriṇā bhāvyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2536: samasamayayoś copakāryopakārakabhāvābhāvāt katham asau viṣayakṣaṇas tasya sahakārīty āśakyāha -- dvividhaś ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2541: parasparopakāritayā ca sahakāritvam ekatvādhyavasāyādhīnaṃ santānagatam amukhyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2543: yadi dvaividhye 'pi prāktanasya grahaṇaṃ tadā tadavastho doṣa ity āha -- iheti /
GSP28durdhpru:2547: sahakārī hi gṛhyate viṣayakṣaṇa iti prakaraṇād avaseyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2550: viṣayavijñānābhyāṃ hi manovijñānam ekaṃ kriyate yatas tan anayoḥ parasparasahakāritvam /
GSP28durdhpru:2551: īdṛśena indriyavijñānena ālambanabhūtena api yogijñānaṃ janyate. tan nirāsārthaṃ samanantarapratyayagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam. samaś ca asau jñānatvena,
GSP28durdhpru:2553: sa ca asau pratyayaś ca hetutvāt samanantarapratyayaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:2557: atha yadi vastunaḥ kṣanikatvenātiśayādhānāsambhavāt parasparopakāritvena na sahakārī gṛhyate dvividhaś ca sahakārīty anantaram uditam anena vyāhanyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:2561: tathā hi kṣanike vastunīti dhārayā 'pravāhiṇi sajātīyāprasavadharmiṇy antime mānasotpādakatayā 'bhimata indriyajñānanāmni nirodhonmukha ity abhipretam /
GSP28durdhpru:2562: na tv akṣaṇikavyāvṛttyā kṣaṇīkapadābhilāpye 'vastumātravyāvṛttyā ca vastumātra iti
GSP28durdhpru:2564: yadīdaṃ mānasopajananonmukham indriyajñānam ekajātīyapravāhavāhi syāt tadā santānopakāradvārakātiśayādhāyakatve viṣayo 'sya sahakārīti kalpeyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:2565: kevalam idam apetasajātīyaprasavaśaktikaṃ santānavarttīti katham asya viṣayas tathā sahakārī kalpyeteti /
GSP28durdhpru:2566: nanu kiṃ tad ekaṃ yat kurvator etayos tathāsahakāritvam ucyata ity āha viṣayeti /
GSP28durdhpru:2568: yato yasmād ābhyām eva tad ekaṃ kiryate, tasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2569: tad ity ayaṃ tasmād ity asminn arthe /
GSP28durdhpru:2573: ālambyata iti ālambanabhūtaṃ rūpaṃ yasya tena grāhyasvabhāvena satā janyata ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2575: evañ ca vyācakṣāṇena “samanantarapratyayagrahaṇam andhabadhirādyabhāvaprasaṅganirākaraṇārtham iti” yad anyena vyākhyātam -- tad apahastitam /
GSP28durdhpru:2577: samaś cetyādinā samanantarapratyayaśabdasya vigraham arthaṃ cāha /
GSP28durdhpru:2580: yadi nāmaivaṃ vyutpattis tathāpi prāktanam eva vijñānam upādānabhūtam āgame tathā rūḍhaṃ nānyat /
GSP28durdhpru:2581: tad uktam abhidharmakoṣe -- “cittacaittā acaramā utpannāḥ samanantaraḥ” [2.6.2] iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2582: siddhāntaprasiddhayā cāmuyā saṃjñayā vyavaharatā ''cāryeṇa siddhāntaprasiddhatvam asya darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:2584: tad anena ekasantānāntarbhūtayor eva indriyajñānamanovijñānayor janyajanakabhāve manovijñānaṃ pratyakṣam ity uktam bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:2586: nanu kiṃ kṛtaṃ samantarapratyayagrahaṇena yena yogijñānasya tathātvena nirāsa ity āha -- tad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2587_0: yasmāt samanantarapratyayarūpeṇendriyajñānena yaj janitaṃ tan mānasaṃ tat tasmāt
GSP28durdhpru:2589: āgame 'pi manaḥśabdenaitad evocyata iti pradarśanārthaṃ caivam abhidhānaṃ mantavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2590: tathāpi kathaṃ yogijñānaṃ tathātvena nirastam ity āha -- tat iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2593: yadi punar indriyajñānena janitam ity etāvad ucyeta tadā ''lambanabhūtenāpi tenādau janyata iti nirastaṃ na syād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2594: syād etat -- yady etad arthaṃ samnanatarapratyayagrahaṇaṃ tarhi nitarāṃ na karttavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2596: na hi tad indriyajñānaṃ yogijñāne karttavye svaviṣayānantaraviṣayakṣaṇasahakārīti /
GSP28durdhpru:2597: athocyate -- yadendriyajñānaṃ yogijñānaṃ janayati tadā svopādeyam api jñānaṃ janayaty eva /
GSP28durdhpru:2598: tataḥ svasantatipatitajanyakṣaṇāpekṣayā tad bhavati svaviṣayānantaraviṣayakṣaṇāsahakārīty asti tajjānitasya tasya mānasatvalakṣaṇam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2600: yad eva hi janyatayā prakṛtaṃ tad apekṣam eva sahakāriṇaḥ sahakāritvaṃ cintanīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2602: na ca tad eva yogijñānaṃ prati tat sahakāri tad indriyajñānaṃ yena tathātvam asyocyamānaṃ śobheta /
GSP28durdhpru:2603: atha tat sahakāri tadvastuvṛttyā tad indriyajñānaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:2605_0: yady evaṃ kṛte 'pi samanantarapratyayagrahaṇe yogijñānaṃ nirasitum aśakyaṃ tathāpi
GSP28durdhpru:2605_1: yathā tad indriyajñānaṃ svopādeyajñānāpekṣaṃ svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāri tathā
GSP28durdhpru:2606: tatas tathābhūtena tena janyamānasya yogijñānasya kathaṃ tathātvena nirāsaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2608: hanta tat sahakāritvam api kim asya tadapekṣam asti?
GSP28durdhpru:2610: na tu vāstavaṃ rūpam upādeyaṃ phalābhāvena tasyānuvādyatā'nupapatteḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2613: na ca rājaśāsanasamānaṃ kiñcid utpaśyāmo yena samanantarapratyayajanyatvam eva prakṛtajanyāpekṣam iha grāhyam,
GSP28durdhpru:2614: na tu svaviṣayānantaraviṣayakṣaṇasahakāritvam iti kalpanīyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2615_0: atrocyate / yadā -- yogī indriyajñāṇaṃ tatsahabhuvaṃ cārthakṣaṇaṃ ca kutaścit kāraṇād
GSP28durdhpru:2615_1: didṛkṣamāṇo yogijñānena tad dvayam api paśyati tadā tenendiryajñānena svaviṣayānantaraviṣayakṣaṇasahakāriṇā
GSP28durdhpru:2615_2: tad yogiñānaṃ janyata iti asati samanantaranprayayagraḥaṇe mānasapratyakṣaṃ samāsajyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:2617: evaṃvidham eva ca yogijñānam abhipratyetyedṛśenety ebhihitaṃ dharmottareṇeti sarvam avadātam /
GSP28durdhpru:2619: yadā ca indriyavijñānād anyo viṣayo manovijñānasya tadā gṛhitagrahaṇāt āsañjito 'prāmāṇyadoṣo nirastaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2621: tadā indriyajñānena agṛhītasya viṣayāntarasya grahaṇād andhabadhirādyabhāvadoṣaprasaṅgo nirastaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2622: samprati yathā gṛhītagrāhitvadvārako doṣaḥ parasya parihriyate tathā darśayann āha -- yadā ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2623: co vyaktam etad ity asminn arthe /
GSP28durdhpru:2625: indriyajñāṇaviṣayād anyo 'sya viṣaya ity etad eva kuto yenāsau nirasto bhavati ity āśṅkyāha -- yadā ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2628: indriyajñānasya viṣayo yas tasyopādeyabhūto yaḥ kṣaṇaḥ sa gṛhīta indryajñānasya mānasopajanane sahakārikāraṇatvena svīkṛtas tadetīhaiva cchedaḥ karttavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2629: evaṃ bruvatedam ākūtam -- janakaviśeṣasya viṣayatvān mānasapratyakṣasya viṣayeṇa bhavatā janakenāvaśyabhāvyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2634: andhabadhirādyābhāvadoṣaprasagṅgas tu kathaṅkāraṃ nirākriyetety āśaṅkyāha -- indriyajñāneneti /
GSP28durdhpru:2636_0: tasmād hetor indriyajñānenāgṛthītaṃ mānasena gṛhyata iti darśayatā cānena yasyaivendriyam
GSP28durdhpru:2636_1: asti tasyaiva tenendriyajñānena sahabhūviṣayakṣaṇasahakāriṇā janitatvān mānasaṃ pratyakṣam /
GSP28durdhpru:2638: yasya punaḥ puṃso 'rthaviṣayam indriyajñāṇam eva sāsti tasya kathaṃ māṇasam utpadyate,
GSP28durdhpru:2639: gṛhṇīyād vā tam viṣyakṣaṇam iti darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:2642_1: yadi nāmendriyajñāneneti labhyate tathāpi pratipattigauravaparihārārtham inderyagrahaṇam
GSP28durdhpru:2645_0: iha śāntabhadreṇa sautrāndikānāṃ mataṃ darśayatā “pūrvaṃ cakṣūrūpe cakṣurvijñānaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:2645_1: tatas tenendriyavijñānena sahajakṣaṇasakāriṇā tṛtīyasmin kṣaṇe mānsapratyakṣaṃ janyate” iti vyākhyātaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:2647: etac ca manovijñānam uparatavyāpāre cakṣuṣi pratyakṣam iṣyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2648: vyāpāravati tu cakṣuṣi yad rūpajñānaṃ tat sarvaṃ cakṣurāśritam eva /
GSP28durdhpru:2654: etan manovijñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ pramāṇatvenopagatam uparatavyāpāra eva cakṣuṣi bhavatītīṣyata iti samudāyārtho draṣṭavaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2655: yadi praṇihite nayane manojñānaṃ na janyate tarhi kiṃ nāma jāyata ity āha -- vyāpāreti /
GSP28durdhpru:2657: rūpajñānam iti vāstavānuvādo na punar anyajñānasambhavena tadvyavacchedārtham /
GSP28durdhpru:2658: yad vā rūpaśabdaḥ svabhāvavacanas tene yat svabhāvajñānam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2662: nanu vyāpāravaty api cakṣuṣi mānasotpattau na cakṣurāśritatvānupapattirādim asyaiva jñāṇasya cakṣurāśritatvopapatteḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2664: kevalam a[yam] abhiprāyaḥ -- yad api tad ādyaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ tad api cakṣuranvayavyatireke '(kā)
GSP28durdhpru:2666_0: saty api tadanvayavyatikerkānuvidhāne yadi kasyacin mānasatvaṃ tadā cakṣuranvyavyatitekau
GSP28durdhpru:2666_1: cakṣurāśritatvavyavasthāyā anaṅgam ity ādye 'pi tadvyavasthā na syād iti sādhīyān prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2667: syād etat -- kim etan mānasaṃ cakṣurvijñānenaiva rūpaviṣaye janyate kiṃ vā rasādijñānenāpi rasādiviṣaya iti?
GSP28durdhpru:2669: yadi rūpa eva tadā[34]“dvividhajñānavijñeyāh pañca bāhyavisayāḥ” ity āgamo viruddhyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:2670: atha samastarūpādiviṣayam iṣyate tadā śabdaviṣayatvena tasyāsambhavaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2671: na hi rasādir iva tālvādijanmā śabdaḥ pravāhavāhī,
GSP28durdhpru:2672: yena śrotrendriyajñāṇena svāviṣayānantaraviṣayakṣaṇasahakāriṇā tatra mānasaṃ janyeteti /
GSP28durdhpru:2677: yat punar avādīd bhagavān -- “dvābhyāṃ bhikṣvo rūpaṃ gṛhyate,
GSP28durdhpru:2678: cakṣurvijñānena tadākṛṣṭena ca manaseti” tad rūpasya grahaṇaprasaṅgenoktam,
GSP28durdhpru:2679: na tu rūpam eva dvidhā gṛhyata iti vivakṣitam /
GSP28durdhpru:2683: nanūktaṃ na tasya śabdaviṣayatvena sambhavas tat katham evam abhyupagamaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:2685: kevalaṃ yadābhihanyamānaṃ ghaṇṭāṭi raṇati tadā taduktaḥ(-tthaḥ)
GSP28durdhpru:2686: śabdaḥ kiyantaṃ kālaṃ santānena pravahatīti śrotrajñānena svaviṣayānantaraviṣayakṣaṇasahakāriṇā tadviṣayaṃ mānasaṃ janyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2691_0: iha pūrvaiḥ -- “bāhyārthālambanam evaṃvidhaṃ manovijñānam astīti kuto 'vaseyaṃ” ity
GSP28durdhpru:2691_1: āśaṅkya “tadabhāve tadbalotpannānāṃ vikalpānām abhāvād rūpādau viṣaye vyavahārābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ syād” ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:2695: na tv asya prasādhakam asti pramāṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:2696: evaṃjatīyakaṃ tad yadi syāt na kaścid doṣaḥ syād iti vaktuṃ lakṣaṇam ākhyātam asya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2698: ” “santānabhedā[n na] bhaviṣyate” iti ca punar āśaṅkya “atrāpi santānabhedād eva vikalpo na prāpnoti,
GSP28durdhpru:2699: yata ihāpīndriyāśrayabhedād eva santānabhedo yugapat pravṛtteś ca /
GSP28durdhpru:2701: na ca santānasyaikye yugapat pravṛttir nyāyyā /
GSP28durdhpru:2702: tasmād rūpādivikalpābhāvo mā bhūd ity avaśyam avikalpakaṃ manovijñānam abhyupeyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2704: nirvikalpakaṃ manovijñānaṃ yadi nāsty eva tadā yogijñānābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2705: asty eva nirvikalpakaṃ manovijñānaṃ kin tv indriyajñānapṛṣṭabhāvi nāstīti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:2706: sati sambhave tasyāpy astitve ko virodhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2707: na hy atra bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ dṛśyate,
GSP28durdhpru:2710: tasmād astīndriyajñānapṛṣṭabhāvi manojñānaṃ nirvikalpakam” ity evamādyabhihitam /
GSP28durdhpru:2711: tad etat tadīyaṃ kadalīgarbhaniḥsāraṃ manyamānaḥ prāha -- etac ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2714: etad eva vyatirekamukheṇa draḍhayati na tv asyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:2716_1: anubhavagamyam idaṃ yathā cakṣurādijñānam iti darśayitum aśakyatvān nāsya prasādhakaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:2717: nanu tair darśitam eva vikalpābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ syād ityādinā prasaṅgamukhena pramāṇaṃ vikalpodayād iti tat kim ucyate na tv asya prasādhakam asti pramāṇam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2718: ayam asyāśayaḥ -- satyam uktam atārkikīyaṃ tu tat /
GSP28durdhpru:2719: tathā hi yat tāvad uktam indriyāśrayabhedād yugapat pravṛtteś ca santānabhedo 'sti /
GSP28durdhpru:2722: yadīndriyāśrayabhedād yugapat pravṛtteś ca santānabhedas tadbhede ca na kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:2723: tadā svāpād utthitamātrasya puṃsaś cakṣurvijñānaṃ ..................................................................... notpadyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:2724: tat khalūpajāyamānaṃ manojñānād vā prācīnād utpadyeta,
GSP28durdhpru:2726: na tāvad indryajñāṇāt tasya pūrvam abhāvāt,
GSP28durdhpru:2730: athaivaṃ bhinnasantānair eva vikalpitair vikalpodayo 'sty eva na tu nirvikalpād vikalpodaya iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:2731: santānabhede 'pi janyajanakabhāve nirvikalpād api vikalpodayasya ko niṣeddhā /
GSP28durdhpru:2732: na cendriyāśrayabhedād yugapat pravṛtteś ca santānabhedo yujyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2734: tasmāt prabhūtam alpaṃ vā sadṛśād eva kāraṇāj jāyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2736: yathāgnikaṇikāyāḥ [28a] prabhāpratānavatī pradīpaśikhā jāyamānā na santānabhedam ātmany āvahati /
GSP28durdhpru:2737_0: yat punar yogijñāṇasya tathātve 'pīdānīṃ manojñānaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ nābhyupeyate tad
GSP28durdhpru:2737_1: yādṛśāḥ sāmagryās tad udbhavo yadākārañ ca tat tat sāmagryabhāvāt tad ākārasya ca
GSP28durdhpru:2738: nanu ca yady asya prasādhakaṃ pramānṃ nāsti kimarthaṃ tarhi pratyakṣaprakaraṇa upanyāsa ity āśaṅkyāha -- evam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2740: evam prakāralakṣaṇakathanasyaiva kim prayojanam iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:2741: sūtrakārasya siddhāntaprasiddhamānasābhyupagame prasaktacodyanirākaraṇam -- yady asti mānasaṃ pratyakṣam evaṃ tasya lakṣaṇam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2748: sarve ca te cittacaittāś ca sarvacittacaittāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2750: na anyā cittāvasthā ity etad āśaṅkā nivṛttyarthaṃ sarvagrahaṇam kṛtam /
GSP28durdhpru:2751: na asti sā kācit cittāvasthā yasyām ātmanaḥ saṃvedanaṃ na pratyakṣaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2752: yena hi rūpeṇa ātmā vedyate tadrūpam ātmasamvedanaṃ pratyakṣam /
GSP28durdhpru:2753: vaibhāṣikaprakriyayā yadācāryeṇa cittacaittau bhedenoktau tayor artham āha -- cittam arthamātragrāhi vastumātra grāhi /
GSP28durdhpru:2755: caittā viśeṣāvasthāgrāhiṇo viśeṣāvasthāsvīkarttāro viśeṣāvasthākārā iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:2757: ka evaṃ rūpā ity āha -- sukhādaya ity /
GSP28durdhpru:2759: vigṛhṇan pūrva cittāni ca caittāś ceti samasya paścāt sarvaśabdena samāsa iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:2760: sukhetyādinā sarva grahaṇasya phalam āha -- sphuṭo vyakto 'nubhavaḥ prakāśo yasya tasyabhās tasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2764: nanu jñānasya saṃvedyātmaḥ kim anyad rūpāntaraṃ yat svasaṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣaṃ syād ity āśaṅkyāha -- yena hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:2766: atha yad anubhūyate tad anyenaiva yathā ghaṭādi /
GSP28durdhpru:2767: tat katham ātmanaivātmanaḥ saṃvedanam iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:2769: asti jñānasya sā yogyatā jaḍavyāvṛttatā jyotīrūpatā yayā svaprakāśe prakāśāntaraṃ nāpekṣate /
GSP28durdhpru:2770: yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśasvābhāvyād ātmānaṃ svayam eva prakāśayte,
GSP28durdhpru:2775: atra ca prayogaḥ -- yad avyaktavyaktikaṃ na tad vyaktam yathā kiñcit kadācit kathañcid avyaktavyaktikam /
GSP28durdhpru:2776: avyaktavyaktikaś cāyaṃ ghaṭādiḥ jñānaparokṣatva iti vyāpakānupalabdhiprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2777: jñānasya jñānāntareṇa vyaktau hetur ayam asiddha iti cen na,
GSP28durdhpru:2779: na ca bhavatām api mate sarvaṃ vijñānam ekārthasamavāyinā jñānena jñāyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2782: tat upekṣaṇīyam eva tāvad avyaktavyaktikatvād avyaktaṃ prasajyeta / na ceyam
GSP28durdhpru:2784: iha ca rūpādau vastuni dṛśyamāne āntaraḥ sukhādyākāras tulyakālaṃ saṃvedyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2785: na ca gṛhyamāṇākāro nīlādiḥ sātarūpo vedyate iti śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP28durdhpru:2786: yato nīlādiḥ sātarūpeṇa anubhūyata iti na niścīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2787: yadi hi sātarūpo 'yam nīlādir anubhūyata iti niścīyeta,
GSP28durdhpru:2789: yasmin rūpe pratyakṣasya sākṣātkāritvavyāpāro vikalpena anugamyate tat pratyakṣam /
GSP28durdhpru:2791: [28b] tathā hi yady avyaktavyaktikam api vyaktavyavahāraviṣayas tadā puruṣāntaravarttijñānavyaktikam api vastu svajñānodayakālavat tathaiva vyaktaṃ vyavahriyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:2793: tatsantāne jñānasyābhāvāt kathaṃ vastunas tathā vyavaḥāra iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:2796: [35]...... tadā tad api puruṣāntarasya kin na tathā vyavahāragocara?
GSP28durdhpru:2800: [35] paṅktibāhyaṃ likhitaṃ samyak na paṭhyate -- saṃ-
GSP28durdhpru:2805: kevalam arthaśūyam etad ucyate ity āśaṅkyāha -- ihetyādi /
GSP28durdhpru:2809: na tu tato 'nyat sukhādirūpaṃ yena tasya vedanarūpatā vyavasthāpy etety āha -- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2812: gṛhyamāṇa ākāro yasya grāhyasvabhāva ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2816: kuta evaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyata ity āha -- yata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2820: bhāvān naivaṃ śakyate vaktum ity ucyate ity āha -- yadīti /
GSP28durdhpru:2823: anena yad evānurūpavikalpena yathātvena niścīyate tad eva tathāvavyavahāragocaro yathā nīlādir ity ākūtam /
GSP28durdhpru:2827: tasmād sātānīlādyarthād anyad eva sātam anubhūyate nīlānubhavakāle /
GSP28durdhpru:2830: tac ca jñānarūpavedanam ātmanaḥ sākṣātkāri nirvikalapakam abhrāntaṃ ca /
GSP28durdhpru:2833: tat kim evam ucyate it āśaṅkya pūrvoktam eva smārayati -- yasminn iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2836: gṛhītaṃ nīlasya sātarūpatvaṃ vikalpenānugamyata evety āha -- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2840: yasmād gṛhymāṇākāro nīlādir na tathā niścīyate,
GSP28durdhpru:2845: kathaṃ cātmavedanaṃ pratyakṣam ity āha -- tac ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2847: jñānam evety avadhārayataḥ prakāśātmana eva jñānatvam anyathā prakāśāyogād ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2850: na ca grāhyākārād anyad anubhūyamānaṃ sātaṃ grāhakākārād apy anyad upapadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2853: na ca tad grāhyam ato grāhakam eva /
GSP28durdhpru:2855: tat punar ātmasaṃvedaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kuta ity āha -- tac ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2859: yad vā jñānarūpaṃ ca tad vedanañ ceti tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:2865: bhavatu nirvikalpakaṃ dvicanedrādijñānavad bhaviṣyatīty āha -- abhrāntaṃ ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2867: na hi tat svātmani atasmiṃs tad iti pravṛttam,
GSP28durdhpru:2869: bhavatāṃ nirvikalpakatvābhrāntatve tataḥ kiṃ siddham ity āha -- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2875: syān matam -- ityam tasya vedanasya pratyakṣatve vikalpātmavedanasyāpi tattvaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2878: vikalpo hi bāhyaṃ vikalpayati na tv ātmānam /
GSP28durdhpru:2881: prayogaḥ -- yad abhrāntatve satyavikapaṃ tat pratyakṣaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:2883: abhrāntatve satyavikalpakaṃ cātmani vikalaparūpavedanam iti svabhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2884: yathā ca jñānātmani samyāsambhavo yathā vā samitaḥ śabdasaṃsṛṣṭo na gṛhyate tathā 'nyatra prapañcitam iti nehocyata iti //
GSP28durdhpru:2891: bhūtasya bhāvanā punaḥ punaś cetasi viniveśanam /
GSP28durdhpru:2893: prakarṣasya paryanto yadā sphuṭābhatvam īṣadasampūrṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:2894: yāvad dhi sphuṭābhatvam aparipūrṇaṃ tāvat tasya prakarṣagamanam /
GSP28durdhpru:2895: bhūtaśabdasya vivakṣitam artham āha -- sadbhūta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2896: artha iti bruvāṇo bhūtaś cāsāv arthaś ceti karmadhārayaṃ darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:2897: nanu sukhādimayatvam apy arthasya sāṃkhyaparikalpitaṃ sadbhūtam ity āha -- pramāṇeneti /
GSP28durdhpru:2899: cakāraḥ sphuṭam etad ity arthaṃ dyotayati /
GSP28durdhpru:2900: kaḥ punar īdṛśo artho vivikṣita ity āha -- yatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:2901: anena bhūtārthaśabdenātra satyacatuṣṭayaṃ vivakṣitam iti darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:2903: tathā 'nyasadbhūtārthaviṣayam api draṣṭavyam iti yathāśabdārtho 'py asti /
GSP28durdhpru:2905: ārāt pāpakebhyo dharmebhyo yātā ity āryāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2906: ata eva tāni satyatayā manyanta iti teṣāṃ satyāni /
GSP28durdhpru:2911: phalabhūtāḥ pañca sakleśas kandhā duḥkhākhyaṃ satyam ekam /
GSP28durdhpru:2912: ta eva hetubhūtās tṛṣṇāsahāyāḥ samudayākhyaṃ satyaṃ dvitīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2914: tadavasthāprāptihetunairātmyādyākāraś cittaviśeṣo mārgākhyaṃ satyaṃ caturtham iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2915: bhāvanāśabdena vigrahaṃ tasya cārtham ācaṣṭe bhūtasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:2917: lakṣyate ca bhūtaśabdasānnidhyāl lekhakena prathamapustake bhūśabdaḥ prakṣiptaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2918: tasyeti tu vacanaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa vigrahaṃ darśayato dharmottarasya pāṭho 'nyathā yathābhūtaṃ vigrahaṃ darśayitukāmenārthapadopādāne kim akṣaragauravaṃ dṛṣṭam,
GSP28durdhpru:2919: yena kevalabhūtaśabdopādāne pratipattigauravaṃ likhanākauśalañ cāviṣkṛtam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2926: sampūrṇaṃ tu yadā tadā na asti prakarṣagatiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2928: tasmāt paryantād yaj jātaṃ bhāvyamānasya arthasya sannihitasya iva sphuṭatarākāragrāhi jñānaṃ yoginaḥ pratyakṣam /
GSP28durdhpru:2931: yādṛśo yogināṃ bhāvanākramo viniścaye “śrutamaye“tyādinābhihito yathā bhāvanāprakarṣaviśadābhatvayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvas tatraiva “kāmaśoke“tyādinā darśitas tathehāpi draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2932: yādṛśaś cākāras teṣāṃ satyānām anityatvādike bhāvanīyo yāvat kālāvadhikā ca bhāvanā 'nekajamaparamparānuyātā,
GSP28durdhpru:2933: yac ca nibandhanaṃ bhāvanāyāḥ karuṇā bodhisattvānām,
GSP28durdhpru:2934: tad anyeṣāṃ saṃsārodvegas tad api sarvaṃ yathā pramāṇavārttike nirṇītaṃ tathehāpy anugantavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:2935: iha tu yogijñāṇsya svrūpamātram upadarśayitum upakrāntam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2936: prakarṣaśabdena saha vigrahaṃ tasya cāryaṃ vivakṣitam āha -- bhāvanāyā iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2938: sa ca yatsphuṭatvatadadhikasphuṭatvādinā rūpeṇa tajjñānasyodaya eva /
GSP28durdhpru:2939: paryantaśabdena vigrahaṃ tasya cārtham ācaṣṭe prakarṣasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:2941: kadā ca tasyāvasānam ity āha -- yadeti /
GSP28durdhpru:2942: yasmin kāle sphuṭābhatvaṃ bhāvanārthaṃ viṣayasya jñānasyeti prakaraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2943: idaṃ leśato 'sampūrṇaṃ bhavati yad a[na]ntaraṃ yogipratyakṣeṇa bhavitavyaṃ tasmin kāle prakarṣasya paryanto 'vasānaṃ jñātavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2944: tatkālopalakṣitaṃ tathābhūtaṃ jñānaṃ paryanta ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2945: nanu prakarṣasya paryantaḥ sa yujyate yasmin sati prakarṣo nivarttate /
GSP28durdhpru:2948: tat katham ucyate kathañ ca paryantajaṃ yogijñānam,
GSP28durdhpru:2949: na tu tad eva paryanta ityāśaṅkyāha -- yāvad iti / hir yasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2950: sampūrṇe tu prakarṣagamanaṃ nāstīti darśayati -- sampūrnam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2956: parisamantād anta iti prādisamāsena niḥśeṣagamanam evocyate /
GSP28durdhpru:2957: tataḥ sa paryanta ucyate yad anantaraṃ prakarṣa(-kṛṣya)
GSP28durdhpru:2959: na tu yadarthaṃ yeṣāṃ prakarṣavatām udaya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2966: r anyajñānaṃ sphuṭatarākāragrāhi pratyakṣaṃ tadvad bhāvyamānārthasphuṭatarākāragrāhi yajjñānaṃ tadyoginaḥ pratyakṣam /
GSP28durdhpru:2967: uktam eva bhāvanāprakarṣārthaṃ tatparyantārthaṃ tajjñānaṃ copasaṃhāravyājena sukhapratipattyarthaṃ punar darśayati tad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2972: karatalāmalakavad bhāvyamānasya arthasya yad darśanaṃ tad yoginaḥ pratyakṣam /
GSP28durdhpru:2975: vikalpavijñānaṃ hi saṅketakāladṛṣṭatvena vastu gṛhṇac chabdasaṃsargayogyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2977: yathā ca pūrvotpannaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ sampratyasat tadvat pūrvavinaṣṭajñānaviṣayatvam api samprati na asti vastunaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2978: tad asadrūpaṃ vastuno gṛhṇad asannihitārthagrāhivād asphuṭābham vikalpakam /
GSP28durdhpru:2982: to dvidhākarttum aśakyeneti prastāvād vyavahitam āvṛtaṃ tadiva /
GSP28durdhpru:2983: karasvarūpaṃ karatalaṃ sannihitasyevety anena yat pūrvam uktaṃ [30a] tasyāyam upasaṃhāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:2985: tat punaḥ kathaṃ pratykṣam ity āśaṅkām apākarttuṃ pratykṣalakṣaṇena yogam asya darśayann āha tad dhīti / hir yasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:2987: nirvikalpakaṃ tu kathaṃ yena pratyakṣaṃ syād ity āha -- sphuṭābhatvād eveti /
GSP28durdhpru:2988: co nirvikalpakam ity ataḥ paraḥ sphuṭābhatvāpekṣaikaviṣayatvaṃ nirvikalpakatvasya samuccinoti /
GSP28durdhpru:2989: ayam asyāśayaḥ -- śabdākārasaṃsargo hi sphuṭābhatvavirodhīti yady asāv abhaviṣyat tadā sphuṭābham eva nābhaviṣyad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:2990: abhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsam eva sphuṭābahṃ bhavaiṣyati ko 'nayor virodha ity āśaṅkya vikalpetyādinā virodham eva darśyitum apakramate /
GSP28durdhpru:2992: vastv iti dṛśyamānaṃ yathā caitat tathā pūrvam eva viveditaṃ gṛṇīyād grahītum arhati /
GSP28durdhpru:2996: kim ata ity āha -- yathā ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:2998: bhavatv evaṃ tathāpi vādakākārasaṃsargino 'pi kathaṃ na sphuṭābhatvam ity āha -- tad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3001: asphuṭābhaṃ tu kutas tad ity āha -- asannnihitārthagrāhitvād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3003: pūrvavṛttadarśana viṣayatayā ca bhūtapūrvo bhāvo gṛhyamāno na sannihitarūpo bhāsate /
GSP28durdhpru:3006: asannihitaviṣayatvam eva tasya kuto 'vasīyata ity āha -- asadrūpam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3008: asadrūpaṃ vastuno gṛhyamāṇasya gṛhṇad iti hetau śatur vidhānād asadrūpagrahaṇād ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3012: anantaroktena krameṇa tatas tasmāt sphuṭābhatvād viśadābatvān nirvikalapakaṃ yogijñānam iti prakaraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3013: prayogaḥ -- yat saṅketakāladṛṣṭatayā vastusaṃsparśi jñānaṃ na tat sphuṭābham / yathā cira--
GSP28durdhpru:3023: tad evaṃ pratyakṣasya kalpanāpoḍhatvābhrāntatvayuktasye prakārabhedaṃ pratipādya viṣayavipratipattim nirākartum āha --
GSP28durdhpru:3026: tasya caturvidhasya pratyakṣasya viṣayo boddhavyaḥ svalakṣaṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:3029: vastuno hy āsādhāraṇaṃ ca tattvam asti sāmānyaṃ ca /
GSP28durdhpru:3030: tatra yad asādhāraṇam tat pratyakṣasya grāhyam /
GSP28durdhpru:3035: na hi pūrvajñānaviṣayatvaṃ pūrvamsin nivṛtte vastuno 'sti /
GSP28durdhpru:3036: tad uttarakālabhāvinā jñājñānena pūrvajñānaviṣayatvam asannihitam eva vastunaḥ spṛśyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3040: asaty abhrātatve tu kathaṃ pratyakṣam ity āha -- pramāneti /
GSP28durdhpru:3044: caḥ [30b] saṃvādakam ity ataḥ paro nirvikalpatvena saha saṃvādakatvena saṃvādakatvaṃ saucchinoti,
GSP28durdhpru:3051: yad vā samādhigrahaṇasyopalakṣaṇatvāt prajñā ca vivekakaraṇaṣaśaktir draṣṭavyā /
GSP28durdhpru:3052: sa yasyāsti sa nityasamāhito vivekakaraṇatatparaś ca yogī /
GSP28durdhpru:3054: tad evam ityādy āheity etad antaṃ subodham /
GSP28durdhpru:3056: ka ity ākāṅkṣāyām āha -- svalakṣaṇam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3057: svaśabdasya lakṣaṇaśabdasya cārtham ācakṣāṇo vigragam upalakṣayati -- svam ityādinā /
GSP28durdhpru:3059: yasya yat svaṃ tat tasyaiva nānyasyeti lakṣaṇayā svaśabdenā sādhāraṇam uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:3061: svaśabdayor artham abhidhāya tayoḥ samastaṃ padam āha -- svalakṣaṇaṃ iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3062: anena svam asādhāraṇaṃ ca tallakṣaṇaṃ svarūpaṃ cet karmadhāryo darśitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3064: dvividho hi viṣayaḥ pramāṇasya -- grāhyaś ca yadākāram utpadyate,
GSP28durdhpru:3068: adhyavaseyas tu pratyakṣabalotpannena niścayena santāna eva /
GSP28durdhpru:3071: tathā anumānam api svapratibhāse 'narthe 'rthādhyavasāyena pravṛtter anarthagrāhi /
GSP28durdhpru:3072: nanu sambhave vyabhicāre ca viśeṣaṇam arthavat /
GSP28durdhpru:3073: atra ca sarvasyaiva svarūpasyāsādhāraṇatvāt sambhava eva,
GSP28durdhpru:3075: evaṃ tu vaktavyam -- vasturūpaṃ tasya viṣaya ity āśaṅkayāha -- vastuna iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3080: sati caivaṃ dvairūpye kiṃ pūrvaṃ rūpam,
GSP28durdhpru:3081: atha paraṃ pratyakṣaya viṣaya iti sandehe -- yad asādhāraṇaṃ tat pratyakṣasya grāhyam ucyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3082: grāhyam iti bruvan viṣayaśabdenācāryasya grāhyo viṣayo 'bhipreta iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:3083: syād etat -- pravṛttiviṣaya eva pramāṇasya viṣayas tataḥ pravṛttiviṣayas tasya viṣaya iti vaktavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:3084: tat kiṃ grāhyam ity ucyata ity āha -- dvividha iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3089: bhedam upapādayati -- yadākāraṃ yatpratibhāsaṃ jñānam utpadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3091: dvayor api svajñāne prakāśanam asty eveti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:3093: tato jñānād yatra pravarttata iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:3095: nanu grāhyādhyavaseyaśabdayor eva bhedo na tv arthasya /
GSP28durdhpru:3096: yato yad eva prakāśate tad evādhyavasīyate,
GSP28durdhpru:3097: tat kiṃ evaṃ uyata ity āha -- anyo hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:3100: kasya kīdṛśo grāhya itaro vety āha -- pratyakṣasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:3101: hir avadhāraṇe eka ity asmāt paro draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3104: atha kiṃ pratyakṣam avasāyātmakaṃ yena tasyāsāv avaseya ity āha -- pratyakṣeti /
GSP28durdhpru:3105: pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvino niśacayasya pratyakṣagṛhīta eva pravṛttatayā 'natiśayādhānena yat tenādhyavasitaṃ tat pratyakṣeṇaivāvasitam iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3106: nanu grāhyād anyaḥ prāpaṇīyo viṣayaḥ pratyakṣasyoktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3108: tad ayaṃ tṛtīyo viṣayaḥ prāpta ity āha -- santāna eveti /
GSP28durdhpru:3111: grāhya eva kasmān na tena prāpyata ity āha -- lakṣāṇāsyeti (ity āha -- kṣaṇasyeti) /
GSP28durdhpru:3112: yadākaraṃ pratyakṣam utpadyate tasya kṣaṇasyeti prastāvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3113: evañ ca vivṛṇvato 'sya pramāṇasyety atra pratyakṣābhiprāyeṇa pramāṇaśabda indriyajāpratyakṣavivakṣayā draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3119: sa punar āropito 'rtho gṛhyamāṇaḥ svalakṣaṇatvena avasīyate yataḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:3122: tad atra pramāṇasya grāhyaṃ viṣayaṃ darśayatā pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣaya uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3123: bruvatā tad api viṣayadvaividhyavad abhyupagam eva ity āśaṅkyāha -- tatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:3124: yena pratibhāsādhyavasāyalakṣaṇena prakāreṇa pratyakṣam anyagrāhy anyādhyavasāyi tathā tena prakāreṇeti tathāśadārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3127: kin tv anumānam apy anyagrāhy anyādhyavasāyīty apiśabdenāha /
GSP28durdhpru:3128: ihaiva cchedaḥ karttavyo 'nyathā vyākhyānam asamañjasaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3131: katham upapadyata ity āśaṅkyopapattim āha -- svapratibhāsa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3136: athānarthe svapratibhāse 'rthādhyavasāyenānumānavikalpo 'nyo vā pravarttaka iti kim uktaṃ bhavati?
GSP28durdhpru:3137: svaprtibhāsasyāropyamāṇasya cārthasyāvasīyamānasya vivekaṃ na prtipadyata ity utkaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:3143: tasyāpi tathā pravṛttitayā pūrvavikapapratibhāsāsaṃsparśād ity alam iha vistareṇa /
GSP28durdhpru:3144: yady evaṃ ko 'syādhyavasīyamānaḥ prāpaṇīyo viṣaya ity āha -- sa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3147: artha iti artha ivārtho gṛhyamāṇaḥ pratīyamānas tasmin jñāne prakāśamāna iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:3149: tad anenānumāsya grāhyādhyavaseyau bhedena sādhyarthyād abhidhāya sukhapratipattyarthaṃ tāv eva kaṇṭhokau karoti -- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3150: yataḥ svalakṣaṇatvena tasyāvasāyas tataḥ [31b] svalakṣaṇam avasitaṃ pravṛttiviṣayo 'numānasya /
GSP28durdhpru:3151: svalakṣaṇam avasitam ity etad apy abhimānād abhidhīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3153: tadviṣayatve tasya niraṃśatvāt kṣaṇikatvāder apy avasitāv anumānānavatāraprasaṅgāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3157: tuḥ prāpaṇiyād viṣayād grāhyaṃ bhedavantaṃ darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:3158: tasmin jñāne prakāśamāne prakāśanād anartho grāhya uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3159: syād etat -- yady avasitaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ pravṛttiviṣayo 'numānasya tadā katham eṣa dharmottaro viniśacayaṭīkāyāṃ avadīt “avasitaś cākāro vikalpānāṃ grāhyaḥ” iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3160: evaṃ hi svalakṣaṇam eva grāhyaṃ samarthitaṃ syān nānartha iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3163_0: tathā hi praramārthato vikalpānām ārotpitam eva rūpam avaseyaṃ grāhyam tathāpi vyavaharttāra
GSP28durdhpru:3163_1: āropitam eva rūpam avṛkṣavyāvṛttam avasyanto bāhyasyāpi tathātvād bāhyaṃ vṛkṣam avasyāma ity abhimanyante,
GSP28durdhpru:3166: tad anurodhāt svalakṣaṇam avasitam ity ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3167: tasyaiva tv āropitasya paramārtho 'numeyasya pratibhāsamānaṃ kevalam ākāram āśritya grāhyatvam ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3168: tatas tatra vāstavāvasitarūpābhiprāyeṇa tathābhidhānāt ko virodhaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:3170: yasmāt pramāṇasya dvididho viṣayo grāhyādhyavsasāyabhedena tat tasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3171: atra viṣayavipratipattinirākaraṇākāle grāhyaṃ viṣayaṃ darśayateti bruvan viṣayaśabdenācāryasya grāhyo viṣayo 'bhipreta iti sphuṭati /
GSP28durdhpru:3172: syād etat -- na vai grāhyaviṣayāpekṣaṃ pratyakṣasya prāmāṇyam upapadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3178: na ca yena yasyāprāpaṇaṃ tasya tatra prāmāṇyam abhyupeyate,
GSP28durdhpru:3181: anumānsyāpi vahnyādyadhyavasāyitayā tathotpattir eva tatprāpaṇam ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3183: kasya nāma jñānasya savikalpasya nirvikalpakasya vā tattadākāratayotpattir nāsti yena tasya prāṇāṇyaṃ na syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3184: tasmān na dvididho viṣayaḥ pramāṇasyābhidhānīyo 'pi tv eka eva pravṛttiviṣayākhyo viṣayaḥ khyāpanīya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3190: ajñānasya ca prāmāṇyāsambhavena jñānāntarbhūtaṃ pramāṇaṃ viṣayadvaividhyavad eva bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:3191: kevalaṃ na grāhyāpe[32a]kṣaṃ prāmāṇyam api tu pravṛttiviṣayāpekṣam iti pratipādyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3193: yad vā pramāṇaśabdena jñānam evātra vivakṣitam /
GSP28durdhpru:3194: yathā 'yaṃ viniścayaṭīkāyāṃ svārthāṇumānavyākhyānāvasare vyaktam āha -- “dvividho jñānānāṃ viṣayo grāhyaś cādhyavaseyaś ca” ityādi /
GSP28durdhpru:3197: yadi grāhyo viṣayo na kadācid api pratyakṣasya prāpaṇīyas tarhi tena darśitena kim prayojanaṃ yenocyate tad atra grāhyaṃ viṣayaṃ darśatā pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇāṃ viṣaya ukta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3200: yadi hi pratyakṣaṃ kṣaṇam eka gṛhṇāti tatrānīlavyāvṛttiniścayopajane santānaṃ niścāyayat pravṛttiviṣayaṃ pradarśayet tatsantānabhāvināñ ca jñānānām apramānāṇyam āpādayet,
GSP28durdhpru:3202: tathā hi santānollekhena niścayābhāve 'py anīlavyāvṛttis tāvad anāgatasarvakṣaṇasādhāraṇī pratyakṣeṇa gṛhītaniścitā /
GSP28durdhpru:3204: tathāniścaya eva ca santāne niścaya ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3205_0: ata eva ca tad ādyaṃ jñānaṃ tathā 'nuṣṭhānaṃ tatsantānabhāvīni parāñci jñānāny anīlavyāvṛttaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:3205_1: rūpaṃ gṛhītam eva gṛhṇanty anīlavyāvṛttiniścayaṃ ca kṛtam eva kurvanty anatiśayādhāyīni
GSP28durdhpru:3205_2: pracurāṇy api prāmāṇyāt pracyāvayat prāmāṇyam ātmasātkarotīti nyāyyaṃ grāhyapradarśanam
GSP28durdhpru:3206: ihācāryasya -- svam asādhāraṇaṃ santānāntarasādhāraṇaṃ yan na bhavati,
GSP28durdhpru:3207: yad arthakriyākṣamam eva sarvato vyāvṛttaṃ tattvaṃ tad eva svalakṣaṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:3211: kaḥ punar asau viṣayo jñānasya yaḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ pratipattavya ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:3212: yasya arthasya saṃnidhānāsaṃnidhānābhyāṃ jñānapratibhāsabhedas tat svalakṣaṇam I-13
