GSP28durdhpru:3218: tasmāt saṃnidhānāsaṃnidhānāc ca jñānapratibhāsasya grāhyākārasya bhedaḥ sphuṭatvāsphuṭatvābhyām /
GSP28durdhpru:3219: yo hi jñānaviṣayaḥ saṃnihitaḥ san sphuṭābhāsaṃ jñānasya karoti,
GSP28durdhpru:3220: asaṃnihitas tu yogyadeśastha eva asphuṭaṃ karoti,
GSP28durdhpru:3222: sarvaṇy eva hi vastuni dūrād asphuṭāni dṛśyante,
GSP28durdhpru:3225: lakṣaṇaṃ tattvaṃ svalakṣaṇam iti vivṛṇvatā ca dharmottarena tad eva darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:3226_0: kevalaṃ na vyaktīkṛtam atas tasya viṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇam iti śabdamātraśrāviṇo 'viditācāryābhiprāyasyāvibhāvitadharmottaravivaraṇārthasya
GSP28durdhpru:3226_1: yady asādhāraṇaṃ pararūpeṇāmiśraṃ rūpaṃ svalaṣaṇaṃ tadā 'gnitvam api gotvādisāmānyenāmiśraṃ
GSP28durdhpru:3226_2: svalakṣaṇaṃ prasajyeteti vyāptiṃ manyamānasyāyaṃ kaḥ punar ityādipraśnaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3227: ka ity anena sāmānyākāreṇa viṣayaṃ pṛcchati /
GSP28durdhpru:3230: codakena viṣayaṃ sampṛṣṭa ācāryaḥ kasmād artham uttarīkarotīty āśaṅkyāha -- artheti /
GSP28durdhpru:3231: jñānasya pratyāsannatvāj jñānaviṣayo labdha ity abhipretya yasya jñānaviṣayasyeti vivṛṇoti /
GSP28durdhpru:3232: sannidhānāsannidhānaśabdau nikaṭadūrāvasthānārthau vyācakṣāṇo yad anyair ākhyātaṃ -- “asannidhānaṃ yogyadeśe sarvathā vastuno 'bhāvaḥ” iti tad apākaroti /
GSP28durdhpru:3233: ayañ cāsyābhiprāyo yatra vastu nāsti tatra jñānam eva na jāyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3234: na tu tatpratibhāsya bhedo nānātvam astīti /
GSP28durdhpru:3235: tasmād ityādinā sa[32b]nnidhānāsannidhānābhyām iti pañcamī dvivacanāntam etad iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:3243: kvacit samudāyārthaṃ vyākhyāya paścāt padārthaṃ vivṛṇvate /
GSP28durdhpru:3244: kvacit padārthṃ vivṛtya paścāt smudāyārthaṃ vyācakṣata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3247: dūrastho hi jñānam eva na janayati kim aṅga punar bhindyād ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3258: dūrād asphuṭāni dṛśyanta iti vadataś cāyam āśayaḥ -- dūre hi vastu gṛhyamāṇaṃ pracurarajonīhārādisaṃsṛṣṭaṃ gṛhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3262: tathā hi vikalpaviṣayo 'pi vahnir dṛśyātmaka eva avasīyata ity āha
GSP28durdhpru:3267: ya eva arthaḥ sannidhānāsannidhānābhyāṃ sphuṭam asphuṭaṃ ca pratibhāsaṃ karoti paramārthasan sa eva /
GSP28durdhpru:3274: yadi ya evārthaḥ sannidhānād asannidhāc ca jñānapratibhāsaṃ sphuṭatvāsphuṭatvābhyāṃ bhinati sa eva svalakṣaṇaṃ tarhi sparśarasau svalakṣaṇe na syātām /
GSP28durdhpru:3275: tau khalu asannihitau jñānam eva na janyataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3277: kiñ caitasmin svalakṣaṇe vijñāṇam asvalakṣaṇaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3278: tasyā''stāṃ tāvad asannihitasyāsphuṭajñānajanakatvaṃ sannihitasyāpi sphuṭajñānajanakatvaṃ nāsti /
GSP28durdhpru:3279: na ca tasya dūrāntikavarttitvam asty adeśatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3280: tad īdṛśīṃ mahatīm avyāpitām anālocyedṛśaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ praṇayann ācāryaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:3281: dharmottaro 'py evaṃ prasabhaṃ vyācakṣāṇaḥ kathaṃ na pramādyatīti? na /
GSP28durdhpru:3285: kevalaṃ sannidhānāsannidhānābhyāṃ jñānapratibhāsabhedakatvena yad ekārthasamavetam asādhāraṇyaṃ vyatyantarāsanuyāyitvaṃ tad upalakṣitam /
GSP28durdhpru:3287: ata eva -- “asādhāraṇaviṣayaṃ svalakṣaṇaviṣayam” iti [hetu-ṭī-pṛ-25] bhaṭaṭārcaṭo vyācaṣṭe /
GSP28durdhpru:3288: ata evānumānasyaitad viparyayeṇa sādhāraṇaṃ rūpa viṣayo darśayiṣyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3290: tasya viṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇam ity abhihite 'pi svalakṣaṇaśabdasyānyathāpi nirvacanasambhavāt,
GSP28durdhpru:3291: nāyam abhimato 'rtho jñāyeta pratipattṛbhir iti tad abhimatārtha ittham upalakṣita iti ca dṛṣṭavyam //
GSP28durdhpru:3292_0: tasya viṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇam ity atra yadi tasyaiva viṣayaḥ svalaṣāṇam ity avadhāryate
GSP28durdhpru:3292_1: tadā yata eva kārakaraṇaṃ tato 'nyatrāvadhāraṇam iti svalakṣaṇasya pratyakṣe niyamāt
GSP28durdhpru:3294: tadā 'pi pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇe niyatatvād [33a] aniyataṃ svalakṣaṇam anumānasyāpi viṣayaḥ syād ity ubhayāvadhāraṇāṃ kāryam /
GSP28durdhpru:3296: etad asahamānaḥ pūrvapakṣavādy āha -- kasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3299: yad vā yasyārthasyety atra tatsvalakṣaṇam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3300: tad eva pratyakṣaviṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ nānumānaviṣaya ity abhipretaṃ tad asahamāna evam āha /
GSP28durdhpru:3301: kasmāt pratyakṣaviṣāya eveti bruvato 'numānasyāpi viṣayaḥ kiṃ na svalakṣaṇam ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3302: sa eva kiṃ na tathety āśaṅkya pūrvapakṣavādy evopapattim
GSP28durdhpru:3304: kasmāt punas tad eva paramārthasad ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:3308: heyo hi hātum iṣyate upādeyaś ca upādātum /
GSP28durdhpru:3311: tad eva lakṣaṇaṃ rūpaṃ yasya vastunaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:3315: nanu `yasyārthasya sannidhānāsannidhānābhyāṃ jñānapratibhāsabhedas tat svalakṣaṇam' ity ukte kuto 'sya praśnasyāvakāśaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:3316: na hi vikalpaviṣayasya sannidhānāsannidhānāc ca jñānapratibhāsabhedo 'sti yato 'syotthānaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3318_0: kevalam ayam asyāśayaḥ -- yad etad bhavadbhir lakṣaṇaṃ svalakṣaṇasya pratītaṃ tad
GSP28durdhpru:3318_1: asya lakṣanaṃ eva na bhavati kin tu yad eva dṛśyatayā 'dhyavasīyate tad eva sva[lakṣaṇa]m
GSP28durdhpru:3319: sati caivam aumānavikalpaviṣayasyāpi tathātvam anivāritam eveti sūtthānaḥ praśnaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3320: etat praśnaviṣarjanam ācāryīyaṃ darśayann āha -- tad eveti /
GSP28durdhpru:3321: atha syāt yadi[37]............. ty ucyamānaṃ śobheta yāvatedam eva na siddhaṃ tat kuto 'yaṃ praśnavisarjanaprakāra iti? ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3322: svalakṣaṇam iti svam asādhāraṇaṃ pāramārthikaḥ svabhāva ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3323: sa eva ca pāramārthikaḥ svabhāva ucyate,
GSP28durdhpru:3325: sa eva ca paramārthasann iti yuktam idam uttaraṃ tad eveti /
GSP28durdhpru:3329: tena rūpeṇa sad vidyamānam iti vigrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3332: paramārthasad ity asyārtham ākhyāya tad evety etad vivṛṇoti ya eveti /
GSP28durdhpru:3335: svalakṣaṇaṃ caivam ātmakam ity abhprāyeṇa ya evārthaḥ sa evety āha /
GSP28durdhpru:3337: sa tu na tasya viṣayo 'nyāpi vā viṣayo bhaviṣyati /
GSP28durdhpru:3338: tathā ca vivakṣitārthāsiddhir ity āha sa ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:3340: tad eteti pratyakṣaviṣayatvena sthitaṃ vastv eva na tv anumānaviṣayo 'pīti /
GSP28durdhpru:3341: anena kasmāt punaḥ pratyakṣaviṣaya eva svalakṣaṇam ity etat praśnavisarjanasyopasaṃhāraḥ kṛto veditavyaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:3345: idānīṃ svalakṣaṇasyaiva paramārthasattvam asahamāna āha -- kasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3346: yam asyāśaḥ -- sa eva khalu paramārhtasann artho ya evārthtvenādhyavasīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3347: anumānaviṣayo 'pi ca vahnis tathā 'dhyavasīyata iti so 'pi kasmān na paramā[33b]rthasann iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3348: atra -- arthetyādi yad uttaraṃ tad arthyata ityādinā vyācaṣte /
GSP28durdhpru:3350: heyaḥ katham arthyata ity āha -- heya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3352: yadi hātum arthyamāno 'rtho na tarhy upādeyo 'rtha ity āha -- upādeya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3355: evaṃ ca vyācakṣāṇaḥ sādhyo dāhādir eva mukhyavṛttyopādeyā heyo vā /
GSP28durdhpru:3360: tad ayam arthaḥ -- yasmād arthakriyāsamarthaṃ parmārthasad ucyate,
GSP28durdhpru:3363: tata eva hi pratyakṣaviṣayād arthakriyā prāpyate na vikalpaviṣayāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3364: ata eva yady api vikalpaviṣayo dṛśya iva avasīyate tathā api na sa dṛśya eva tato 'rthakriyāya abhāvāt,
GSP28durdhpru:3366: atas tad eva svalakṣaṇaṃ na vikalpaviṣayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3369: etasmāt svalakṣaṇād yad anyat ---- svalakṣaṇaṃ yo na bhavati jñānaviṣayaḥ ---- tat sāmānyalakṣaṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:3370: vikalpajñānena avasīyamāno hy arthaḥ sannidhānāsannidhānābhyāṃ jñānapratibhāsaṃ na bhinatti /
GSP28durdhpru:3371: tathā hi āropyamāṇo vahnir āropād asti /
GSP28durdhpru:3373: tasya samāropitasya sannidhānāsannidhānāc ca jñānapratibhāsasya na bhedaḥ sphuṭatvena asphuṭatvena vā /
GSP28durdhpru:3379: tam evopādātuṃ hātum vā tatsādhanasyopādānaṃ hānaṃ vā 'nyathā vā śakyata iti tatsādhanabhūto vahnyādir upādeyādir upapadyata iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:3380: tasyām ityādi tasmād ity antaṃ subodham /
GSP28durdhpru:3381: paramārthasatas tattve pratipādye kim iti vastunas tādrūpyam ācāryeṇa darśitam ity āśaṅkām apākurvann āha -- vastuśabda iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3382: tad ayam artha ityādir na vikalpaviṣaya ity anto granthas tūktārthopasaṃhāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3385: svalakṣaṇaśabdasya cānyaśabdayogāt pañcamyā bhavitavyam ity abhipretya etasmād ity āha /
GSP28durdhpru:3386: anyatvam abhivyanakti -- svalakṣaṇaṃ yo na bhavatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:3392: pratibhāsābhedakatvaṃ tasya kuto 'vasīyate sarvadā tasya sannihitarūpatvād asannihitarūpatvād eva vety āha -- tathā hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:3395: āstām āropāt tathābhūtas tathāpi tasya sannidhānāsannidhāna(ne)
GSP28durdhpru:3401: tac ca anumānyasya grāhyaṃ darśayitum āha --
GSP28durdhpru:3405: sāmānyalakṣaṇam anumānasya viṣayaṃ vyākhyātukāmena ayaṃ svalakṣaṇasvarūpākhyānagrantha āvartanīyaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3406: tato lāghavārthaṃ pratyakṣapariccheda eva anumānaviṣaya uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3412: vikalpaviṣayasyāpy asādhāraṇatvād asiddhaṃ vyakyantarasādhāraṇatvād asiddhaṃ vyaktyantarasādhāraṇatvam ity āha -- sakalaś cāsau tārṇapārṇādibhedabhinno vahniś ceti tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:3415: tad viṣayatve 'numānasya kathaṃ bāhye pravarttakatvaṃ tatprāpakatvañ ca,
GSP28durdhpru:3416: yataḥ pramāṇyam asya syād iti ced /
GSP28durdhpru:3418: vikalpāḥ khalv ete 'nādyavidyāvaśāt svapratibhāsam anagnivyāvṛtta avasyanto bāhyo 'py anagnivyāvṛtta iti tad adhyasānam eva bāhyo vahnir adhyavasita iti manyante /
GSP28durdhpru:3420: tator vivekāpratipatteḥ ata eva te vikalpā dṛśyavikalpyāv arthāv ekīkṛtya bāhye lokaṃ pravarttayanti /
GSP28durdhpru:3421: dṛśyavikapyaikīkaraṇam api teṣāṃ tathā pravṛttihetutayotpatter eva draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:3424: tad āha nyāyavādī -- “bhrāntir api sambandhataḥ pramā” iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3425: eṣa cārthaḥ svapratibhāse 'narthe 'rthādhyavasāyena pravṛtter ity atrāpy apekṣaṇīyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3427: yata evaṃ tat tasmād ity upasaṃhāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3432: evaṃ vyācakṣāṇo viṣayaśabdena grāhyo viṣayo 'bhipreto 'tra pramāṇavyāpāraviṣayo 'dhyavaseyaḥ svalakṣaṇasyaiva tad adhyavaseyatvena tathā vyavasthāpanād iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:3434: prakāśamānaṃ ca rūpam āśritya grāhyatvam ucyata ity uktaprāyam /
GSP28durdhpru:3435: anumānasyāpi grāhyaviṣayadarśane 'yam abhiprāyo yadīdam anumānam anartham anagnivyāvṛttimātraṃ sāmānyarūpaṃ gṛhṇāti,
GSP28durdhpru:3438: tathākurvac ca vastuviṣayaṃ prāmāṇyam aśnuvīta nānyatheti / sa
GSP28durdhpru:3441: tad eva ca pratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaphalam I-18
GSP28durdhpru:3442: tad eva iti / yad eva anantaram uktaṃ pratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ tad eva pramānasya phalaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:3446: sā eva rūpaṃ yasya pratyakṣajñānasya tad arthapratītirūpam /
GSP28durdhpru:3448: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- prāpakaṃ jñānam pramāṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:3449: prāpaṇaśaktiś ca na kevalād arthāvinābhavitvād bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:3451: tasmāt prāpyād arthād utpattāv apy asya jñānasya asti kaścid avaśyakartavyaḥ prāpakavyāpāro yena kṛtena arthaḥ prāpito bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:3454: uktaṃ ca purastāt pravṛttiviṣayapradarśanam eva prāpakasya prāpakavyāpāro nāma /
GSP28durdhpru:3455: tad eva ca pratyakṣam arthapratītirūpam arthapradarśanarūpam /
GSP28durdhpru:3460: atrāpi sāmānyalakṣaṇam evānumānasya viṣaya ity avadhāraṇīyaṃ na tv anumānasyaiveti pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvino 'pi vikalpaviśeṣasya tadviṣayatvād anyathā liṅganiścayāyogād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3461: samprati pratyakṣasya viṣayavipratipattinirākaraṇe prakṛte kim aprakṛtam anumānasya viṣayavipratipattinirākaraṇam ācaritam ity āśaṅkām apākarttuṃ sāmānyetyādinopakramate /
GSP28durdhpru:3462: etac cokta ity etad antaṃ sujñānam //
GSP28durdhpru:3463: viṣayetyādi phalam ity ed antaṃ suboddham /
GSP28durdhpru:3464: phalapradarśane cāyaṃ vārttikakārasyāśayaḥ -- pramākaraṇaṃ khalu loke pramāṇam ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3466: nanu yasmin viṣaye kriyāsādhanaṃ vyāpriyate[38]..... katham iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3467: kim anyat pramāṇam iti punar ihopekṣaitam anena /
GSP28durdhpru:3469: etac ca tasmād ity antaṃ sugamam /
GSP28durdhpru:3476: tat kim arthe pratītis tat phalaṃ mṛgyata ityāśaṅkyāha -- etad uktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:3479: sā ca śaktis tata utpatte eva /
GSP28durdhpru:3480: tathā ca kathaṃ pūrvapakṣātikrama ity āha -- prāpaṇaśaktiś ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:3483: vivakṣitena vinā bhavatīti vinābhāvī grahāditvāṇ ṇiniḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:3485: arthena vinā bhāvīti “tṛtīyā” [pā-2.1.30] iti yogavibhāgāt samāsaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3487: kathaṃ punar na kevalād ity āha -- bījād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3489: yady api santāna eva prāpyo na ca tasmāt tasyotpattis tathāpi viṣaye 'syaikatvam adhyavasāya prāpyād arthād uttpattāv apīty uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:3493: tathāpi na tatphalam ity āha -- sa eveti /
GSP28durdhpru:3494: ca sphuṭam etad ity asimnn arthe /
GSP28durdhpru:3497: tathā ca kathaṃ pratītiḥ phalam ity āha uktam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3500: kenoktam etad iti cet pravarttakatvam api pravṛttiviṣayopadarśakatvam evetyādinā /
GSP28durdhpru:3501_0: āstām arthapratītir avaśyakarttavyā pramāṇasya tathāpi kathaṃ tad eva pratyakṣajñānaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:3501_1: phalaṃ tasyātadrūpatvād ityāśaṅkya yad arthapratītirūpatvaṃ prajñātaṃ tad upapādayann āha -- tadeveti /
GSP28durdhpru:3504: tat katham arthapratītyām ekaṃ tat pradarśyata ity āha -- arthapradarśanarūpam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3506: yata evam ato 'smāt tad eva pratyakṣaṃ jñānam eva nārthāntaram ity arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3507: pramāṇād anyajñānam eva phalaṃ yadi syāt, kiṃ syāt?
GSP28durdhpru:3508: yena yatnena garīyasā pramāṇād abhedo 'sya sādhyata iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:3511: pravṛttes tatpradhānatvāt” [pramāṇavā-1.4] ity atrājñāṇātmanas tāvat prāmāṇyam apahastitam /
GSP28durdhpru:3514: anyathā jñānatvam eva tasya na syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3515: pramājanakatvena ca jñānatve cakṣurāder api jñānatvaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3517: svasaṃvedanarūpatve vā grāhyākārasaṃvedanam evārthavedanam iti kahtaṃ bhinnaṃ phalam?
GSP28durdhpru:3519: jñānam evārthasya prakāśa iti ca sarvatantrasiddho 'yam arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3521: satyāṃ ca tadātmatāyāṃ tad eva phalaṃ yujyate,
GSP28durdhpru:3523: api ca yadi jñānasya svayam artharūpaparicchedarūpatvenārthaparicchedakatvaṃ na syāt,
GSP28durdhpru:3525: tadā 'rthasya paricchitter aparokṣataiva vyavasthāpayituṃ na śakyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:3526: tathā hi tad ādyaṃ jñānam arthaṃ paricchinatty artham aparokṣayatīti ko 'rtho 'rthaviṣayāṃ paricchittiṃ janayatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:3527: sā 'pi yady artham aparokṣayati tadā 'parāṃ pratītiṃ janayatīti syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3528: evam uttaratrāpy evam eveti paricchittīnām ānantyam,
GSP28durdhpru:3529: na tv arthasyāparokṣatety āyātam āndhyam aśeṣasya jagataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3530: atha tāsām ekā svayam arthaparicchedarūpā arthāparokṣatārūpopeyate;
GSP28durdhpru:3532: kin tarhi? svayam arthaparicchedātmatvam iti ādyasyāpi tathātvam anivāritam /
GSP28durdhpru:3533: tathā ca kathaṃ pramāṇād vyatiriktaṃ phalam iti?
GSP28durdhpru:3534: iha na kriyaiva karaṇaṃ loke tayor bhedenāvasthiteḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3535: yā ceyaṃ jñānalakṣaṇā kriyā sā cet phalaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:3540: arthena saha yat sārūpyaṃ sādṛśyam asya jñānasya tat pramāṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:3541: iha yasmād viṣayād vijñānam udeti tadviṣayasadṛśaṃ tad bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:3543: tac ca sārūpyaṃ sādṛśyam ākāra ity ābhāsa ity api vyapadiśyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3545: tathā ca sati tad eva jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ tad eva ca pramāṇaphalam /
GSP28durdhpru:3546: na ca ekaṃ vastu sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca upapadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3547: tat kathaṃ sārūpyaṃ pramāṇam ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:3550: kim anyat pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati ity āgūrya pūrvapakṣāvādī yadīty āha /
GSP28durdhpru:3553: tad eva pratyakṣaṃ jñānam evam iti (eveti)
GSP28durdhpru:3556: tarhi tasmin kāle kim pramāṇam iti yojyam /
GSP28durdhpru:3561: etac ca nīlasadṛśam ity antam subodham /
GSP28durdhpru:3562: kevalam evaṃ vadato 'yam āśayaḥ -- anekaprāgbhāvenodayamānam api vijñānam arthasyaivākāraṃ bibharti,
GSP28durdhpru:3565: yadi hi tadanyākāro viṣayaḥ syāt tadā taditarasyākāradhāri vijñānaṃ kadācij janyet /
GSP28durdhpru:3566: yathā śuktiḥ kathañcid rajatākārajñānaprabandhodaye 'pi taddeśopasṛṣṭasya svākārānukāri jñānaṃ janayati /
GSP28durdhpru:3567: na cābhrāntasya nīlajñānasya kadācid apy anyākāratvam asti /
GSP28durdhpru:3568: tasmād artho 'py evam ākāra iti niścīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3570: nanu cānyatra viṣayābhāsaḥ pramāṇam uktas tathāviṣayākāraḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:3572: tat kathaṃ na vyāghāta ity āśaṅkyāha -- tac ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:3573: co yasmād avadhāraṇe vā ity apy anenāpi śabdena /
GSP28durdhpru:3576: kiṃ tarhi pramāṇam iti pṛcchatā yac cetasi nihitam āsīt tad idānīṃ nanu cetyādinā kaṇṭhoktaṃ karoti /
GSP28durdhpru:3577: etac ca pramāṇam ity etad antaṃ subodham /
GSP28durdhpru:3585: arthasya pratītirūpaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vijñānaṃ sārūpyavaśāt siddhyati pratītaṃ bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3588: yebhyo hi cakṣurādibhyo vijñānam utpadyate na tadvaśāt tajjñānaṃ nīlasya saṃvedanaṃ śakyate 'vasthāpayitum[39] /
GSP28durdhpru:3589: nīlasadṛśaṃ tu anubhūyamānaṃ nīlasya saṃvedanam avasthāpyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3597: tata ekasya vastunaḥ kiñcid rūpaṃ pramāṇam kiñcit pramāṇaphalaṃ na virudhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3598: etasmin pūrvapakṣe tadvaśād ityādy uttaram ācāryīyaṃ vivṛṇoti tad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3601: yataḥ pramitir iyaṃ viśiṣṭenaiva karmaṇā 'vacchinnā pratīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3604: pratītaṃ tannīlasyedaṃ jñānaṃ na pītasyetyādyākāreṇa niścitaṃ bhavtīty arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3607: yata evaṃ tat tasmāt nīlasya pratītir nīlasyaivedaṃ jñānam ity avasīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3608: nanu janakebhya eveyaṃ jñānasya vyavasthā bhaviṣyati /
GSP28durdhpru:3609: te hi jñāṇaṃ janayituṃ śaktāḥ kim aṅga niścāyituṃ na śaknuyuḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:3610: ataś ca na sārūpyādhīno 'yaṃ pratītiniyama ity āśaṅkyāha -- yebhya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3616: tadaviśeṣe sa kathaṃ viśeṣavyavasthāyā aṅgaṃ bhaved iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3617: nīlasārūpye 'pi yady ayaṃ nyāyas tadā kathaṃ tasyāpi niyamakatvam ity āha -- nīleti /
GSP28durdhpru:3619: nīlasadṛśam anubhūyamānaṃ saṃvedanaṃ jñānaṃ nīlasya nīlasyaiveti vyavasthāpyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3620: ayam atra prakaraṇārthaḥ -- yadi jñānam arthasarūpaṃ na syāt kin tu nirākāraṃ bodhaikarūpaṃ tadā 'nubhavaikarūpatayā tad aviśiṣṭaṃ,
GSP28durdhpru:3621: paricchedyatayā karmasyānaprāpte nīlapītādāv iti nīlasyaivedaṃ saṃvedanam,
GSP28durdhpru:3623: [35b] arthagataś cākāro jñānādhīnapratipattitayā jñānasya viśiṣṭarūpatāsandehena sandigdhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3624: na ca tenaiva sandigdharūpeṇa tad eva sandigdhaṃ rūpaṃ niścetuṃ śakyam /
GSP28durdhpru:3625: jñānagataś ca viśeṣo 'rthakṛtaḥ sārūpyād anyo nopapadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3626: sann api na tāvad idaṃ tayā 'sau nirdeṣṭuṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3628: yadrūpaś ca yaś ca karmaniyamaniśayo jñānasya tasminn nirūpite kīdṛśī tadrūpatāvyavasthā? yathā
GSP28durdhpru:3632: vyavasthāpyavyavasthāpakabhāvo 'pi katham ekasya jñānasya iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:3634: nīlasadṛśam anubhūya tad vijñānaṃ yato nīlasya grāhakam avasthāpyate niścayapratyayena,
GSP28durdhpru:3636: niścayapratyayena ca taj jñānaṃ nīlasaṃvedanam avasthāpyamānaṃ vyavasthāpyam /
GSP28durdhpru:3639: nīlādir anirūpite kṣaṇikatve tadrūpo na nirūpyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3640: tasmād yata iyam adhigatir avyavadhānāt tattvaṃ pralabhate tad evānyenāvyavadhīyamānavyāpāraṃ svabhedena bhedakaṃ pramākaraṇaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:3643: eṣa ca vādo 'smābhir 10vistareṇa viśeṣākhyāne 'bhihita iti tato 'py apekṣitavya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3644: nanu caivam apy ekasyaiva jñānasya sādhyatvaṃ sādhanatvañ ca katham upapadyate?
GSP28durdhpru:3645: na hi paraśur eva chidā bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:3646: tataḥ pramāṇaphalayor abhedo nābhyupaitavya ity āśaṅkyāha -- na cetyādi /
GSP28durdhpru:3649: yady evam na bhavati kathaṃ nāmety āha -- api tu kin tu /
GSP28durdhpru:3651: vyavasthāpyate viśiṣṭenātmanā niyamyate 'neneti vyavasthānimittam vyavasthāpanam abhipretam /
GSP28durdhpru:3653: yadā tu vyavasthāpakabhāveneti pāṭho dṛśyate tadā karaṇe karttṛbhāvavivakṣayā tathā draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:3655: tayor vyavasthāpyavyavasthāpanayor bhāvas tathā jñānābhidhānanimittaṃ rūpaṃ tena /
GSP28durdhpru:3657: yata evaṃ tatas tasmād ekasya vastunaḥ pratyakṣalakṣaṇasya jñānasya vastunaḥ kiñcid rūpaṃ vyāvṛttiparikalpitaṃ kṛtakatvādivat /
GSP28durdhpru:3659: grāhyākāro 'rthasārūpyākhya ātmanaḥ saṃvidam arthasaṃvidam ādarśayann arthe pramāṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:3661: vastutaḥ svavid apīyam arthasambandhinī vyavasīyamānā 'rthasaṃvittiḥ phalm iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3663: kiñ ca vyavasthāpyaṃ yenaitat syād ity āha -- vyavasthāpaneti /
GSP28durdhpru:3671: nīlasyedaṃ nānyasyety anenākāreṇa yan nīlasaṃvedanaṃ tad rūpam /
GSP28durdhpru:3673: na kevalam ekasya janyajanakabhāvo 'nupapanna ity apinā darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:3675: yato yasmān nilasadṛśam anubhūyeti vāstavaṃ rūpam anūditam /
GSP28durdhpru:3677: api tu nīlam evānubhavāmīti nīlasya grākam avasthāpyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3680: na tu nirvikalpatvāt pratyakṣam eva nīlabodharūpatvena ātmanam avasthāpayitum śaknoti /
GSP28durdhpru:3681: niścayapratyayena avyavasthāpitaṃ sad api nīlabodharūpaṃ vijñānam asatkalpam eva /
GSP28durdhpru:3682: tasmān niścayena nīlabodharūpaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ vijñānaṃ nīlabodhātmanā sad bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:3683: tasmād adhyavasāyaṃ kurvad eva pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:3684: akṛte tv adhyavasāye nīlabodharūpatvenāvyavasthāpitaṃ bhavati vijñānam /
GSP28durdhpru:3686: ataḥ sādhakatamatvābhāvāt pramāṇam eva na syāj jñānam /
GSP28durdhpru:3689: na ca niścayo 'py ātmānaṃ tathā 'vasthāpayituṃ paryavāpnoti,
GSP28durdhpru:3691: tat kena tathā vyavasthāyata ity āha -- niścayapratyayeneti /
GSP28durdhpru:3694: tasmāt sārūpyam anubhūtaṃ svasaṃvedanena pratītaṃ vyavasthāpanahetur nīlasyedaṃ saṃvedanam,
GSP28durdhpru:3696: idaṃ ca vyavasthāpanahetur hi sārupyaṃ tasya jñāṇasyety asya samarthanam /
GSP28durdhpru:3697: yadi jñānasya tasya sārupyam evaṃ vyavasthāpanahetus tarhi kiṃ kīdṛśaṃ ca sad vyavasthāpyam ity āha -- niścayeti /
GSP28durdhpru:3700: yasyaiva nīlajñānasya sārūpyaṃ tathoktaṃ tad eva jñānaṃ vyavasthāpyaṃ nīlasyaivetyākāreṇa niyāmyam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3703: iti pāṭho 'ṣṭamapaṃktisambaddhatvena paṃktibāhyabhāge likhitaḥ pratau dṛśyate kin tu tasya kutra niveśa iti na jñāyate -- saṃ-
GSP28durdhpru:3705: kīdṛśaṃ sat tathā vyavasthāpyam ity āha -- nīleti /
GSP28durdhpru:3706: pītādisaṃvedanavyāvṛttyā nīlasyedaṃ saṃvedanaṃ jñānam ity avasthāpyamānaṃ niścīyamānam /
GSP28durdhpru:3708: nanu kiṃ jñānāt sārūpyaṃ vyatiricyate yena sārūpyaṃ tathoktam,
GSP28durdhpru:3709: jñānaṃ tv evam ucyata ity āśaṅkyopasaṃhāravyāhenāha -- tasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3711: sārūpyaṃ ca jñānād anyaṃ nopapadyate tasmāt kāraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3712: ayaṃ ca -- tata ekasya vastunaḥ kiñcid rūpam ityāder upapattyā prasādhitasyopasaṃhāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3714: ekasyaiva jñānasya vyāvṛttikṛtaṃ bhedam āśrityāha vyavasthāpyavyasthāpanabhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3715: vāstavaṃ cābhedam upādāya pramāṇaphalayor abheda ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3717: samprati niścayapratyayeneti bruvatā yādṛśo niścayo vivakṣitas taṃ vyavasthāpaka ityādinopasaṃhāravyājena spaṣṭayati /
GSP28durdhpru:3721: yathā marīcīr dṛṣṭvā tadbalotpannena vikalpenāvasthāpyamānayor jalasārūpyajñānayor na tathābhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3723: janitena tv adhyavasāyena sārūpyavaśān nīlabodharūpe jñāne vyavasthāpyamāne sārūpyaṃ vyavasthāpanahetutvāt pramāṇaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:3724: yady evam adhyavasāyasahitam eva pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam syāt na kevalam iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:3728: darśanāñ ca arthasākṣātkaraṇākhyaṃ pratyakṣavyāpāraḥ utprekṣaṇaṃ tu vikalpavyāpāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3730: yenābhiprāyeṇa niścayapratyayasya vyavasthāpakatvam uktaṃ tam abhivyanakti -- na tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3733: nanu paramārthato yadi taj jñānaṃ nīlam eva rūpatayā sarūpaṃ tadā tathāniścayo bhavatu vā mā vā /
GSP28durdhpru:3734: svayam evāvikalpakatve 'pi tena rūpeṇa sadvyayvahāragocaro bhaviṣyatīty āśṅkyāha -- niścayapratyayenetyādi /
GSP28durdhpru:3737: tenāvyavasthāpitam asatkalpam asat tulyam svaviṣaye vyavahārayitum aśaktatvāt[36b] /
GSP28durdhpru:3740: yamān niścayena tathā 'vyavasthāpitam asatā sadṛśaṃ abhavati tasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3741: nīlabodhātmanā nīlasyāyaṃ bodha ityākāreṇa sad bhavati sadvyavahārayogyaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:3742: yamātsvasāmarthyotpannenānurūpeṇa niścayapratyayena vyavasthāpitaṃ tathā vahavati nānyathā tasmāt kāraṇād adhyavasāyam anurūpaṃ niścayaṃ kurvat /
GSP28durdhpru:3744: amum evārthaṃ vyatirekamukhena draḍhyann āha -- akṛte tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3746: bhavatu tathā 'vyavasthāpitaṃ kim ata ity āha -- tathā ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:3748: tad aniṣpattāv api kiṃ na pramāṇam ity āha -- ata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3753: sā cen na niṣpannā tarhi kim apekṣya sādhakatamatvam ātmasātkuryāt,
GSP28durdhpru:3755: nanu avasāyābhāve tāvad iyaṃ gatis tadbhāve 'pi yady eṣaiva gatis tadā na pratyakṣaṃ nāma pramāṇam ity āśaṅkyānvayamukhenedānīm āha -- janiteneti /
GSP28durdhpru:3757: tena tathāvyavasthāpyamāne vyavasthāpakatve ca nimittam āha -- sārūpyavaśād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3759: yadi pratyakṣaṃ kevalam asahāyaṃ pravarttayitum anīśanaṃ niyamena niścayam apekṣate tarhi tat sahitam eva pramāṇaṃ prasajyetety abhiprāyavān prāha -- yady evam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3760: evam anantaroktaṃ yady abhyupagamyate tadaivaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:3763: evaṃ saty etan na bhavati / hetum āha --
GSP28durdhpru:3765: vikalpayanta utprekṣāmahe na tu paśyāma ity utprekṣātmakaṃ vikalpavyāpāram anubhavād adhyavasyanti /
GSP28durdhpru:3766: tasmāt svavyāpāraṃ tiraskṛtya pratyakṣavyāpāram ādarśayati yatra arthe pratyakṣapūrvako 'dhyavasāyas tatra pratyakṣaṃ kevalam eva pramāṇam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3769: [41] pramāṇam iti nyāyabinduṭīkāyāṃ prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:3772: pramāṇam iti ācāryadharottaraviracitāyāṃ nyāyabinduṭīkāyāṃ prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:3779: tataḥ svavyāpāraviśiṣṭārthādhyavasāne tasya kā kṣatir ity āśaṅkyāha -- darśanañ ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:3781: yady evaṃ kas tarhi vikalpavyāpāra ity āha -- utprekṣaṇam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3782: etad eva tathā hītyādinā 'vasyantīty anena (-ty antena)
GSP28durdhpru:3784: bhavatv evaṃ tathāpi kathaṃ pratyakṣasya kevalasya prāmāṇyaṃ na tu vikalpasyāpīty āśaṅkyopasaṃhārāpadeśenāha -- tasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3787: syāt khalu vikalpasyāpi prāṇaṇyaṃ yady asau svavyāpārayukta eva pratyakṣasya sāhāyyaṃ bhajate /
GSP28durdhpru:3790: sa ca darśanalakṣaṇo vyāpāraḥ pratyakṣeṇaiva sampādita iti katham ayam api piṣṭapeṣaṇakārī prāmāṇyaṃ pratilabheta /
GSP28durdhpru:3791: atha pratyakṣaṃ tāvat svaprāmāṇyavyavahārāya tam apekṣate /
GSP28durdhpru:3792: tataḥ so 'pi pramāṇam eveti matis tarhi pitā pitṛvyavahārāyāvaśyaṃ putram apekṣata iti putro 'pi pitā prasajyata iti kṛtam atārkikavacanavicāraṇayeti
GSP28durdhpru:3795: [DhPr p.87] II K A P I T E L
GSP28durdhpru:3797: evaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vyākhyāya anumānaṃ vyākhyātum āha --
GSP28durdhpru:3800: atha anumānalakṣaṇe vaktavye kim akasmāt prakārabhedaḥ kathyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3804: tayor atyantabhedāt na ekam lakṣaṇam asti /
GSP28durdhpru:3805: tatas tayoh pratiniyataṃ lakṣaṇam ākhyātuṃ prakārabhedaḥ kathyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3807: vyaktibhede ca kathite prativyaktiniyataṃ lakṣaṇaṃ śakyate vaktum /
GSP28durdhpru:3810: aśakyatāṃ ca prakārabhedakathanam antareṇa lakṣaṇanirdeśasya jñātvā prāk prakārabhedaḥ kathyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3813: yathoddeśam adhunā 'numānaṃ vyākhyātum avasaraprāptam ity abhisandhāyāha -- evam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3815: prakāre dhāpratyayo 'yam iti darśayann āha -- dviprakāram iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3816: nanu cānumānasya lakṣaṇaṃ vaktukāmenāsya lakṣaṇam eva vaktavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:3817: tat kim idam aprastutābhidhānam āsthīyata iti pūrvapakṣam -- arthetyādinotthāpayati /
GSP28durdhpru:3823: yathā caturṇām api pratyakṣāṇāṃ jñānarūpatvād ekaṃ kalpanāpoḍhatvādisādhāraṇaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sambhavati,
GSP28durdhpru:3824: tathā yadi syāt pratyakṣaval lakṣaṇam eva prathamam uktaṃ syād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3827: nanu prativyaktiniyataṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vyaktiviśeṣopadarśanaṃ vinā na śakyate darśayitum iti vyaktibheda eva kathayitavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3828: tat kiṃ prakārabhedaḥ kathyata ity āha -- prakāreti /
GSP28durdhpru:3830: yadi tasmin darśite 'pi pratiniyatalakṣaṇākhyānaṃ na śakyaṃ tarhi kiṃ tena kathitenety āha -- vyaktīti /
GSP28durdhpru:3833: tena prati viśiṣṭā vyaktis tatra niyatam iti,
GSP28durdhpru:3835: kim punas tad dvaividhyam ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:3842: yad vā niyataṃ viśiṣṭaṃ lakṣaṇāṃ na śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP28durdhpru:3843: kva ca niyatam ity āśaṅkyoktaṃ -- prativyaktīti /
GSP28durdhpru:3847: etena yac codyate “lakṣaṇamātre kathite viśiṣṭalakṣaṇam anumānam ekam anekaṃ vā 'stu /
GSP28durdhpru:3848: kiṃ tasya prakārabhedakathanena” iti tat parihṛtam /
GSP28durdhpru:3849: yadi hi sādhāraṇaṃ lakṣaṇam abhipretyedam uyate tadā tan nāstīti kiṃ kathyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:3850: atha viśiṣṭaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tad api vyaktibhedakathanam antareṇa vaktuṃ yadi śakyeta kiṃ na kathyta /
GSP28durdhpru:3852: ata evādāv eva tad abhidhānaṃ nyāyyam,
GSP28durdhpru:3853: na tu paścād iti darśayitum āha -- aśakyatām iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3857: syād etat -- svārthānumānam evaṃlakṣaṇaṃ parārthānumānam evaṃlakṣaṇam iti kiṃ viśiṣṭaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na śakyate vaktum?
GSP28durdhpru:3858: evam api kim anumānadvaitaṃ nāveditaṃ bhavati yena sasaṃkhyeyā saṃkhyā -- anumānaṃ dvidhā svārthaṃ parārthaṃ cety ucyata iti?
GSP28durdhpru:3860: kevalaṃ niyamārtham etad vibhāgavacanam iti brūmaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3861: anumānaṃ dvidhā -- dvidhaivaivam ātmakam iti kathaṃ nāma[37b] pratīyeteti /
GSP28durdhpru:3862: itaratheha tāvad etāvad eva vyutpādyatayā prastutam,
GSP28durdhpru:3863: anyatra punar anyad apy anumānaṃ vyutpādyam astīty āśaṅkā nāhatya nirākṛtā syād iti //
GSP28durdhpru:3864: pūrvavaccheṣavadādirūpeṇa anyathā 'pi dvaividhyasambhavāt saṃśayānaḥ pṛcchati -- kiṃ punar iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3873: yenānumānena karaṇabhūtenānumātā svayaṃ pratipadyate parokṣam artham iti śeṣaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:3876: ayam āśayaḥ -- trirūpaliṅgasya jñānaṃ yasya santāna utpadyate tat tadartham eva /
GSP28durdhpru:3879: na tu kiñcij jñānaṃ kvacit puṃsi niyatam asti /
GSP28durdhpru:3881: yena svayaṃ pratipadyata iti bruvataś cāyam abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3882: yady api pratipattir anumānajñānātmikā tathāpy ekasyāpi vyavasthāpyavyavasthāpanabhāvena kriyākaraṇabhedo darśita iti sārūpyabhāgaḥ karaṇam anumānam,
GSP28durdhpru:3885: tatra svārthaṃ trirūpāl liṅgād yad anumeye jñānaṃ tad anumānam II-3
GSP28durdhpru:3886: tatra tayoḥ svārthaparārthānumānayor madhye svārthaṃ jñānaṃ kiṃ viśiṣṭam ity āha -- trirūpād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3887: trīṇi rūpāṇi yasya vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇāni tat trirūpam /
GSP28durdhpru:3889: parārtham ity asya vigraham āha -- parasmāy iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3892: asya ca parapratipattḥ prayojanam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3894: yena vākyena karaṇena paraṃ prati vācyaṃ pratipādyati parokṣam arthaṃ bodhayati tat trirūpalaiṅgākhyānaṃ vākyaṃ parārtham anumānam /
GSP28durdhpru:3895: atrāpy ayam asyābhiprāyaḥ -- yady api abhidhānarūpam apy anumānaṃ na niyataṃ puṃsi tathā 'pi tat parārtham eva /
GSP28durdhpru:3896: tathā hi yad yad uddiśya pravarttate tat tad artham ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3897: param uddiśya pravarttate ca śabdo nātmānam /
GSP28durdhpru:3899: prayoktṛsamīhāviṣyasyārthasya para eva prayojako yasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3901: sākṣād anayor vyāpārabhedād iti ca draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:3902: nanu ca parārthānumānotpādakavākyavad asti kiñcid vākyaṃ yat parapratyakṣopayogi /
GSP28durdhpru:3904: ataḥ parārthānumānavat parārthaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kiṃ na vyutpādyata iti?
GSP28durdhpru:3905: atrocdyate -- parokṣārthapratipatter yā sāmagrī -- liṅgasya pakṣadharmatā sādhyavyāptiś ca -- tadākhyānād vākyam upacārataḥ parārthānumānam ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3908: idaṃ punaḥ `ayaṃ kalabhaḥ' ityādivākyaṃ na pratyakṣotpatter yā sāmagrīndriyālokādi tadabhidhānāt tannimittaṃ bhavat tathā vyapadeśam aśnute yena vyutpādyatām apy aśnuvīta /
GSP28durdhpru:3910_0: yathā kathañcit parapratyakṣotpattāv aṅgabhāvamātreṇa tādrūpye netrotsave vastuni
GSP28durdhpru:3910_1: sannihite 'pi kathañcit parāṅmukhasya pareṇa yad abhimukhīkaraṇaṃ [38a]śirasas tad
GSP28durdhpru:3910_2: api vacanātmakaṃ parārthapratyakṣaṃ vyutpādayitur vyutpādyam āpadyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:3911: etac ca kaḥ svasthātmā manasi niveśayet /
GSP28durdhpru:3912: kiñ ca bhavatu tathāvidhaṃ vacanaṃ parārthaṃ pratyakṣam /
GSP28durdhpru:3914: tasyāpi vyutpādanārthasyāvyutpādanāt pramāda eva mahatī kṣtir iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:3918: na tu kecit tathāvidhe vacane parārthapratyakṣopayogini vipratipadyante /
GSP28durdhpru:3920: parārthānumāne[42]............... vastu pratipadyamānā api taddharmavyāptivyatirekābhyāṃ nigadanto dṛṣṭāḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:3922: upanayasādhyatadāvṛttivacanānāñ ca prayogād iti tad vyutpādyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3923: yadi tu tatrāpi na vipratipadyeran pare tadā tad api naiva vyutpāditaṃ syād,
GSP28durdhpru:3928: iha yathaiva svayaṃ pratipannaḥ parokṣārthas tathaiva parasmai partipādyata iti svārthāṇumānapūrvakatvāt prarārthānumānasya prathamaṃ svārthānumānam uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:3929: yathoddeśam eva ca lakṣaṇapraṇeyam iti svārthānumānasyaivaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:3931: liṅgam / tasmāt trirūpāl liṅgāt yat jātaṃ jñānam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3933: tat trirūpāt ca liṅgāt trirūpaliṅgālambhanam apy utpadyata iti viśinaṣṭi -- anumeya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3935: trirūpāl liṅgāt yad utpannam anumeyālambhanam jñānam tat svārtham anumānam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3938: pramāṇasya yat phalaṃ tasya vā vyavasthā sā atra anumāne 'pi pratyakṣa iva pratyakṣavat veditavyā /
GSP28durdhpru:3939: lakṣaṇaṃ tatretyādinā ''dita upadiṣṭam ācāryeṇa tad vyācaṣṭe tatreti /
GSP28durdhpru:3941_0: tasmāt trirūpāl liṅgād yaj jātam iti vyācakṣāṇo mūle trirūpāl liṅgād iti yā pañcamī
GSP28durdhpru:3941_1: sā gamyamānajanikriyāpekṣayā “janikarttuḥ prakṛtiḥ” [pāṇini 1.4.30] ity anena labdhāpādānasaṃjñakād
GSP28durdhpru:3943: trirūpāl liṅgād iti cācakṣāṇenācāryeṇaikadvipadavyudāsena ṣaṭpakṣīṃ pratikṣipya saptamapakṣaparigraheṇa liṅgasya lakṣaṇam abhipretaṃ prakāśitam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3944: yathā caitat tathā bhaṭṭārcaṭanibandhanam arcaṭālokasaṃjñitaṃ vidhāsyanto vistareṇa spaṣṭayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3948: trirūpaliṅgālambanam iti dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvatrāyaṃ vahnināntarīyaka iti jñānaṃ vācyam /
GSP28durdhpru:3949: tad dhi paramparayā trirūpāl liṅgāj jātam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3952: kim punar viśiṣyata ity āha -- etac ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:3956: anumeyo dharmadharmisamudāyaḥ ālambyata ity ālambanaṃ yasyeti vigrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3957: itir vākyārthaparisamāptau evam arthaḥ san nāpareṇa sambaddhyate -- evam uktena pakāreṇā lakṣaṇavipratipattiṃ nirākṛtyeti //
GSP28durdhpru:3958: nanu ca pramāṇasya phalam iti yady ācāryasya vivakṣitaṃ dharmottareṇa caivaṃ vyākhyāyate tadā pramāṇabhāgavyavasthāyāṃ kim uktam ācāryeṇa,
GSP28durdhpru:3959: dharmottareṇāpi `nīlasārūpyaṃ vyavasthāpanahetuḥ pramāṇam' ity upariṣṭāt [pṛ-91] kim iti darśayiṣyate iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:3963: yathā hi nīlasarūpaṃ pratyakṣam anubhūyamānaṃ nīlabodharūpam avasthāpyate,
GSP28durdhpru:3966: tadvad anumānaṃ nīlākāram utpadyamānaṃ nīlabodharūpam avasthāpyate,
GSP28durdhpru:3975: trairūpyaṃ punar liṅgasya anumeye sattvam eva sapakṣa eva sattvam,
GSP28durdhpru:3976: asapakṣe ca asattvam eva niścitam II-5
GSP28durdhpru:3978: liṅgasya yat trairūpyaṃ yāni trīṇi rūpāṇi tat idam ucyate iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:3979: kiṃ punas tat trairūpyam ity āha -- anumeyaṃ vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:3980: tasmin liṅgasya sattvam eva niścitam -- ekaṃ rūpam /
GSP28durdhpru:3981: yady api ca atra niścitagrahaṇam na kṛtaṃ tathā api ante kṛtaṃ prakrāntayor dvayor api rūpayor apekṣaṇīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:3982: yato na yogyatayā liṅgaṃ parokṣajñānasya nimittam / yathā
GSP28durdhpru:3985: etac copalakṣaṇaṃ tena phalasya sādhanaṃ ca yat tasyāpi yā vyavasthā sā 'pi gṛhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:3988: ata eva niścayaḥ -- “na parmāṇaphalayor viṣayabhdedaḥ” iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3998: na tu viṣayavipratipattir ity āha -- evam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:3999: evam anantaroktena prakāreṇa ihānumānaparicchede nirākṛtā iti śeṣaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:4000: vakṣyamāṇaṃ vā nīrākṛteti padaṃ vacanavipariṇāmena sambandhanīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4003: prasaṅgena prastāv ena yāni trīṇi rūpāṇi tāny eva tathety āvedayati /
GSP28durdhpru:4004: tat idaṃ trairūpyam iti prakṛtatvāt śeṣo 'dhyāhāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4008: kasmāt punas tad apekṣanīyam ity āha --yata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4011: kasmān na tathety āha -- adṛṣṭād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4014: liṅgaṃ na parokṣajñānanimittaṃ tarhi pakṣadharmatayā jñātam evāstu parokṣaprakāśanaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:4021: tasmāt parokṣārthanāntarīyakatayā niścayanam eva liṅgasya parokṣārthapratipādanavyāpāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4023: ato 'nvayavyatirekapakṣadharmatvaniścayo liṅgavyāpārātmakatvād avaśyakartavya iti sarveṣu rūpeṣu niścitagrahaṇam apekṣaṇīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4027: pakṣīkṛteṣu taruṣu patrasaṅkocalakṣaṇaḥ svāpa ekadeśe na siddhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4028: na hi sarve vṛkṣā rātrau patrasaṅkocabhājaḥ kin tu kecid eva /
GSP28durdhpru:4041: parokṣasya vahnyāder nāntarīyako 'vinābhāvītasya bhāvas tattā tayā niścayanam -- sarvatrāyam etad avinābhāvīti vikalpanam /
GSP28durdhpru:4044: evakāreṇa vyavacchinnam evānyasya tad vyāpārārarūpatvaṃ spaṣṭārthaṃ nāpara ity anenānūditam /
GSP28durdhpru:4045: yat punar atrāpy ayam etan nāntarīyaka iti jñāṇaṃ tad anumānajñānam iti jñeyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4047: ataḥ sattvenāniścitāl liṅgād aniścitasambandhāc cāpratipatteḥ kāraṇād anvayādiniściyo 'vaśyakarttavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4048: tathāpi kathaṃ karttaya ity āśaṅkya vyatirekamukheṇoktam eva hetum anvyayamukhenāpi darśayann āha -- liṅgeti /
GSP28durdhpru:4049: liṅgavyāpārasya parokṣapratipādane gamakavyāpārasyātmā sa eva tatheti svārthikaḥ kan karttavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4050: tasya bhāvas tasmād iti hetupadaṃ kṛṭvā 'yam upasaṃhāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4052: sampraty ekaikasya rūpasya yad vyāvarttyaṃ tat krameṇa darśayitum āha -- tatreti /
GSP28durdhpru:4055: yathā tu prabhedo yathā vāntarbhāvas tathopariṣṭād vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4057: athāpi syāt svāpavat dhūmo 'py ayam ekadeśāsiddha eva /
GSP28durdhpru:4058: tathā hi parvatādir iha pakṣas tatra ca kvacid eva deśe siddho na sarvatra /
GSP28durdhpru:4060: athaivaṃvidho 'pi pakṣavyāpaka ucyate tarhi svāpena kim aparāddhaṃ yenāsāv evaiko na yukta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4062: paścāt kṛtena evakāreṇa asādhāraṇo dharmo nirastaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4063: yadi hi anumeya eva sattvam iti kuryāt śrāvaṇatvam eva hetuḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4066: tasminn eva sattvam niścitam iti dvitīyaṃ rūpam / iha api
GSP28durdhpru:4069: yaś cāsau parvatādis tatra na vahnir jijñāsitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4071: tatraikadeśasthadhūmadarśane 'py ekadeśavahnir jijñāsito jñāyata iti kiṃ sarvaparvatavyāpinā dhūmena kāryam?
GSP28durdhpru:4072: yadi punaḥ sarvatraiva vahnimattvaṃ jijñāsitaṃ syāt,
GSP28durdhpru:4076: atra punaḥ sarveṣām eva tarūṇāṃ caitanyaṃ jijñāsitam iti sakalapādapavyāpinaiva svāpena prayojanam /
GSP28durdhpru:4077: yathā vedasya sarvasyaiva pauruṣeyatve sādhye sakalāmnāyavyāpakenaiva vākyatvena paryojanam /
GSP28durdhpru:4080: eke tu -- lokādhyavasāyasiddhaṃ mahīdharāder ekatvam avalambyāyaṃ vyavahāraḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:4081: na ca sarveṣāṃ tarūṇāṃ tathaikatvaṃ loko 'dhyavasyati,
GSP28durdhpru:4084: athābhidhīyate -- yadi kaścit tintiṅkāprabhṛtīn eva pādapān pakṣayitvā svāpaṃ hetūkaroti,
GSP28durdhpru:4085: tadā 'yaṃ na pakṣaikadeśāsiddha iti kiṃ na sādhayec caitanyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4087: yadi sarvajanaprasiddha indriyavyāpāravirodhyavasthāviśeṣaḥ svāpo nidrāparanāmā hetur abhipretas tadā 'yaṃ teṣv api taruṣv asddha iti kathaṃ caitanyam anumāpayet?
GSP28durdhpru:4088: atha yena kenacid upādhinā svāpaśabdamātravācyo 'rtho hetuḥ;
GSP28durdhpru:4090: “ṣaṣṭhy atasarthapratyeyana” [pāṇini 2.3.30] ity anena paścācchabdayoge sattvavacanāt ṣaṣṭhī /
GSP28durdhpru:4094: pūrvāvadhāraṇe tu nāyaṃ nirākṛtaḥ syād iti darśayati yadīti /
GSP28durdhpru:4096: ayam asyāśayaḥ -- yady anumeya eva sattvaṃ yasyeti lakṣaṇaṃ syāt tadā sapakṣa eva sattvam iti vacanam atiricyamānaṃ lakṣaṇāntaraṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP28durdhpru:4099: sandigdhaś cāsāv asya hetutvena viśeṣaṇatvena cāsiddho 'niścitaśabdeti vigrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4103: yathā 'nayor bhedo yathā cāntarbhāvas tathā parastāt pradarśayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4104: ihāśritatvādārthena nyāyena hetusattvasya viśeṣaṇarūpatvād anena sahoditi(ta)
GSP28durdhpru:4110: sa hi na sapakṣa eva vartate kin tu ubhayatra api /
GSP28durdhpru:4111: sattvagrahaṇāt pūrvāvadhāraṇavacanena sapakṣāvyāpisattākasya api prayatnānantarīyakasya hetutvaṃ kathitam /
GSP28durdhpru:4112: paścādavadhāraṇe tv ayam arthaḥ syāt -- sapakṣe sattvam eva yasya sa hetur iti prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ na hetuḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4117: tasminn asattvam eva niścitam -- tṛtīyaṃ rūpam /
GSP28durdhpru:4121: prayatnānantarīyakatve sādhye hy anityatvaṃ vipakṣaikadeśe vidyudādau asti,
GSP28durdhpru:4124: asattvaśabdād dhi pūrvasminn avadhāraṇe 'yam arthaḥ syāt -- vipakṣa eva yo na asti sa hetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4126: sādhāraṇaś cāsau sapkṣāsapakṣavṛttitvād anaikāntikaś caikasmin sādhye viparyaye vā 'vyavasthitaś ceti tathā nirasta iti varttate /
GSP28durdhpru:4128: prayatnānantarīyakatvam apy anityatvasiddhau samartho hetur iti darśayituṃ sakalasapakṣāvyāpi prayatnānantarīyakatvam udāhṛtam iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4129: vastutas tu sarva eva kāryahetur dhūmādiḥ sapakṣaikadeśavṛttir boddhavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4131: evaṃ sati prayatnānantarīyakatvam upalakṣaṇatvād asya dhūmādikam api na hetuḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4133_0: ihāśrayatvādārthena nyāyena sapakṣalakṣaṇasya dharmiṇo viśeṣyatvād anena sahodito
GSP28durdhpru:4133_1: nipātaḥ pakṣe vṛkṣe vṛttau labdhāyāṃ samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇatvād asapakṣalakṣaṇadharmyanatarayogasya
GSP28durdhpru:4134: tṛtīyaṃ rūpaṃ vyākhyātum āha -- asapakṣa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4136: katham asya nirāsa ity āha -- viruddho hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:4139: kasmin sādhye kin tad īdṛśam ity āha -- prayatneti /
GSP28durdhpru:4143: na asti / tato na hetuḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4146: nanu ca sapakṣa eva sattvam ity ukte vipakṣe 'sattvam eva iti gamyata eva /
GSP28durdhpru:4147: tat kimarthaṃ punar ubhayor upādānaṃ kṛtam? ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:4148: anvayo vyatireko vā [prayujyamānaḥ] niyamavān eva prayoktavyo na anyathā iti darśayituṃ dvayor apy upādānaṃ kṛtam /
GSP28durdhpru:4149: aniyate hi dvayor api prayoge 'yam arthaḥ syāt -- sapakṣe yo 'sti vipakṣe ca yo na asti sa hetur iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4150: tathā ca sati sa śyāmaḥ tatputratvāt dṛśyamānaputravad
GSP28durdhpru:4152: asapakṣa eveti kiṃ nāvadhāryata ity āha tathā ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:4159: tathā hi -- ya eva vipakṣe vīkṣito hetuḥ sa eva prameyatvādivad abhimataṃ na sādhayet /
GSP28durdhpru:4160: yaḥ punar mahatā 'pi prayatnena mṛgyamāṇo 'sapakṣe nopalakṣitaḥ sa katham aṅga sādhyaṃ na sādhayed iti?
GSP28durdhpru:4162: yato yo 'pi vipakṣe vīkṣito hetuḥ so 'pi iṣṭo duṣṭaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4163: kathaṃ? sādhyaṃ vinā 'py upalabdher iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:4164: nanu yadi nāmāsau sādhyam antareṇānyatra dṛṣṭas tathāpi vivādādhyāsite dharmiṇi sādhyaṃ kiṃ na sādhayati?
GSP28durdhpru:4165: na hi ayam atrāpi sādhyaṃ vinaiva varrtata iti prasādhakaṃ pramāṇam asti /
GSP28durdhpru:4166: na caikatra yena vinā yo dṛṣṭaḥ sarvatrāsau tena vinaiva varttate iti siddham /
GSP28durdhpru:4168: atha sādhyam antareṇa yo vṛttaḥ sādhye saty evāsau varttata iti niyamābhāvād vivādādhyāsite sandehahetur na samyag hetur bhavitum arhati /
GSP28durdhpru:4169: hanta tarhi vipakṣe tasya sādhyadharmiṇi sādhyavinākṛtāṃ vṛttiṃ sambhāvayad hetum aniściyahetūkarotīti āyātam /
GSP28durdhpru:4170: sati caivaṃ sādhyaviparyaye hetusattābādhakapramāṇādarśanam api -- yady ayaṃ ca dharmo bhaviṣyati,
GSP28durdhpru:4171: na ca tataḥ sādhyam ity evaṃ vidhāṃ vṛttim asya -- sambhāvayati tadā kim ayaṃ niścayahetur bhavitum arhati?
GSP28durdhpru:4172: tato vi[40a]pakṣe darśanaṃ vā tathā śaṅkābījam astu viparyaye vā bādhakapramāṇādarśanaṃ veti ko viśeṣaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:4173: tathā cāha vārttikakāraḥ -- “na tu sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sattvam asattvaṃ vā niśiyāpekṣam /
GSP28durdhpru:4175: so 'niścaye 'pi tulya iti tathāvidhodbhāvanam apy atra dūṣaṇam eva /
GSP28durdhpru:4176: tathā vipakṣapracārāśaṅkāvyavacchedena labhyaṃ gamakatvaṃ katham ātmasātkuryād” iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4178: vipakṣe 'sattvam eveti gamyata iti brubato 'yaṃ bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4179: pakṣe vṛttau labdhāyāṃ sapakṣa eva sattvaṃ niścitam iti khalu samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇo 'yaṃ nirṇayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4180: ayaṃ cāsapakṣe 'sattve 'niścite sandigdhe vā na ghaṭata iti avaśyam asapakṣe 'sattvam eva
GSP28durdhpru:4183: tasmān niyamavator eva anvayavyatirekayoḥ prayogaḥ kartavyo yena pratibandho gamyeta sādhanasya sādhyena /
GSP28durdhpru:4184: niyamavatoś ca prayoge 'vaśyakartavye dvayor eka eva prayoktavyo na dvāv iti niyamavān eva anvayo vyatireko vā prayoktavya iti śikṣaṇārthaṃ dvayor upādānam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4185: trairūpyakathanaprasaṅgena anumeyaḥ sapakṣo vipakṣaś ca uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4190: evam upalakṣaṇatvād asyāsapakṣe cāsattvam eva niścitam ity anena sapakṣe vṛttimātraṃ labdham eva /
GSP28durdhpru:4191: tenaiva ca prayojanam iti kiṃ sapakṣa eva sattvam ity aneneti drṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4193: sādhyenānvīyamānatvaṃ tayeva sādhye bhavitṛtvaṃ sādhanasya svagato dharmo 'nvayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4194: sādhyābhāve vyatiricyamānatvam abhavitṛtvaṃ hetoḥ savagato dharmo vyatirekaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4195: sa cāsaś ca[44]prayujyamānaḥ śabdena pratipādyamāṇo niyamavān avyabhicāravān prayoktavyo 'nyathā parokṣapratīty aṅga noktaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4197: yadā 'nvayavākye sādhye niyataṃ sādhanaṃ vyatirekavākye ca sādhanābhāve niyataḥ sādhyābhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4204: aniyamenāpi prayoge yady anvayavyatirekayos tādṛśoḥ pratītir asti tadā kiṃ niyamavat prayogeṇety āha -- aniyate hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:4206: āstāṃ tāvad ekasya prayoge dvayor apy ayam arthaḥ syād ity apiśabdaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4209: kā kṣatir ity āha -- tathā ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:4210: kākatālīyanyāyena cāśyāmeṣu nikaṭavarttiṣu atatputreṣu etad draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4211: anyathā hy aniyato 'pi vyatireko 'tra nokta iti vacanāvakāśaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4212: yata evaṃ tasmād yena niyamavatprayogeṇa partibandhaḥ pratibaddhatvam āyattatvam /
GSP28durdhpru:4215: yady evam ekasminn eva sādhanavākye niyamavān evānvayo vyatirekaś ca prayujyatām ity āha -- niyamavatoś ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:4217: ayam āśayaḥ -- anvayavākyenāpi tathāprayuktena sāmarthyād vyatirekasya,
GSP28durdhpru:4218: vyatirekavākyenāpi sāmarthyād anvayasya prakāśanāt kiṃ pratītapratyāyakena dvitīyavākyena kāryam iti?
GSP28durdhpru:4223: anena prayo[40b]gasamāsa eva darśito na rūpasamāsa iti darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:4224: prayogadarśanābhyāsāt kaścit prayogabhaṅgyaiva svayam api parokṣam arthaṃ pratipadyata iti svārthe 'py anumāne nirṇītam idaṃ lakṣaṇakathanaprasaṅgena /
GSP28durdhpru:4231: vyāptiniścayakāle tu dharmo anumeya iti darśayitum atragrahanam /
GSP28durdhpru:4232: jijñāsito jñātum iṣṭo viśeṣo dharmo yasya dharmiṇaḥ sa tathā uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4236: samānaḥ sadṛśo yo 'rthaḥ pakṣeṇa sa pakṣa ukta upacārāt samānaśabdena viśiṣyate /
GSP28durdhpru:4239: nanu yadi dharmadharmisamudāyo mukhyo 'numeyo 'tra gṛhyate tadā na kasyacit sādhanasya taddharmatvaṃ grahītuṃ śakyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:4240: grahaṇe vā vyaktam eva vaiyarthyam ity abhiprāyavān pṛcchati -- tatra ka iti teṣu madhye /
GSP28durdhpru:4243: tasmiṃś tasmin kāle 'numeyaikadeśatvād upacārato draṣṭavyam / tad uktam --
GSP28durdhpru:4246: atha yad saha pakṣeṇa varttate iti sapakṣo 'bhipretas tadā 'rthāsaṅgatiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4247: athāpi samānaḥ pakṣeṇeti mataṃ tadā pakṣasamāna iti prāpnotīty abhipretya pṛcchati ka iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4254: nanu samānaś cāsau pakṣaś ceti kiṃ nābhipretam?
GSP28durdhpru:4255: tatra pakṣa evāsau dṛṣṭāntadharmī kathaṃ yena samānaśabdena viśiṣyata ity āha -- pakṣa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4256: katham anyārthena tena śabdena sa tathocyatām ity āha -- upacārād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4258: tatra so 'rthaḥ pakṣa uktaḥ iti yojyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4260: sa upacārād yaḥ pakṣa uktaḥ viśi(śe)
GSP28durdhpru:4262: yadi samānaśabdo viśeṣaṇam asya tarhi saśabdaśrutiḥ katham ity āha -- samānasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:4263: samānasya samānaśabdasya sthāne saśabdādeśaś ca “samānasya” [pāṇini 6.3.84] iti yogavibhāgāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4264: samānaḥ pakṣo yasya sa tatheti bahuvrīhiḥ kim iti dharmottareṇa nāśrito yenaivam ātmā prayāsita iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:4268: syāt etat -- kiṃ tat pakṣasapakṣayoḥ sāmānyaṃ yena samānaḥ sapakṣaḥ pakṣena ity āha -- sādhyadharmasāmānyena iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4274: sādhyadharmaś ca asau sāmānyaṃ ca iti sādhyadharmasāmānyena samānaḥ pakṣeṇa sapakṣa iti arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4280: ācaritam / viniścaye hi navapakṣadharmapravedananirdeśaprakaraṇe[44*]sādhyadharmasāmānyena samānaḥ pakṣaḥ sapakṣas tad abhāvo 'sapakṣaC ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:4281: ato vārttikakārasyeva dṛṣṭāntadharmī pakṣo 'bhipreta upacārād ity atrāpy evam ayaṃ vyācaṣṭa ity adoṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4285: yena sāmānyena pakṣeṇa samānaḥ sapakṣa ity āheti yojyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4288: nanu sādhyadharmaś cāsau sāmānyaṃ ceti karmadhārayagarbhaḥ karmadhāraya ity ābhipretaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:4289: viśeṣaś ca sādhyata iti kathaṃ sāmānyaśabdena sādhyadharmaśabdasya samāsa ity āśaṅkyāha -- na cetyādi /
GSP28durdhpru:4293: yata evam ato 'symād dhetor hi sapakṣalakṣaṇakāle /
GSP28durdhpru:4294: sāmānyasya sādhyatām uktvā sādhyadharmaśabedena saha sāmānyaśabdasya vigrahaṃ darśayati -- sādhyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:4297: samāna evety avadhāraṇiyam na tu sāmānyenaiveti,
GSP28durdhpru:4298: anyenāpi vastutvādinā sādṛśyāt dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇaḥ sapakṣatvābhāvaprasaṅgād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4299: yadi sapakṣād anyo 'sapakṣo evānyadharmayogād anya iti tatrāsapakṣe varttamāno hetuḥ sarva evānaikāntikatvād ahetuḥ prasajyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:4300: atha viruddhe naño vidhānāt sapakṣaviruddho 'sapakṣaḥ sahānavasthānalakṣaṇena virodhena viruddhas tadā 'gnilakṣaṇo hetur auṣṇyaṃ na gamayet /
GSP28durdhpru:4302: tadā 'bhāve kasyacit sattvāsambhavāt sādhāraṇānaikāntiko na kaścit syād iti manasi niveśya pṛcchati -- ko 'sapakṣa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4305: sapakṣo yo na bhavatīti sādhyadharmavān yo na bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4307: yady evam, samāsaḥ kathaṃ iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:4312_0: prayogasaṃkhyāniyamas tu bhāṣyakārīyo yathā 'nupapannas tathā cācāryeṇaiva viniścaye
GSP28durdhpru:4312_1: “duḥkhaṃ batāyaṃ tapasvī” ityādy upahāsapūrvakaṃ -- “yathā niketena pratipatteḥ”
GSP28durdhpru:4314: tato 'nyas tadviruddhas tadabhāvaś ca iti II-9
GSP28durdhpru:4317: tasya ca sapaksaya abhāvaḥ. sapakṣād anyatvaṃ tadviruddhatvaṃ ca na tāvat pratyetuṃ śakyam,
GSP28durdhpru:4318: yāvat sapakṣasvabhāvābhāvo na vijñātaḥ. tasmād anyatvaviruddhatvapratītisāmarthyāt[45] sapakṣābhāvarūpau pratītāv anyaviruddhau.
GSP28durdhpru:4322: evaṃ saty anyaviruddhayor asapakṣatvaṃ na syād ity asapakṣaśabdena tadabhāvatadanyatadviruddhanāṃ trayāṇām api saṅgrahaṃ darśayituṃ kaś cetyādinā praśnapūrvam upakra[ma]te /
GSP28durdhpru:4326: na hi sa eva brāhmaṇas tajjātiyogād,
GSP28durdhpru:4327: abrāhmaṇaś ca dharmāntarasamāveśāl loke pratīyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4335: kin tarhi? sarvaḥ pratiyogī niṣedhaḥ paryudataś ca,
GSP28durdhpru:4343: anyaviruddhayoś ca svarūpakathanena tadasapakṣatvapakṣokto doṣo nirasta iti sarvam avadātam /
GSP28durdhpru:4344: nanu ca sapakṣo yo na bhavatīti vacanena yasya sapakṣābhāvasvabhāvatvaṃ tasyaivāsapakṣatvaṃ [41b] pratipādyate /
GSP28durdhpru:4347: tat kathaṃ tayos tathātvam ity āśaṅkyāha -- sapakṣād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4348: anyatvaṃ tato bhidyamānatvaṃ pṛthaktvam iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:4349: tena ca viruddhatvaṃ tāvan na śakyaṃ jñātum,
GSP28durdhpru:4352: ayam āśayaḥ -- yadi tasyānyatvābhimatasya yato 'nyatvaṃ vyavaharttavyaṃ tadrūpatā cettasyāsiddhā sandigdhā vā bhavet tadā 'nyatvam eva na syāt,
GSP28durdhpru:4354: dhūmasyeva vā bāṣpādibhāvena sandihyamānasya na bāṣpāder anyatvaniścayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4355: yena ca viruddhaṃ yat tad rūpaṃ cet siddhaṃ sandgidhaṃ vā tādrūpyeṇa,
GSP28durdhpru:4361: yata evaṃ tato hetoḥ sākṣād avyavadhānena /
GSP28durdhpru:4362: anena yady eka evāsapakṣo vaktavyaḥ tadā tadabhāva eveti sūcitaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:4368: trirūpāṇi ca trīṇy eva liṅgāni II-10
GSP28durdhpru:4369: uktena trairūpyeṇa trirūpāṇi ca trīṇy eva liṅgāni iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4371: trairūpyam ādau pṛṣṭaṃ trirūpāṇi ca liṅgāni pareṇa /
GSP28durdhpru:4377: anupalabdhiḥ svabhāvaḥ kāryaṃ ca iti II-11
GSP28durdhpru:4379: vidheyasya sādhyasya svabhāvaś ca trirūpaḥ, kārya ca /
GSP28durdhpru:4381: yato 'nyo niruddhaś coktayā nītyā sapakṣābhavarūpau tatas tasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4382: āstām ekasya dvayor vā trayāṇām apīty apiśabdaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4384: trīṇi rūpāṇi lakṣaṇāni yeṣām iti vigrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4386: triyrūpāṇīty anenābādhitaviṣayatvādirūpānatarayogena caturlakṣaṇatvaṃ ṣaḍlakṣaṇatvaṃ vā parābhimataṃ hetoḥ pratiṣedhati,
GSP28durdhpru:4388: pṛṣṭa iti pāṭhe tv ācārya iti śesaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4389: yat trairūpyaṃ pṛṣṭo yad vā yat trairūpyaṃ pṛṣṭaṃ tat trairūpyam uktam uktena granthena /
GSP28durdhpru:4390: atha vā yad yasmāt trairūpyaṃ pṛṣṭa ācāryaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:4391: pṛṣṭaṃ vā tat tasmāt trairūpyam uktam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4392: cas trairūpyeṇa samaṃ trirūpāṇām uktakaramtāṃ samuccinoti /
GSP28durdhpru:4393: nanu na tāvat parasyaitad dvitayapraśnavākyaṃ śrutam /
GSP28durdhpru:4394: tat kathaṃ parasya dvedhā praṇaḥ saṃkīrttyata iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:4396: trirūpāl liṅgād iti śrutavatā pūrvapakṣavādinā 'vaśyaṃ kiṃ tat trairūpyaṃ kiyac ca trirūpaṃ liṅgam ityākāṅkṣitavyam,
GSP28durdhpru:4398: etad eva katham avasīyata iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:4399: trairūpyaṃ liṅgasyaivam ātmakam ity abhidhānād ācāryasya pūrvapakṣavādina evaṃrūpa praśno 'vasīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:4400: trirūpāṇi ca trīṇyevety abhidhānāc ca samkhyāpraśnaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4406: kevalaṃ vidheyasyeti pūrvaṃ sāmarthyād anarthāntarasya vidheyasya,
GSP28durdhpru:4412: tatra anupalabdhir yathā na pradeśaviśeṣe kvacid ghaṭaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:4416: yathā iyam anupalabdhis tathā anyā api /
GSP28durdhpru:4417: na tv iyam eva ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4422: pratipattṛpratyakṣe kvacid eva pradeśa iti dharmī /
GSP28durdhpru:4430: atha yo yatra na asti sa kathaṃ tatra dṛśyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4432: yaś ca evaṃ sambhāvyate -- yady asāv atra bhaved dṛśya bhaved iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4438: ekaindriyajñānagrāhyaṃ locanādipraṇidhānābhimukhaṃ vastudvayam anyonyāpekeṣam ekajñānasaṃsargi kathyate / tayor hi
GSP28durdhpru:4442: tayā lakṣyata iti bruvatā lakṣyate 'neneti lakṣaṇam iti vyaktīkṛtam /
GSP28durdhpru:4445: kiṃ tenaikena sā janyate yenaivam ucyata ity āha sāmagryantarbhāvād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4450: yady avidyamānaḥ samāropād dṛśya ucyate tadā bhinnendriyagrāhyam api tatrānekam asti /
GSP28durdhpru:4451: tasyāpi tarhi tathātvam āyātam ity āśaṅkyāha yaś caivam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4453: sa tādṛśo dṛśyatayā samāropyo na sarva ity arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4461: tac cen nāsti kathaṃ taddarśanakāraṇasāmagryāvagatir ity āśayaḥ pṛcchati kadeti /
GSP28durdhpru:4463: ekasmiñ jñāne saṃsargaḥ pratibhāsaḥ sa yasyāsti /
GSP28durdhpru:4464: tac ca tadvastvantaraṃ ceti tathā tasyopalambho yadety uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:4468: tasmād ekajñānasaṃsargiṇi dṛśyamāne saty ekasminn itarat samagradarśanasāmagrīkaṃ yadi bhaved dṛṣyam eva bhaved iti sambhāvitaṃ dṛśyatvam āropyate /
GSP28durdhpru:4470: tasmāt sa eva ghaṭaviviktapradeśas tadālambhanaṃ ca jñānam dṛśyānupalambhaniścayahetutvāt drśyānupalambha ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:4471: yāvad dhi ekajñānasaṃsargi vastu na niścitam tajjñānaṃ ca na tāvad dṛśyānupalambhaniścayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4472: tato vastu anupalambha ucyate tajjñānaṃ ca /
GSP28durdhpru:4474: tato dṛśyaghaṭarahitaḥ pradeśaḥ tajjñānaṃ ca vacanasāmarthyād eva dṛśyānupalambharūpam uktaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4475: tatra yadi nirākāraṃ vijñānam iti sthitis tadaikaśabdo dvayādisaṃkhyānirāsārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4476: yadā tu sākāram iti sthitis tadā pakṣadvayam -- ekam eva vānekākāram aśakyavivecanaṃ citraṃ jñānam,
GSP28durdhpru:4479: śeṣapakṣe tv ekacakṣurāyatanaprabhavatvād ekarūpālambanatvāc caikaśabdo gauṇaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4480: nanu yadi tat pratiṣidhyamānam anena bhūtalādinā sahaikasmin jñāne pratibhāseta tadapekṣam idam ekajñānasaṃsargi kathyate /
GSP28durdhpru:4481: yāvatedam eva nāstīty āśaṅkya tathātvam eva tayor ekendriyetyādinā darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:4482: locanādīnāṃ praṇidhānaṃ svajñānopajanane yogyībhavanaṃ tatrābhimukham anuguṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:4485: yadi nāma dvayaṃ tatrāvasthitaṃ tathāpy ekam eva tatrāvabhāsiṣyata ity āha -- tayor iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4488: yata eva tayor ghaṭādibhūtalādyor ekajñānasaṃsargaḥ sambhavī tasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4489: ekasmin bhūtalādike dṛśyamāne satītarad ghaṭādikaṃ paripūrṇadarśanasāmagrīkaṃ jñātavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4490: tathāsad avidyamānam api samāropād dṛśyam ucyata iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:4493: yasmāt tasyaikajñānasaṃsargiṇo bhūtalāder darśanāt tadanupalambho niścīyate tasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4494: nanu bhūtalādijñānaniścaya eva tadanupalambhaniścayahetutvād anupalambho 'stu bhūtalādikaṃ tu katham ity āha -- yāvad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4497: bhūtalādyavacchinnañ ca jñānaṃ dṛśyasyānupalambham upalambhābhāvaṃ vyavaharttavyaikasvabhāvaṃ niścāyayatīti darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:4504: upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptiḥ upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptavaṃ ghātasya upalambhapratyayāntarasākalyam iti. jñānasya ghaṭo 'pi janakaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:4505_0: anye ca cakṣurādayaḥ. ghaṭād dṛśyād anye hetavaḥ pratyayāntarāṇi. teṣāṃ sākalyam
GSP28durdhpru:4505_1: sannidhiḥ. svabhāva eva viśiṣyate tadanyasmād iti viśeṣa viśiṣta ity arthaḥ. tad
GSP28durdhpru:4505_2: ayam viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāvaḥ pratyayāntarasākalyaṃ ca etat dvayam upalabdhilakṣanaprāptatvaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:4506_0: yady ekasmin jñāne yayoḥ saṃsargo 'sti tayor ekataropalambhas taditarānupalambhaniścayahetutvād
GSP28durdhpru:4506_1: anupalambhas tasmāc ca tasyābhāvavyahāras tadā nīlajñānānubhave pītajñānābhāvavyavahāro
GSP28durdhpru:4507: na hi bhavanmate jñānaṃ jñānāntareṇa vedyate,
GSP28durdhpru:4512: yadi hi tajjñānaṃ vidyamānaṃ syāt tadā nīlajñānavat saṃviditam eva bhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:4514: tasmān nāstīti vyavahriyata iti kim avadyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4515: syād etat / kiṃ punar jñātṛjñeyadharmopalabdhivyudāsena paryudāsavṛttinā nañā jñātṛjñeyadharmalakṣaṇā dvividhopalabdhiḥ pratipādyate ?
GSP28durdhpru:4516: na tūpalambhābhāvamātraṃ prasajyapratiṣedhāśrayeṇocyate yatheśvaraseno manyata ity āśaṅkyāha -- darśanatyādi /
GSP28durdhpru:4517: darśanam upalabdhis tasya nivṛttir abhāvas tuccharūpaḥ saiva tanmātraṃ vastvantarasaṃsargavirahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4518: tuḥ pūrvasmād anupalambhād vaidharmyam asya dyotayati /
GSP28durdhpru:4519: svayam aniścitatvād iti bruvatānupalambhāt tatpratipattāv anavasthādoṣaprasaṅgena tasya sādhakābhāvaḥ sūcitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4521: evañ ca vyācakṣāṇena idaṃ sūcitam -- tathāvidhānupalabdhiḥ pramāṇanivṛttāv apy arthābhāvābhāvād abhāvavyavahāre sādhye 'naikāntikīti /
GSP28durdhpru:4525: yathā yasyāptir yathārthadarśanādirūpāsti sa āpta ity ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:4531: rūpaṃ codbhūtaṃ samākhyātaṃ tadā tvanmate 'mīṣām abhāvād upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptir asambhavinīti manyamānaḥ pṛcchati kā punar iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4534: kiṃ tarhīyam ityabhiprāyeṇa yad upalabdhilakṣaṇetyādiprativacanaṃ tad upalabdhītyādinā vyākhyātum upakramate /
GSP28durdhpru:4536: ayaṃ cāsyāśayaḥ yasyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptis tasyāvaśyam upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvam astīti /
GSP28durdhpru:4541: kiñ ca yadi pratiṣedhyo 'pi jñānasya hetuḥ syāt tadā tasmāt pratyayād anye pratyayāḥ pratyayāntarāṇy ucyanta ity āśaṅkyāha jñānasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:4544: yaḥ svabhāvaḥ satsv anyeṣu upalambhapratyayeṣu san pratyakṣa eva bhavati sa svabhāvaviśeṣaḥ II-14
GSP28durdhpru:4546: upalambhasya yāni ghaṭād dṛśyād pratyayāntarāni teṣu satsu vidyamāneṣu yaḥ svabhāvaḥ san pratyakṣa eva bhavati sa svabhāvaviśeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4547: tad ayam atra arthaḥ -- ekapratipattrapekṣam idam pratyakṣalakṣaṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:4548: tathā ca sati draṣṭuṃ pravṛttasya ekasya draṣṭur dṛśyamāna ubhayavān bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4549: adṛśyamānās tu deśakālasvabhāvaviprakṛṣṭāḥ svabhāvaviśeṣarahitāḥ pratyayāntarasākalyavantas tu /
GSP28durdhpru:4550: yair hi pratyayair sa draṣṭā paśyati te sannihitāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4551: ataś ca sannihitā yad draṣṭuṃ pravṛttaḥ saḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4552: na kevalaṃ pratyayāntarasākalyam upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptiḥ kin tv anyad apīty āha -- svabhāveti /
GSP28durdhpru:4555: jñānajananayogyatayā viśeṣaṇatve py asya rājadantādipāṭhād viśeṣaśabdasya pūrvanipātābhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4557: dvayam etan militam evopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptiśabdavācyam upasaṃhāravyājena tad ityādinā darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:4558: yataḥ pratyayāntarasākalyaṃ svabhāvaviśeṣaś copalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptir vivakṣitā tat tasmād upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptiśabdavācyam upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvaṃ ghaṭādeḥ pratiṣedhyasya //
GSP28durdhpru:4559: atha kiṃ sthavīyān svabhāvaḥ svabhāvaviśeṣa utasvit pararūpāmiśrasvalakṣaṇātmaka ity abhipretya pṛcchati kīdṛśa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4561: nanu kim asya sambhavo 'sti yad uta pratyayāntarasākalye saty api svabhāvaḥ pratyakṣa eva bhavatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:4562: tathā hi saty api ghaṭasya tādṛśe svabhāve vidūravarttinaḥ puruṣasya locanādipraṇidhāne pi nāsau pratyakṣo bhavatīty āśaṅkyāha tad ayam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4563: yasmād dvayam etad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptim avocad ācāryas tat tasmād atra prastave 'yam artho vācyo 'bhimataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4565: ekaś cāsau vivakṣitaḥ pratipattā ceti tathā tadapekṣam idaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:4566: yaḥ svabhāvaḥ satsv anyeṣūpalambhapratyayāntareṣu san pratyakṣa eva bhavatīty evaṃ rūpaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:4567: ekaś ca pratipattā sa eva vācyo yo 'vyavadhānādideśo draṣṭuṃ pravṛttaś ca /
GSP28durdhpru:4568: tathāvidhe ca draṣṭari tathāvidho 'vaśyaṃ pratyakṣa eva bhavatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:4569: tathāpi kathaṃ pūrvapakṣātikrama ity āha tathā ceti tasmiṃś ca prakāre sati /
GSP28durdhpru:4573: draṣṭum apraṛttasya tu yogyadeśasthā api draṣṭuṃ te na śakyāḥ pratyayāntaravaikalyavantaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:4576: tad evaṃ paśyataḥ kasyacin na pratyayāntaravikalo nāma,
GSP28durdhpru:4578: apaśyatas tu draṣṭuṃ śakyo yogyadeśasthaḥ pratyayāntaravikalaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4580: adṛśyamānāpi svabhāvaviśeṣavantas tadā kiṃ svabhāvaviśeṣagrahaṇenety āha adṛśyamānā iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4587: ayam atra prakaraṇārthaḥ ekapratipattrapekṣayā yas tathāvidhaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'pi yady upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptilakṣaṇatvena nopādīyate,
GSP28durdhpru:4588: tadā teṣām api deśādiviprakarṣiṇāṃ pratyayāntarasākalyam upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptir astīty upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānām anupalambhād abhāvavyavahāraḥ pravarttanīyaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4590: tasmād viśiṣṭapratipattrapekṣam idaṃ svabhāvaviśeṣasya lakṣaṇam ity upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptilakṣaṇaṃ sūktam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4591: pratyayāntarasākalyavattvam eva teṣāṃ sādhayann āha yair iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4593: etad eva kutaḥ siddhyatīty āha ata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4596: sannihitās te pratyayā yad yasmād draṣṭuṃ pravṛttas tadviviktaṃ draṣṭuṃ pravṛtto yata ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4597: yad vā tad eva nirīkṣituṃ pravṛtto yata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4600: draṣṭum apravṛttasya tu sa kīdṛśa ity āha draṣṭum apravṛttasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:4601: tunā draṣṭuṃ pravṛttād apravṛttasya bhedam āha /
GSP28durdhpru:4602: yāvaty eva deśe sati tasmin pratyayāntare dṛśyante 'rthaḥ sa eva yogyo deśaḥ tatrasthāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4603: tasmād dṛśyād anye ye cakṣurādayo hetavas tāni pratyayāntarāṇi /
GSP28durdhpru:4606: ata eva draṣṭuṃ te na śakyāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4607: svabhāvaviśeṣas tu teṣām astīti darśayann āha svabhāveti /
GSP28durdhpru:4609: tathāvidhapuruṣāpekṣayā deśakālaviprakṛṣṭānāṃ tu kā vārttety āha dūreti /
GSP28durdhpru:4611: ye hi deśena viprakṛṣṭās te dūradeśā ye ca kālena te dūrakālā bhavantīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4615: athavā ekapratipattrapekṣam idam ity anyathā vyākhyāyate -- ihopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyety anena deśakālasvabhāvaviprakṛṣṭatayānupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāḥ kila vyāvartayitavyāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4616: na ca te 'py anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāḥ śakyā vaktuṃ yato vyavacchidyeran tathāpi piśāco 'pi sajātīyair upalabhyate evaṃ deśaviprakṛṣṭo 'pi taddeśīyaiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4617: tathā kālaviprakṛṣṭo 'pi tatkālikair iti vyāvarttyābhāvād upa--
GSP28durdhpru:4623: kīdṛśo hetuḥ sādhyasya svabhāva ity āha -- svasya ātmanaḥ sattā /
GSP28durdhpru:4625: tasmin sati bhavituṃ śīlaṃ yasya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4626: yo hetor ātmanaḥ sattām apekṣya vidyamāno bhavati,
GSP28durdhpru:4627: na tu heutsattāyā vyatiriktaṃ kañcid dhetum apekṣate sa svasattāmātrabhāvī sādhyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4628: tasmin sādhye yo hetuḥ sa svabhāvaḥ tasya sādhyasya na anyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4630: yathā vṛkṣo ayaṃ śiṃśapātvād iti II-16
GSP28durdhpru:4636_0: yatra pracuraśiṃśape deśe 'viditaśiṃśapāvyavahāro jaḍo yadā kenacid uccāṃ śiṃśapāṃ
GSP28durdhpru:4636_1: upādarśya ucyate `ayaṃ vṛkṣaḥ' iti tadāsau jāḍyāc chiṃśapāyā uccatvam api vṛkṣavyavahārasya
GSP28durdhpru:4636_2: nimittam avasyati tadā yām eva anuccām paśyati śiṃśapāṃ tām eva avṛkṣam avasyati /
GSP28durdhpru:4639: labdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyeti viśeṣaṇam anarthakam ity āśaṅkyāha tad ayam atrārtha iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4640: tadā tu pratyakṣaśabdenopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvaṃ vācyaṃ tasya lakṣaṇam idaṃ pūrvoktam iti yojyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4641: ekapratipattrapekṣam idaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇam upalabdhilakṣaṇam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4642: tathāpi kathaṃ codyātikrama ity āha tathā ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:4645: sāmānyavṛttir apy ayaṃ svabhāvaśabdaḥ sādhyadharmasya śrutatvāt tasyaiva svabhāve vartate ity abhiprāyeṇa sādhyasya svabhāva ity abhyavādīt /
GSP28durdhpru:4646: hetoḥ svarūpasya cintanāt svaśabdena tasyaivātmā vivakṣitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4647: etad eva yo hetor ityādinā sphuṭayati /
GSP28durdhpru:4652: api tu śiṃśapātvamātraṃ nimittaṃ -- śiṃśapāgataśākhādimattvam nimittam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4654: kāryaṃ yathā vahnir atra dhūmād iti II-17
GSP28durdhpru:4658: kāryakāraṇabhāvo loke pratyakṣānupalambhanibandhanaḥ pratīta iti na svabhāvasyeva kāryasya lakṣaṇam uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:4660: udāhriyate pradarśyate svabhāvahetur anenety udāharaṇaṃ svabhāvahetupratipādakaṃ vākyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4661: idaṃ ca svabhāvahetor arthakathanaṃ na tu tatprayogopadarśanam /
GSP28durdhpru:4662: prayogas tu yaḥ śiṃśapātvavyavahārayogyaḥ sa vṛkṣatvavyavahārayogyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4665: nanu ca yaḥ śiṃśapā paśyati sa vṛkṣaṃ jānāty eva /
GSP28durdhpru:4666: tat katham atra sādhyasādhanabhāva ity āha tad ayam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4669_0: na caitad yathāśruti saṅgacchate tat tasmāt vṛkṣo 'yaṃ vṛkṣavyavahārayogyo 'yaṃ śiṃśapātvāt
GSP28durdhpru:4669_1: śiṃśapāvyavahārayogyatvād ity ayam artho vācyaḥ vṛkṣo 'yaṃ śiṃśapātvād ity asya vākyasyeti prakaraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4671: nanu yo viditavṛkṣavyavahāraḥ sa svayaṃ pratyakṣeṇaiva taṃ vyavahāraṃ pravartayiṣyati tat katham asyānumānasyāvatāra ity āha tatreti vākyopakṣepe /
GSP28durdhpru:4673: anena ca prabandhena mūḍhaṃ praty etad vyavahārasādhanam anumānam iti darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:4677: ādita eva tena śākhādimattvamātraṃ nimittaṃ na gṛhītam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4680: tadāsau jāḍyād uccatvam api nimittam avasyatītīdam etasmin mūḍhe pratipattari yojanīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4681_0: yaḥ prathamaṃ tāvat śiṃśapāgataṃ śākhādimattvamātram eva nimittam avasāya vṛkṣavyavahāraṃ
GSP28durdhpru:4681_1: prāvartayat paścāj jāḍyavaśāt tanmātraṃ nimittaṃ vismṛtyānyad eva vṛkṣavyavahārakāle
GSP28durdhpru:4681_2: uccatvam api nimittam āsīd iti vyāmuhya tadoccatvam api vṛkṣavyavahāranimittam avakalpayatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:4682_0: sa caivaṃbhūto jaḍaḥ śiṃśapāvyavahārayogyatvena hetunā prathamaṃ pravartitatanmātranimittavṛkṣavyavahārayā
GSP28durdhpru:4682_1: tadānīṃ tathāsmāritayā śiṃśapayā dṛṣṭāntena vṛkṣavyavahārayogyatāṃ bodhayituṃ śakyata eva /
GSP28durdhpru:4683: yaḥ punar ādita evāropitoccatvādinimittas taṃ prati hetūpanyāsa eva na yujyate /
GSP28durdhpru:4684: kiṃ tarhi? vṛkṣavyavahārasamayam evāsau grāhayitavya iti sarvam avadātam /
GSP28durdhpru:4686: nanu trirūpatvād ekam eva liṅgaḥ yuktaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:4688: evaṃ sati svabhāvahetor ekasyānantaprakāratvāt trirūpam ayuktam ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:4689: atra dvau vastusādhanau ekaḥ pratiṣedhahetuḥ II-18
GSP28durdhpru:4691: atra ity eṣu triṣu madhye dvau hetū vastusādhanau -- vidheḥ sādhanau gamakau /
GSP28durdhpru:4693: pratiṣedha iti ca abhāvo 'bhavavyavahāraś ca ukto draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4694: idānīṃ kāryahetuṃ vivarītum āha -- kāryam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4695: hetoḥ prakṛtatvāt kāryam iti kāryahetum ity avaseyaṃ sukhapratipatty artham /
GSP28durdhpru:4701: vyāptivediny api puṃsi hetur anuvādyenaiva rūpeṇa nirdiśyamāna prathamānta eva nirdeśyaḥ atra dhūma iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4703: na ca tathāvidhaṃ praty api pratijñā anyathā ka enām asādhanāṅga brūyāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4705: īdṛśas tu prayogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ -- yatra dhūmas tatra sarvatra vahnir yathā mahānase,
GSP28durdhpru:4707: svabhāvānupalabdhyor iva kāryahetor api kasmāl lakṣaṇam ācāryeṇa na praṇītam ity āśaṅkām apākurvann āha -- kāryeti /
GSP28durdhpru:4712: ayam abhiprāyaḥ anupalabdhau khalu bahavo vipratipannāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4714: kumārilas tu vastvantarasyaikajñānasaṃsargitām anapekṣyaivānyamātrasya jñānam anupalabdhim abhāvapramāṇatayā varṇayati /
GSP28durdhpru:4715: tathā, vivakṣitajñānānādhāratālakṣaṇam ātmano 'pariṇāmaṃ svāpādisādhāraṇam [44b] api tathātvena varṇayati /
GSP28durdhpru:4716: yad āha -- “sātmano 'pariṇāmo vā vijñānaṃ vānyavastuni” iti /[46]
GSP28durdhpru:4718: [46] ŚV abhāvapariccheda 11cdsātmanaḥ pariṇāmo vā vijñānaṃ vākyavastuni /
GSP28durdhpru:4721: kecid arthāntarāpekṣiṇy api dharme svabhāvaṃ hetum adhyavasitāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4722: kecit tu vastuno dharmiviśeṣam āśritaṃ svabhāvam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4724: atra tu kāryatvarūpe na kecid vipratipadyanta iti nāsya lakṣaṇām uktam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4725: kāryakāraṇabhāvena gamyagamakabhāve sarvathā gamyagamakabhāvaprasaṅga ityādikāyāṃ vipratipattāv api na kāryasya lakṣaṇe viprtipatti /
GSP28durdhpru:4727: sā cānyatra nirākṛtā 'trāpi prājñaiḥ svayam abhyūhyā prājñajanādhikāreṇāsya prārambhād iti //
GSP28durdhpru:4728: samprati trirūpāṇi ca trīṇy evety asahamānaḥ prāha -- nanv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4731: prakārasya svarūpasya bhedād viśeṣāt bhedo nānātvam /
GSP28durdhpru:4735: tad ayam arthaḥ -- hetuḥ sādhyasiddyarthatvāt sādhyāṅgam,
GSP28durdhpru:4737: ataś ca sādhyopakaraṇasya hetuḥ pradhānasādhyabhedād bhedaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:4741: vidhipratiṣedhayoś ca parasparaparihāreṇa avasthānāt heyor hetū bhinnau /
GSP28durdhpru:4748: kasmāt ca anyeṣām hetutvam ity āśaṅkya yathā trayāṇām eva hetutvam anyeṣāṃ ca ahetutvaṃ tad ubhayaṃ darśayitum āha --
GSP28durdhpru:4749: svabhāvapratibandhe hi saty artho arthaṃ gamayet II-19
GSP28durdhpru:4751: gamakāv iti vivṛṇvan sādhayata iti sādhanāv iti kartari lyuṭaṃ darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:4752: atra ca vastunaḥ sādhanāv evety avadhāraṇīyaṃ na tu vastuna eveti /
GSP28durdhpru:4755: pratiṣedhasya hetur evety avadhāraṇīyaṃ na tv ayam eveti pūrvābhyām api sāmarthyāt pratiṣedhasya sādhanāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4756: nanu na dṛśyānupalambhenābhāvaḥ sādhyate tasya pratyakṣasiddhatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4760: tarhi vyāpakānupalambhādinā vyāpyādyabhāve sādhye kenābhāvaḥ sādhitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4761: tataḥ kim atra pratiṣedhaśabdena pratipattavyam ity āśaṅkyāha pratiṣedha iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4763: tena pratiṣedha ity anena śabdenābhāvo 'bhāvavyavahāraś cokto draṣṭavya ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4764: ekasya pratiṣedhena iti mukhyayā vṛttyā saṅgraho 'nyasya pratiṣedhāśrayatayā gauṇyā vṛttyeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4765: nāstīti jñānaṃ nāstītyabhidhānaṃ niḥśaṅkātra gamanāgamanalakṣaṇā pravṛttir vyavahāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4766: sa ca haṭhāt pravarttayituṃ na śakyata iti tadyogyataiva sādhyeti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4767: evaṃ tu svabhāvahetāv antarbhāve 'py anupalambhasya tataḥ pṛthakkaraṇaṃ pratipattradhyavasāyavaśād ity avaseyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4770: tat katham idam uttaraṃ pūrvapakṣam iti varttatām ity āśaṅkyāha -- tad ayam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4771: yasmād idam uttarīkṛtam ācāryeṇa yathāśruti ca pūrvapakṣaṃ nātikrāmati tat tasmād ayam artho vākyasyāyaṃ tātparyārth ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4772: etam evārthaṃ hetur ityādinā na tu svata evety antena granthe pratipādayati //
GSP28durdhpru:4773: atha katham anyo 'rtho 'nyam arthaṃ na vyabhicarati yenaite trayo hetavaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:4774: ya[45a]thā cāmīṣāṃ svasādhyasādhanād gamakatvaṃ tathā 'nyeṣām apy akāryasvabhāvānupalambhātmanāṃ kiṃ na bhavatīti manvānaḥ praśnenopakramate -- kasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4775: kasmād iti sāmānyato hetuṃ pṛcchati punar iti viśeṣataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4784: kāraṇe svabhāve vā sādhye svabhāvena pratibandhaḥ kāryasvabhāvayor aviśiṣṭa ity ekena samāsena dvayor api saṃgrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4786: yasmāt svabhāvapratibandhe sati sādhanārthaḥ sādhyārthaṃ gamayet tasmāt trayāṇāṃ gamakatvam anyeṣām agamakatvam /
GSP28durdhpru:4787: kasmāt punaḥ svabhavapratibandha eva sati gamyagamakabhāvo na anyathety āha --
GSP28durdhpru:4792: yo yatra svabhāvena na pratibaddhaḥ tasya tadapratibaddhasya tadavyabhicāraniyamābhāvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4793: tasyāpratibhandaviṣayasyāvyabhicāraḥ tadavyabhicāraḥ tasya niyamaḥ tadavyabhicāraniyamaḥ tasyābhāvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4794: tad ayam arthaḥ -- na hi yo yatra svabhāvena na pratibaddhaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:4795: sa tam apratibandhaviṣayam avaśyam eva na vyabhicāratīti nāsti tayor avyabhicāraniyamaḥ -- avinābhāvaniyamaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4799: tena “karttṛkaraṇe kṛtā bahulam” [pāṇini 2.1.32] iti sūtram apanīya galecopaka ityādisiddhy artha “sādhanaṃ kṛtā” iti sūtraṃ kṛtam /
GSP28durdhpru:4801: anena ca tṛtīyāsamāsenaiva kāryasvabhāvayoḥ saṃgrahād āvṛttyā ṣāṣṭhīsaptamīsamāsābhyāṃ kāryasvabhāvayoḥ saṃgraha iti yat pūrvair vyākhyātaṃ tad apavyākhyānam iti khyāpitam /
GSP28durdhpru:4803: anena pratibandhaśabdena pratibaddhatvam āyattatvam ucyata iti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:4805: pratibaddheti yaḥ svarūpeṇa kvacid āyattas tas tasya svabhās tatra pratibaddha āyatta ity arthābhedena pratibaddhasvabhāvatvam ity artha iti spaṣṭīkṛtam /
GSP28durdhpru:4806: nanu pūrveṣām abhimatasamāsavyudāsena tṛtīyāsamāsaṃ darśayatā kiṃ svid ati yo labdhaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:4807: kevalam āhopuruṣikā prakāśitety āśaṅkya pūrvaṃ buddhistham eva sphuṭayitum āha -- kāraṇa iti / kasyāsau
GSP28durdhpru:4810: na hi yogyatayā pradīpavat parokṣārthapratipattinimittam iṣṭaṃ liṅgam api tv avyabhicāritvena niścitam /
GSP28durdhpru:4813: tasmāt svabhāvapratibandhe saty artho 'rthaṃ gamayen nānyathety sthitam /
GSP28durdhpru:4815: tad iha sādhyasādhanayoḥ kasya kva pratibandha ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:4816: sa ca pratibandhaḥ sādhye arthe liṅgasya II-21
GSP28durdhpru:4817: pratibandha ity akāṅkṣāyām āha -- kāryasvabhāvayos tayor eva prakṛtatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4819: dvayor api kāryasvabhāvayor atiśaye saṅgrahaḥ svīkāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4821: sādhanalakṣāṇo 'rthaḥ sādhyalakṣaṇam arthaṃ gamayet bodhayatuṃ śaknoti /
GSP28durdhpru:4826: tādātmyatadutpattibhāve ca kāryasvabhāvayor evāntarbhāva iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:4827: tad ityādinā samāsaṃ pradarśya tadapratibaddhasyeti yojayatā dharmottareṇa mūle tadapatibaddhasyeti pāṭho darśitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4829: tatrāpi pāṭhe tadapratibaddhaḥ sādhyāprtibaddhaḥ svabhāvaḥ svarūpaṃ yasya liṅgasyeti vigrahaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4833: nanu tad apratibaddhatve 'pi adyatana ādityodayo 'stamayam apratibandhaviṣayaṃ na vyabhicaratīty āśaṅkyāha -- tad ayam artham iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4834: yata evaṃ uktam tat tasmād ayaṃ tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4838: tasmād ādityasya tasmād astamayayogyataiva sādhyā -- ayam ādityodayo 'stamayayogya udayatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:4840: sati caivaṃ svabhāvahetutvam asyāyātam iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4845: etad eva kuta ity āha -- na hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:4848: api tu kin tv vyabhicāritvena sādhyasya prakṛtatvāt sādhyāvinābhāvitvena niścitam /
GSP28durdhpru:4849: niyamābhāve ca kuto 'vyabhicāraniścaya ity asya tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4851: pratibandhas tu kasmān mṛgyata ity āha -- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4853: anyathā 'vyabhicāra eva na śakyate niścetum ity arthād anena darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:4854: etāvatā 'pi kathaṃ gamakatvaṃ ity āha -- tata iti tato niścitād avyabhicārāl liṅgasya gamakatve siddhe sādhyasyāpi gamaka(gamya)
GSP28durdhpru:4856: uktam artham upasaṃharann āha -- tasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4861: sa ceti / sa ca svabhāvapratibandho liṅgasya sādhye 'rthe /
GSP28durdhpru:4863: sādhyas tv artho 'parāyattatvāt pratibandhaviṣayo na tu pratibaddha ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4864: tatrāyam arthaḥ -- tādātmyāviśeṣe 'pi yat pratibaddhaṃ tad gamakam /
GSP28durdhpru:4866: yasya ca dharmasya yo niyataḥ svabhāvaḥ sa tatpratibaddaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4868: yasya tu sa cānyaś ca svabhāvaḥ ca pratibandhaviṣayaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:4875: nanu bhinnayor gamyagamakabhāve liṅgaṃ tadutpattyā parāyattatvāt pratibaddham /
GSP28durdhpru:4880: tataḥ pratibaddhatvaṃ pratibandhaviṣayatvaṃ vā dvayor aviśiṣṭam āyāti /
GSP28durdhpru:4881: tadāśrayaś ca niyataḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ prasakta ity āha -- tatrāyam artha iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4882: na kevalam arthāntaratva ity api śabdaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4883: yat pratibaddham iti yat sādhyapratibaddhatayā tadāyattatayā niścitam iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:4885: nanu tādātmyāviśeṣād ekas tatra pratibandhaviṣayatayā na tu pratibaddhatayety ayam eva vibhāgaḥ kuta ity āha -- yasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:4886: yad vā tādātmyānubhāvini dvaye kin tatra pratibaddhaṃ yad gamakaṃ kiñ ca pratibandhaviṣayo yad gamyam ity ajānantam praty āha -- ysyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:4888: yasya dharmasya vyāvṛttikalpitasya yo niyataḥ pratiniyataḥ sa eva svabhāvo na tad anyo 'pi /
GSP28durdhpru:4890: tad iti ya iti prathamāntenoktaḥ pratyavamṛṣṭas tasmin pratibaddha iti vigrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4899: prayatnānantaryakatvasya hy anityatvam eva svabhāvo na tu nityatvam api /
GSP28durdhpru:4901: īdṛśasya tāvad iyaṃ gatir anyasya tu kā vārttetyāha -- yasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:4904: sa ca so 'pi prayatnānantaryākhyo 'nyaś ca saś ca(cā)
GSP28durdhpru:4907: etad eva vyatirekamukheṇa draḍhayati -- na tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4919: sa sādhyo 'rtha ātmā svabhāvo yasya tat tadātmā /
GSP28durdhpru:4922: yataḥ sādhyasvabhāvaṃ sādhanaṃ tasmāt tatra svabhāvapratibandha ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4923: yadi sādhyasvabhāvaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhyasādhanayor abhedāt pratijñārthaikadeśo hetuḥ syād ity āha -- vastuta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4928: tato niścayāruddharupāpekṣa eva tayor bhedao yuktaḥ vāstavas tv abheda iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4929: na kevalāt tādātmyād api tu tataḥ sādhyād arthād utpattir liṅgasya -- tadutpatteś ca sādhye 'rthe svabhāvapratibandho liṅgasya /
GSP28durdhpru:4930: syād etat tādātmyaṃ tāvat tayor asti /
GSP28durdhpru:4933: tad apekṣāyām api kim iti prayatnānantarīyakatvam eva gamakam ity āha -- prayatneti /
GSP28durdhpru:4935: yatas tatsvabhāvaṃ niśitam ato 'sto 'smāt tad evāvnityatve pratibaddham ucyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4936: yatas tādātmyāviśeṣe 'pi yatpatibddhatayā niścitaṃ tad eva gamakam itarad gamyaṃ tasmān niyataḥ patiniyataḥ prayatnāntarīyakam eva gamakam,
GSP28durdhpru:4937: anityatva ca gamyam evety evaṃrūpo viṣayo yasya gamyagamakabhāvasya sa tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:4939: nanu ca ya ekasyānyatra pratibandhas tadāyattatvaṃ sa tāvan nāhetukaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4940: kaś cāsau hetur ity abhipretya praśnayati -- kasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4942: tādātmyād iti maulam uttara vyākhyātum āha -- yata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4943: tatra sādhye svabhāvena pratibandhaḥ pratibaddhatvaṃ liṅgasyeti śeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4946: atra ca sādhyasādhanayor aikātmyasya pratutatvāt sādhyalakṣaṇasya pratijñārthasya hetuvamāsaktam /
GSP28durdhpru:4950: kathaṃ tarhi bhedanibandhano gamyagamakabhāva ity āha -- vikalpeti /
GSP28durdhpru:4953: yadi bāhyas tadā tadavastho doṣa ity āha -- yad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4956: kasmān nimittadvayāt svabhāvapratibandho liṅgasya nānyasmād ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:4957: atatsvabhāvasya atadutpatteś ca tatra apratibaddhasvabhāvatvāt II-23
GSP28durdhpru:4962: yo yatsvabhāvo yadutpattiś ca na bhavati tasya atatsvabhāvasyātadutpatteś ca /
GSP28durdhpru:4963: tatra atatsvabhāve anutpādake cāpratibaddaḥ svabhāvo 'syeti so 'yam apratibaddhasvabhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4966: yady atatsvabhāve 'nutpādake ca kaścit pratibaddhasvabhāvo bhaved,
GSP28durdhpru:4972: idaṃ sādhanam idaṃ sādhyam iti sādhyasādhanarūpo bhedo nānātvam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4973: yadi nāma kalpanānirmito bhedas tathāpi kathaṃ gamyagamakabhāva ity āha -- niścayeti /
GSP28durdhpru:4976: yata evaṃ tatas tasyāt tayoḥ sādhyasādhanayor bhedo nānātvaṃ yuktyā saṅgato yuktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4978: syān matam -- bhedena kalpitayor na tādātmyaṃ gamyagamakabhāvanibandhanam asti /
GSP28durdhpru:4979: vāstavena ca rūpeṇaikatvān na gamyagamakabhāva iti kathaṃ svabhāvahetor gamakatvam?
GSP28durdhpru:4981: yad darśanadvārāyātāv etau dharmau tathāpratīyamānau tat tāvat paramārthatas tadātmakam ity ekasya dharmasya dharmāntarāvyabhicāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:4982: vāstavaṃ tadātmyagataṃ ca yasya gamakatvaṃ sa svabhāvahetur ucyata iti ko virodhaḥ?
