GSP28durdhpru:4983: ayaṃ prakaraṇārthaḥ -- na niścayasthe samāropite rūpe samāropitatvenādhyavasīyamāne gamyagamake kin tu svalakṣaṇatvenādhyavasīyamāne /
GSP28durdhpru:4988: tad avadhyavasitabhedanibandhano gamyagamakabhāvas tasya svataś ca tādātmyam iti
GSP28durdhpru:4989: dvitīyaṃ pratibandhakāraṇaṃ vyākhyātum āha -- na kevalād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4991: nanu ca samavāyādito 'pi nimittāt pratibandho nāsambhavī /
GSP28durdhpru:4992: tat kathaṃ tādātmyāt tadutpatter eva ca sa ucyate ity abhiprāyavān pṛcchati -- kasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:4996: yadi samavāyādir anyaḥ sambandhaḥ pramāṇabādhito na bhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:4998: tat kuto 'sāv asann asya nimittaṃ bhaveti /
GSP28durdhpru:5000: apratibaddhasvabhāvatvād iti mūlasya bhāvapratyayaṃ tyaktvā vigraham āha -- apratibaddha iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5004: kasmāt punar anyato nimittān na bhavatīy āha -- pratibaddheti /
GSP28durdhpru:5006: pratibaddhasvabhāvatvam evānyasyānyatra bhvaviṣyatīy āha -- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:5008: anyasya sambandhasyābhāvāt tādātmyatadutpattyabhāve ceti prakaraṇalabhyaṃ kṛtvā na cānyaḥ kścid āyattasvabhāva ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:5009: nanu cāsaty api tādātmye tadutpattau cānyatrāsvabhāve 'nutpādake cānyat pratibaddhaṃ yathā -- ātapo vṛkṣacchāyāyām /
GSP28durdhpru:5027: etāvat tūcyate -- yad yenāvinābhūtaṃ dṛśyate tat tatra pratibaddham /
GSP28durdhpru:5029: ata eva trīṇy eva liṅgānīti saṃkhyāniyamo 'py ayuktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5033: amīṣāṃ madhye yeṣāṃ pratibandho 'sti teṣāṃ tādātmyatadutpattyor anyataram sambhavād,
GSP28durdhpru:5034: yeṣu ca tad abhāvas teṣām apratibandhād agamakatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5035: tathā hi vṛkṣasya chāyāyām ekasāmagryadhīnatayaiva pratibandhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5037: chāyā hi pratibhāsamānarūpasaṃsthānavatī śaityādyarthakriyākāriṇī vastv eva,
GSP28durdhpru:5039: sā ca pūrvasmād ālolopādānāt pūrvavṛkṣakṣaṇād vṛkṣakṣaṇena sārdham utpadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:5040: tathā 'rvāgbhāganamanāvanamane api tulāyāḥ parabhāgonnamanāvanamanābhyām eva samaṃ puruṣaprayatnād eva tathāvidhāt tadupādānasaha[47a]kāriṇa utpadyete /
GSP28durdhpru:5048: dṛśyādṛśyasamudāyaś ca yathāyogaṃ sarvatra dharmī karttavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5055: ekasmād eva mahābhūtaviśeṣāt kālavyavahāraviṣayād etad utpādāpekṣiṇas teṣām utpādāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5056: tathā ya eva kṛttikodayahetur mahābhūtaviśeṣaḥ kālasaṃjñitaḥ sa eva katipayakālavyavadhānena rohiṇyudayahetur iti tad darśanād hetos tajjananayogyatādharmo 'numīyate eva /
GSP28durdhpru:5057: tathā pipīlikotsaraṇasya matsyavikārasya ca yo hetuḥ sa eva katipayakālavyavadhānena varṣakaraṇayogyas tataḥ pūrvavad hetudharmānumānam,
GSP28durdhpru:5062: tadā tasmād eva mahābhūtāt kālasaṃjñitāj jalaprasādaḥ / sa
GSP28durdhpru:5067: te ca tādātmyatadupattī svabhāvakāryayor eva iti tābhyām eva vastusiddhiḥ II-24
GSP28durdhpru:5069: yasmāt svabhāve kārye eva ca tādātmyatadutpattī sthite tannibandhanaś ca gamyagamakabhāvas tasmāt tābhyām eva kāryasvabhāvyāṃ vastuno vidheḥ siddhiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5070: atha pratiṣedhasiddhir dṛśyānupalambhād api kasmān neṣṭety āha --
GSP28durdhpru:5071: pratiṣedhasiddhir api yathoktā yā eva anupalabdheḥ II-25
GSP28durdhpru:5072: pratiṣedhavyavahārasya siddhir yathoktā yā dṛśyānupalabdhis tata eva bhavati yatas tasmād anyato noktā /
GSP28durdhpru:5075: sati tasmin pratiṣdhye vastuni yasmād dṛśyānupalabdhir na sambhavati tasmād asambhavāt tataḥ pratiṣedhasiddhiḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:5076: ca katipayakālavyavadhānena tadudayanimittam iti pūrvavad hetudharmānumānam /
GSP28durdhpru:5079: sā ca svabhāvabhūtaivānumīyata iti tādātmyam eva nibandhanam /
GSP28durdhpru:5080: ādityodayasya tu prabhāvātiśayavatā yogyādinā vibandhasambhavāt nāsty evāvinābhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5082: evaṃ tu yuktam -- ayam udetā astamayaśvastanodayayogya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5088: etāvad ucyate -- asati tādāmye taduptattau vā kasyacit kvacit pratibandhe tādrūpyeṇa ca gamakatve sarvaṃ sarvatra pratibaddhaṃ tadgamakaṃ prasajyeteti //
GSP28durdhpru:5089: kāryasvabhāvayor eva tu gamakatvaṃ katham iti bruvataḥ pūrvapakṣavādino 'yam āśayaḥ -- tādātmyatadupattī evānyasya bhaviṣyataḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:5091: kāryasvabhāvayor iti dvayo[r u]ccāraṇe cāyaṃ tasya bhāvaḥ -- bhavadibhar evānuplalambho 'nayor antarbhāvita iti //
GSP28durdhpru:5094: kevalaṃ tad evā ......................................... m ity asyāpy anupalabdheḥ
GSP28durdhpru:5096: atha tata eva kasmād ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:5097: anyathā ca anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpteṣu deśakālasvabhāvaviprakṛṣṭeṣv artheṣv ātmapratyakṣanivṛtter abhāvaniścayābhāvāt II-27
GSP28durdhpru:5099: sati vastuni tasyā adṛśyānupalabdheḥ sambhavād ity anyathāśabdārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5101: kuta etad -- saty api vastuni tasyāḥ sambhava ity āha -- anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpteṣv ityādi /
GSP28durdhpru:5106: deśaś ca kālaś ca svabhāvaś ca tair viprakṛṣṭā iti vigrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5108: saty api vastuni tasyā bhāva iṣṭaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5109: kasmān niścayābhāva ity āha -- teṣu pratpattur ātmano yat pratyakṣam tasya nivṛtteḥ kāraṇāt niścayābhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5111: tasmāt saty api vastuni ātmaprtyakṣanivṛttilakṣaṇāyā adṛśyānupalabdheḥ sambhavaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5113: pratiṣedhasambhavād ity abhiprāyeṇa pūrvapakṣapravṛtter adoṣa eṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5114: pratiṣedhaśabdena vyavahāro 'bhipreta iti pratiṣedhavyavahāra iti vivṛtam /
GSP28durdhpru:5117: mūlasāmarthyasthitam abhivyanakti tasmād anyato 'dṛśyasyānupalabdher noktā pratiṣedhasiddhir iti prakṛtena sambandhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5118: yady adṛśyānupalabdher na bhavati tadānupalabdhitvāviśeṣe vivakṣitāyāpi mā bhūd ity abhipretyāha tatas tāvad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5119: tasmād asambhavāt kāraṇāt tata iti tata eva dṛśyānupalabdher iti vivakṣitam itarathā nyasyāpi pratiṣedhasiddhikathanaprasaṅgāt //
GSP28durdhpru:5121: kathaṃ punas tata eveti niyamo labhyate ity abhiprāyavān āha atheti /
GSP28durdhpru:5123: anyathā cety uttaraṃ vyācakṣāṇa ihaiva cchedaṃ darśayati caśabdañ ca yasmādarthe /
GSP28durdhpru:5124: dṛśyānupalabdher uktāt prakārād adṛśyānupalabdher anyaprakāratvam anyathātvaṃ vivakṣitam ācāryasyeti
GSP28durdhpru:5137: ata evābhāvo na sādhyaḥ svabhāvānupalabdheḥ siddhatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5138: [50]avidyamāno 'pi ca[51]ghaṭādir ekajñānasaṃsargiṇi bhūtale[52]bhāsamāne samagrasāmagrīko jñāyamāno dṛśtayā[53]sambhāvitatvāt pratyakṣa uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5139: ata ekajñānasaṃsargī[54]dṛśyamāno 'rthas tajjñānaṃ ca pratyakṣanivṛttir ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:5140: tato hi dṛśyamānād arthāt tadbuddheś ca samagradarśanasāmagrīkatvena pratyakṣatayā sambhāvitasya nivṛttir avasīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:5141: tasmād arthajñāne eva pratyakṣasya ghaṭasyābhāva ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:5142: na tu nivṛttimātram ihābhāvaḥ nivṛttimātrād dṛśyanivṛttyaniścayāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5145: [50] yathā ca pratipattṛpratyakṣanivṛttr anupalabdhiḥ pradeśas tajjñānaṃ cocyate tathā avidyamāno 'pītyādinā darśayāti -- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:5153: mūle tv anyathā cānupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpteṣv ity ekavākyatayaivārthaḥ saṅgacchate /
GSP28durdhpru:5157: tathā tu na prakrāntaṃ dharmottareṇeti kim atra kurmaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:5158: kuta etad iti sāmānyenoktvā viśeṣaniṣṭhaṃ karoti saty apīti /
GSP28durdhpru:5159: etac ca vigraha ity antaṃ sugamam /
GSP28durdhpru:5161: saty api vastuni asyānupalabdher bhāva iṣṭaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5162: anenaitad āha -- nāsmākam atra pramāṇam asti yat saty eva vastuni sā bhavatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:5163: kin tu tasyāṃ satyām api yasmāt pratyayo dolāyate tasmād evam ucyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5164: samprati niścayābhāvasyāvadhiṃ prayeṣamāṇa āha kasmāt sakāśād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5166: nanu yady ayam apādānapraśno na tu hetupraśnas tadā katham idam āha tasya nivṛtteḥ kāraṇān niścayābhāva iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:5169: niścayābhāvasya śabdena nyāyena jāyamānasyaiṣā prakṛtiḥ kāraṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:5170: “janikartuḥ prakṛtiḥ” [Pāṇini 1.4.30] ity anena labdhāpādānasaṃjñakād asmād ity arthasya vivakṣitatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5173: etac ca pratiṣedhasiddhir ity etad antaṃ sugamam //
GSP28durdhpru:5174: sampraty anupalabdher anumānajñānahetutvāt prāmāṇyaṃ svabhāvaviśeṣo vyāpāraś cokto 'pi kālapuruṣaviśeṣaparigrahaṇena vaktum athetyādinā praśnapūrvam upakramate /
GSP28durdhpru:5179: kevalam ekajñānasaṃsargiṇi dṛśyamāne ghaṭo yadi bhaved dṛśya eva bhaved iti dṛśyaḥ sambhāvitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5183: yadi hi dṛśyas tatra bhaved dṛśyānupalambho na bhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:5184: ato dṛśyānupalambhaniścayād dṛśyābhāvaḥ sāmarthyād avasitaḥ na[57]vyavahṛta iti dṛśyānupalambhena vyavaharttavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5185: tasmād arthānatram ekajñānasaṃsargi dṛśyamānam tajjñānaṃ ca pratyakṣanivṛttiniścayahetutvāt pratyakṣanivṛttir uktaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:5192: nivṛttiśabdenācāryasyānupalabdhir vivakṣiteti darśayati tasya nivṛttir anupalabdhir iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5193: anupalabdhiśabdenāpi vivakṣitakartṛkarmadharmopalabdhiparyudāsenānyad ekajñānasaṃsargi vastu tajjñānaṃ ca vivakṣitam /
GSP28durdhpru:5194: etad eva spaṣṭayati tadabhāvasvabhāveti yāvad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5195: tasya pratiṣedhyasya ghaṭāder abhāvo viśiṣṭo bhāvas tatsvabhāvā /
GSP28durdhpru:5196: tadabhāvasvabhāvaśabdena yāvān artha ukta tadanupalabdhiśabdenāpīti iti yāvad ity asyārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5198: saiva ca tadabhāvo nānyo 'ta evāsmād eva kāraṇād abhāvo ghaṭāder na sādhyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5199: kuto na sādhya iti svabhāvānupalabdher liṅgāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5200: kuto na sādhya ity āha siddhatvāt niścitatvād ghaṭābhāvasyeti prakaraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5201: evaṃ manyate -- tadekajjānasaṃsargi vastu tajjñānaṃ ca ghaṭādyanupalabdhis tadabhāvaś ca /
GSP28durdhpru:5202: tac cendriyajena pratyakṣeṇa svasaṃvedanena ca siddham iti na liṅgād abhāvaḥ sādhyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5205: kathaṃ tadanupalabdhir ucyata ity āha avidyamāno 'pi ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:5206: na kevalaṃ vidyamānaḥ pratyakṣa ucyate ity apiśabdaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5210: jñāyamāno niścīyamāno [ghaṭādir ekajñāna]saṃsargiṇi pra ... tadanupalabdher evety avadhāraṇīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:5212: kasmāt tu dvayaṃ tathocyata ity āha tato hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:5214: yasmād amū eva dṛśyaghaṭādituccharūpanivṛttyavaseyahetū tasmāt karaṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5217: etad eva vyatirekamukheṇa draḍhayati na tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5219: tasya tathātve ko doṣa ity āha nivṛttimātrād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5221: iha nivṛttimātrasya prasajyapratiṣedhātmano niścetum aśakyatvān na hetutvaṃ yujyata iti dharmottarasyāśayo nivṛttimātrād dṛśyanivṛttyaniścayād iti bruvataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5222: pūrvapakṣavādinā tv evaṃ jñātam nivṛttimātrān nirviśeṣaṇād ayam evaṃ pratiṣedhati /
GSP28durdhpru:5223: tad ahaṃ saviśeṣaṇaṃ nivṛttimātram eva darśayāmīti pramodamāna āha nanu ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:5225: dṛśyānupalambhād ity atrānupalambhaśabdenopalambhābhāvamātraṃ vivakṣitam itarathā pūrvapakṣavādinaḥ prakṛtaṃ hīyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:5228_0: yathā caikajñānasaṃsargiṇi pratyakṣe ghaṭasya pratyakṣatvam āropitam asato 'pi tathā
GSP28durdhpru:5228_1: tasminn ekajñānasaṃsargiṇy atīte cāmūḍhasmṛtisaṃskāre varttamāne ca ghaṭasya[58]tattadrūpam[59]āropitam
GSP28durdhpru:5231: tena na[61]ghaṭābhāvaḥ sādhyaḥ api tu abhāvavyavahāra ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:5239: na tu nañaḥ paryudāsavṛttyā tadekajñānasaṃsargi vastu,
GSP28durdhpru:5242: kin tv ekajñānasaṃsargiṇi bhūtalādau dṛśyamāne sati dṛśyaḥ sambhāvita āropitaḥ sa pratiṣedhya iti prakaraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5243: tato dṛśyatvasamāropāt dṛśyānupalabdhir dṛśyajñānābhāvas tuccharūpo vyavahartavyamātraṃ niścitā bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:5244: niścīyatām upalabdhyabhāvo jñeyābhāvas tāvan na niścita iti tanniścayārthaṃ nivṛttimātraṃ vyāpariṣyata ity āha dṛśyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:5254: nanu yadi jñeyābhāvo 'py avasitas tarhi kathaṃ liṅgena sādhyata ity āha na vyavahṛta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5255: adṛṣṭānām api sattvaśaṅkayā na pratyakṣaṃ vyavahārayituṃ śaknotīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5256: kena tarhi vyavahriyata ity āha dṛśyānupalambhena liṅgabhūtena /
GSP28durdhpru:5260: jñānam antareṇa yasmād ayaṃ kevalaḥ pradeśas tasmāt ghaṭādir nāstīty adhyavasātum aśakyatvāt;
GSP28durdhpru:5261: tathā viṣayam antareṇa yasmāt kevalapradeśāparokṣīkaraṇaṃ tasmāt tajjñānaṃ nāsti iti niścetum aśakyatvād iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:5262: pratyakṣasya ghaṭāder nivṛttiniścayahetutvāt pratyakṣanivṛtti[r uktaṃ draśtavyam] /
GSP28durdhpru:5263: nanu ca pratiṣedhyasya ghaṭāder asato 'pi tathāstu pratyakṣatvam /
GSP28durdhpru:5264: yat punas tatra nāsīd eva tasya katham atītatvam;
GSP28durdhpru:5265: yac ca tatra nāsty eva tasya kathaṃ varttamānatvam,
GSP28durdhpru:5266: kathaṃ ca tatrānupalabdher vyāpāra ity āśaṅkām upākurvann āha -- yatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:5267: yena prakāreṇa ghaṭo yadi bhaved dṛśya eva bhaved ity evaṃrūpeṇa /
GSP28durdhpru:5273: tathā tena prakāreṇa yadi tatra pūrvaṃ ghaṭaḥ sthito yadi syāt,
GSP28durdhpru:5275: na copalabhyate ity evam ātmanā ghaṭasyāropāt pratyakṣasya tadānīm asatas tadrūpam atītatvaṃ varttamānatvañ cāropitam āropasiddham itir evaṃ draṣṭavyākāraṃ darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:5278: amūḍho 'bhraṣṭo darśanāhitaḥ smṛtijananarūpaḥ saṃskāro yasmin ghaṭādau sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5282: yasmād atīte ghaṭaviviktapradeśadarśane smṛtisaṃskāro mūḍho dṛśyaghaṭānupalambhe dṛśye ca ghaṭe mūḍho bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:5284: ata eva na ghaṭābhāve nāpi ghaṭānupalambhe mohaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5286: ata eva varttamānasya ceti caśabdaḥ kṛtaḥ viśeṣaṇarahitasya varttamānasya viśeṣaṇavatātītena samuccayo yathā vijñāyeteti[65]/
GSP28durdhpru:5289: [63] ata eva na ghaṭānupalambhe nāpi ghaṭe mohaḥ -- ACDPHEN. ata eva na ghaṭānupalambhe nāpi ghaṭe mohaḥ -- B
GSP28durdhpru:5293: tad ayam arthaḥ atīto 'nupalambhaḥ sphuṭaḥ[66]smaryamāṇaḥ pramāṇam varttamānaś ca /

GSP28durdhpru:5609: api tu kin tv anyatrāpi kāryaviśeṣe svabhāvaviśeṣe ca tatra tatra kāryahetor dhūmavākyād agnipauruṣeyatvād asiddhau tathāvidho dharmī suvyakta iti na tatra darśitas tulyatvā(-nyā)
GSP28durdhpru:5611: kathaṃ hetāv apy evaṃvidhasya dharmiṇaḥ sambhava ity [verb. itth--] āha -- śabdasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:5612: kaścid eva śrūyamāṇaḥ pratyakṣo 'nyas tv aśrūyamāṇaḥ parokṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5614: dṛśyādṛśyātmanā ca śabdena dharmiṇā bhāvyam iti pratipādyajanasaṃśayāropābhyām āyātam /
GSP28durdhpru:5615: na hi pratipādyaḥ śabdasyānityatve saṃśayāno viparyasyati,
GSP28durdhpru:5621: tatas tadanurodhāt pratyakṣāpratyakṣaśabdasamudāyo 'nityatve sādhye dharmī prasahya patitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5623: amum eva nyāyam anyatrāpy atidiśann āha -- yathā ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:5624: co 'vadhāraṇe sādhyapratipattyadhikaraṇabhūta iti viśeṣaṇavyājena dharmiṇo lakṣaṇam uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:5626: yatra yasya kāryam upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ nopalabhyate tat tu tajjananāpratibaddhasāmarthyaṃ nāsti /
GSP28durdhpru:5629_0: anena ca kāryānupalambhapradarśanena yaj jalpitaṃ jalpamahodadhinā niḥśabde deśe
GSP28durdhpru:5629_1: śabdamātrābhāve sādhye kas tadekajñānasaṃsargivastvantaropalambho yena śabdābhāvavyavahāro
GSP28durdhpru:5629_2: bauddhānāṃ bhaved iti tat pratyuktaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:5636: vyāpakānupalabdhir yathā na atra śiṃśapā vṛkṣābhāvād iti II-33
GSP28durdhpru:5640: iyam apy anupalabdhir vyāpyasya śiṃśapātvasyādṛśyasyābhāve prayujyate /
GSP28durdhpru:5642: tatra yadā pūrvāparāv upaśliṣṭau deśau bhavataḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:5644: draṣṭāpi tasthān vṛkṣān paśyann api śiṃśapādibhedaṃ yo na vivecayati,
GSP28durdhpru:5645: tasya vṛkṣatvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ apratyakṣaṃ tu śiṃśapatvam /
GSP28durdhpru:5646: sa hi nirvṛkṣa ekaśilāghaṭite vṛkṣābhāvaṃ dṛśyatvād dṛśyānupalambhād avasyati /
GSP28durdhpru:5649: svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhir yathā na atra śītasparśo vahner iti II-34
GSP28durdhpru:5654: iyaṃ cānupalabdhas tatra prayoktavyā yatra śītasparśo dṛśyaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:5657: tādātmyāviśeṣe 'pi yathā kaścid eva dharmī vyāpya itaro vyāpakaś ca tathā prāg eva dharmottareṇa nirṇītam /
GSP28durdhpru:5659: na śiṃśapeti na śiṃśapātvam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5660: vṛkṣasyeti ca dharmiṇā dharmasya vṛkṣatvasya nirdeśaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5662: tathā ca śiṃśapātvam api dṛśyam eva niṣedhyam iti dṛśyānupalabdhir eva prayogārhaty āha -- iyam apīti /
GSP28durdhpru:5663: na kevalaṃ pūrvikā viśiṣṭe viṣaye kin tv ayam apīty apiśabdaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5664: śiṃśapātvasyādṛśyasyeti -- yadi syād dṛśyam eva syād iti sambhāvanām ativṛttasyety arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5665: evam uttaratrāpy adṛśyatvam īdṛśyam eva draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:5668: tasmād yatra varṇaviśeṣād vahnir dṛśyaḥ śītasparśo dūrasthatvāt[85]sann apy adṛśyaḥ tatrāsyāḥ prayogaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:5672: viruddhakāryopalabdhir yathā nātra śītasparśo dhūmād iti II-35
GSP28durdhpru:5673: pratiṣedhyena yad viruddhaṃ tatkāryasyopalabdhir gamikā yatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:5678: ko 'sāv evaṃvidho viṣaya ity āha -- tatreti vākyopanyāse /
GSP28durdhpru:5681: dvitīya ekayā śilayā ghaṭate nimitta ekaśilārūpas tūpa iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:5685: bhavaty evaṃ tathāpi katham asyāḥ prayoga ity āha draṣṭāpīti /
GSP28durdhpru:5686: apir avadhāraṇe na vivecayatīty asyānantaraṃ draṣṭavyam (-vyaḥ) /
GSP28durdhpru:5688: bhavatu draṣṭu[s] tāvad dūradeśasthāyitayā śiṃśapāyāvivekas tathāpi yenaiva vṛkṣābhāvaṃ pratipadyate tenaiva śiṃśapābhāvam api kiṃ na pratipadyata ity āha sa hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:5690: kathaṃ dṛśyānupalambhād avasyatīty āha dṛśyatvād vṛkṣatvasyeti prakaraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5691: kutas tarhi śiṃśapātvābhāvam avaitīty āha śiṃśapeti /
GSP28durdhpru:5696: prayogaḥ punar īdṛśaḥ kāryaḥ yatra yasya vyāpakaṃ nāsti na tat tatrāsti /
GSP28durdhpru:5698: nāsti ca vṛkṣatvaṃ śiṃśapātvasya vyāpakam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5699: anena vyāpakānupalambhasya vyāpyābhāve gamakatvapratipādanena nityānām arthakriyākāritvābhāvaḥ kramayaugapadyayo vyāpakayor abhāvād ityādi darśitaṃ draṣṭavyam //
GSP28durdhpru:5700: pratiṣedhyetyādinā svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhiṃ vyācaṣṭe mūle tūdāhriyata ity adhyāhāra iti darśayann āha udāhriyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5701: sukhapratipattyarthaṃ maulaṃ dharmyādipravibhāgaṃ darśayann āha atreti /

GSP28durdhpru:5709: mūlagamikā vivakṣitābhāvapratipādaketi vivakṣitam iti darśayitum āha gamiketi /

GSP28durdhpru:5716: iha dṛśyamānadvārapradeśasahitaḥ sarvo 'pavarakābhyantaradeśo[90]dharmī sādhyapratipatty anusaraṇāt pūrvavad draṣṭavya iti[91]//
GSP28durdhpru:5725: viruddhavyāptopalabdhir yathā na dhruvabhāvī bhūtasyāpi bhāvasya vināśaḥ hetvantarāpekṣaṇād iti[92]II-36
GSP28durdhpru:5729: pratiṣedhyasya yad viruddhaṃ tena vyāptasya dharmāntarasya upalabdhir udāhartavyā /

GSP28durdhpru:5744: tat katham iyaṃ gamikety āha samasteti /
GSP28durdhpru:5747: anyatra ca gamyamāno dhūmaḥ katham anyatra śītābhāvaṃ sādhayatīty āha iheti /

GSP28durdhpru:5752: pūrvavad iti yathāpūrvaṃ kāryānupalambhe vahnyādyabhāvapratītisāmarthyāyātas tādṛśo dharmī tadvat /
GSP28durdhpru:5753: ayam asya bhāvaḥ śītasparśābhāvapratītir eveyaṃ vimṛśyamāṇāvaśyam evaṃvidhadharmiṇam ākarṣatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:5754: prayogaḥ punar asyā evaṃ karttavyaḥ yatra dhūmaviśeṣas tatra śītasparśābhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5757: etac cātyantābhyāsāj jhagiti dhūmadarśanāc chītasparśābhāvapratītyudaye viruddhakāryopalambhajam ekam anumānam ācāryeṇoktam iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:5761: bhūtasya jātasyāpi vinaśvaraḥ svabhāvo nāvaśyaṃbhāvī kim utājātasyeti apiśabdārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5765: hetvantarāpekṣaṇaṃ nāmādhruvabhāvitvena[98]vyāptaṃ yathā vāsasi rāgasya rañjanādihetvantarāpekṣaṇam adhruvabhāvitvena vyāptam[99]/

GSP28durdhpru:5780: yata evaṃ[103]tādātmyaniṣedhaḥ kriyate yady ayaṃ dṛśyamāno nityo bhavenn ity arūpa dṛśyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:5783: evaṃ ca pratiṣedhyasya nityatvasya dṛśyamānātmakatvam[104]abhyupagamya pratiṣedhaḥ kṛto bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:5788: svabhāvānupalabdhirūpā cābhyupetā pūrvācāryair ity āha -- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:5792: [105] atha na vastv ekatvavirodho 'nayoḥ paraṃ yo viṣedho dhruvabhāvitvasya vidhīyate sa /
GSP28durdhpru:5793: yady ayā (?) dṛśyatve sati pūrvānupalabdhiṣv iva bhavet tadā nāsyānupalabdheḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5795: piśācādīnāṃ tu satāṃ kathaṃ niṣedha ity āha -- ṭi-

GSP28durdhpru:5801: tadanu yatra vahnir na tatra śītasparśo yathā rasavatīpradeśe vahniś cātreti viruddhopalambhajaṃ dvitīyam iti //
GSP28durdhpru:5804: kim uteti nipātasamudāyaḥ kim punar ity asyārthe varttate /

GSP28durdhpru:5828: prayogaḥ punar īdṛśaḥ karttavyaḥ yadyadavasthāprāptau hetvantaram apekṣate na tad avaśyaṃ tadrūpaṃ bhavati /

GSP28durdhpru:5832: svatantrasādhanaṃ tu viruddhavyāptopalambhākhyam evaṃ draṣṭavyam -- yo viruddhadharmasaṃsargavān nāsāv eko yathā dravakaṭhine /
GSP28durdhpru:5835: kiñ cāsya virodhasya sādhakaṃ pramāṇam ity āśaṅkām apakārttum āha iheti /

GSP28durdhpru:5841: kathaṃ dṛśyatayābhyupa[ga]tasya niṣedha ity āha yata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:5844: na ca naivaṃ nityarūpavaśyambhāvisvarūpo dṛśyate pratīyate /

GSP28durdhpru:5848: vastunāpy adṛśyena tathātvavyavasthāyām evopāya iti darśayituṃ vastuno 'pītyādinopakramate /

GSP28durdhpru:5857: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāryaṃ tasya yadivruddhaṃ tasyopalabdher udāharaṇam yatheti /

GSP28durdhpru:5864: yatra śītakāraṇāni adṛśyāni śītasparśo 'py adṛśyaḥ tatrāyaṃ hetuḥ prayoktavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5865: dṛśyatve tu śītasparśasya tatkāraṇānāṃ vā kāryānupalabdhir dṛśyānupalabdhir vā gamikā /
GSP28durdhpru:5867: tato yasmin uddeśe[114]sad api śītakaraṇam adṛśyam śītasparśaś ca dūrasthatvāt pratipattur vahnirbhāsvaravarṇatvād dūrād api dṛśyas tatrāyaṃ prayoga iti[115]//
GSP28durdhpru:5873: anye tu avastuno 'dṛśyatvasya siddhatvāt kiṃ tadanuvādena kāryam ?
GSP28durdhpru:5874: tato dvayam apy etad vastvapekṣayā yojyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:5877: prakṛtaṃ ca tad eva iti pratipannāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5878: bhavaty evaṃ tataḥ kiṃ siddham ity āha -- tathā ca satīti /
GSP28durdhpru:5881_0: nanu bhavatu dṛśyānupalambhād dṛśyāmāneṅgulyādau sarvasya sumervādes tādātmyaniṣedhas

GSP28durdhpru:5900: pratiṣedhyasya yad vyāpakaṃ tena yad viruddhaṃ tasyopalabdhir udāhartavyā yatheti /

GSP28durdhpru:5907: dūravartinaś ca pratipattus tuṣārasparśaḥ śītasparśaviśeṣaḥ śītamātraṃ ca[121]parokṣam /
GSP28durdhpru:5911: śītaviśeṣasya śītasāmānyena vyāptatvād iti viśiṣṭaviṣaye[122]'syāḥ prayogaḥ //

GSP28durdhpru:5926: kīdṛśi viṣaye 'syāḥ prayoga ity āha yatreti /

GSP28durdhpru:5931: uddeśe pradeśe pratipattur dūrasthatvād iti śītasparśaśītakāraṇayor adṛśyatve kāraṇaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:5933: bhāsvaro bhāsanaśīlo varṇo yasya tadbhāvas tasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:5936: prayogaḥ punar evaṃ kāryaḥ yatra viśiṣṭo vahnir na tatra śītopajananāpratibaddhaśaktīni śītakāraṇāni /
GSP28durdhpru:5939: etac cābhyāsāj jhagiti vahnidarśanena tathābhūtaśītakāraṇābhāvapratītijanmany ekaṃ kāryaviruddhopalambhajam anumānam uktam ācāryeṇeti draṣṭavyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:5940: anyathā tu viruddhopalambhakāryānupalambhaje dve ete anumāne /

GSP28durdhpru:5942: yatra ca yatkāryaṃ nāsti na tatra tatkāraṇaṃ tajjananāpratibaddhasāmarthyam astīti kāryānupalambhajaṃ dvitīyam iti //
GSP28durdhpru:5946: yatra kāryaṃ sad api adṛśyaṃ[124]bhavati tatrāyaṃ prayogaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:5949: niṣkampāyatasalilapūrite hrade hemantocitabāṣpayodgame virale sandhyātamasi sati sann api tatra dhūmo na dṛśyata iti kāraṇānupalabdhyā pratiṣedhyate[126]/
GSP28durdhpru:5950: vahnis tu yadi tasyāsambhava upari plavamāno bhavet prajvalito[127]rūpaviśeṣād evopalabdho bhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:5952: tatrāpi dahanādhikaraṇam indhanaṃ pratyakṣam iti svarūpeṇa ādhārarūpeṇa vā dṛśya[128]eva vahnir iti tatrāsya[129]prayoga iti[130]/
GSP28durdhpru:5957: [127] bhavej jvalito rūpa- -- APHEN.[bhavej jvalitarūpa- -- E.
GSP28durdhpru:5966: kathaṃ tayor adṛśyatvaṃ vahneś ca dṛśyatvaṃ kathaṃ ca na śītasparśa eva tuṣārasparśa ity āśaṅkātritayam apākurvann āha dūreti /
GSP28durdhpru:5973: eṣa ca vāstavo nivṛttikramaḥ parāmarśadaśāyāṃ darśito na tu tatprayogakālikaḥ /

GSP28durdhpru:5985: nirgataḥ kampaś calanaṃ yasmāt sa tathā sa cāsāv āyato mahān iti tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:5986: sa cāsau salilapūritaś cety evaṃ vigrahaḥ kāryaḥ /

GSP28durdhpru:6005: yatra śītasparśaḥ sann apy adṛśyo dahanaviśeṣo yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6007: yatra śītasparśaḥ sann apy adṛśyo romaharṣādiviśeṣāś cādṛśyāḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:6018: tathā tasyodgama ūrdhvaṃ gamanaṃ yasmin yasmād vā sa tathā /

GSP28durdhpru:6021: kutra ? hrade tathāvidhe ca tamasi sati /

GSP28durdhpru:6036: tamisrāyām eva tu rātrau nirādhārake pradeśe kāraṇānupalabdheḥ prayogaḥ sukaraḥ tatra vahner dṛśyatvād dhūmasya sato 'py adṛśyatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:6037: anena punar evaṃvidhaṃ viṣayaṃ parityajyānyaṃ viṣayam upapādayatā kim ity ātmāyāsati iti na pratīmaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6038: evaṃ tu prayogaḥ kāryaḥ -- yatra yasya kāraṇaṃ nāsti na tat tatrāsti /
GSP28durdhpru:6040: nāsti cātra dhūmasya kāraṇaṃ vahnir iti /

GSP28durdhpru:6043: nāsti ca prāgbhavīyaṃ vijñānaṃ kalalāvasthāyām iti kāraṇānupalabdhiprasaṅgaḥ sucitas tulyanyāyārthaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:6053: teṣāṃ kāraṇairuddhopalambdhyā 'bhāvaṃ[133] pratipadyata iti tatrāsya prayoga[134] iti //

GSP28durdhpru:6058: kāraṇaviruddhakāryopalandhar yathā -- na rosasarṣādiviśeṣayuktapuruṣavānayaṃ pradeśaḥ, dhūmāditi II-41
GSP28durdhpru:6059: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāraṇaṃ tasya yad viruddhaṃ tasya yata kāryaṃ tasyopapabdhir udārarttavyā -- yatheti ayaṃ pradeśa iti[135]dharmī /
GSP28durdhpru:6071: kiṃ śītanivarttanākṣamo 'py asti dahano yena tato viśiṣyata ity āha -- kaścid iti /

GSP28durdhpru:6073: tadā hi vyadhikaraṇāsiddho hetuḥ syād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6074: kva punar asyāḥ prayoga ity āha -- yatreti /
GSP28durdhpru:6075: nanu śītasparśaromaharṣaviśeṣāṇām adṛśyatve kathaṃ vahner dṛśyatvam ity āha -- rūpeti /
GSP28durdhpru:6079: eṣa tu prayogo 'bhidhānīyaḥ -- yatra yatkāraṇaviruddham asti na tat tatrāsti /
GSP28durdhpru:6080: yathā śleṣmaviruddhe pitte na ślaiṣmiko vyādhiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6082: etad apy atyantābhyāsāñ jhag iti sannihitadahanaviśeṣatvāvagamamātre romaharṣādiviśeṣābhāvapratītyudaye saty ekam ācāryeṇoktaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6084: anyathā tu viruddhopalambhakāraṇānupalambhasambhave dve ime anumāne /
GSP28durdhpru:6085: tathā hi -- yatra vahnir na tatra śītasparśa iti viruddhopalambhajam ekam anumānaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6086: yatra śītasparśābhāvo na tatra tatkāryaromaharṣādīti kāraṇānupalambhajaṃ dvitīyam iti //
GSP28durdhpru:6089: romaharṣādiviśeṣair yuktaś cāsau puruṣaś ceti karmadhārayaṃ kṛtvā sa vidyate yatra sa tadvān iti śāntabhadrena vyākhyātaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6091_0: yataḥ karmadhārayamattvarthīyād bahuvrīhir eva lāghavena iti vacanād romaharṣādiviśeṣayuktaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:6091_1: puruṣo yatrety evaṃ viśiṣṭe pradeśe 'vagate kiṃ matvarthīyeneti manyamāno mahāvaiyākaraṇo
GSP28durdhpru:6091_2: yaṃ dharmottaraḥ prāha -- yogo yuktam iti bhāve niṣṭhā /
GSP28durdhpru:6102: dhūmas tu yādṛśas taddeśe[142]sthitaṃ śītaṃ nivartayituṃ samarthasya vahner anumāpakaḥ sa iha grāhyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6104: nāpi romaharṣādiviśeṣanivṛttir[144]avasātuṃ śakyeti na dhūmamātraṃ[145]hetur iti draṣṭavyam iti//
GSP28durdhpru:6116: yasmin valmīke lohitaḥ śālir yasmin grāme gauraḥ kharo yasmin naraṇya iti bahuvrīhiṇā bhavitavyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6117: tataś ca kṛṣṇasarpavān valmīko lohitaśālimān grāmo gaurakharavad araṇyam iti na syāt /

GSP28durdhpru:6120: yasmāt karmadhārayamatvarthīyād bahuvrīhir lāghavena itīdaṃ vacanaṃ saṃjñāśabdaṃ varjayitvā veditavyaṃ /

GSP28durdhpru:6142: etad eva vyatirekamukheṇa draḍhayann āha -- dhūmamātreṇeti /
GSP28durdhpru:6147: yady ekaḥ pratiṣedhahetur uktath katham ekādaśā 'bhāvahetava ity āha
GSP28durdhpru:6148: ime sarva kāryānupalabdhyādayo daśānupalabdhiprayogāḥ svabhāvānupalabdhau saṅgraham upayānti II- 42
GSP28durdhpru:6152: tatra kiyatām api grahaṇe prasakta āha -- kāryānupalabdhyādaya iti /

GSP28durdhpru:6226: na tarhi daśagrahaṇaṃ karttavyam iti cet /

GSP28durdhpru:6233: yadi prayogabhedād eṣa bhedaḥ[160]parārthānumāne vaktavya eṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6242: prayogadarśanābhyāsāt svayam apy evaṃ vyavacchedapratītir bhavatīti svārthe 'py anumāne 'syāḥ prayoganirdeśaḥ[162] II-44
GSP28durdhpru:6244: [162] vyavacchedapratītir iti svārthānumāne 'py asyāḥ prabhedanirdeśaḥ -- C.
GSP28durdhpru:6252: vyavacchedasya pratiṣedhasya pratītir bhavatīti[165]itiśabdas tasmād arthe /
GSP28durdhpru:6260: kathaṃ saṅgraham antarbhāvaṃ gacchantīty āha -- tādātmyeneti /

GSP28durdhpru:6262: anupalabdhisvabhāvā ity arthaḥ -- itīdaṃ spaṣṭīkaraṇam api svabhāvānupalabdhismārakatvena tatsvabhāvā iti draṣṭavyaṃ //
GSP28durdhpru:6263: ...r eva kiṃ na śabdākhyā yata iti cet na -- paramparyagrahaṇavyāghātaprasaṅgāt,
GSP28durdhpru:6268: arthāntaravidhipratiṣedhābhyām iti mūle kāraṇatṛtīyād vivacanāntam etad iti darśayann āha -- arthāntareti /
GSP28durdhpru:6275: nanu yady amīṣāṃ dṛśyānupalabdhāv antarbhāvas tadā sākṣāt tadabhidhānaṃ tathātve ca kathaṃ pāramparyeṇety āśaṅkyāha -- etad uktaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:6276: yadi nābhidadhati tadā -- na sākṣād iti na karttavyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6278: tad ayam arthaḥ yasmāt svayam apy evam anenopāyena[166]pratipadyate prayogābhyāsāt tasmāt svapratipattāv apy upayujyamānasyāsya prayogabhedasya svārthānumāne nirdeśaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6279: [167]yat punaḥ parapratipattāv evopayujyate tat parārthānumāna eva vaktavyam iti //
GSP28durdhpru:6284: saṅgrahaś ca katham ity āha -- dṛśyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:6293: kasmāt tatra vācya ity āha śabdeti /
GSP28durdhpru:6296: yady apy evaṃ tathāpi kathaṃ tatra vaktavya ity āha -- śabdaś ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:6298: śāstraparipaṭhitānām iti śāstraparipaṭhitaddvāreṇa parijñātānāṃ svabhāvādyanupalabdhyādivācakānāṃ vākyānām iti draṣṭavyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6304: mūle svayaṃśabda ātmana iti ṣaṣṭyarthe varttamāno gṛhīta ity āśayenāha -- pratipattur ātmana iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6305: svārthānumānaprastāvāt pratipattṛśabdena yas trirūpeṇa liṅgena parokṣam arthaṃ pratipadyate sa gṛhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6306: apiśabdāt paro 'pi tasmāt pratipadyata iti sambandhanīyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6307: mūle tu na kevalaṃ parasyeti yojanīyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6309: yata itiśabdas tasmādarthe tatas tasmād ayaṃ vakṣamāṇo 'rthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6310: tasmāc chabdena yasmāc chabdasyānvayād yasmād ity uktaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6311: anena svabhāvānupalabdhyādiprayogalakṣaṇenopāyena pratipadyata ity āśaṅkya pūrvam eva smarayati prayogābhyāsād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6312: syān matam -- na svayam uccaritaḥ śabdas tatpratipatter nimittaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6315: tat kathaṃ piṣṭapeṣaṇakārī śabda upāyatvenocyata iti naitad asti /
GSP28durdhpru:6316_0: yato liṅgadarśanenānyato vā nimittāt prabuddhavāsano mandapracārārthasmaraṇo 'tyanrābhyastaprayogas
GSP28durdhpru:6316_1: tathāvidhaprayogam uccāryaivaṃ tattvam avagāhamānas tadarthaṃ pratipadyate -- yathā
GSP28durdhpru:6316_2: kaścid abhyāsāt sati dharmiṇi dharmāṇāṃ loke cintā pravarttata ity uccāryaivāsyārthaṃ pratipadyate,
GSP28durdhpru:6317: tadvat trirūpākhyānaṃ vākyam uccāryaiva kaścid abhyastaprayogaḥ parokṣam arthaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6322: kā kṣatiḥ ? svapratipattiprayojanaṃ satvsārthānumānaṃ tadaiva ca tenānyaḥ pratipadyata iti parapratipattiprayojanaṃ sat parārthānumānaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6323: ata evam aśabde 'pi kaścin niyato 'stīty avācāmeti /
GSP28durdhpru:6325: nanu ca kāryānupalabdhyādiṣu kāraṇādinām adṛśyānām eva niṣedhaḥ[168]dṛśyaniṣedhe svabhāvānupalabdhiprayogaprasaṅgāt[169]/
GSP28durdhpru:6327: tat katham eṣāṃ prayogāṇāṃ dṛśyānupalabdhāv antarbhāva ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:6333_1: kāraṇādīnām anupalabdhyā ca pratiṣedha uktas teṣām upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānām evopalabdhir
GSP28durdhpru:6344: yasmāt sarvatrānupalabdhau[175]yeṣāṃ pratiṣedha uktas teṣām upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānāṃ dṛśyānām[176]eva[177]pratiṣedhas tasmād dṛśyānupalabdhāv antarbhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6352: kuta etad dṛśyānām evety āha svabhāvety ādi /
GSP28durdhpru:6354: yasmāt svabhāvaviruddhādir yeṣāṃ teṣām upalabdhyā kāraṇamādir yeṣāṃ teṣām anupalabdhyā pratiṣedha uktas tasmād dṛśyānām eva pratiṣedha ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6355: yadi nāma svabhāvaviruddhādyupalabdhyā kāraṇādyanupalabdhyā[178]ca pratiṣedha uktas tathāpi kathaṃ ḍṛśyānām eva pratiṣedha ity āha upalabdhir ity ādi /
GSP28durdhpru:6357: yasmād ye virodhinaḥ vyāpyavyāpakabhūtāḥ kāryakāraṇabhūtāś ca jñātās teṣām avaśyam evopalabdhiḥ upalabdhipūrvā cānupalabdhir veditavyā jñātavyā[179]/
GSP28durdhpru:6358: upalabdhyanupalabdhī ca dve yeṣāṃ stas te dṛśyā eva /
GSP28durdhpru:6359: tasmāt svabhāvaviruddhādyupalabdhyā kāraṇādyanupalabdhyā copalabdhyanupalabdhimatāṃ viruddhādīnāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyamāṇo dṛśyānām eva kṛto draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6364_0: kecit punar evaṃ vyākaṣate -- svayam ityādinā granthena vārttikakṛtedam uktam --
GSP28durdhpru:6364_1: svabhāvādīnām anupalabdhyā viruddhādīnāñ copalabdhyā yathāyogam abhāvaṃ tadvyavahāraṃ
GSP28durdhpru:6365: na kevalaṃ prayogābhyāsāt pratipattisamaya eva prayogam uccārayati /
GSP28durdhpru:6366: na tu tato pūrvam avagacchatītarathā pratiniyataśabdoccāraṇaṃ na bhaved iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6367: anenopāyeneti copāya ihopāyas tathāśabdoccāraṇakramas teneti varṇayanti /
GSP28durdhpru:6370: bahuṣu codyeṣu prakrānteṣu parihārasamuccayārthaś cakāro hetvartho bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:6371: yasmād idaṃ cedaṃ ca samādhānam asti tasmāt tattaccodyam ayuktam iti cakārārthaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:6372: kasmāt punaḥ pratiṣedhyānāṃ viruddhādīnām upalabdhyanupalabdhī veditavye ity āha
GSP28durdhpru:6379_0: upalabdhyanupalabdhimadbhayo 'nye 'nupalabdhā eva ye teṣāṃ virodhaś ca kāryakāraṇabhāvaś
GSP28durdhpru:6379_1: ca kenacit sahābhāvaś ca vyāpyasya vyāpakasyābhāve[181]na sidhyati yasmāt tato virodhakāryakāraṇabhāvābhāvāsiddheḥ[182]kāraṇād
GSP28durdhpru:6383: virodhaś ca[183]kāryakāraṇabhāvaś ca vyāpakābhāve vyāpyābhāvaś ca dṛśyānupalabdher eveti /
GSP28durdhpru:6395: anye punar anyathā vyavasthitāḥ -- svayam apītyādikaṃ nāvirbhūtaprayogam adhikṛtyoktam,
GSP28durdhpru:6397: atra ca sādhv asādhu vā vyākhyānaṃ sādhubhir eva jñātavyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6398: syād etat -- yathā prayogabhedaḥ svārthānumāne kathyate tathā ca na kiñcid vācyaṃ parārthānumāne syād ity āśaṅkyāha -- yat punar iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6401: samprati dṛśyānupalabdhāv antarbhāvaṃ sarvānupalabdhīnām asahamāna āha -- nanu ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:6402: tathā ca sati kāraṇādīnām adṛśyānāṃ niṣedhaprakāre sati /
GSP28durdhpru:6403: śiṣṭeṣu pariśiṣṭeṣu abhāva ity abhāvo 'pīti draṣtavyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6404: na tv abhāva eva vyavahārasyāpi sādhanāt /
GSP28durdhpru:6406: kāryakāraṇabhāvādigrahaṇakāle yopalabdhir anupalabdhiś ca pūrvam āsīt tadvatāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyamāṇo dṛśyānām eva kṛto draṣṭavyo jñātavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6407: yathā arthavirodhādigrahaṇakāle 'vaśyaṃbhāvinī dṛśyānupalabdhis tathānantaram eva dharmottareṇa prasādhayiṣyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6408: nanu ca kāraṇādīnāṃ cety anena pra(ca)
GSP28durdhpru:6410: tat kathaṃ hetvarthe vyākhyāyata ity āśaṅkya pūrvaṃ buddhisthaṃ spaṣṭayann āha -- bahuṣv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6411: evam manyate -- samuccayārthe varttamāna evāyaṃ hetvarthe varttate /
GSP28durdhpru:6419: iha gṛhīte vṛkṣābhāve hi śiśapātvābhāvapratītau [188]pratīto vyāpyavāpakabhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6422: vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaṃ ca smaratā virodha--kāryakāraṇabhāva--vyāpyavyāpakabhāviviṣayābhāvapratipatti[189] nibandhanaṃ dṛśānupalabdhiḥ smartavyā /
GSP28durdhpru:6429: [189] deśakālasvabhāvaviprakṛṣṭāḥ piśācādyayas teṣāṃ piśācādīnāṃ virodhaś ca kenacid agninā saha na sidhyatīti sambandhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6430: tathā kāryakāraṇabhāvaś ca piśācādīnāṃ kenacid dhūmena sārdhaṃ na sidhyati / -- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:6432: tatra yady api saṃpratitanī[190] nāsti dṛśyānupalabdhir virodhādigrahaṇakāle tv āsīt /
GSP28durdhpru:6434: tataḥ samprati nāsti [191]dṛśyānupalabdhir ity abhāvasādhanatvena dṛśyānupalabdhiprayogād bhidyante kāryānupalabdhyādiprayogāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6443: vyāpakasyābhāve 'bhāvaś ca vyāpyasya na siddhyiti (?) yasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:6444: ayam āśayaḥ -- yadi pūrvaṃ vyāpakābhimatasyābhāve vyāpyābhimatābhāvo niścito bhavet tadā vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaḥ siddhyet,
GSP28durdhpru:6445: tadā ca vyāpakānupalabdhir gamikā syāt, nānyadeti /
GSP28durdhpru:6446_0: ayam atra prakaraṇārthaḥ -- prabandhena bhavato yadbhāve yasyābhāvas tasya virodhagatir
GSP28durdhpru:6446_1: yat svabhāvaś ca yenopalabhyate tena saha kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'pi pañcapratyakṣānupalambham adhigamyaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:6447: vyāpyavyāpakabhāvo pi pratyakṣānupalambhāvaseya iti katham adṛśyasya sidhyantīti /
GSP28durdhpru:6451: tat kathaṃ dṛśyānupalabdhāvitarāsām anupalabdhīnām antarbhāva ity āśaṅkya tathā tatrāntarbhāvas tathā darśayitum āha -- tad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6452: yasmād anyatra dṛśyatve 'pi viruddhādīnāṃ dṛśyānupalambhe 'ntarbhāvo na ghaṭate,
GSP28durdhpru:6453: sa cācāryeṇoktas tat tasmād ayam arthaḥ -- sarvatra cetyāder vākyasya tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6454: kathaṃ dṛśyānupalabdher ity ayam amum arthaṃ tāvat prasādhayati -- eketi /
GSP28durdhpru:6456: yady evaṃ vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasya kā gatir ity āha -- vyāpaketi /
GSP28durdhpru:6457: nanu ca vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaniścaye tayor ekatvāt kim abhāvaniścayenety āha -- tatra vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaniścaye karttavye /
GSP28durdhpru:6458: katham abhāvapratītir vyāpyavyāpakabhāvapratīter nimittam ity āha -- iheti /
GSP28durdhpru:6461: kāraṇādiniṣedhena ca yato dṛśyānupalabdhir ākṣiptā tato dṛśyānupalabdher eva[192]kālāntaravṛttāyāḥ svṛtiviṣayabhūtāyā abhāvapratipattiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6463: tad anena sarveṇa dṛśyānupalabdhāvantarbhāvo daśānāmanupalabhdhiprayogāṇāṃ pārabpryeṇa darśita iti veditavyam //
GSP28durdhpru:6468: dṛśyānupalabdhis tu kvopayujyata ity āha -- abhāveti /
GSP28durdhpru:6470: nanu yadi nāma virodhādigrahaṇakāle dṛśyānupalabdhir āsīt,
GSP28durdhpru:6472: tat kathaṃ viruddhopalabdhyādīnāṃ tatrāntarbhāva ity āha -- tasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6474: abhāvasiddhiś ca dṛśyānupalabdhes tasmād hetor virodhādikaṃ smarateti viruddhopalambhavyāpakānupalambhādiprayogakāla iti draṣṭavyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6477: tasmāt tat tannāstīty asyāḥ pratīter ayogāt -- ity api draṣṭavyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6478: smarateti ca tadānīṃ virodhāder grahaṇād gṛhītasyaiva vikalpanād uktaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6479: kutaḥ punar avaśyasmarttavyā sety āha -- dṛśyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:6480: atha syāt -- prāktanī dṛśyānupalabdhiḥ sadā smaryatām,
GSP28durdhpru:6481: tathāpi katham asau vivakṣitābhāvasiddhāv upayogaṃ bhajate,
GSP28durdhpru:6485: nanu viruddhopalabdhikāraṇādyanupalabdhiprayogaviṣaye sā nāsti tat katham avidyamānā saivābhāvapratīter nibandhanam ity āha -- tatreti vākyopanyāse /
GSP28durdhpru:6486: sampratīdānīṃ smaryamāṇā saivābhāvapratīter nibandhanaṃ viruddhādyabhāvajñānasya karaṇaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6487: kathaṃ tarhi dṛśyānupalabdher viruddhopalabdhyādīnāṃ bheda ity āha -- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6490: itis tadmād atrābhāvaḥ sādhyate tenābhāvasādhanatvena tato bhidyante viruddhopalabdhyādiprayogaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6495: nanu svātantryeṇa tvayā tasyā eva prākpravṛttāyā abhāvaniścayo darśitas tatra cānupalabdhīnām antarbhāvaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:6496: na tv ācāryasyāyam abhipreta ity āśaṅkyācāryasyaivāyam abhipreto 'rtha iti darśayann āha -- tadaneneti /
GSP28durdhpru:6499: ayam atra prakaraṇārthaḥ -- dṛśyānupalambhasyāvaktavyatvena daśānām apy anupalabdhīnāṃ tatrāntarbhāvaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:6510: viprakṛṣṭaviṣayā punar anupalabdhīḥ pratyakṣānumāṇanivṛttilakṣaṇā saṃśayahetuḥ II-47
GSP28durdhpru:6512: viprakṛṣṭastribhir deśakālasvabhāvaviprakarṣair yasyā viṣayaḥ sā viprakṛṣṭaviṣayeti saṃśayahetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6513: kiṃsvabhāvā sety āha -- pratyakṣānumānanivṛttir lakṣaṇaṃ svabhāvo ysyāḥ sā pratyakṣaṇā /
GSP28durdhpru:6516: na ca śītasya niṣedhe sādhye dūratvād vahner bhāsvararūpopalabdhiḥ śītasparśānupalabdhir yujyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6524: tata eva smaryamāṇāt pramāṇād vivakṣitapratītiprasaṅgāc ca /
GSP28durdhpru:6525: tasmāt sarvatraiva sampratitano dṛśyānupalambho darśanīyas tadbalenaivābhāvaniścayo vācyaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:6526: na tu prākpravṛttād dṛśyānupalambhāt smṛtyā viṣayīkṛtād abhāvaniścayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6528: yady evaṃ kathaṅkāraṃ sa pradarśyatām iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:6530: dūrād vahne rūpaviśeṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā yatraivaṃvidharūpaviśeṣas tatra tāvad deśavyāpakas tuṣārasparśaviśeṣo 'sti /
GSP28durdhpru:6531: yathā mahānasādau tathāvidham evarūpam ity ānumānikī viśiṣṭoṣṇasparśapratītiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6534: sa kvacit pratyakṣātmā kvacid anumānātmeti na śāstravirodho na yuktivirodhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6539: kevalam atyantābhyāsāg jhaṭiti tathāpratītyudaye saty ekam anumānam uktaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6542: tathā ca vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhyādiṣv aparam anumānam ekaṃ plavamānam avaseyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6543: yayoś ca parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇo virodhas tatra dṛśyānupalabdhiḥ sphuṭaiva /
GSP28durdhpru:6544: tena viruddhavyāptopalabdhyādiṣu sampraty eva dṛśyānupalabdhir asti /
GSP28durdhpru:6546: evaṃ vyāpakakāraṇānupalabdhādiṣv akāraṇāvyāpakāder dharmasyaivānupalambhād abhāve (siddhe tata
GSP28durdhpru:6547: eva sāmarthyāt kāryāder abhāvāv asāv itīdānīn tanasyaiva dṛśyānupalambhasyopayogo)
GSP28durdhpru:6549: dṛśyānupalambhasya ca sākṣātkāraṇe vyāpārāt pāryamparyeṇa ca viruddhādyabhāve bhāve vyāpārāt dṛśyānupalabdher bhedena kāraṇānupalabdhyādīnāṃ prayoga iti //
GSP28durdhpru:6557: -- DB; nyāyabinduprakaraṇe dvitīyaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ // -- E.
GSP28durdhpru:6561: kāraṇaḥ vyākaṃ ca nivrttamānaṃ kāryaṃ vyāpyaṃ ca nivarttayet /
GSP28durdhpru:6562: na ca pramāṇaṃ prameyasya kāraṇaṃ nāpi vyāpakam /
GSP28durdhpru:6563: ataḥ praṇāṇayor nivṛttāv api arthasya prameyasya nivṛttir an sidhyati /
GSP28durdhpru:6566: yat punaḥ pramāṇasattayā prameyasattā sidhyati tad yuktam /
GSP28durdhpru:6568: na ca kāraṇam antareṇa kāryam asti /
GSP28durdhpru:6581: sampraty adṛśyānupalabdhim adhikṛtyoktaṃ vyācakṣāṇa āha -- ukteti /
GSP28durdhpru:6582: nanu yadi pratyakṣānumānanivṛttimātrarūpādṛśyānupalabdhir abhāve sādhye saṃśayahetur anaikāntikī tarhi sā tataś ca hetvābhāsāvasara eva vaktavyā /
GSP28durdhpru:6585: yato na sā vacanavyaktyānupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhir asadvyavahāre sādhye na pramāṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:6587: na jñānajñeyasvabhāveti yāvad ity ārthaṃ nyāyam āśrityoktaṃ na śābdam iti draṣṭavyaṃ //
GSP28durdhpru:6588: yadi pramāṇanivṛttyā prameyānivṛttis tarhi tatsattayāpi na prameyasattā siddhyed ity āśaṅkya tatropapattiṃ darśayann āha -- yat punar iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6589: nanu kāraṇam apy avaśyaṃ kāryavad bhavati tataś ca sati jñeye jñānenāpy avaśyabhāvyaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6590: tac cen nāsti jñeyam api nāsty eva /
GSP28durdhpru:6591: tataḥ siddhyaty evādṛśyasyāpy abhāva ity āśaṅkyāha -- na tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6601: svārthaparārthānumānyoḥ svārthaṃ vyākhyāya parārthaṃ vyākhyātukāma āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:6607: trīṇi rūpāṇi --- anvayavyatirekapakṣadharmatvasaṃjñakāni yasya tat trirūpam /
GSP28durdhpru:6619: tat kimarthaṃ saṃprati vacanātmakam anumānam ukta ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:6628: tasmin kāraṇe vacane kāryasya anumānasyopacāraḥ samāropaḥ kriyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6634: trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ jñātam api vaktum aviduṣo bālasya vyutpādanārthaṃ trirūpaliṅgākhyānalakṣaṇaṃ yat parārtham anumānam uktaṃ tad vyākhyātuṃ svārthetyādinā prastauti /
GSP28durdhpru:6635: dvayo rūpyor abhidhānād ekasya gamyamānatvād ākhyāyate prakāśyate 'neneti trirūpaṃ liṅgam iti vivṛtaṃ na tv abhidhīyate 'neneti /
GSP28durdhpru:6636: abhidheyasya gamyamānasya ca prakāśyatvaṃ tulyam iti prakāśyate ity anena dvayoḥ saṅgrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6637_0: yenārthakrameṇātmanaḥ parokṣārthajñānam utpannaṃ tenaiva krameṇa parasantāne liṅgijñānotpapādayiṣayā
GSP28durdhpru:6637_1: trirūpasya liṅgasya khyāpakaṃ yad vacanaṃ tatparārtham anumānam iti draṣtavyam //
GSP28durdhpru:6644: na yāvat[206] kiṃcid upacārād anumānaśabdena vaktuṃ śakyaṃ tāvat sarvaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP28durdhpru:6645: kin tv anumānaṃ vyākhyātukāmenānumānasvarūpasya[207] vyākhyeyatvān nimittaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP28durdhpru:6647: tac ca svayaṃ vā pratītam anumānsya nimittaṃ bhavati,
GSP28durdhpru:6653: tataḥ pratipādakaṃ śabdam avśyaṃ vaktavyaṃ darśayan anumānaśabdenoktavān ācārya iti paramārthaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:6664: nanu ca trirūpaliṅgābhidhānād avagate sati dharmiṇi liṅgaṃ jñāyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6666: tat kathaṃ `trirūpaliṅgavacanāt tatsmṛtir utpadyate' ity ucyata iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:6668: gṛhyamāṇam api dhūmādivastu na tāval liṅgaṃ yāvad vahnyādisādhyāvinābhūtatayā na jñāyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6669: tathātvaṃ ca tasya na tadā grāhyam api tu pūrvagṛhītam eva smarttavyam iti sūktaṃ trirūpaliṅgasmṛtir utpadyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6671: ayam arthaḥ --- vacanam api trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ smarayat parokṣārthajñānasya paramparayā kāraṇaṃ bhavad upacārād anumānam ucyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6672: athābādhitatvādy api liṅgasya lakṣaṇam ity ācakṣate kecid iti vipratipattidarśanāt tadvyutpādanaṃ yuktam,
GSP28durdhpru:6675: na atrāpy avyāptivyatirekābhyāṃ nigadanto vipratipannā ity asyāpi vyutpādanaṃ nyāyyam /
GSP28durdhpru:6677_0: yadi paramparayā'numānahetutvena vacanam upacārād anumānam iti vyutpādyate tarhi
GSP28durdhpru:6677_1: jijñāsāsvāsthyādikam api paramparayā'numānahetutvād anumānaśabdena vaktuṃ śakyam
GSP28durdhpru:6677_2: iti tad api kiṃ nocyata ity āha --- na yāvad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6678: nanu svāsthyādikam api nimittam iti tadavastho doṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6680: nimittaṃ vyākyeyam ity avyahitam asādhāraṇaṃ nimittam ākhyeyam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6681: nanu svayaṃ pratītaṃ liṅgam anumānasya nimittam /
GSP28durdhpru:6682: tatkiṃ tadvacanena vyākhyātenety āha --- tac ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:6685: yataḥ pareṇa pratipāditam api tal liṅgam anumānsya nimittaṃ tatas tasmād avaśyaṃ vaktavyaṃ pratipādakaṃ[58a] liṅgapratipādakaṃ vacanaṃ darśayann anmumānśabdenoktavān ācāryaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6689: dvau vidhau prakārau yasya tad dvividham //
GSP28durdhpru:6707: dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇā saha sādhyadharmiṇaḥ sādṛśyaṃ hetukṛtaṃ sādharmyam ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6709: tatra yasya sādhanavākyasya sādharmyam abhidheyaṃ tat sādharmyavat /
GSP28durdhpru:6710: yathā --- yata kṛtakaṃ tad anityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:6711: tathā ca kṛtakaḥ śabda ity atra kṛtaktvakṛtaṃ dṛṣṭāntasādhyadharimiṇoḥ sādṛśyam abhidheyam /
GSP28durdhpru:6712: yasya tu vaidharmyam abhidheyaṃ tad vaidharmyavat /
GSP28durdhpru:6713: yathā --- yan nityaṃ tad akṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathākāśam /
GSP28durdhpru:6714: śabdas tu kṛtaka iti kṛtakatvā'kṛtakatvakṛtaṃ[214] śabdākāśayoḥ sādhyadṛṣṭāntadharmiṇor asādṛśyam ihābhidheyam //
GSP28durdhpru:6719: yad anayayoḥ prayogayor abhidheyaṃ bhinnaṃ kathaṃ tarhi trirūpaṃ liṅgam abhinnaṃ prakāśyam ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:6722: yat payojanaṃ prakāśayitavyaṃ vastu uddiśyānumāne prayujyete,
GSP28durdhpru:6723: tataḥ prayojanād anayor na bhedaḥ[215] kaścit /
GSP28durdhpru:6726: dvābhyām api trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ prakāśyate eva /
GSP28durdhpru:6728: tathā ca na tato bhedaḥ kaścit //
GSP28durdhpru:6732: anenaitad āha --- na svāsthyādi pratipannam api parokṣārthapratipādakaṃ yena tad ucyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:6734: svayam aśaktam api tu hetuvacanaṃ parokṣaprakāśanavastusūcakatvād anumānaśabdenoktam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6735: iti paramārtha evam asyopacārasya paramaḥ prakṛṣṭo 'rthaḥ prayojanam //
GSP28durdhpru:6736: vidhaśabdena ca vigṛhṇato 'bhiprāyaḥ prāg eva pradarśitaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:6739: abhidheyabhdedo 'pi tarhi na syād ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:6743: vācakatvabhedād anyo bhedaḥ prayojanakṛto nāstīty arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6748: anvaye hi kathite vakṣyamāṇena nyānyena vyatirekagatir bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:6751: na ca yatrābhidheyabhdedas tatra sāmarthyagamyo 'py artho[216] bhidyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6752_0: yasmāt `pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkte' `pīno devadatto rātrau bhuṅkte' ity anyor
GSP28durdhpru:6752_1: vākyayor abhidheyabhdedepi gamyamānam ekam eva[217] tadvad ihābhidheyabhede 'pi gamyamānaṃ vastv ekam eva //
GSP28durdhpru:6755: [217] gamyaṃ divā bhojanābhāvaviśeṣaṃ pīnatvaṃ rātribhojanakāryam ekam eva --- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:6757: kena kasya kim kṛtaṃ ca sādharmyaṃ vaidharmyaṃ cety āha --- dṛṣṭānteti /
GSP28durdhpru:6759: asādṛśyaṃ ca hetukṛtam iti hetusadbhāvāsadbhāvadvārakaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:6761: yasya vākyasya sādharmyaṃ sādṛśyam abhibheyam asti /
GSP28durdhpru:6764: yad yad kṛtakam iti vīpsārtho vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:6766: tathā ca kṛtakaḥ śabda iti pakṣadharmatākathanam idam /
GSP28durdhpru:6768: `kṛtakaś ca śabadaḥ' ity etāvataiva gatārthatvena tathāśabdasya vaiyarthyāt /
GSP28durdhpru:6769: tataḥ `kṛtakaś ca śabdaḥ' ity eva darśanīyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6772: yan nityam iti sādhyābhāvānuvādas tad akṛtakam iti sādhanābhāvavidhiḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:6773: abhidheyaṃ bhinnam iti brubato 'yam āśayaḥ --- sādharmyavat prayogasyānvayaḥ pakṣadharmatā cābhidheyā /
GSP28durdhpru:6775_0: arthaḥ prayojanavācyācāreṇokto nābhidheyavācīti darśayati yad uddiśyeti spaṣṭayan
GSP28durdhpru:6775_1: prayujyate 'neneti prayojanaṃ sādhanavākyasya pravarttakaṃ liṅgavastūktaṃ na phalaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:6776: prakāśayitavyaṃ rūpatrayayogiliṅgaṃ tac cābhinnaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ dvayor api prayogayoḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:6779: tata iti prayojanasamānādhikaraṇaṃ na hetupadam etat //
GSP28durdhpru:6780: nanv abhidheyam eva prakāśyaṃ ta tkathaṃ prakāśyābheda ityāśaṅkyāha --- etad uktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:6784: yadi sādharmyavadvākye 'nvayo 'bhidheyas tarhi kathaṃ vyatirekaḥ prakāśyatāṃ gataḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:6787: tatra sādharmyavat prayogaḥ[218]--- yad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ san na upalabhyate so asadvyavahāraviṣayaḥ siddhaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:6789: na upalabhyate ca kvacit pradeśaviśeṣa[219]upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpto ghaṭa[220]ity anupalabdhiprayogaḥ III-8
GSP28durdhpru:6795: tatreti tayoḥ sāhdarmyavaidharmyavator anumānayoḥ sādharmyavat [221]tāvad uhārann anupalabbhim āha --- yad itiyādinā /
GSP28durdhpru:6796: yad upalabdhdilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ --- yad dṛśyaṃ san nopalabhyate ity anena dṛśyānupalambho 'nūdyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6797: so 'sadvyavahāraviṣayaḥ[222] siddhaḥ --- tad asad iti vyavahartavyam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6809: katham anvayaḥ prakāśyatām āpanna ity āha --- anvaya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6811: vakṣyamāṇena “sādharmyeṇāpi hī” tyādinā pratipādayiṣyamāṇena nyāyena yuktā /
GSP28durdhpru:6812: syān mataṃ --- yayor abhidheyaṃ bhinnaṃ tayoḥ sāmarthyagamyam apy avaśyaṃ bhidyate --- yathā gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:6813: kūpe gargakulam ity āśaṅkyāha --- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:6817: ekasya vākyasya divā bhojanābhāvo 'bhidheyo 'nyasya rātribhojanam ity anayor vākyayor [58b] abhiddheyabhedo 'sti /
GSP28durdhpru:6818_0: tasmin saty api yathā bhojanaviśiṣṭaṃ devadattasya pīnatvaṃ pratipādyaṃ na bhidyate
GSP28durdhpru:6821: tathā hi divā bhojananiṣedhavākyasya gamyamānaṃ rātribhojanaṃ rātribhojanavidhānavākyasya tu gamyanānaṃ divā bhojananiṣedhanam,
GSP28durdhpru:6823: vadvākye vyatireko gamyamāno vaidharmyavadvākye cānvayo gamyamānaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6825: yad anyasya gamyanānaṃ tad itarasyābhidheyam iti saṃkṣepaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6826: tataḥ katham ucyate vākyayor gamyamānam ekam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6830_0: yat tu dvayaṃ pratīyamānatāmātreṇopādhinā vivakṣitaṃ tac ca dṛṣṭāntavākyayor bhojananimittapīnatvalakṣaṇaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:6831: sādharmyam abhidheyaṃ yasya vidyate tad udāhahraṇena darśayann anupalabdhim āha /
GSP28durdhpru:6837: tam eva darśayitum āha --- yathānya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6840: śaśaviṣāṇaṃ hi na cakṣuṣā viṣayīkṛtam api tu pramāṇe dṛśyānupalambhenāsadvyavahārayogyaṃ vijñātaṃ /
GSP28durdhpru:6843: tata eva pramāṇād anena vākyenābhidhīyamānā[228]vyāptir jñātavyā /
GSP28durdhpru:6850: saṃprati vyāptiṃ kathayitvā dṛśyānupalambhasya pakṣadharmatvaṃ darśayitum āha --- nopalabhyate ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:6851: sa ca dvirāvṛttyā 'nupalabdhim ity atrāpi draṣtasvyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6852: tenāyam arthaḥ --- sādharmyavat tāvad udāharann anupalabdhim āha /
GSP28durdhpru:6854: tathā 'nupalabdhiṃ tāvad āha paścāt svabhāvakārye vakṣyatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:6855: nanv ācāryeṇaiva sādharmyavad vaidharmyavac codāhṛtam atreti kim iti dharmottarena --- yathā yat kṛtakam ityādinā sādharmyavad vaidharmyavac codāhṛtaṃ prāg iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:6858: vaisadṛśyākhyāṃ vaidharmyaṃ ca hetudvārakam eva na tu sāmānyena,
GSP28durdhpru:6859: anyathā pratiyogyapekṣayā 'pi sādharmyaṃ vaidharmyaṃ ca kenacid ākārenāstīti na tan nirākṛtaṃ syād iti darśayituṃ tad udāhṛtam,
GSP28durdhpru:6860: na tv ācāryeṇa nodāhṛtam ity udāhṛtam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6861: tenātrāpy ācāryīye nidarśane hetukṛtam eva tat pratyetavyaṃ vyavasthitam /
GSP28durdhpru:6862: asadvyavahāraḥ --- asad iti jñānam asad ity abhidhānaṃ niḥśaṅkā ca gamāgamādikā pravṛttiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6866: ayam āśayaḥ --- yad anūdyate tad vyāpyam /
GSP28durdhpru:6870: atha dvyavayave sādhanavākye darśitavye vyāptiḥ pakṣadharmatā ca darśanīyā /
GSP28durdhpru:6874: tat kathaṃ pariparṇaṃ sādhanavākyam idaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āśaṅkyāha --- sādhanasyeti / co hetau /
GSP28durdhpru:6875: nanu parokṣārthapratipattau sarvathā 'nupayogī dṛṣṭāntas tat kiṃ tenākhyātenety āha vyāptīti /
GSP28durdhpru:6876: vyāpyavāpakadharmalakṣaṇā [59a] vyāptiḥ sādhyate niścīyate yena pramāṇena tasya viṣayo yatra
GSP28durdhpru:6879: sa eva viśiṣyate 'nyasmād iti viśeṣaḥ ekaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6883: sa evābhāvavyavahārādhikaraṇaṃ yaḥ pratipattuḥ pratyakṣo nānyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6885: yathā cāsato 'pi ghaṭasya samāropitam upalabdhilakṣaṇāprāptatvaṃ tathā vyākhyātam //
GSP28durdhpru:6890: tathā svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ --- yat sat tat sarvam anityam,
GSP28durdhpru:6891: yathā ghaṭādir iti śuddhasya[230] svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ III-9
GSP28durdhpru:6895: tatheti / yathā 'nulabdhes tathā svabhāvahetoḥ sādharmyavān prayoga ity athaḥ / yat sad iti
GSP28durdhpru:6897: sa ca viṣayo dṛṣṭo niścitaḥ sādhyasādhanayor anto 'vasānaṃ yathāyogaṃ niyatatvaniyamaviṣayatvanipuṇo yasminn iti vyutpattyā dṛṣṭāntaśabdo 'bhilapyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6899: anenaitad ākūtam --- vyāptisādhakapramāṇasyādhikaraṇatāṃ gacchan dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhanāvayavasya vyāpteḥ pratipattyaṅgam /
GSP28durdhpru:6903: ata eva vacanasādhanavākyasyāvayavo 'tha ca prayoktavaya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6905: śaśaviṣāṇādeś ca vyāptisādhakapramāṇādhikaraṇatvena dṛṣṭāntarūpatvād dṛṣṭānta ity artha iti spaṣṭayati /
GSP28durdhpru:6906: nanu dṛṣṭaś cakṣuṣā jñāta iti kiṃ na vyākhyāyate?
GSP28durdhpru:6907: kiṃ punar evaṃ vyākhyāta ity āha--- śaśeti /
GSP28durdhpru:6909: viṣayīkṛtaṃ vijñātam iti cātīte niṣṭhāṃ prayuñjānaḥ prāgbhāvi vyāptigrahaṇaṃ daṛśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:6910: kathaṃ punaḥ śaśaviṣāṇādi dṛṣṭānto yena sā khyāpyata ity āha --- śaśeti /
GSP28durdhpru:6912: dṛśyānupalambha eva tanmātraṃ tannimittaṃ yasya sa tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:6914: kiṃ tat pramāṇaṃ yena tatra pravṛttena dṛśyānupalambhābhāvavyavahārayogyatvayor vyāptiḥ sādhyata iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:6916: vādanyāyoktena nyāyena buddhivyapadeśābhāvāder asadvyavahārānimittatvena nimittāntarābhāve dṛśyānupalambha evānyanirapekṣo nimittam /
GSP28durdhpru:6917: yac ca yan mātranimittaṃ tatasmin sati bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:6919: dṛśyānupalambhamātranimittaś cāsadvyavahāra ity anumānaṃ tatra pravṛttaṃ sādhyasādhanayor vyāpitim avasyatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:6920: anena vākyena yad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptam ityādinā 'bhidhīyamānā prakāśyamānā /
GSP28durdhpru:6921: tata eva prākpravṛttād anantaroktād anumānātmanaḥ pramāṇād vyāptir jñātavyā /
GSP28durdhpru:6922: etad uktaṃ bhavati tatpramāṇasiddhaiva vyāptir anena vākyena smaryata iti //
GSP28durdhpru:6923: svabhāvetyādinā svabhāvahetoḥ sādharmyavat prayogaṃ vivaritum upakramate /
GSP28durdhpru:6925: tayaiva pratipāditayā sādhanasya sādhyāyattatākhyo yo niyamaḥ sa pratipādito
GSP28durdhpru:6927: sattvam anūdya tat sarvam nityam ity anityatvaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6932: anityatvād anyatra nityatve sattvaṃ nāstīty evaṃ sattvam aniytyatve sādhye niyataṃ khyāpitaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:6934: yathā ghaṭādir iti [231]vyāptisādhakasya pramāṇasya viṣayakathanam etat /
GSP28durdhpru:6938: nityakramayogapadyābhyām arthakriyāvirodhād iti viparyayabādhakaṃ pramāṇam --- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:6942: yad utpattimat tad anityam iti svabhāvabhūtadharmabhedena svabhāvasya prayogaḥ III-10
GSP28durdhpru:6945: utpattimattvam anūdya tad anityam ity anityatvavidhiḥ[235] /
GSP28durdhpru:6946: tathā ca saty utpattimattvam anityatve niyatam ākhyātam /
GSP28durdhpru:6956: [238]anutpannebhyo hi vyāvṛttim āśrityotpanno bhāva[239] ity ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6957: saiva vyāvṛttir yadā vyāvṛttyantaranirapekṣā vaktum iṣyate tadā vyatirekinīva nirdiśyate --- bhāvasya utpattir iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6958: yathā ca vyatiriktayevotpattyā viśiṣṭaṃ[240] vastu utpattimad uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:6961_1: ity eva dharottarasaṃmataḥ pāṭha iti gṛhītas tathāpi atra tenaiva `svahāvaṃ bhūtaḥ'
GSP28durdhpru:6961_2: ity evṃrūpeṇa gṛhīto 'sti iti vyākhyānurodhād bhāvi --- saṃ- /
GSP28durdhpru:6964: [238] nanu svabhāvabhūtasya kathaṃ bhada ity āha --- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:6972: idaṃ vākyaṃ yat sat tad anityam ity ātmakam /
GSP28durdhpru:6973: vyāptisādhakasya pramāṇasyeti yasya kramākramā 'yogo na tasya kvacit sāmarthyaṃ yathākāśakuśeśayasya /
GSP28durdhpru:6974: asti cākṣaṇike sa iti vyāpakānupalambhasambhabasyānumāṇasyeti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:6975: etac ca bahuvācyam anyatra vipañcitam nehāprakṛtatvāt pratanyate /
GSP28durdhpru:6976: kathaṃ punar utpattir bhāvasya viśeṣaṇam ity āḥa --- svabhāvam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:6977: svabhāvaṃ bhūtaḥ prāpta iti karttari niṣṭhā “dvitīyā” [pāṇini 2.1.24.] iti yogavibhāgāt [59b] samāsaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6983: yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityam ity upādhibhedena III-11
GSP28durdhpru:6984: yat kṛtakamiti kṛtaktvam anūdya [241]anityatvaṃ vidhīyata iti anityatve niyataṃ kṛtakatam uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:6988: tasya bhdedena bhinnopādhinā viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāvaḥ prayukta ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:6993: kadācid avyatiriktena viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ kadācid vyatiriktena /
GSP28durdhpru:7004: svabhāvabhūtaḥ svabhātmako dharma iti ca paramārthābhiprāyeṇoktam /
GSP28durdhpru:7005: bhedenetīyaṃ tṛtīyā hetāv iti darśayann āha --- bhedam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7006: vyavahārasiddhaṃ bhedam utpattuḥ sakāśād anyatvaṃ hetūkṛtya nibandhanīkṛtya prayogaḥ saviśeṣaṇasya svabhāvahetor iti prakaraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:7007: kalpanayā 'pi kathaṃ bhedo yenotpattyā viśiṣṭam utpattyā viśiṣṭam utpattimad ucyata ity āha --- anutpannebhya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7009: anutpannebhya ākāśādibhyo vyāvṛttiṃ vyavacchedam āśritya parikalpya /
GSP28durdhpru:7010: yadi vyāvṛttyāśrayeṇotpanno bhāva ucyate tarhi katham utpattir asyeti prayoga ity āha --- saiveti /
GSP28durdhpru:7011: vyāvṛttyantaraṃ mahattvādi tannirapekṣā vaktum iṣyate yadā tadā /
GSP28durdhpru:7012: tena paramārthaḥ svabhāvabhūtenotpattyākhyena dhārmeṇa kalpitaḥ samāropito bhedo 'rthāntaratvaṃ yasya ye(te)
GSP28durdhpru:7013: na avyatiriktena viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭasya svabhāvahetoḥ prayoga ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7015: adhunā tu bhinnaviśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭasyeti bhedas tad āha --- bhinneneti /
GSP28durdhpru:7016: yad vā bhinnena pūrvasymād anyādṛśena saṅketavaśād antarbhāvitena,
GSP28durdhpru:7021: atha kim eko arthaḥ śuddhaḥ kadācid avyatiriktopādhinā viśiṣṭaḥ;
GSP28durdhpru:7022: kadācid vyatiriktaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭo dṛṣṭaḥ śiṣṭaiḥ prayujyamāno yenaivam ucyamānaṃ parabhāgaṃ puṣṇātīy āha --- devadatta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7024: citrā cāsau gauś ceti “gor ataddhitaluki” [pāṇini 5.4.92] iti ṭac,
GSP28durdhpru:7027: cittraguśabdena kṛtakaśabdasya sāmyaṃ nāstīti manvānaḥ para āha --- nanu ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:7029: nanu ca kṛtakaśabde na viśeṣaṇavāciśabdo 'stīti yad uktaṃ tat tadavadastham evety āha --- yady apīti /
GSP28durdhpru:7032: nanu ca citraguśabde vyatirektasya viśeṣaṇasya vācakaś citraśabdo gośabdaś cāsti /
GSP28durdhpru:7033: kṛtakaśabde tu nirviśeṣaṇavācinaḥ śabdasya prayogo 'stīty āśaṅkyāha ---
GSP28durdhpru:7034: apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi bhāvaḥ svabhāvaniṣpattau kṛtaka iti III-12
GSP28durdhpru:7036: pareṣāṃ kāraṇānāṃ vyāpāraḥ svabhāvasya niṣpattau --- niṣptatty artham apekṣitaḥ paravyāpāro yena sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7038: yasmād apekṣita paravyāpāraḥ kṛtaka ucyate tasmād vyatiriktena viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāva ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:7039: yady api vyartiriktaṃ viśeṣaṇapadaṃ [243]na prayuktaṃ tathāpi kṛtakaśabdenaiva vyatiriktaṃ [244]viśeṣaṇapadam antarbhāvitam /
GSP28durdhpru:7040: ata eva saṃjñāprakāro 'yaṃ kṛtakaśabdo yasmāt saṃjñāyām ayaṃ kan pratyayo vihitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7041: yatra ca viśeṣaṇam antarbhāvyate tatra viśeṣaṇapadaṃ na pryujyate /
GSP28durdhpru:7046: kvacit[245] tu pratīyamānaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ yathā kṛta ity ukte hetubhir ity etat pratīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:7058_0: yathā ca kṛtakaśabdo bhinnaviśeṣaṇasvabhāvābhidhāyī evaṃ prayayabhedabheditvam ādir
GSP28durdhpru:7058_1: yeṣāṃ prayatnānatarīyakatvādīnāṃ te 'pi svabhāvahetoḥ prayogā bhinnaviśeṣaṇasvabhāvābhidhāyino draṣṭāvyāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7064: prayayānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ bhedo viśeṣas tena prayayakālābhedena bhettuṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa prayayabhedabhedī śabdas tasya bhāvaḥ prayayabhedabheditvam /
GSP28durdhpru:7072: punaḥ kṛtakaśabdenāntarbhāvitam ity āha --- yasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7073: saṃjñāyāṃ nāmni kan pratyayo vihitas tasmād antarbhāvitam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7074: ata eva saṃjñāyā kano vidhānbād evāyaṃ kṛtakaśabdaḥ saṃjñāprakāraḥ saṃjñāviśeṣaḥ saṃjñāśabda iti yāvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:7075: antarbhāve 'pi kathaṃ viśeṣaṇapadāprayoga ity āha --- yatreti /
GSP28durdhpru:7077: athāvasitasyāpy asti prayogo yathā kṛtaka ity ukte hetuneti pratītāv api hetuśabdaprayoga ity āha --- kvacid iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7081: tad evaṃ tirvidhaḥ svabhāvahetuprayogo[252] darśitaḥ śuddho 'vyatirktaviśeṣaṇo vyatirktaviśeṣaṇaś ca /
GSP28durdhpru:7085: [253]evamarthaṃ caitad ākhyātaṃ --- vācakabhedān mā bhūt kasyacit svabhāvahetāv api prayukte vyāmoha iti //
GSP28durdhpru:7089: [254]sann utpattimān kṛtako vā śabda iti pakṣadharmaupadarśanam [255] III-14
GSP28durdhpru:7092: [255] asmin sūtre na kiṃcit kenacid vyākhyātam
GSP28durdhpru:7094: atha kim ete svabhāvahetavaḥ siddhasambandhe svabhāve sādhye prayoktavyā āhosvid asiddhasambandha ity āśaṅkya siddhasambandhe prayoktavyā iti darśayitum āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:7095: sarva ete sādhanadharmā yathāsvaṃ pramāṇaiḥ siddhasādhanadharmamātrānubandha eva sādhyadharme 'vagantavyāḥ III-15
GSP28durdhpru:7100_0: ayam asyāśayaḥ --- na kṛtakaśabdena pratipāditasyārthasya anyathānupapattyā hetuvyāpāro
GSP28durdhpru:7100_1: 'tra pratīyate yenātarāpi viśeṣaṇapadasya [60a] prayogo vaktur icchātaḥ syād vā na
GSP28durdhpru:7100_2: vā kin tu svotpattāv apekṣitaparavyāpārasyaivārthasyedaṃ nāmeti kuto 'nayoḥ sāmyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7101_0: evaṃ tāvat kaścid viśeṣaṇabhūto 'rtho 'rthāt pratīyamānaḥ svaśabdenocyate na vā vaktur
GSP28durdhpru:7101_1: icchāvaśād iti pratipādya kaścit punar viśeṣaṇabhūto 'rthaḥ pratīyamāno 'py avaśyaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:7103: svaśabdaḥ svavācako yasya viśeṣaṇarūpasyārthasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7105: prayayabhedaḥ prayayabhedalakṣaṇo 'rtho viśeṣaṇātmā 'vaśyaṃ svavācakena prayayabhedaśabdenābhidhīyate iti prakaraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:7107: kasimin sādhye sādhanam idam ity āha --- śabdasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:7110: svabhāvahetoḥ sādharmyavat prayogamātre darśayitavye kim anekasya svabhāvahetoḥ prayogo darśita ity āśaṅkya phalam asyopadarśayann āha --- evamarthaṃ caitad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7111: evaṃ vakṣyamāṇako 'rthaḥ prayojanaṃ yasyeti vigrahaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7114: evamarthaṃ caitat hetujātam iti kvacit pāṭhas tatra ca jātaṃ vṛndaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:7117: kasyacit pratipattuḥ svabhāvahetāv api prayukte vyāmoho `nāyaṃ svabhāvaḥ' iti viparyayajñānam /
GSP28durdhpru:7118: etad uktaṃ bhavati --- yadi trayāṇām anyatama upādīyate tadā kadācid anyenānyathā prayukte svabhāvahetau śāstroktasvabhāvahetuvācaka[bhinna]tvāt `nāyaṃ svabhāvavācakaḥ' iti vācake
GSP28durdhpru:7124: kena siddha ity āha --- yathāsvaṃ pramāṇair iti[256] /
GSP28durdhpru:7125: yasya sādhyadharmyasya yadātmīyaṃ pramāṇaṃ tenaiva pramāṇena siddha ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7126: svabhāvahetūnāṃ ca bahubhedatvāt saṃbandhasādhanāny api pramāṇāni bahūnīti pramāṇair iti bahuvacananirdeśaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7130: [256] atha nāntarīyatvāniścaye 'pi liṅgasya parokṣārthapratipādakatvaṃ syād ity āha --- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:7132: tad ayaṃ paramārthaḥ --- na hetuḥ pradīpavad yogyatayā gamako 'pi tu nāntarīyakatayā viniścitaḥ[257] /
GSP28durdhpru:7133: sādhyāvinābhāvitvaniściyanam eva[258] hi hetoḥ sādhyapratipādanavyāpāro nāyaḥ kaścit /
GSP28durdhpru:7140: sa vyāmoho mā bhūd ity etad arthaṃ trividhaḥ svabhāvahetur uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7142: siddho niścitaḥ sambandhas tādātmyalakṣaṇo yasya tasmin /
GSP28durdhpru:7143: yasya sādhyadharmasya yadātnmīyam iti yena pramāṇena yasya sādhyasya sādhanavyāpa[ka]taṃ niścīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:7147: kiṃ tanniścayenety āha --- tad ayam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7148: yata evaṃ tat tasmād ayam abhidhāsyamānas tātparyārthaḥ sarva ityāder vākyasya /
GSP28durdhpru:7151: nanu parokṣārthapratipādanavyāpārasamāveśād hetur gamakaḥ tat kiṃ sādhyanāntarīyakatvaniścayenety āha --- sādhyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:7153: sādhyāvinābhāvitvaniścayanam atrāpīdam etat svabhāvam iti niścayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7154: tad eva hetoḥ pratipādanavyāpāraḥ parokṣārthapratipādanalakṣaṇo vyāpāraḥ parokṣārthapratipādakatam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7155: yady evam aniścatasambanbhe 'pi sādhyadharme sādhanadharmas tannāntarīyakatayā niścetuṃ śakya iti kiṃ siddhasambandhena sādhyenānusṛtenety āha --- prathamam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7158: yad darśanadvārāyātāv etau kṛtakatvānityatvavikalpau vyāvṛttiniṣṭhau paramārthatas tasya tādātmyād ity uktaprāyam ity doṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7159: tādātmyāvasāyaḥ kuta iti cet viparyaye vādhakapramāṇavaśāt /
GSP28durdhpru:7160: tata eva tarhi sādhyaṃ siddham iti kiṃ sādhyata iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:7161: na tato dharmyanavacchedena plavamānākārāyāḥ pratīter apravṛttyaṅgasyodayāt /
GSP28durdhpru:7168: punar anumānakāle[261] sādhanaṃ sādhyanāntarīyakaṃ[262] sāmānyena smartavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:7169: kṛtakatvaṃ nāmāṇityasvabhāvam[263] iti sāmānyena smṛtam arthaṃ[264] punar viśeṣe yojayati --- idam api kṛtakatvaṃ śabde vartamānam anityasvabhāvam[265] eveti /
GSP28durdhpru:7180: tathā ca saty avinābhāvitvajñānam eva parokṣārthapratipādakatvaṃ nāma /
GSP28durdhpru:7181: tena niścitatanmātrānubandhe sādhyadharme sādhyadharmne svabhāvahetavaḥ prayoktavyā nānyatrety uktam //
GSP28durdhpru:7187: yady evaṃ sambandho niścetavyaḥ sādhyasya sādhanena saha /
GSP28durdhpru:7188: sādhanadharmamātrānubandhas tu sādhyasya kasmān niścito mṛgyata ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:7195: yo hi sādhayadharmaḥ sādhanadharmamātrānubandhavān sa eva tasya sādhanadharmasy svabhāvo nānyaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:7197: svabhāva eva tu sādhye kasmād dhetuprayogaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:7204: tasmāt sa eva sādhyaḥ kartavyaḥ yaḥ sādhanasya svabhāvaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:7212: yadi sādhyadharmaḥ sādhanasya svabhāvaḥ[274] syāt pratijñārthaikadeśas tarhi hetuḥ syād ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:7228: tadātmatāpratītiḥ pravṛttyaṅgam iyam asmād eva liṅgād iti kim avadyam?
GSP28durdhpru:7230: etac coktam api svārthānumāne 'dhikābhidhānārthaṃ punar uktam iheti draṣṭavyam //
GSP28durdhpru:7234: dūrād dhi śākhādimān artho vṛkṣa iti niścīyate na śiṃśapeti /
GSP28durdhpru:7235: atha ca sa eva vṛkṣaḥ saiva śiṃśapā /
GSP28durdhpru:7236: tasmād abhinnam api vastu niścayo bhinnam ādarśayati
GSP28durdhpru:7238: tasmān niścayārūḍharūpāpekṣayā anyat sādhanam anyat sādhyam /
GSP28durdhpru:7241: kasmāt punaḥ sādhanadharmamātranubandhyeva[277] sādhyaḥ svabhāvo nānya ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:7250: yo hi yan nānubadhyāti sa[279] tanniṣpattāv aniṣpannaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7255: aniṣpannasya cakyaṃ bhaved ekasyaivārthasya bhāvābhāvau syātāṃ yugapat /
GSP28durdhpru:7256: na ca viruddhayor bhāvābhāvayor aikyaṃ yujyate,
GSP28durdhpru:7263: kiñ ca paścād utpadyamānaṃ pūrvaniṣpannād bhinnahetukam /
GSP28durdhpru:7265: tato niṣpannāniṣpannyor niruddhadharmasaṃsargātmko bhedo bhedahetuś ca kāraṇabheda iti kuta ekatvam?
GSP28durdhpru:7266: tamāt sādhadharmamātrānubandhy eva sādhyaḥ svabhāvo nāyaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:7267: mā bhūt paścān niṣpannaḥ pūrvajasya svabhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7268: sādhyas tu kasmān na bhavatīty āha
GSP28durdhpru:7271: pūrvajena paścān niṣpannasya vyabhicāraḥ parityāgo yas tasya sa bhavāc ca
GSP28durdhpru:7272: nanu kim asya sambhavo 'sti yad uttaikātmana evaikā vyāvṛttir niścīyate netarety āha --- dūrād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7277: vāstavaṃ vastusvarūpād āgatam asamāropitam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7281: tasmin sati niyamena nopatiṣṭhata iti yāvat /

GSP28durdhpru:7283: bhavatāṃ bhāvābhāvarūpe tathā 'pi kiṃ tayos tatsvabhāvatvam ity āha --- bhāveti /
GSP28durdhpru:7291: tathā ca siddhasādhanadharmamātrānubandha eva svabhāve svabhāhetavaḥ prayoktavyā iti sthitam //
GSP28durdhpru:7297: asti ca iha dhūma iti III-21
GSP28durdhpru:7304: yatra dhūma iti dhūmam anūdya tatrāgnir ity agner[283] vidhiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7309: [284] vyāptir vyāpakasya tatra bhāva evetyādikaḥ --- ṭi-

GSP28durdhpru:7328: pūrvaniṣpannavastuhetukatve tadaivotpattiprasaṅena paścād upādāyogād iti bhāvo bhinnhetukam iti bruvataḥ /

GSP28durdhpru:7336: tasmād ityādinā sādhanadharmamātrānubandhinas tat svabhāvatvaṃ sādhanasvabhāvtvañ copasaṃharati /
GSP28durdhpru:7337: caśabdaḥ sādhya ityasyānantaraṃ tatsvabhāvatvāpekṣayā sādhyatvaṃ samuccinoti /
GSP28durdhpru:7338: tathā ca tanniṣpattāv eva niṣpannsasya tādātmye tanmātrānubandhina eva ca sādhyatve sati //
GSP28durdhpru:7342: vaidharmyavataḥ[288]prayogaḥ --- yat sad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ tad upalabhyata eva,
GSP28durdhpru:7344: na ca evam iha upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya sata upalabdhir ghaṭasya ity anupalabdhiprayogaḥ III-23
GSP28durdhpru:7348: vaidharmyavata[289] iti yat sad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptam iti yat sat dṛśya ity astitvānuvādaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7350: [290]tad anena dṛśyasya sattvaṃ darśanaviṣayatvena vyāptaṃ kathitam,
GSP28durdhpru:7354: tathā ca [291]sādhyanivṛttiḥ sādhananivṛttau niyatatvāt sādhananivṛttyā vyāptā kathitā /
GSP28durdhpru:7355: yadi ca dharmaṇi sādhyadharmo na bhaved [292]hetur api na bhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:7358: ato vyāpakasya sādhanābhāvasyābhāvād[296] vyāpyasya[297] sādhyābhāvasyābhāva iti sādhyagatir[298] bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:7359: tato vaidharmyaprayoge sādhanābhāve sādhyābhāvo[299] niyato darśanīyaḥ sarvatreti nyāyaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:7377: tallakṣaṇo 'rthaḥ pratipādyatayā 'bhidheyaḥ prayojanaṃ vā 'sya --- yatra dhūma ityādeḥ prayogasyeti prastāvāt,
GSP28durdhpru:7380: etad eva vyanakti tad iti yata evaṃ tat tasmāt /
GSP28durdhpru:7385: ayam āśayaḥ --- vyāptiḥ khaluḥ pratibandhaḥ sādhyāyattatvam /

GSP28durdhpru:7390: kiṃ tatra vyāptisādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ yad apekṣayā tasya viṣayatvam ity āha --- pratyakṣeti /
GSP28durdhpru:7392: pratyakṣānupalambhānāṃ pratyekaṃ jātyekatvavivakṣayā pratyakṣānupalambhyām ity avaseyam /
GSP28durdhpru:7393: kāryakāraṇbhāvād ātmā niścayārūḍhaḥ svabhāvo yasyeti vigrahaḥ kāryo 'nyathā yuktivirodhaḥ svavacanavirodhaś cā 'sya syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:7395: pakṣadharmasyopasaṃhāro ḍhaukanaṃ tatra sattvapradarśanam ity arthaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:7398: asaty anityatve na asty eva[300] sattvam utpattimattvaṃ kṛtakatvaṃ vā /
GSP28durdhpru:7399: [301] saṃś ca śabda utpattimān kṛtako vā iti svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ III-24
GSP28durdhpru:7405: ihānityatvasya sādhyasyābhāvo hetor abhāve niyata[302] ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:7406: tena hetvabhāvena[303] sādhyābhāvo vyāpta[304] uktas triṣv api svabhāvahetuṣu /
GSP28durdhpru:7407: sann utpattimān kṛtako vā śabda iti trayāṇām api pakṣadharmatvapradarśanam /
GSP28durdhpru:7409: tato vyāpyo 'pi sādhyābhāvo nirvartata[306] iti sādhyagatiḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:7421: asaty agnau na bhavaty eva dhūmaḥ[308] /
GSP28durdhpru:7422: atra ca asti dhūma iti kāryahetoḥ prayogaḥ III-25
GSP28durdhpru:7428: [310]asti dhūma atra iti vyāpakasya dhūmābhāsyābhāva uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7436: tat katham etat trirūpaliṅgākhyānam ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:7440: dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayor hetusadbhāvāsadbhāvadvārakaṃ vaidharmyaṃ vidyate pratipādyatayā yasya taṃ darśayitum āha vārtikakāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7441: tathā ceti sādhyanivṛttyanuvādena sādhananivṛttiprakāre satīty arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7442: sādhyanivṛttir abhāvaḥ sādhanasya nivṛttyā 'bhāvena vyāptā ātmaniyatīkṛtā kathitā prakāśitā /
GSP28durdhpru:7443: kuta ity āha --- sādhanasya nivṛttāv abhāve niyatatvād avyabhicāritvāt sādhyanivṛtter iti prakramāt /
GSP28durdhpru:7444: yato yatra sādhyābhāvas tan niyatatvam asya /
GSP28durdhpru:7447: dharmaṇīty anena dharmamātram upadarśayan sarvopasaṃhāravatīṃ vyāptim āha /
GSP28durdhpru:7448: kutaḥ punaḥ sādhyābhāve sādhanābhāva ity āha --- hetvabhāveneti /
GSP28durdhpru:7451: ato vyāpakābhāvāt sādhyābhāvaḥ sadvyavahārayogyatvalakṣaṇo vyāpyo nivarttate / yata evam
GSP28durdhpru:7453: sādharmyeṇa api hi prayoge arthād vaidharmyagatir iti[312] III-26
GSP28durdhpru:7458: sādharmyaṇāpi abhidheyena ukte prayoge kriyamāṇe arthāt[313] sāmarthyāt vaidharyasya vyatirekasya gatir bhavatīti[314] /
GSP28durdhpru:7466: yadi nāma vyatireko 'nvayavatā[316] noktas tathāpi anvyavacanasāmarthyād evāvasīyate //
GSP28durdhpru:7471: asati tasmin sādhyena hetor anvayābhāvāt III-27
GSP28durdhpru:7472: asati tasmin vyatireke[317] buddhyādhyavasite sādhyena hetor anvyasya [318]buddhyādhyavasitasyābhvāt[319] /
GSP28durdhpru:7473: [320]sādhye niyataṃ sādhanam anvayavākyād avasyatā sādhyābhāve sādhanaṃ nāśaṅkanīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:7487: kathaṃ punas atra sādhyaniścayo jāyata ity āha --- iheti svabhāvahetuprayogatraye /
GSP28durdhpru:7488: co yasmāt sādhanābhāsya sattvādinivṛtte abhāvaḥ sattvādividhir uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7496: dhūmābhāvasyābhāvo dhūmasattaiva pratiṣedhapratiṣedhasya vidhirūpatvād evaṃ pūrvatrāpi vijñeyam /
GSP28durdhpru:7499: na kevalaṃ vyatirekeṇābhidheyena yukta ity apiśabdaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7502_0: etad iha jñātavyam --- anvayavyatirekaor bhedasya vyāvṛttinibandhanbatvād vastutas
