GSP28durdhpru:7829: pratijñāhetūdāharaṇopanayanigamanāny avāvayavā iti śāstrasthiter apasiddhānto 'pi dīptājñaḥ pārthiva iva nigṛhṇāti /
GSP28durdhpru:7830: atha kim asya sambhavo 'sti yo nirdiṣṭe hi sādhye sādhane vā 'bhihite nirdaśite codāharaṇe kṛte 'py upanaye nigamite ca sarvāvayavavyāpāre sādhyaṃ na budhyata iti?
GSP28durdhpru:7831: nanu asyāpi pratipattuḥ kim asti sambhavo yatra dharmiṇi sādhanaṃ bodhitaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:7832: tasya sādhyāvinābhāvitāṃ smarito 'pi yas tatra sādhyaṃ nāvabudhyata iti?
GSP28durdhpru:7834: sarvaṃ samānam idam anyatrābhiniveśād ity alaṃ vistareṇa /
GSP28durdhpru:7837: nopalabhyate ca[362] ityādinā sādhyadharmiṇi tattvaṃ liṅgasya darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:7838: yadi ca sādhyadharamas tatra sādhyadharmiṇi na bhavet sādhanadharmo 'pi na bhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:7843: tathā vaidharmyavatprayoge api --- yaḥ sadvyavahāraviṣaya upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:7845: na[363]tathā atra tādṛśo ghaṭa upalabhyata ity ukte sāmarthyād eva neha sadvyavahāraviṣaya iti bhavati III-36
GSP28durdhpru:7849: yathā sādharmyavatprayoge tathā vaidharmyavatprayoge 'pi sāmarthyād eva neha savyavahāraviṣayo[364] 'sti ghaṭa iti bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:7853: sāmarthyaṃ darśayitum āha--- yaḥ sadvyavahāraviṣaya iti vidyamānaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7854: upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpta iti dṛśyaḥ ity eṣā sādhyanivṛttiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7856: anena ca[366] sādhyanivṛttiḥ sādhananivṛttyā vyāptā darśitā /
GSP28durdhpru:7857: na tatheti --- yathā 'nyo dṛśya upalabhyate na tathātra pradeśe tādṛśa iti dṛśyo ghaṭa upalabhyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:7858: anena sādhyanivṛtter vyāpikā nivṛttir asatī sādhyadharmiṇi darśitā /
GSP28durdhpru:7859: yadi ca[367] sādhyadharmaḥ sādhyadharmiṇi na syāt sādhanadharmo 'pi na bhavet[368] /
GSP28durdhpru:7867: nyāyabhāṣyaṭīkāvārtikayor viśvarūpodyotakrarāv āhatuḥ “purā viṣayanirūpaṇapūrvakam eva hi karaṇavyāparaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP28durdhpru:7873: yato yadi hetuṃ prayuñjānena viṣayaḥ sisādhayiṣito 'rtho nirūpayitavyo buddhau niveśanīya ity abhimatam,
GSP28durdhpru:7875: na hi kaścit sādhyam aniścityaiva parapratipattaye sādhanavākyam abhidhatte /
GSP28durdhpru:7876: atha vacanena karaṇasya hetoḥ sa viṣayo darśayitavya iti matiḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:7878: yadi parasya pratītir anyathā na syāt sarvaṃ śobhetety uttaram iti kiṃ kṣuṇṇakṣodīkaraṇena?
GSP28durdhpru:7882: adhyayanaḥ punā ruciṭīkāyām idam avocat “dharmaviśiṣṭasya dharmiṇo nirdeśaḥ kriyate śrotur āśvāsanārtham /
GSP28durdhpru:7883: na tv ādau dharmaviśiṣṭasya dharmiṇo nirdeśo yuktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7888: tato 'vinābhāvaṃ smarati tadanantaraṃ tad evedam iti parāmṛśati /
GSP28durdhpru:7892: na ca svārthe dharmaviśiṣṭasya dharmiṇo darśanam asti /
GSP28durdhpru:7898: ataḥ sāmarthyāt nāsty atra ghaṭa iti pratīter na pakṣānirdeśaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7899: evaṃ kāryasvabhāvahetvor api sāmarthyāt saṃprayaya iti na [371]pakṣanirdeśaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:7908: kīdṛśaḥ punar arthaḥ pakṣa iti --- anena śabdena niddeśo vaktavyaḥ?ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:7909: svarūpeṇaiva svayam iṣṭo[373]'nirākṛtaḥ pakṣa iti[374] III-38
GSP28durdhpru:7916: iṣṭa iti --- nokta evāpi tv iṣṭo 'pīty arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7924: na sādhanavākyāvayavatvād asya lakṣaṇam uktam api tv asādhyaṃ [377]kecit sādhyam,
GSP28durdhpru:7938: svarūpeṇaiva iti sādhyatvena eva iṣṭo[379]na sādhanatvena api III-40
GSP28durdhpru:7943: nanu caivaśabdaḥ kevala eva pratyavamarṣṭavyas tat[380] kimarthaṃ svarūpaśabdena
GSP28durdhpru:7949: kathaṃ cāsau sandgidhārthābhidhāyinaḥ pratijñāvacanād āsthām utpādayatīti samīcīnaṃ nirūpitam /
GSP28durdhpru:7950: āsthā khalu idam eva manye 'rthety abhisampratayayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7952: jātau vā sādhanādyabhidhānaṃ na kathaṃ vaiyartham aśnuvītety alaṃ bahunā //
GSP28durdhpru:7953: atra sāmarthyāt svayaṃśabdasya vādineti vivṛtiḥ kṛtā na tu svayamśabdasya vādinety arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7958: padāntarābhihitasyārthasya viśeṣaṃ dyotayati iti padāntareṇa viśeṣyavācinā saha nirdiṣṭaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:7968: yathā śabdasya anityatve sādhye cākṣuṣatvaṃ hetuḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:7970: na punas tad iha sādhyatvena eva iṣṭam[383],
GSP28durdhpru:7976: [385]yatheti / śabdasya anityatve sādhye cākṣuṣatvaṃ hetuḥ śabde asiddhatvāt sādhyam --- ity anena sādhyatveneṣṭam āha /
GSP28durdhpru:7986: svayam ity anena svayaṃśabdaṃ vyākhyeyam upakṣitya tasyārtham āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:7988: vādineti / svayaṃśabdo nipāta ātmana iti [386]ṣaṣṭhyantasyātmaneti ca tṛtīyāntasyātha[387] varttate /
GSP28durdhpru:7992: tato yasya vādina ātmā tṛtīyārthayuktaḥ[389] sa eva[390] tṛtīyārthayukto nirdiṣṭo vādineti /
GSP28durdhpru:7995: [386] nāśaṃ svayam icchatītyādau ātmano nāśam icchatīty arthaḥ --- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:8005: yat sādhanatveneṣṭaṃ tat kathaṃ sādhyatvenāpīṣṭaṃ bhavatīty āha --- asiddha[tvā]d iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8007: sādhyatveneṣṭo 'pi yadā sādhanatvenoktas tadā 'pakṣa ity evam artha evaśabda iti samudāyārthaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:8011: yas tadā --- iti vādakāle sādhanam āha /
GSP28durdhpru:8016: yady evaṃ[393] vādinā iṣṭaḥ sādhyaḥ --- ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:8018: anena[394] tadā vādakāle tena vādinā svayaṃ yo dharmaḥ sādhayitum iṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyo[395] netaro [396]dharma ity uktaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:8019: vādino 'niṣṭadharmasādhyatvanivarttanam asya vacanasya phalam iti yāvat //
GSP28durdhpru:8026: atha kasmin saty anyadharmasādhyatvasya sambhavo yannivṛttyarhaṃ [397]tad vaktavyam ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:8030: etena yady api kvacic śāstre sthitaḥ sādhanam āha,
GSP28durdhpru:8031: tacchāstrakāreṇa tasmin dharmiṇy anekadharmābhyupagame 'pi yas tadā tena vādinā[398]dharmaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitum
GSP28durdhpru:8036: iha pakṣalakṣaṇe svayaṃśabdo gṛhīta iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8038: ātmanā iṣṭa ity atra tṛtīyāyāḥ karttari vidhānāt //
GSP28durdhpru:8042: viśeṣaṇaṃ vyavacchedakam etad yastadāsādhanam ahet vacanam /
GSP28durdhpru:8046: ucyatām evaṃ ko doṣa ity āha --- eteneti /
GSP28durdhpru:8049: tat ko 'tiśayo 'nena pratipāditia iti cedayitur āśayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8051: anena yas tadā sādhanam āheti viśeṣaṇāvacchinnena svayaṃśabdena /
GSP28durdhpru:8054: tacchāstrakāreṇa tatra yāvad iṣṭaṃ tāvaccettasyasādhyatveneṣṭaṃ tadṣṭam ity eva kṛtaṃ syāt,
GSP28durdhpru:8059: iṣṭaḥ, sa eva sādhyo na itara ity uktaṃ bhavati III-44
GSP28durdhpru:8061: yacchāstraṃ tena vādinā 'bhyuagataṃ tacchāstrakāreṇa tasmin sādhyadharmiṇi anekasya [399]dharmasyābhyupagame sati anyadharamasādhyatvasambhavaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8062: tathā hi --- śāstraṃ yenābhyupagataṃ [400]tatsiddho dharamaḥ sarva eva tena sādhyaty ity asti vipratipattiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8064: anekadharmābhuypagame 'pi sati sa eva sādhye yo vādina iṣṭo nānya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8070: ato 'napekṣaṇīyatvān na śāstre sthitvā vādaḥ karttavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8072: āhopuruṣikayā tu yady api kvacicchāṣtre sthita iti kiñcicchāstram abhyupagataḥ sādhanam āha,
GSP28durdhpru:8073: tathāpi ya eva tasyeṣṭaḥ sa eva[402] sādhya[403] iti jñāpanāyedam uktam //
GSP28durdhpru:8080: iṣṭa iti yatrārthe vivādena sādhanam upanyastaṃ tasya siddhim icchatā so [404]anukto api vacanena sādhyaḥ III-45
GSP28durdhpru:8084: yatrārtha ātmani viruddho vādaḥprakrāntaḥ --- `nāsti ātmā' --- ity ātmapratiṣedhavāda ātmasattāvādaviruddhaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:8086: tena vivādena hetunā sādhanam upanyastaṃ tasyātāmārthasya siddhiṃ niścayam icchatā vādinā so 'rthaḥ sādhya ity uktaṃ bhavati iṣṭaśabdena /
GSP28durdhpru:8087: yat tad `ity uktaṃ bhavati' iti grahaṇam ante tad ihāpekṣya vākyaṃ [405]samāpayitavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8091: yady api parārthānumāna ukta eva sādhyo uktaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:8097: ity asti vipratipattir nyāyaviruddhā pratipattiḥ keṣāñcit /
GSP28durdhpru:8100: anekadharmābhyupagame 'pi śāstrakārasya tatra dharmiṇy anekadharmopagame saty api /
GSP28durdhpru:8101: vādina ity ātmana iti ṣaṣṭhyantasyārthe vṛttaṃ svayaṃśabdam u[pā]dāya /
GSP28durdhpru:8103: viruddhaḥ parasya cābhipretaviparītārthopasyāpako vādaḥ svaparapakṣayoḥ siddhyasiddhyarthaṃ vacanam /
GSP28durdhpru:8105: ity uktaṃ bhavatīti nātra śrūyate tat katham evaṃ vyākhyāyata ity āha --- yat tad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8112: [407]tad iti so 'rtho 'dhikaraṇam āśrayo yasya sa tad adhikaraṇo vivādaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8117: etad ukataṃ bhavati --- yasmād vivādaṃ nirākarttum icchatā vādinā sādhanam upanyastaṃ tasmād yadadhikaraṇaṃ vivādasya tad eva sādhyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8118: yato viruddhaṃ vādam apanetuṃ sādhanam upanyastaṃ tac cet na sādhyaṃ kim idānīṃ [408]jātiniyataṃ kiṃcit sādhyaṃ syād iti //
GSP28durdhpru:8128: yathā parārthāś cakṣurādayaḥ saṃghātatvāc chayanāsanādyaṅgavad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8130: [411]tena noktamātram eva sādhyam ity uktaṃ bhavati III-47
GSP28durdhpru:8137: cakṣurādir yeṣāṃ śrotrādīnāṃ te[412] cakṣurādaya iti dharmī /
GSP28durdhpru:8141: śayanam āsanaṃ ca te ādī[414] yasya tacchayanādi puruṣopabhogāṅga saṃghātarūpam /
GSP28durdhpru:8142: tadvad atra [415]pramāṇe yad apy ātmārthāś cakṣurādaya ity ātmārthatā noktā [416]anuktāv apy ātmārthatā sādhyā /
GSP28durdhpru:8154: kuta ity āha --- sāmarthyoktatvāt tasya buddhisthasyātmādeḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8155: etad uktaṃ bhavati --- parārthānumāne ukto 'rthaḥ sādhyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8157: prakāśyamānatā ca sākṣād abhidhāvyāpāraviṣayatayā ca sāmarthyamyatayā ca /
GSP28durdhpru:8160: kuta etad iti sāmarthyoktatvam iti hetor āha vārttakakāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8164: tataḥ sāṅkhyena svavādaviruddhaṃ bauddhavāda hetūkṛtya virūddhavādanirākraṇāya svavādapratiṣṭhāpanāya ca sādhanam upanyastam /
GSP28durdhpru:8167: [419] śayanāsanādiṣu hi puruṣopabhogāṅgeṣv ātmārthatvenānvayo[420] na prasiddhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8178: cakṣurādaya ityādigrahaṇādivijñānam api[422] parārthaṃ sādhayitum iṣṭam /
GSP28durdhpru:8181: [422] bauddhānāṃ mate paramāṇurūpaṃ jñāṇamataḥ sāṅghātarūpatvam --- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:8183: [423]parasyārthakāri vijñānaṃ setsyatīti sāmarthyād ātmārthatvaṃ sidhyate cakṣurādīnām iti matvā parāthagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
GSP28durdhpru:8185: api tu prativādino vivādāspadatvād vādinaḥ[425] sādhayitum iṣṭam --- uktam,
GSP28durdhpru:8186: anuktaṃ vā prakaraṇagamyaṃ sādhyam ity uktaṃ bhavati//
GSP28durdhpru:8192: yady api tanmūlo vivādas tathāpi abhidhāvyāpāraviśrāmabhūmir evārthaḥ ṣadhyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8194: tathābhūtas tat kathaṃ sādhya ity āśaṅkyāha --- etad uktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:8195: yad ātmādi adhirakaṇam āspadaṃ vivādasya --- astīdaṃ nāstīdam ity ātmakasya prarasparaviruddhasya vādasya /
GSP28durdhpru:8198_0: tad viruddhavādāpanetṛhetūpanyāsaviṣayaṃ ced yadi na sādhyaṃ na jijñāpayiṣitam idānīm
GSP28durdhpru:8198_1: etasminn abhyupagame kiṃ jātiniyataṃ sādhyatvajātiniyataṃ jātivaśaṃ kiñcid vastu
GSP28durdhpru:8199: kṣepe kimaḥprayogān na kiñcid ity artho 'vatiṣṭhate //
GSP28durdhpru:8203: tena krameṇa yugapad vā saṃhataṃ tad iti saṃhatarūpaṃ vijñānam api krameṇānekarūpam atas tatrāpi saṃhā(ghā)
GSP28durdhpru:8204: tatvaṃ siddhim iti tad apy ādiśabdena saṅgṛhītaṃ dharmi karttavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8205: ata evānantaram `atrādiśabdād vijñānam api' iti vakṣyate /
GSP28durdhpru:8215: yady ayṃ tasyābhiprāyas tadā ''tmārthā ity eva kiṃ na bravītīty āśaṅkya yenābhiprāyeṇaivam avādīttaṃ darśayitum āha --- śayaneti /
GSP28durdhpru:8218: anirākṛta iti --- etallakṣaṇayoge api yaḥ sādhayitum iṣṭo apy arthaḥ pratyakṣānumānapratītisvavacanair nirākriyate,
GSP28durdhpru:8224: etad iti anantaraprakāntaṃ ya pakṣaṇam utkaṃ sādhyateneṣṭetyādi[427] --- etallakṣaṇena yoge 'pi apy artho na pakṣa iti pradarśanārtham [428]pratipādanāya anirākṛtagraṇaṃ kṛtam /
GSP28durdhpru:8229_0: kīdṛśo 'rtho na pakṣaḥ sādhaytum iṣṭo 'pīty āha --- yaḥ sādhayitum iṣṭo 'rtho ---
GSP28durdhpru:8229_1: pratyakṣaṃ cānumānaṃ ca pratītiś ca svavacanaṃ ca --- [429]etair nirākriyate ---
GSP28durdhpru:8236: tatreti / teṣu caturṣu pratakṣādinirārkṛteṣu[431] prakṣanirrākṛtaḥ kīdṛśaḥ? yatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:8237: yathā 'yaṃ pratyakṣanirākṛtas tathā'ye 'pi draṭavyā iti yathāśabdārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8249: tat katham ātmārthatāsiddhir ity āha cakṣurādaya ity atreti /
GSP28durdhpru:8250: tathāpi kutas tatsiddhir ity āha vijñānāc ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:8252: atha vijñānsyāpi dharmitve katham ātmārthatāsiddhir ity āśaṅkya spaṣṭayitum āha --- parasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:8254: ātmārthatvaṃ siddhyāt cakṣarādīnām ity evaṃ matvā parārthagrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ sāṃkhyeneti prastāvāt,
GSP28durdhpru:8257: tat siddhaikaṃ sāmarthyam ity āśaṅkya parasyeti yojyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8260: ādiśabdād vijñāsyāpi tathātve sādhye vijñānaṃ parārthakāri setsyatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:8265: tac ca dvavidham iti darśayann āha --- uktam ityādi /
GSP28durdhpru:8268: kathaṃ tarhi tatsādhyam ity āha --- prakaraṇeti /
GSP28durdhpru:8269: prakaraṇena sādhyopanyāsāśrayatayā prakṛtatvena gamyaṃ prakāśyaṃ sādhyaṃ sādhyam evety uktaṃ bhavati //
GSP28durdhpru:8271: anumānanirākṛto yathā --- nityaḥ śabda iti III-50
GSP28durdhpru:8278: pratītinirākṛto yathā --- acandraḥ śaśī iti III-51
GSP28durdhpru:8279: pratītyā nirākṛtaḥ acandra iti candraśabdavācyo na bhavati śaśīti pratijñātārthaḥ[435] /
GSP28durdhpru:8286: etallakṣaṇayoge 'pīty asyārthakathanam idam etallakṣaṇena yoge 'py artha iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8287: nanu ca pratyakṣādibhir nirākriyate 'pasāryate iti kila matam /
GSP28durdhpru:8289: pasāraṇaṃ pratyakṣādidharmo 'pi tu vastuvyavasthāpanam ity āha --- viparīta iti //
GSP28durdhpru:8290: śrūyate 'neneti śravaṇaṃ śrotrendrayaṃ tena grāhyaḥ upalabdhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8294_0: ayam asyāśayaḥ --- aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ --- śrotraje [65b] na jñānena nānubhūyata iti
GSP28durdhpru:8294_1: yaḥ pratijānīte tasya sā pratijñā śravaṇendriyajena pratyakṣeṇa śabdālambanena bādhyate
GSP28durdhpru:8296: yad uddyotakareṇoktam[436]--- `aśrāvaṇaḥ śabda iti pratyakṣaviruddhodāharaṇa varṇayati /
GSP28durdhpru:8308_0: na hy aśrāvaṇaśabdena śabdākhye viṣaye jñānotpattau śrotrendriyasya vṛtter abhāvo
GSP28durdhpru:8308_1: 'bhimato yasya vādinas tam prati śabdaviṣayaśravaṇendriyavṛtteḥ pratyakṣaviruddhatvāt
GSP28durdhpru:8309: yenocyate 'tīndriyendriyavavṛttiḥ kathaṃ pratyakṣā yenedam udāharaṇaṃ saṃgaccheteti /
GSP28durdhpru:8310: kin tarhi? yaḥ kaścid vyāmohamāhātmyād yad etac chrotragrāhyaṃ rūpam advayaṃ tan nāstīti pratījānīte taṃ vādiviśeṣaṃ pratīti kathaṃ na pratyakṣaviruddhodāharaṇam idam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8315: tatrāsati śrāvaṇaśabde sarvasyaiva niṣedhe pratyakṣabādhā śaṅkyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:8316: śrāvaṇaśabdena tu śrutimātragrāhyam eva yadrūpaṃ tanniṣedhe pratyakṣabādhā na tu sāmānyadharmaniṣedha iti khyāpyata iti //
GSP28durdhpru:8319: tena vikalpajñānena[437] pratītirūpeṇa śaśanaś canadraśabdavācyatvaṃ siddham eva /
GSP28durdhpru:8320: tathā hi --- yad vikalpavijñānagrāhyaṃ[438] tac chabdākārasaṃsargayogyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8321: yac chaśadākārasaṃsargayogyaṃ tat sāṅketikena śabdena vaktuṃ śakyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8322: ataḥ praītirūpeṇa vikalpavijñānaviṣayatvena siddhaṃ candraśabdavācyatvam acandratvasya bādhakam /
GSP28durdhpru:8325: tataḥ svabhāvahetusiddhaṃ candraśabdavācyatvam vācyatvasya bādhakaṃ draṭavyam //
GSP28durdhpru:8336: sākṣāt kṛtasyāpy ajātādhyavasāyasya tathāvyavahārābhāvād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8337: viṣayiṇā viṣayagato dharma ukta iti sphuṭayate pratītiḥ pratītatvarūpeṇa patītatvam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8341: tacchabdavācyatā tu katham ity āha --- yad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8344: kiṃ sādhanasiddhim idaṃ candraśabdavācyatvam ity āha --- svabhāveti /
GSP28durdhpru:8347: evaṃ tu prayogo draṣṭavyaḥ --- yo 'rtho vikalpavijñānaviṣayaḥ sa sāṅketikena śabdena vaktuṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8350: iha kenacic chabdena kasyacid abhidhātum aśakyatvaṃ vāstave pratiniyatārthaśabdasambandhe sati syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:8352: pāriśeṣyāj jñānātmany ārūḍhasyārthasya śabdasambandhaḥ karttuṃ kasya śakyo yas tena śabdākāreṇa saha naikasmin jñānena saṃsṛjuyate /
GSP28durdhpru:8353: aniyatārthaṃ ca vijñānam iti tadārūḍho 'rthas tadabhidhānākārasaṃsargayogya eva /
GSP28durdhpru:8354: tasmāt tena śabdenābhidhātum aśakyatvam atadākārasaṃsargayogatvena vyāptam /
GSP28durdhpru:8357: tad evaṃ vikalpavijñānaviṣayatvaṃ tadvyāpakavirūddhavyāptatvāt tenāpi viruddhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:8358: tataś ca tadviruddhena śakyatvena vyāpta iti svabhāvahetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8359: tasmād vikalpavijñānaviṣayatvam eva pratītiḥ prasiddhir vyavahāraś cocyate /
GSP28durdhpru:8360: anayā patītyā yat sādhitaṃ śaśinaś candraśabdavācyatvaṃ tat svaviruddhasya tadanabhidheyatvasya bādhakaṃ bahvati /
GSP28durdhpru:8361: tena pratīter vikalpavijñānalakṣaṇāyā jāto dharma iṣṭaśabdābhidheyatvalakṣaṇas tenānabhidheyatvasya bādhanāt pratītibādhocyata iti paramārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8362: yad vā pratītes tathārūpāyā jāta eveṣṭaśabdābhidheyatvalakṣaṇo dharmaḥ pratītiśabdenoktaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:8367: yathā nānumānaṃ pramāṇam --- ity atra[439] anumānsya prāmāṇyaniṣedhaḥ pratijñārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8368: sa[440] nānumānaṃ pramāṇam --- ity anena svavācakena vākyena bādhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:8369: vākyaṃ hi etat prayujyamānaṃ vaktuḥ [441]śābdapratyayasya sadarthatvam iṣṭaṃ sūcayate /
GSP28durdhpru:8370: tathā hi --- madvākyād yo 'rthasampratyayas tavotpadyate so 'satyārtha iti darśayan vākyam eva noccārayed vaktā,
GSP28durdhpru:8371: vacanārthaś ced astyaḥ pareṇa jñātvyo vacanam apārthakam /
GSP28durdhpru:8372: yo 'pi hi sarvaṃ mithyā bravīmīti[442] vakti so 'py asya vākyasya satyārthatvam ādarśayann eva vākyam uccārayati /
GSP28durdhpru:8374: evaṃ vākyāntarāṇy ātmīyāny asatyārthāni darśitāni bhavanti /
GSP28durdhpru:8377: tataś ca na kiñcid uccāraṇasya phalam iti noccārayet /
GSP28durdhpru:8378: tasmād vākyaprabhavaṃ vākyārthālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ satyārthaṃ darśayann eva vaktā [444]vākyam uccārayati /
GSP28durdhpru:8379: tathā[445] ca sati bāhyavastunāntarīyakaṃ śabdaṃ darśayatā śabdajaṃ vijñānaṃ satyārthaṃ darśayitavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8380: tato bāhyārthakāryāc chabdād utpannaṃ vijñānaṃ satyārtham ādrśayatā [446]kāryaliṅgajam anumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ śābdaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:8386: [443] `etad eva' ityādi `bhavanti' ity antaṃ sūtratvena mudritam /
GSP28durdhpru:8387: kin tu nāsty etat sūtram --- saṃ-
GSP28durdhpru:8392: pratītimātrād eva sidho yo 'rthaḥ sa iha bādhaka iti darśayitum /
GSP28durdhpru:8397: svaśabdenātmavacanena prakṛtatvāt sādhyasyātmā gṛhyata iti abhiprāyeṇāha --- pratijñārthasyātmīya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8398: tena nirākṛta iti tadupasthāpi tenānumānaprāṇāṇyena nirākṛta iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8399: kathaṃ nirākriyata ity āha --- vākyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8400: yasmād etad vākyaṃ prayujyamānaṃ sad vaktuḥ śābdapratyayasya śabdaprabhavasya jñānasya sadarthatvaṃ satyārthvam iṣṭaṃ sūcayati prakāśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:8401: pratyuktam api kathaṃ tathākarotīy āha --- tathā hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:8404: vacanetyādinā tv etad eva vyanakti --- na sarvaṃ vacanaṃ prayujyamānaṃ tathākāri yathā sarvaṃ mithyā bravīmīti vacanam ity āha --- yo 'pīti /
GSP28durdhpru:8408: tathāpi katham anumānapramāṇyaṃ vacanenopasthāpyate yenānumānaprāmāṇyapratiṣedhas tadvacanopasthāpitānumānapramāṇyena
GSP28durdhpru:8410: tasmāt `nānumānaṃ pramāṇam' --- iti bruvatā śābdasya pratyayasyāsann artho[447] grāhya utkaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8411: asadarthatvam eva hy aprāmāṇyam ucyate, nānyat /
GSP28durdhpru:8418: [449] `nānumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ' ity asmāc chabādyo 'tho budhyate tena janito `nānumāna' ityādikaḥ śabdaḥ na pratyeṣyati nāsitko vyabhicārāt --- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:8422: tad evaṃ svavacanānumitena sattvenāsattvaṃ[452] bādhyamānaṃ svavacanena bādhitam uktam ity ayam atrārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8426: anye tv āhuḥ --- abhiprāyakāryāc chabdāj jātaṃ jñānam abhiprāyālambanam /
GSP28durdhpru:8429: nirākriyamāṇaḥ svavacananirākṛto bhavatītyāśaṅkyāha --- tathā ca satīti --- śābdajñānasya satyārthatvapratipādanābhiprāyeṇa vākyoccāraṇaprakāre sati /
GSP28durdhpru:8430: bāhyavastunānatarīyakaṃ tadavinābhāvinaṃ darśayatā satyārthaṃ darśayitavyaṃ darśayituṃ yujyate śakyata ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8432: bāhyārthakāryād iti sati bhede tadutpattyaiva nāntarīkatvasambhavād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8433: śābdam iti prakṛtatvāj jñānaṃ kāryaliṅgajaṃ śabdarūpakāryaliṅgajam iti hetubhāvena viśeṣaṇam anumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ darśitaṃ prakāśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:8435: nanv anumānasyā'san grāhya iti yujyate vaktum /
GSP28durdhpru:8436: tat kiṃ śābdasya pratyayasyety uktam iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:8441: yady evam aprāmāṇyam uktam tac ca bādhya[66b]ta iti vaktuṃ yujyate /
GSP28durdhpru:8442: tat kim evam uktam ity āha --- asadarthatvam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8444: āstām asan grāhyo 'bhitaḥ kim ata ity āha --- śabdeti /
GSP28durdhpru:8446: śabdo 'py atas tathā darśitas tathāpi kim āyātam ity āha --- tathā ceti śabdasya bāhyārthāvinābhāvipradarśanaprakāre sati sann artho 'dhyavaseyo darśitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8448: tasya sadarthatvaṇ pradarśyatāṃ bādhā tu katham ity āha --- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8449_1: sattvaṃ karttṛ pratijñāyamānam asadartham aprāmāṇyalakṣaṇaṃ karmabhūtaṃ patibadhnāti /
GSP28durdhpru:8450: nirākarotīti vaktvye pratibadhnātīti bruvāṇaḥ paramārthato 'syāvāstavatvān na bādhā kin tv etadupasthāpitetarayoḥ parasparapratibandha iti sūcayati /
GSP28durdhpru:8461: kiñ ca / yathā --- anumānam anicchan[454] vahnyavyabhicāritvaṃ dhūmasya na pratyeti,
GSP28durdhpru:8472: `api ca' ity ārabhya `śabdaprayogaḥ' ity antaḥ pāṭho nāsti /
GSP28durdhpru:8477: iti catvāraḥ pakṣābhāsā nirākṛtā bhavanti III-53
GSP28durdhpru:8478: evaṃ[459] ca sati --- anirākṛtagrahaṇenāntaroktāś catvāraḥ pakṣavadābhāsanta iti pakṣābhāsā nirastā bhavanti //
GSP28durdhpru:8482: sampati pakṣalakṣaṇapadāni yeṣāṃ vyavacchedakāni teṣāṃ vyavachedena yādṛśaḥ [460]pakṣārtho labhyate taṃ darśayituṃ vyavacchedyān saṃkṣipya darśayati ---
GSP28durdhpru:8486_0: nanv anumānaprāmāṇyam asattvaṃ bādhate na tu svavacanaṃ tat kathaṃ svavacananirākṛtodāharaṇam
GSP28durdhpru:8486_1: idam uktam ity āśaṅkya svavacananirārkṛta ity atra yādṛśo 'rtho vivakṣitas taṃ darśayati tad evam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8489: svābhiprāyeṇaiva vyākhyāya anye tv ityādinā pūrvavyākhyānaṃ dūṣāyitum āha /
GSP28durdhpru:8491: na vāstavam iti bruvato yadīdaṃ vāstavam anumānaṃ syāt tadānumānanirākṛtodāharaṇānana pṛthag ucyateiti /
GSP28durdhpru:8496: tad avyabhicāritvābhyupagamaḥ pūrvo yasya tathā na bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:8497_0: pūrvaṃ bāhyavastupratyāyanāyety anena sāmarthyān na svābhiprāyapratyāyanāyety ukam
GSP28durdhpru:8497_1: api sphuṭaṃ darśayitum tan na śabdasyābhiprāyāvinābhāvitvābhyupagamapūrvakaḥ śabdapryoga
GSP28durdhpru:8497_2: ity anena sāmarthyād bāhyavastvavinābhāvitvābhyupagamapūrvaka iti darśitam api sākṣād
GSP28durdhpru:8497_3: darśayitum api ceti pūrvoktasya vaktavyāntara dyotakasya spaṣṭīkaraṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:8498: yatrāpy asattvapratipādanāya śadaḥ prayujyate tatrāpi vivakṣitasattvaviviktasyānyasattvasya pratipādanād bāhyasattvapratipādanāyety uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:8505: tena eva svarūpeṇābhimato vādina iṣṭo anirākṛtaḥ pakṣa iti pakṣalakṣaṇam anavadyaṃ[462]darśitaṃ bhavati III-54
GSP28durdhpru:8511: siddhasya vipariyeṇa viparītatvena hetunā sādhyo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8514: siddhaś ca viparīto 'siddhasya tasmād asiddhaḥ sādhyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8515: asiddho 'pi na sarvo 'pi tu sādhanatvenoktasyāsiddhasyāpi viparyayeṇa /
GSP28durdhpru:8516: svayaṃ vādinā sādhayitum aniṣṭasya asiddhasya viparyayeṇa /
GSP28durdhpru:8522: yaś cāyaṃ pañcabhir vyavacchedyai rahito 'rtha 'siddho[464] 'sādhanaṃ vādinaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitum iṣṭa ukto 'nukto vā pramāṇair anirākṛtaḥ sādhyaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:8523: sa evāsau svarūpeṇaiva svayam iṣṭo 'nirākṛta etaiḥ padair ukta ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8524: yaś cāyaṃ sādhyaḥ sa pakṣa [465]iti ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:8527: avidyamānam avadyaṃ doṣo yasya tad anavadyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8533: trirūpaliṅgākhyānaṃ parisamāpayya[466] prasaṅgāgataṃ ca pakṣalakṣaṇam abhidhāya hetvābhāsān vaktukāmas teṣāṃ prastāvaṃ racayati trirūpetyādinā---
GSP28durdhpru:8538: tatra trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇām ekasya api rūpasya anuktau sādhanābhāsaḥ III-55
GSP28durdhpru:8539: etad uktaṃ bhavati --- trirūpaliṅgaṃ[467] vaktukāmena sphuṭaṃ tad vaktavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8545: sarvathā na svābhiprāyasya sattvam asattvaṃ vā pratpādayituṃ śabdaprayogta ity ane[na] hetum /
GSP28durdhpru:8546: yata evaṃ tatas tasmāt pūrvakam eva yan mayā vyākhyātam anavadyam apagatadoṣam //
GSP28durdhpru:8547: iti catvāraḥ pakṣābhāsā nirākṛtā bhavantīti mūlaṃ vyācakṣāṇa āha --- evam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8549: pakṣa ity ucyate vyakatīkriyata iti vyutpattyeti bhāvaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:8555: heyajñāne[469] hi tadviviktam upādeyaṃ sujñātaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:8573: uktāv apy asiddhau sandehe vā pratipādyapratipādakayoḥ III-56
GSP28durdhpru:8574: na kevalam anuktvāv uktāv apy asiddhau sandene vā /
GSP28durdhpru:8577: atha [472]kasyaikasyārūpasyāsiddhau sandehe[473] vā kiṃ saṃjñako hetvābhāsa ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:8582: ekasya rūpasya dharmisambandhasya asiddhau sandehe[474]vā asiddho hetvābhāsāḥ III-57
GSP28durdhpru:8586: ity āśaṅky āha --- etad uktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:8587: trirūpaliṅgākhyānasya sphuṭābhidhānārthatvaṃ copalakṣaṇaṃ tena vipratipattinirākaraṇārthaṃ ceti draṣṭavyam,
GSP28durdhpru:8595: yasmād ekasya dvayor vā 'nuktau trīṇi paripūrṇaṃ pratipāditāni na bhavanti tasmāt trayāṇām nyūnatety arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8597: vidyamāne 'pi hi rūpatraye dvayor ekasya vā vaktrā 'nabhidhāne sati nyanatāyāḥ sambhavāt /
GSP28durdhpru:8598: tat kathaṃ vaktṛdoṣaḥ sādhanadoṣa ity ucyata iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:8599: satyam; kevalaṃ nātra sādhanaśabdena liṅgam abhipretam /
GSP28durdhpru:8600: kiṃ tarhi? tatpratipādakaṃ vākyaṃ tasya cāparipūrṇatā doṣo bhavaty eva /
GSP28durdhpru:8601: vaktṛdoṣas tu nimitta[m] paripūrṇatāyā iti kim avadyam?
GSP28durdhpru:8602: evam upalakṣaṇārthatvād asya yathā 'nyatam evāpi rūpeṇā hīnatvān nyūnatā sādhanadoṣas tathā hetūvacanād vādinā nigraho vivakṣita ity apīti //
GSP28durdhpru:8604: ācāryasyas tu pratipādyasya pratipādakasya ca pratipādyaprapādakayoś ceti vyastasamastanirdeśo 'bhipretaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8609: tasya asiddhau sandehe vā asiddhasasañjñako hetvābhāsaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8613: na saṃśayasya hetur api tv apratipattihetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8614: na kasycid ataḥ pratipattir iti kṛtvā /
GSP28durdhpru:8617: yathā, anityaḥ śabda iti sādhye cākṣuṣatvam ubhayāsiddham III-58
GSP28durdhpru:8619: [475]anityaḥ śabda ity anityatvaviśiṣṭe śabde sādhye cākṣuṣatvaṃ cakṣurgrāhyatvaṃ śabde [476]dvayor api vādiprativādinor asiddham //
GSP28durdhpru:8624: cetanās tarava iti sādhye sarvatvagapaharaṇe maraṇaṃ[477]prativādyasiddham,
GSP28durdhpru:8631: cetanās tarava iti tarūṇāṃ caitanye sādhye /
GSP28durdhpru:8633: tasya apaharaṇe sati maraṇaṃ digambarair upanyastaṃ pratibādino bauddhasyāsiddham /
GSP28durdhpru:8634: kasmād asiddha ity āha ---vijñānaṃ ca indriyaṃ cāyuś ceti dvadvaḥ[479] /
GSP28durdhpru:8646: ayaṃ hetvābhāsaḥ kīdṛśīṃ pratipattiṃ prasūta ity āha --- asiddhatvād eveti /
GSP28durdhpru:8648: katham etat prāpyata ity āha --- ayañ ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:8650: kasyāścid api pratipatter hetutayā na siddha iti asiddha ukta ity abhiprāyaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:8655: tasyāpi kārṣṇyasya prāsāde dharmiṇi ubhayor asiddhatvāt,
GSP28durdhpru:8657: nanu vyadhikaraṇam api liṅgaṃ gamakaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP28durdhpru:8660: deśa eva hi dharmī avidūrakulālasambandhitvaṃ sādhyam tasya ca dharmiṇaḥ pratygraśarāvasambandhitvaṃ bhrānimaccakrasambandhitvañ ca dharmo bhavaty eva /
GSP28durdhpru:8661: na tv atra kulālasya dharmiṇaḥ sadbhāvaḥ sādhyate,
GSP28durdhpru:8671: sa lakṣaṇaṃ tattvaṃ yasya tat tathoktam /
GSP28durdhpru:8677: yadi nāmaivaṃ tathāpi katham asiddham ity āha --- tasya ca vijñānādinirodhātmakasya [486]taruṣv asambhaāt /
GSP28durdhpru:8679: tataś ca yo vijñānanirodhaṃ taruṣv icchet sa kathaṃ vijñānaṃ necchet /
GSP28durdhpru:8687: kevalaṃ vijñānasattayā [487]vyāptaṃ yat maraṇaṃ tad iha hetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8690: tato[488] yan maraṇaṃ[489] hetus tat taruṣv asiddham /
GSP28durdhpru:8691: yat tu[490] siddhaṃ śoṣātmakaṃ tad ahetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8698: digambaras tu sādhyena [491]vyāptam avyāptaṃ[492] vā maraṇām avivicya maraṇamātraṃ hetum āha /
GSP28durdhpru:8699: tad asya vādino hetubhūtaṃ[493] maraṇaṃ na jñātam /
GSP28durdhpru:8703: yadā tu vādino 'pi jñātaṃ tadā vādino 'py asiddhaṃ syād iti nyāyaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:8711: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prameyatve sati anabhidheyatvād iti viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭasya rūpasya tatra dharmiṇi dvayor api vādiprativādinor asiddhatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:8712: kevalaṃ tatrāsiddho viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭatayopāttasya rūpasya tathā 'siddhes tathā tathā vyapadiśyata iti //
GSP28durdhpru:8714: diśa evāmvaraṃ yeṣām iti vyuptattyā digambarāḥ kṣapaṇakā ucyante /
GSP28durdhpru:8715: taiḥ kim pramāṇasamadhigatam indriyam ity āha --- rūpādīti /
GSP28durdhpru:8716: satsv anyeṣu kāraṇeṣv avyāpṛte cakṣurādau rūpādijñānam anutpadyamānaṃ svotpattau kāraṇā[67b]ntaram apekṣaṇīyaṃ sūcayati /
GSP28durdhpru:8717: praṇihite tu cakṣurādau jāyamānaṃ tatrasthaṃ tat kim api kāraṇam astīti khyāpayati /
GSP28durdhpru:8722: prasannārthāder api sadbhāvān na golakādir evendriyam iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8723: kim āyur ity āha --- āyur iti āyuḥśabdenety arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8724: loke vyavaharttari jane prāṇo 'ntaraḥ śarīre rasamaladhātūnāṃ preraṇādihetur ekaḥ san kriyābhedod(-bhedād)
GSP28durdhpru:8725: apānādisamjñāṃ labhata iti tat tad avasthāvivakṣayā praṇā iti bahuvacanam /
GSP28durdhpru:8726: nanv āgame jīvitendriyam āyur ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:8727: tat kim evaṃ vyākhyāyata ity āha --- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:8732: acetanāḥ sukhādaya iti sādhye utpattimatvaṃ anityatvaṃ[494]vā sāṃkhyasya svayaṃ vādino asiddham III-60
GSP28durdhpru:8736: acetanāḥ sukhādaya iti --- sukham ādir yeṣāṃ duḥkhādīnāṃ te sudhādayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8739: ya utpattimanto 'nityā vā te na cetanāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8741: tathā cotpattimanto 'nityā vā sukhādyas tasmād acetanāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8743: atra cotpattimattvam anityatvaṃ vā paryāyeṇa hetur na yugapat /
GSP28durdhpru:8744: tac ca dvayam api sāṃkhyasya vādino na siddham /
GSP28durdhpru:8746: tena yaḥ parasya siddhaḥ sa hetur vaktayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8751: yadi tv anityatvotpattimattvayoḥ [497]pramāṇyaṃ vādino [498]jñātaṃ syād [499]tadā vādino 'pi siddhaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:8761: tathā svayaṃ tadāśrayaṇasya vā sandehe asiddhaḥ III-61
GSP28durdhpru:8763: tadārayaṇasya [500]veti --- tasya hetor āśrayaṇam --- āśrīyate 'simin hetur ity āśrayaṇaṃ hetor vyatirikta āśrayabhūtaḥ[501] sādhyadharmī kathyate / tatra hi
GSP28durdhpru:8769: vijñānasattayā vyāptaṃ yad iti yasmin maraṇe 'vaśyaṃ prāgāsīd vijñānam,
GSP28durdhpru:8772: digambarasyāpi kathaṃ siddham ity āha --- ajñānād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8774: anenaitad āha --- yadi tena sādhyavyāptaṃ maraṇaṃ maraṇaśabdamātrasamatāṃ bibhrataḥ śoṣamātrād bhedena vivekitaṃ syāt kevalam ajñānāt tatsiddham ucyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8781: sāṃkhyasya saṃkhyayā pañcaviśatitattvānītyanyā vyavaharatīti sāṃkhyo yogarūḍhiś caiṣā,
GSP28durdhpru:8783: nanūtpattimattvaṃ kṛtakatvam vā svasiddham eva tenopanyasanīyam upanyastaṃ ca /
GSP28durdhpru:8784: tat kathaṃ vādyasiddhateti āha --- parārtho hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:8795: yathā bāṣpādibhāvena sandihyamāno bhūtasaṃghāto agnisiddhāv upadiśyamānaḥ[503]sandigdhāsiddhaḥ III-62
GSP28durdhpru:8799: yatheti / bāṣpa ādir yasya sa bāspādiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8800: tadbhāvena bāṣpāditvena sadihyāmāno bhūtasaṃghāta iti bhūtānāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ saṃghātaḥm samūhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8802: etad uktaṃ bhavati --- yadā dhūmo 'pi bāṣpāditvena saṃdigdho bhavati tadā 'siddhaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:8805: yadā tu saṃdigdhas tadā na gamaka ity asiddhatākhyo doṣaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:8810: yathā iha nikuñje[505]mayūraḥ kekāyitād iti III-63
GSP28durdhpru:8824: hetoś ca prakṛtatvād hetor iti vivṛṇoti /
GSP28durdhpru:8826: yasyātmanaḥ sandehaḥ sa ātmanā sandihyamāno bhavatīty abhiprāyeṇāha --- ātmanā sandihyamānam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8828: nanu yady asau paramārthato dhūmas tadā sandehe 'pi kiṃ na gamaka ity āha --- etad uktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP28durdhpru:8829: kiṃ tad gamakaṃ rūpaṃ yenāniścita ity āha --- vahnīti /
GSP28durdhpru:8831: tadā na gamaka iti bruvataś cāyam āśayo vihnijanyatvasyaiva gamakatvanibandhanasya tadā 'niścitatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:8832: etena sandigdhaviśeṣaṇāsiddhaḥ sandigdhaviśeṣyāsiddhaś cokto draṣṭavyaḥ [68a] yathā ṣaḍjādisattvasandehe mayūraśabdo 'yam ṣaḍjādimattve sati avarṇātmakatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:8841: tasya kekāyitasyāpāta [508]āgamanaṃ tasya deśaḥ sa ucyate yasmād deśād āgacchati kekāyitam /
GSP28durdhpru:8842: tasya vibhrame vyāmohe saty ayam āśrayaṇāsiddhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8843: nirantareṣṛ bahuṣu nikuñjeṣu satsu yadā kekāyitāpātanikuñje[509] vibhramaḥ --- kim asmān nikujñāt kekāyitamāgatam /
GSP28durdhpru:8855: yathā sarvagata ātmā iti sādhye sarvatropalambhamānaguṇatvam III-65
GSP28durdhpru:8856: yatheti / sarvasimin gataḥ sthitaḥ sarvagato vyāpīti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:8858: sarvatradeśa upalabhyamānāḥ sukhaduḥkhecchādveṣādayo guṇā yasyātmanas tasya bhāvas tattvam /
GSP28durdhpru:8862: tataś ca yadi vyāpī na bhavet kathaṃ dākṣiṇāpatha upalabdhāḥ sukhādayo madhyadeśa uplabhyeran /
GSP28durdhpru:8865: kim uta sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvaṃ sidhyet tasyety asiddhau[512] hetvābhāsaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8867: saṃprati tv asiddho dharmy ukta ity ananayor viśeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8873: ubhayatrāpi viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭasya rūpasya vādiprativādinor dvayor apy aniścitatvāt kevalaṃ viśeṣaṇasandehena ca viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭena rūpeṇāsiddha iti tathā vyapadiśyata iti //
GSP28durdhpru:8874: parvatoparibhāgena tiryagnirgateneti ca bhūbhāga iti copalakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8877: yasmād deśād āgacchatīti vacanavyaktyā cotpannaḥ śabdaś caturdikkaṃ śabdasantānaṃ janayati,
GSP28durdhpru:8878: sa ca jalataraṅganyāyena śrotradeśam āgato gṛhīta iti darśayati //
GSP28durdhpru:8880: “sāmānyavān guṇaḥ saṃyogavibhāgayor anapekṣo na kāraṇaṃ” iti guṇalakṣaṇayogād guṇāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8884: tad evam ekasya[513] rūpasya [514]dharmisambaddhasyāsiddhāv asiddho hetvābhāsaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:8886: [513] sarveṣv api asiddheṣu ekaṃ rūpaṃ pakṣadharmatvam asiddham --- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:8889: tathā ekasya rūpasya asapakṣe asattvasya asiddhāv anaikāntiko hetvābhāsaḥ III-66
GSP28durdhpru:8898: ayasmān na sādhyasya na viparyayasya niścayo 'pi tu tadviparītaḥ saṃśayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8906: kim uteti nipātaḥ kim punar ity asyārthe varttate //
GSP28durdhpru:8907: āśrayaṇāsiddhadharmyasiddhayoḥ kiyān bheda ity āśaṅkya bhedam upapādayann āha --- pūrvam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8908: ayam arthaḥ --- pūrvaṃ paramārthato vidyamāno 'pi hetvādhārarūpatayā sandehād aniścita iti tad dharmyasiddha uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8909: samprati tu sarvathtaivāsau dharmitvenāsiddha ucyata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8912: anyathāsiddhas tv asiddha eva na bhavatīti na tasyāntarbhāvaś cintyate /
GSP28durdhpru:8913: tathā hy anyathāsiddha iti ko arthaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:8914: kim anyathaiva siddha āhosvit anyathā 'pi siddhaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:8916: tadā jijñāpayiṣitaviparyayeṇaiva siddha upapanno nānena prakāreṇeti viruddha eva /
GSP28durdhpru:8918: tadaitasmād anyenāpi prakāreṇa siddho 'yam ity ayam api bhaviṣyati /
GSP28durdhpru:8919: na ca sādhyam iti sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttir anaikāntika eveti //
GSP28durdhpru:8922: sādhyalakṣaṇaikārthaviṣayatvād antaśca kathāvasānahetutvād ākāṅkṣopaśamahetutvād veti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:8923: samastaṃ padam arthañ cāha --- ekānto niścaya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8927: yasmād dhetor ity apādāne ceyaṃ pañcamī /
GSP28durdhpru:8928: kin tu tadviparīto niścayaviparītaḥ yattador nityam abhisambandhāt sa iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:8930: yad vā katham anaikāntiko bhavatīty āha --- yasmād iti hetupañcamī /
GSP28durdhpru:8931: aikāntikapratiṣedhenānyaḥ pratipattihetur ukto nañety abhiprāyeṇāha --- saṃśayahetur iti /
GSP28durdhpru:8933: atha vaikāntaniyatatvād eka ity anta iti ca niścayaḥ proktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8937: yathā śabdasya anityatvādike dharme sādhye prameyatvādiko dharmaḥ sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sarvatra ekadeśe vā vartamānaḥ III-67
GSP28durdhpru:8945: śabdasya dharmiṇo 'nityatvādike dharme sādhye prameyatvādiko dharmo 'naikāntikaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:8953: tathā hi --- anityaḥ śabdaḥ prameyatvāt [522]ghaṭavad ākāśavad iti prameyatvṃ sapakṣavipakṣavyāpi /
GSP28durdhpru:8959: vidyudākāśavad [523]ghaṭvac ca --- ity anityatvaṃ sapakṣaikadeśavṛtti --- vidyudādāv asti,
GSP28durdhpru:8967: anityatvāt prayatnānantarīyakaḥ śado ghaṭvad vidyudākāśavac ca --- ity anityatvaṃ vipakṣaikadeśavartti --- vidyudādāv asti nākāśādau /
GSP28durdhpru:8975: ity amūrtatvam ubhayaikadeśavṛtti --- ubhayor ekadeśa ākāśe karmaṇi ca vartate /
GSP28durdhpru:8976: paramāṇau tu sapakṣaikadeśe ghaṭādau ca vipakṣaikadeśe na vartate /
GSP28durdhpru:8991: [68b] “sad akāraṇavan nityam” [vai-sū-4.1.1.] iti nityalakṣaṇayogān nityā iṣṭāḥ paramāṇavaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:8995: tathā --- asya eva rūpasya sandehe apy anaikāntika eva III-68
GSP28durdhpru:8996: yathā cāsya rūpasyāsiddhāv anaikāntikas tathā asyaiva vipakṣe 'sattvākhyasya[531] rūpasya saṃdehe 'naikāntikaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:9000: yathā asarvajñaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimān veti sādhye vaktṛtvādiko dharmaḥ sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikaḥ III-69
GSP28durdhpru:9002: kaśiad vivakṣita iti vaktur abhiprataḥ puruṣo dharmī /
GSP28durdhpru:9003: rāgā ādir yasya dveṣādeḥ sa rāgādiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9004: sa yasyāsti sa rāgādimān iti dvitīyaṃ sādhyam /
GSP28durdhpru:9006: tato 'sarvajñatve rāgādimattve vā[533] sādhye prakṛte vakṭrtvaṃ --- vacanaśaktis tadādir yasyonmeṣanimeṣādeḥ sa vaktṛtvādiko dharmo 'naikāntikaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9011: sandigdhā[534] vipakṣā vyāvṛttir yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9013: tatra vacanādeḥ sattvam asattvaṃ vā sandigdham /
GSP28durdhpru:9014: ato na jñāyate kiṃ[535] vaktā sarvajña utāsarvajña ity anaikāntikaṃ vaktṛtvam /
GSP28durdhpru:9019: nanu ca sarvajño vaktā nolpalabhyate tat kathaṃ vacanaṃ sarvajñe sandigdham? ata eva
GSP28durdhpru:9020: [536]`sarvajño vaktā na upalabhyate' ity evaṃprakārasya anupalambhasya adṛśyātmaviṣayatvena[537]sandehahetutvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9021: [538] tato asarvajñaviparyayād vaktṛtvāder vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdhā III-70
GSP28durdhpru:9027: `sarvajño vaktā na upalabhyate' ity evaṃ prakārasya --- [539]evaṃjātīyasyānupalambhasya saṃdehahetutvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9028: kuta ity āha --- adṛśya[540] ātmā viṣayo yasya tasya bhāvo 'dṛśyātmaviṣayatvaṃ tena sandehahetutvam /
GSP28durdhpru:9035: amum evārthaṃ mūlena saṃsyandayann āha --- sarvajña iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9039: yato 'dṛśyaviśeṣayo 'nupalambhaḥ saṃdehahetur[541] na niścayahetus tato 'sarvajñavipakṣāt sarvajñād vaktṛtvāder vyāvṛttiḥ saṃdigdhā //
GSP28durdhpru:9044: api tu sarvajñatvena saha vaktṛtvasya virodhāt / etan na[543] /
GSP28durdhpru:9049: vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayor virodhābhāvāc ca yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sa vaktā na bhavatīty adarśane 'pi vyatireko na sidhyati, saṃdehāt 71
GSP28durdhpru:9051: virodhābhāvāc ca kāraṇād vyatireko na sidhyati --- iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9052: vyāptimantaṃ vyatirekaṃ darśyati --- yaḥ sarvajñaḥ iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9053: sādhyabhāvarūpaṃ sarvajñatvam anūdya [544] `sa vaktā na bhavati' iti sādhanasya vakṛtvasyābhāvo vidhīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:9054: tena sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyatatvāt [545]sādhanābhāvena vpyāta ukta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9055: vyāptimānīdṛśo vyatireko virodhe sati vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayoḥ sidhyet /
GSP28durdhpru:9074: kaḥ punar asau dvividho virodha ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:9081: avikalāni samagrāṇi kāraṇāni yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9082: yasya kāraṇavaikalyād abhāvo na tasya kenacid api virodhagatiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9084: nanu ca yasyāpi kāraṇasākalyaṃ tasyāpi nivṛttir aśakyā kenacid api karttum /
GSP28durdhpru:9086: evaṃ tarhi avikalakāraṇasyāpi yatkṛtāt kāraṇavaikalyād abhāvas tena virodhagatiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9095: tathā ca sati yo yasya viruddhaḥ sa tasya kiñcit kara eva /
GSP28durdhpru:9096: tathā hi --- śītasparśasya janako bhūtvā śitasparśāntarajananaśaktiṃ pratibadhnan śītasparśasya nivarttako viruddhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9097: tasmād dhetuvaikalyakārī viruddho janaka eka nivartty asya /
GSP28durdhpru:9099: tato viruddhayor ekasminn api kṣaṇe sahāvasthānaṃ pariharttavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:9100: dūrasthayor virodhābhāvāc ca nikaṭsthayor eva nivarttyanivarttakabhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9101: tasmād yo yasya nirvarttakaḥ sa taṃ yadi paraṃ tṛtīye kṣaṇe nivarttayati /
GSP28durdhpru:9105: tṛtīye tv asamarthe nivṛtte taddeśam ākrāmati /
GSP28durdhpru:9110_1: ālokakṣaṇaṃ janayati tadā ''lokasamīpavarttinam andhakāram asamarthaṃ janayati /
GSP28durdhpru:9112: [554]asamarthe nivṛtte [555]taddeśo jāyata āloka ity evaṃ krameṇā ''lokenāndhakāro 'paneyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9122: kim ataḥ siddham ity āha tathā ceti kāraṇavaikalyakāriṇo virodhāvagamaprakāre sati /
GSP28durdhpru:9124: yathā cāsya janakatvaṃ tathānantaram eva vyaktīkariṣyate /
GSP28durdhpru:9125: nanu kiṃ katipayakṣaṇasahitayoḥ paścān nivarttyanivarttakabhāvena virodho 'tha vānyathety āśaṅkyāha saheti /
GSP28durdhpru:9127: na kevalaṃ bahuṣu kṣaṇeṣv ity apiśabdaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9129: nikaṭāvasthānaṃ tu na pariharttavyam iti buddhistham /
GSP28durdhpru:9131: tayor ekasminn api kṣaṇe sahasthityabhāvāt katham evam aṅgīkriyate ? ata eva /
GSP28durdhpru:9132: na sahasthitayoḥ paścād virodha iti vā kṛtam anena /
GSP28durdhpru:9133_0: yady evaṃ kvacit pradeśe varttamāna ālokas trilokīvyavasthitāni tamāṃsy anenaiva
GSP28durdhpru:9133_1: krameṇāpanayed iti na kvacit tamāṃsy avatiṣṭherann ity āha --- nikaṭasthayor iti
GSP28durdhpru:9133_2: yayor nivarttyanivarttakabhāvo dṛṣṭas tayor nikaṭasthayor eva na tu nikaṭasthayor
GSP28durdhpru:9134: tayor eva kathaṃ tathābhāva ity āśaṅkāyāṃ dūrasthayor iti yojyam /
GSP28durdhpru:9136: yataḥ kiñcitkarasyaiva nivarttakatvaṃtasmād hetoḥ paraṃprakṛṣṭaṃ yathā bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:9137: etad evopapādayann āha --- prathama iti sanniyatan nikaṭībhavan nivarttaka iti prakaraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9138: asamarthā copādeyakṣaṇanirmāṇe aśaktāvasthā yasyāndhakārakṣaṇasya tasyādhānam utpādanam,
GSP28durdhpru:9144: yadā tv ālokas tatraivāndhakāradeśe janyate tadā yataḥ kṣaṇād andhakāradeśasyālokasya janakaḥ[556] kṣaṇaḥ utpadyate tata evāndhakāro 'ndhakārāntarajananāsamartha[557] utpannaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9152: ataś ca yasmin kṣaṇe janakas tatas tṛtīye kṣaṇe nivṛtto viruddho yadi śīghraṃ nivarttate /
GSP28durdhpru:9154: yady api ca na santāno nāma vastu tathāpi santānino vastubhūtāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9160: vandhyakṣaṇe nivṛtte svarasato niruddhe taddeśaṃ tasyāsamarthakṣaṇasya deśaṃ sthānam ākrāmati,
GSP28durdhpru:9162: iha kaścin nivarttaka āloko yām eva diśam ākrāmati taddigvarttinam eva svaviruddhaṃ gatikrameṇaiva nivarttayati /
GSP28durdhpru:9163: kaścit punar viruddhāvaṣṭabdha eva deśe samutpannamātra evānekadigvarttinaṃ viruddhaṃ jhaṭiti nivarttayati /

GSP28durdhpru:9524: aneneti virodhena niṣiddham ekatvaṃ yeṣām iti vigrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9525: virodhe parasparaparihārasthitātmalakṣaṇe sahaikatra lokapratītisiddhe deśe 'vasthānaṃ sthitiḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9527: yasmād anena virodhena naikatrāvasthānaṃ niṣiddhyate kin tv ekātmakatvam /
GSP28durdhpru:9529: tataḥ kāraṇād bhinnau nāmabhūtau vyāpārau yayos tau tathoktau /
GSP28durdhpru:9532: kin tu viṣayabhedād apīty āha bhinnaviṣayau ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:9533: na kevalaṃ bhinnavyāpārau bhinnaviṣayāv apīty apiśabdārthaś cakāraḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9534: bhinnaviṣayatvam eva darśayann āha sakala iti //
GSP28durdhpru:9536: tathāpy anayor anyatara eva virodho vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayor bhaviṣyatīty āha sa ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:9537: co yasmāt so 'yam anantarokto dvividho nāsti /
GSP28durdhpru:9540: sa cāyaṃ dvividho 'pi virodho vaktṛtvaṃ ca sarvajñatvaṃ ca tayor na sambhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:9541: na hy avikalkāraṇāsya sarvajñatvasya vaktṛtvabhāvād abhāvagatiḥ[593] /
GSP28durdhpru:9559: syād etat --- yadi nāsty eva virodho ghaṭapaṭayor iva syād api tayoḥ sahāv asthitadarśanam[596] /
GSP28durdhpru:9566: na ca[598]aviruddhavidher anupalabdhāv apy abhāvagatiḥ III-77
GSP28durdhpru:9570: tatrādyasya tāvad abhāvaṃ na hītyādinā darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:9572: kuto nābhāvagatir ity āha sarvajñatvaṃ hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:9574: adṛśyasyāpi kiṃ nābhāvagatir ity āha adṛṣṭasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:9577: anena vaktṛtvena virodhagatir nāsti tasya sarvajñatvasyety arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9578: dvitīyasya virodhasya [abhāvaṃ] pratipādayann āha na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:9582: kuto vaktṛtvaparihāreṇa sarvajñatvaṃ nāvasthitam ity āha teṣām api kāṣṭhādīnāṃ sarvajñatvasya prasaṅgāt prasakteḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9583: kutas teṣāṃ tathātvaprasaṅga ity āśaṅkya yojanīyaṃ kāṣṭhādaya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9586: vaktṛtvam eva sarvajñatvaparihāreṇa vyavasthitaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āha nāpīti /
GSP28durdhpru:9589: ihāpi kāṣṭhādayo hi sarvajñatvena parihṛtā iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:9590: syād etat vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayoḥ parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvāvirodhe 'pi kā kṣatir yena tanniṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9591: tathā hy anyonyaparihāreṇāvasthāne 'pi yad vaktṛtvaṃ tat sarvajñatvaṃ mā bhūt,
GSP28durdhpru:9594: tad anantaram evoktam dharmottareṇa saty api cāsmin virodhe sahāvasthānaṃ syād apīti /
GSP28durdhpru:9596: yeṣāṃ hi vaktṛtvasarvajñatvalakṣaṇau dharmiṇo bhinnāv eva dharmau teṣām idaṃ śobhate na tu tathāgatānāṃ dharmadharmiṇor vāstavam abhedam icchatām /
GSP28durdhpru:9599: na cāviruddhavidher iti anupalabdhāv apy nāyaṃ viruddhavidhiḥ yady api[599] sahāvasthānānupalambhas tathāpi na tayor virodhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9600: yasmān na sahānupalambhamātrād virodho 'pi tu dvayor upalabhyamānayor [600]nivartyanivartakabhāvāvasāyāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9601: tasmād anupalamdhāv api na vaktṛtvavidhe viruddhavidhiḥ[601] /
GSP28durdhpru:9609: yato yadi vacanādi rāgādīnāṃ kāryaṃ syād vacanāde rāgādigatiḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9616: rāgādīnāṃ vacanādeś ca kāryakāraṇabhāvāsiddheḥ kāraṇān na kāryam /
GSP28durdhpru:9618: mā bhūd rāgādikārya vacanaṃ sahacāri tu bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:9619: tato rāgādau sahacāriṇi nivṛtte nivarttate[603]vacanam ity āśaṅkyāha ---
GSP28durdhpru:9623: arthāntarasya[604]cākāraṇasya nivṛttau na vacanāder nivṛttiḥ III-79
GSP28durdhpru:9627: arthāntarasya [605]cākāraṇasya nivṛttau sahacāritvadarśanamāteṇa nānyasya vacanāder nivṛttiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9636: syāt tadā vaktṛtvasya vaktur abhedāt sarvajñatvasya ca sarvajñād,
GSP28durdhpru:9638: sarvajña eva vā vakteti yuktam anayoḥ parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatābhāvapratipādanam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9639: yadi nāsty eva virodhaḥ sahānavasthāṇalakṣaṇa iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:9643: tat kim evam ucyata ity āśaṅkyāha yady apīti /
GSP28durdhpru:9645: ato hetor asmād vaktṛtvād anyasya sarvajñatvasya nābhāvapatipattiḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:9646: yathā vaktṛtvād asarvajñatvagatir nāsti tathā vaktṛtvād rāgādimattvasyāpi gatir nāstīti jijñāpayiṣur āha tatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:9649: yathā sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikasādhanadoṣas tathā prāg evābhihitam iti na punar ucyate //
GSP28durdhpru:9658: tasmād asarvajñarāgādimattvaviparyayāt vipakṣāt sarvajñatvād arāgādimattvāc ca sandigdho
GSP28durdhpru:9661: evam ekaikarūpādisiddhasandehe hetudoṣān ākhyāya dvayor dvayo rūpayor asiddhisandehe hetudoṣān vaktumāma[609] āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:9666: dvayor[610] iti / dvayo rūpayor viparyayasiddhau sattyāṃ viruddhaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:9680: yathā kṛtakatvaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ ca nityatve sādhye viruddho hetvābhāsaḥ III-83
GSP28durdhpru:9682: asapakṣe ca asattvasya viparyayasiddhāv iti[612] sambandhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9685: prayatnānantarīyakaśabdena[614] hi prayatnānantaraṃ janma jñānaṃ ca prayatnānantarīyakam ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:9697: sarvān aikānitikaprārān uktvā viruddhatvākhyaṃ hetudoṣam abhidadhāno vārtikakārasyābhipāryam evam ityādinā darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:9700: yadi dvāv api svabhāvahetū tadā kiṃ dvayābhidhānena?
GSP28durdhpru:9701: ekenāpi svabhāvahetunā viruddhatvasya darśītatvād ityāśaṅkya samarthanam āha --- kṛṭakatvam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9703: tat katham anenaivam ucyata ity āha --- prayatneti /
GSP28durdhpru:9705: prayatnasya puruṣavyāpārasyānantaram avyavahitaṃ janma jñānaṃ ca tad viṣayam ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:9707: etau hetū nityatvae sādhye viruddhau hetvābhāsau //
GSP28durdhpru:9708: kasmāt punar etau viruddhāv ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:9710: asapakṣe ca sattvam iti viparyayasiddhiḥ[617] III-84
GSP28durdhpru:9714: anayor iti / sapakṣe hi[618] nitye kṛtakatvaprayatnānantarīyakatvayor asattvam eva niścitam /
GSP28durdhpru:9715: anitye vipakṣe eva sattvaṃ niścitam iti viparyayasiddhiḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:9719: kasmāt punar viparyayasiddhāv apy etau viruddhāv ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:9721: etau ca sādhyasya nityatvasya viparyayam --- anityatvaṃ sādhayataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9730: ato 'nya iṣṭavighātakṛd ābhyām iti darśayann āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:9731: [620]nanu ca tṛtīyo api iṣṭavighātakṛd viruddhaḥ III-86
GSP28durdhpru:9735: nanu ca tṛtīyo api viruddha utkaḥ[621]/
GSP28durdhpru:9737: tṛtīyo 'yam iṣṭasya śabdenānuāttasya[622]vighātaṃ karoti viparyayasādhanād iti iṣṭavighātakṛd //
GSP28durdhpru:9743: yathā parārthāś cakṣurādayaḥ saṃghātatvāc chayanāsanādyaṅgavad iti III-87
GSP28durdhpru:9744_0: nanu prayatnānantarīyaka[tva]śabda upāttas tat kiṃ prayatnānānantarīyakaśabdasyārtha
GSP28durdhpru:9744_1: ucyate ity āha --- prayatnānatarīyakatvam iti prayatnānantarīyakatvaśabdenāpi tad
GSP28durdhpru:9745: tena śabdena dvayasyābhidhāne kadā svabhāvasyābhidhānaṃ kadā kāryasyety āśaṅkya janmetyādinā vibhajate /
GSP28durdhpru:9746: yato jñānasyāpy abhidhānaṃ tat tasmād iha viruddhodāharaṇaprakrame /
GSP28durdhpru:9747: anupalambhas tv anyor evāntarbhūtatvān na pṛthag upadarśitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9748: etayor udāhṛtayor eva so 'pi sujñāna iti bhāva unneyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9749: lakṣyate cāyam ācāyasyāśayaḥ --- sapakṣāvṛttau satyāṃ vyāptyā'vyāptyā vā vipakṣavṛtto viruddha eveti darśayitum ubhayopādānam /
GSP28durdhpru:9750: anyathā kṛtakatvamātre pradarśite sapakṣāvṛttau vipakṣavyāpaka eva yaḥ sa viruddho na tu praytnānantarīyakavad yo vipakṣavyāpīti śaṅkā syāt / tathā
GSP28durdhpru:9753: paro 'rthaḥ prayojanaṃ [623]parārthaḥ prayajakaḥ saṃskārya upakarttavyo yeṣām te parārthāḥ --- iti sādhyam /
GSP28durdhpru:9761: yataḥ [626]śayanāsanādayaḥ saṃghātarūpāḥ puruṣasya bhogino bhavanty upakārakā iti parārthā ucyante //
GSP28durdhpru:9770: tadiṣṭāsahatapārārthayaviparyayasādhanād iti asaṃhate viṣaye pārārthyam asaṃhatapārārthyam[627] /
GSP28durdhpru:9771: tasya sākhyasya vādina iṣṭam asaṃhatapārārthya tadiṣṭāsaṃhatapārārtham /
GSP28durdhpru:9775: [627] -rthyam / iṣṭāsaṃhatapārārthyaṃ tasya sāṃkhyasya vādina iṣṭāsaṃhata pārārthyam
GSP28durdhpru:9777: `ātmā asti' iti bruvāṇaḥ sāṃkhyaḥ `kuta etad' iti paryanuyukto bauddhenedam ātmanaḥ siddhaye pramāṇam āha /
GSP28durdhpru:9780: yasmād yo yasyopakārakaḥ sa tasya janakaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9781: janyamānaś ca yugapat krameṇa vā bhavati[628] saṃhataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9787: prayatnānantarīyakatvamātre pradarśite sapakṣāvṛttāv avyāptyaiva yo vipakṣe varttate sa eva viruddho nānya iti śaṅkā syāt,
GSP28durdhpru:9789: yadi tu kāryahetur udāhṛta ity ucyate,
GSP28durdhpru:9791: na ca tasyās tatrāntarbhāvān nodāharaṇam iti yuktam,
GSP28durdhpru:9793: evaṃ dharmottareṇa kathaṃ na vyākhyātam iti na pratīmaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:9794: arthaśabdaḥ prayojane vṛttas tasya ca prayojayatīti vyutpattyā prayojakaśabdābhilapyatvam ity abhipetya parārthaḥ prayojaka ity uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9795: parasminn arthaḥ prayojanaṃ yeṣām iti gamakatvād vyadhikaraṇabahuvrīhau tu sarvaṃ samañjasaṃ kevalam anena tathā na vyākhyātam iti na vidmaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9797: kasya tad aṅgam ity ucyata ity āha --- puruṣeti //
GSP28durdhpru:9798: krameṇa yugapad vā 'pi dvedhāpy asaṃhataṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:9799: kutaḥ punar asaṃhataviṣayaṃ pārārthyam iṣṭaṃ sāṃkhyāsyākhyata ity āśaṅkyāha ātmeti /
GSP28durdhpru:9801: yac ca tad asaṃhatarūpaṃ sa evātmety abhiprāyeṇoktam asaṃhatasyātmana iti //
GSP28durdhpru:9804: sa[630] iha kasmān na uktaḥ III-89
GSP28durdhpru:9808: sa kasmād vārttikakāreṇa satā tvayā na uktaḥ? itara[631] āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:9815: tat katham uktavipayayasādhanayor evāntabhāva ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:9816: na hy ayam ābhyāṃ sādhyaviparyayasādhanatvena bhidyate III-91
GSP28durdhpru:9819: yasmād ayam iṣṭavidhatakṛdābhyāṃ hetubhyāṃ sādhyaviparyayasya[632] sādhanatvena bhidyate /
GSP28durdhpru:9821: uktaviparyayaṃ tu sādhayatu[633] vā mā vā kim uktaviparyayasādhanena /
GSP28durdhpru:9827: nanu coktam eva sādhyaṃ[634] tat kathaṃ sādhyaviparyayasādhanatvenābheda ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:9831: na hi iṣṭauktayoḥ sādhyatvena kaścid viśeṣa iti III-92
GSP28durdhpru:9832: na hīti yasmād iṣṭauktayoḥ [635]parasparasmāt sādhyatvena na kaścid viśeṣa bheda iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9837: pravādino hi yaj jijñāsitaṃ tat prakaraṇāpannam /
GSP28durdhpru:9838: yac ca prakaraṇāpannaṃ tat sādhanecchayā viṣayīkṛtaṃ sādhyam iṣṭam uktam uktaṃ vā,
GSP28durdhpru:9841: dvayo rūpayor ekasya asiddhāv aparasya ca sandehe anaikāntikaḥ III-93
GSP28durdhpru:9850: itara iti codakādanyo vārtikakāra ity arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9854: tam eva sādhyatenābhedaṃ sādhayann āha --- prativādino hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:9867: yatheti / vigato rāgo yasya sa vītarāgaḥ ity ekaṃ sādhyam /
GSP28durdhpru:9871: svātmany eva sarāge cāsarvajñe ca vipakṣe vaktṛtvaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP28durdhpru:9875: sarvajñavītarāgayor viprakarṣād vacanādes tatra sattvam asattvaṃ vā sandigdham III-95
GSP28durdhpru:9876: sapakṣabhūtayoḥ sarvajñavītarāgayor viprakarṣād ity atīndriyatvād vacanāder indriyagamyasyāpi tatra atīndriyayoḥ sarvajñatvavī(jñavī)
GSP28durdhpru:9878: tataś ca na jñāyate kiṃ vaktṛtvāt sarvajña uta nety anaikāntikam iti //
GSP28durdhpru:9879: samprati dvayor eva sandehe 'naikāntikaṃ vaktum āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:9880: anayor eva dvayo rūpayoḥ sandehe anaikāntikaḥ III-96
GSP28durdhpru:9892: yatheti[643] / sahātmanā varttate sātmakam iti sādhyam /
GSP28durdhpru:9899: prāṇāḥ [644]śvāsādaya ādir yasyonmeṣanimeṣādeḥ prāṇidharmasya sa prāṇādiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9907: jīvat prāṇān dhārayac ca tac charīraṃ ceti vigrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9908: unmeṣaś cakṣur vikāśa ādir yasya nimeṣādes tasya prāṇidharmasya jīvadharmasya /
GSP28durdhpru:9911: asādhāraṇatvād eva saṃśayahetur iti hetubhāvena viśeṣaṇam //
GSP28durdhpru:9914: saṃśayaviṣayau yāv ākārau tābhyāṃ sarvasya vastunaḥ saṃgrahāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9915: tayoś ca vyāpakayor ākārayor ekatrāpi vṛttyaniścayāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9916: [645]yābhyāṃ hy ākārābhyāṃ sarvaṃ vastu na saṅgṛhyate tayor ākārayo na saṃśayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9917: prakārāntarasambhave hi pakṣadharmo dharmiṇam aviyuktaṃ dvayor ekena dharmeṇa darśaytuṃ na śaknuyāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9919: dvayor dharmayor aniyataṃ bhāvaṃ darśayan saṃśayahehuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9920: dvayos tv aniyatam api bhāvaṃ darśayitum aśakto[646] 'pratipattihetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9921: niyataṃ tu[647] bhāvaṃ darśayan [648]samyag hetur viruddho vā syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9922: tasmād [649]yābhyāṃ sarvaṃ vastu saṃgṛhyate tayoḥ[650] saṃśayahetur yadi tayor ekatrāpi sambhāvaniścayo na syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9923: sadbhāvaniścaye tu yady ekatra niyatasattāniścayo hetur[651] viruddho vā syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9937: kathaṃ punar ayaṃ saṃśayahetur utpādayituṃ śakyate yāvatā nāsmāt sātmakatvasyānātmakatvasya vā pratipattir jāyate /
GSP28durdhpru:9938: tato 'praitpattir evāsādhāraṇa ity uddyotakaramatam āśaṅkya yatra (yat na)
GSP28durdhpru:9939: hīty uktaṃ vārtikakṛtā tad avatārayitum bhūmikām racayann āha --- pakṣadharmasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:9941: pakṣasya dharmaya sato dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ nimittābhyām /
GSP28durdhpru:9943: tayor vyāpakayor ākārayoḥ sātmakatvānātmakatvākhyayor viṣayabhūtayo ekatrāpi viṣaye 'niścayāt tasya pakṣādharmasyety arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9945: yena tathātvaṃ tayo upavarṇyata ity āha --- yābhyām iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9947: kathaṃ punas tayor ākārayo na saṃśaya ity āha --- prākārāntareti /
GSP28durdhpru:9949: pakṣadharmaḥ san dharmiṇaṃ taṃ pakṣaṃ dvayor ekena dharmeṇa sātmakatvākhyena anātmtvākhyena vā /
GSP28durdhpru:9951: na śaknoti darśayituṃ prakārāntareṇa sambandhasya tasya sambhavāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9952: yata evam ataḥ sa pakṣadharmo na saṃśayahetuḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9954: atha kathaṃ sātmakatvānātmakatve dvau dharmau darśayann api saṃśayatehtur ucyata ity āha --- dvayor iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9955: darśayann[73a] iti hetau śatur vidhānād aniyatabhāvapradarśanād ity artho boddhavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:9956: nanu niyatābhāvam adarśayann apratipattihetur evāyāyaṃ yujyata ity āha --- dvayos tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9958: niyatapradarśakasyāpi kiṃ na tathātvam ity āha --- niyatatvaṃ(yataṃ) tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:9962: viruddho 'pi viparyaye samyaghetur evety ekatra sattāniścaye viruddho vā syād ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:9966: na hi[652]sātmakanirātmakābhyām anyo rāśir asti yatrāyaṃ[653]prāṇādir vartate (varteta)III-98
GSP28durdhpru:9988: tābhyāṃ sarvasya vastunaḥ saṃgrahāt kroḍī karaṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:9989: yatra hy ātmā asti tat sātmakam /
GSP28durdhpru:9996: yadaikatraiva sattāniścayo viruddho vā syād ity uktam,
GSP28durdhpru:9997: yadaikatraiva sattāniścayo nāsti tadā kā vārttety āha --- aniyateti /
GSP28durdhpru:9999: aniyato 'traivāyaṃ varttata ity evaṃ rūpaniyamaśūnyo yaḥ sattāniścayas tasmin sati /
GSP28durdhpru:10003: yadā punaḥ sapakṣe vṛttisandehāniyatasattāniścayas tadā sandhgadhānvayāsiddhavyatirekaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10004: yadā tu sapakṣāsapakṣayor ekatrāpi sattāniścayo nāsti tadā sapakṣāsapakṣāvṛtter asādhāraṇaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10006: yataḥ pakṣādharmas yoktābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ saṃśayahetutvaṃ tatas tasmāt darśayituṃ darśayiṣyāmīti mattvā /
GSP28durdhpru:10008: vastudharmatvaṃ ca prāṇāder avastuni śaśaviṣāṇād āvavṛtteḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10009: yato rāśyantarābhāvas tasmāt kāraṇād ayaṃ prāṇādimattvākhyo hetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10012: tatrāmunā nahītyādinā mūlena saṃśayaviṣayābhyām ākārābhyāṃ sarvavastusaṃgraha ekaṃ kāraṇam uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:10013: nāpy anayor ityādinā tu tayor ekatrāpi vṛttyaniścayo dvitīyaṃ kāraṇam uktam iti darśayitum āha --- saṃśayeti /
GSP28durdhpru:10020: nāpy anayor sātmakānātmakayor madhya ekatra sātmake 'nātmake[661] vā vṛtter sadbhāvasya niścayo 'sti /
GSP28durdhpru:10021: dvāv api rāśī tyaktvā na varttate prāṇādiḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:10023: tataś cānayor eva varttate[662] ity etāvad eva jñātam /
GSP28durdhpru:10024: viśeṣe tu vṛttiniścayo nāstīy ayam arthaḥ[663] //
GSP28durdhpru:10031: [664]sātmakatvena anātmakatvena vā prasiddhe prāṇāder asiddheḥ[665] III-101
GSP28durdhpru:10036: [666]sātmakatvena anātmakatvena vā viśeṣeṇa yukte prasiddhe niścite vastuni prāṇāder dharmasya[667] sarvavastuvyāpinoḥ prakārayor ekatra niyatasadbhāvasyāsiddher anaikāntikaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:10042: tad evam asādhāraṇasya dharamasyānaikāntikatva kāraṇadvayam abhihitam //
GSP28durdhpru:10044: vṛttiḥ pravṛttir arthāt bhāva evāvatiṣṭhata ity abhiprāyeṇāha --- vṛtteḥ sādbhāvasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:10045: yady evaṃ tayor na varttata ity eva kiṃ na syāt?
GSP28durdhpru:10046: tathā ca kathaṃ saṃśayahetur ity āśaṅkya yādṛśo 'syārtho 'bhipretas taṃ sphuṭayitum āha --- dvāvapīti /
GSP28durdhpru:10047: kuto na varttata ity āha --- vatudharmatvād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10050: vastunā vā 'vaśyaṃ sātmakenā 'nātmakena vā bhāvyam iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10056: yad idam anantaroktam etat parimāṇaṃ yasya prameyasya tad etāvad vastutattvaṃ niścitam /
GSP28durdhpru:10057: kutas tarhi nāsya vṛttiniścaya ity āha --- viśeṣe tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10064: artho 'bhidheyo yasya “nāpy anayor ekatra vṛttiniścayaḥ” ity asya maulasya vākyasyety arthāt //
GSP28durdhpru:10069: evaṃ ca vyācakṣāṇena [na] maya svātantryeṇa pakṣadharmasyetyādinā
GSP28durdhpru:10071: pakṣadharmaś ca bhavan[668] sarvaḥ sādhāraṇo 'sādhāraṇo va bhavaty anaikāntikaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10076: tasmāj jīvaccharīrasambandhī prāṇādiḥ sātmakād anātmakāc ca sarvasmād vyāvṛttatvena asiddhes tābhyāṃ[669]na vyatiricyate III-102
GSP28durdhpru:10082: yasmāt tayor ekatrāpi na nivṛttiniścayas tasmāt tābhyāṃ na vyatiricyate /
GSP28durdhpru:10083: vastudharme hi sarvastuvyāpinoḥ prakārayor ekatraniyatasadbhāvo niścataḥ prakārāntarān nivarttete /
GSP28durdhpru:10084: ata evāha[670] --- sātmakād anātmakāc ca sarvasmād vastuno vyāvṛttatvena asiddher iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10085: prāṇādiḥ tāvat kutaścid ghaṭader nivṛtta eva /
GSP28durdhpru:10086: tata etāvad avasātuṃ śakyam --- sātmakād anātmakād vā kiyato nivṛttaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10097: tasmād ityādinā tu śarīrasambandhitvam asya kasmād ācāryo darśayatītyāśaṅkāṃ nirācikīrṣuḥ pakṣadharmaś ce tyādinopakramate /
GSP28durdhpru:10099: apakṣadharmastvasiddhtvākhyām anyām eva doṣajātim anuśnuta iti bhāvaḥ pakṣadharmatvaṃ pradarśayato vārtikakārasyonneyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10103: yasmād apkṣadharmo nānaikāntika upavarṇatenābhipāryeṇa tasmāt kāraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10107: tasmād ity anena yasmādityādkṣiptaṃ darśayann āha --- yasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10108: ekatrāpi na vṛttiniścayas tasya prāṇāder ity arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10109: tasmāt kāraṇāt tābhyāṃ sātmakatvānātmakatvābhyāṃ na vyatiricyate na nivarttate,
GSP28durdhpru:10111: tayor ekatra vṛttyaniścaye 'pi kathaṃ tābhyāṃ na vyatiricyata ity āha --- vastv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10114: tayor dharma ekatraniyataḥ `atraivāyaṃ varttata iti niyamavān' sadbhāvaḥ sattvaṃ yasya sa tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:10118: ekatra vṛttyaniścayāc ca nāyaṃ tathety abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10125: yady evam anvayo 'stu tayor niśicta ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:10138: vastudharmatayā tayor dvayor ektatra[675] vā varttata ity avasitaḥ prāṇādiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10139: na tu sātmaka eva nirātmaka eva vā varttata iti kuto 'nvayaniścayaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:10145: nanu ca prativādino na kiñcit sātmakam asti /
GSP28durdhpru:10146: tato 'sya hetor na sātmake 'nvayo[676] na vyatirka[677] ity anvayavyatirkayor abhāvaniścayaḥ sātmake,
GSP28durdhpru:10152: na api[678]sātmakād anātmakāc ca tasya anvayavyatirekayor abhāvaniścayaḥ III-105
GSP28durdhpru:10156: nanu ghāṭapaṭāder anekasmāt prāṇādinirvarttamāno dṛṣṭas tat kathaṃ tasya vyāvṛttatvenāsiddhir ity āha --- prāṇādir iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10157: tataḥ sarvasmāt sātmakād anātmakāc ca nivṛttyanavasāyāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10158: kutaḥ? sātmakād anātmakāc ca pratibandhāsiddher iti cātra sarvatrābhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10159: nanu kim ucyate na kutaścid iti?
GSP28durdhpru:10162: yady evaṃ jīvaccharīram api bauddhena tathātveneṣṭam iti tasyāpi tathātvaṃ kin na bhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:10163: abhyupagamena ca sātmakānātmake vibhajya hetuṃ kathayatā gamikatvam iti yat kiñcid etat //
GSP28durdhpru:10166: nanu vastudharmeṇa tenāvaśyaṃ kvāpi niyatena bhāvyam /
GSP28durdhpru:10167: tat katham anvayābhāva ity āha --- vastudharmatayeti /
GSP28durdhpru:10171: nirātmake ghaṭādau prāṇāder adarśaṇād iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:10173: tasyaiva [74a] śarīrasya nirātmakatvasambhāvanāyāṃ sarvasmān nirātmakān nirvṛttiniśayābhāvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10176: nāpi sātmakād vastunaḥ tasya prāṇāder anvayavyatirekayor abhāvaviścayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10178: sātmakād anātmakād iti ca pañcamī vyatirekaśabdāpekṣayā draṣṭavyā //
GSP28durdhpru:10185: ekasyānvayasya vyatirekasya vā yo abhāvaniścayaḥ [681]so parasya dvitīyasya bhāvaniścayanāntarīyakaḥ [682]bhāvaniścayasyāvyabhicārī /
GSP28durdhpru:10203: sa eva rūpaṃ yayos tator bhāvas tattvaṃ tasmāt kāraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10206: yasya vyavacchedena yat paricchidyate tat tatparihārṇa vyavasthitam /
GSP28durdhpru:10209: abhāvo hi nīrūpo yādṛśo vikalpena darśitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10210: nīrūpatāṃ ca vyavacchidya rūpam ākāravat paricchidyate /
GSP28durdhpru:10215: nanu cetiyādi tasmāt kāraṇād ity etad antaṃ spaṣṭārtha tena na vyākhyāyate /
GSP28durdhpru:10216: anyonyavyavacchedarūpatvam evānvayavyatirekayoḥ katham ity āśṅkyāha --- anvayavyatirekāv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10218: bhavatāṃ tau tathārūpau kim ata ity āha --- bhāvābhāv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10220: bhavatv evaṃ tathāpi kathaṃ tayor anonyaparihāreṇāvasthānam ity āha --- yasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:10221: nanv atra kasya vyavacchedena kiṃ paricchidyate yena tat parihārehaṇa tad vyavatiṣṭhata ity āha --- svābhāveti /
GSP28durdhpru:10226: tasmād yadi nāma sātmakam avastu nirātmakaṃ ca vastu,
GSP28durdhpru:10228: ekatra[687] vastuny ekasya[688] vastuno yugapad bhāvābhāvavirodhāt tayor abhāvaniścayāyogāt[689] /
GSP28durdhpru:10235: na ca prativādyanurodhāt sātmakānātmake vastuno vastusato /
GSP28durdhpru:10242: eta eva kvacid anvayavyatirekayor na bhāvaniścayo [691]nāpy abhāvaniśayaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:10247: yadi tu kvacid apy[692] anvayavyatirekayor ekasyāpy abhāvaniścayaḥ syāt,
GSP28durdhpru:10248: sa eva dvitīyasya bhāvaniścaya ity anvayavyatirekasandeha eva na syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10249: yataś ca[693] na kvacid bhāvābhāvaniścayas tata evānvayavyatirekayoḥ sandehaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10256: paricchidyata ity āha --- tathā ceti nīrūpatāvyavacchedena rūpasya pratiṣṭhatākāravataḥ paricchedaprakāre sati /
GSP28durdhpru:10258: nanu bauddhānāṃ sātmakaṃ nāma nāsty evety avastu /
GSP28durdhpru:10260: tatra vastu[ni] nirātmako[ke] hetor anvayavyatirekayor abhāvaniścayo mā bhūt sātmake tv avastuni sa kathaṃ na syād ity āśaṅkyopasaṃhāravyājenāha tasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10262: kathaṃ na bhāvaniścayas tator ity āśaṅkyopapattim āha --- ekatreti /
GSP28durdhpru:10265: kālabhede kiṃ na yujyate ity āha --- yugapad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10268: tad eva tu na yujyate iti darśayann āha --- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:10270: prakaraṇād iha prativādī bauddhas tad anurodhavaśād iṣṭyaniṣṭivaśāt sātmakam asannirātmakaṃ sad iti yathāyogaṃ yojanīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:10271: evaṃ hy avāstavam anumānaṃ syāt na vastubalapravṛttam iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10272: yady evaṃ te sadasatī na bhavataḥ kathaṃ nāmety āha --- kin tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10279: yata evaṃ tataḥ kāraṇāt sātmakānātmakayoḥ sadasattvayoḥ saṃśayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10288: sādhyasya, itarasya ca viruddhasya ataḥ --- sandigdhānvayayatirekān niścayābhāvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10289: sapakṣavipakṣayor hi sadasattvasandehe na sādhyasya na viruddhasya siddhiḥ[696] /
GSP28durdhpru:10290: na ca sātmakānātmakābhyāṃ[697] paraḥ prakāraḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:10291: tataḥ prāṇādimattvād dharmiṇi jīvaccarīre saṃśaya ātmabhāvābhāvayor ity anaikāntikaḥ prāṇādir iti //
GSP28durdhpru:10296: astu sasattvasaṃśayo 'nvayavyatirekaniścayas tu kin na bhavatīty āha --- yata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10297: na bhāvaniścayo nābhāvaniścaya ity ekatra sātmake 'nātamake veti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:10298: sātmake 'nātmake vā prāṇādeḥ sadasattvaniścayābhāvād evānvayavyatirekayoḥ sandeho nānyatheti pratipādayitum āha --- yadi tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10302: tasmāt sandehāt anaikāntikaḥ prāṇādimattvākhyo hetur iti prakaraṇāt //
GSP28durdhpru:10307: sapakṣavipakṣayor viṣayabhūtayor hetoḥ sadasattvasandehe na sādhyasyānumitsitasya viruddhasya viparayayasya siddhir niścayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10308: viruddho 'pi viparyaye samyaghetur ity abhiprāyeṇedam uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:10309: na cetyādi prāṇādir ity antaṃ sugamam /
GSP28durdhpru:10310: īdṛśa eva cāsādhāraṇo hetuḥ kaiścin naiyāyikair anupalasaṃhārya ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:10312_0: uddyotakaras tu śrāvaṇatvākhye 'sādhāraṇahetāv ācāryadignāgena darśita idam avādīt
GSP28durdhpru:10312_1: --- “yady etac chrāvaṇatvaṃ nityānityayor dṛṣṭaṃ syāj janayettayoḥ saṃśayam ūrdhvatvam
GSP28durdhpru:10314: tasmān nāyaṃ saṃśayahetur api tv apratipattihetur eva /
GSP28durdhpru:10316: vastunā nityena bhāvyam anityena vā prakārāntarābhāvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10319: tarhi vastudharmatvāt saṃśayo na śrāvaṇatvād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10320: ” tulyanyāyatayā 'trāpy asādhāraṇe tad īyam idam īdṛśaṃ carcitam āsajyata eveti “katham ayaṃ saṃśayaṃ saṃśayahetur upapādayitavyaḥ” iti sādhūktam tena /
GSP28durdhpru:10323: na tu tasmād eva vastudharmād ubhayākārasaṃsparśī pratyayo dolāyate na ca yady asyapratipattikāraṇe kāraṇam tata eva sā pratipattiḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:10324: na tu tasmād iti śakyate vaktum /
GSP28durdhpru:10325: tad utpatter agnipratipattir na dhūmād ity asyābhidhānaprasaṅgāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10327: kiñcaivaṃ prameyatvāder api na saṃśayaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10328: śakyate hi tatrāpi vaktum ubhayatra darśanāt saṃśayo na prameyatvād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10329: atha tasya tāvad ubhayatra darśanaṃ tena tasmād ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:10330: yady evaṃ vastudharmatvam api śrāvaṇatvasyaiveti kathaṃ na tasmād asau /
GSP28durdhpru:10331: api cordhvatvam api yady api sthāṇupuruṣayor api dṛṣṭaṃ tathāpi tāvat tatrāntareṇātraiva bhaviṣyatīti paryanuyoge satīdam eva vācyam --- yad utordhvatvaṃ nāma vastudharmaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10332: vastunā caivaṃvidhiḥ --- sthāṇunā puruṣeṇa vā 'vaśyaṃ bhāvyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10333: tathā ca vastudharmād eva saṃśayo nordhvatvād ity aniṣṭāpādanaṃ --- kena nirākriyetety alaṃ viṣtareṇa /
GSP28durdhpru:10334: sādhansasya siddher yan nāṅgam asiddho viruddho 'naikāntiko hetvābhāsaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10336: tsmād evaṃvidho hetvābhāsaḥ dvayam aprayojyaḥ paraprayuktaś cāvaśyam udbhāvayitavya iti hetvābhāsavyutpādane vārttikakārasyābhiprāyo boddhavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10337: syād etat --- asamarthaṃ viśeṣaṇo 'samarthaviśeṣyaś cāsti prabhedaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10339: atra kṛṭakatvaṃ viśeṣyam eva sādhyasiddhau samartham,
GSP28durdhpru:10340: na tu prameyatvaṃ viśeṣaṇam ity asamarthaṃ viśeṣaṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:10341: yatra viśeṣyam eva samratham iti kṛtvā bhavaty asamarthaviśeṣaṇo hetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10343: nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatve sati prameyatvād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10344: atra hi kṛtakatvaṃ viśeṣaṇam eva sādhyasiddhau samartham,
GSP28durdhpru:10345: na tu prameyatvaṃ viśeṣyam ity asamarthaṃ viśeṣyam /
GSP28durdhpru:10346: yatra hi viśeṣaṇam [75a] eva samartham iti kṛṭvā bhavaty ayam asarthaviśeṣyo hetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10352: nāpy anaikāntike kṛtakatvaniśiṣṭaprameyatvasya prameyatvaviśiṣṭakṛtakatvasya ca sādhyā 'vyabhicārāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10353: tasmād asiddhatvāder anya evāyaṃ hetudoṣaprakāraḥ prāpta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10356: yadi hy evam ayaṃ prayukto hetur dviṣyet(ta)
GSP28durdhpru:10359: yāvatā naivam ayaṃ prayukto 'nyatheti sādhyasādhanād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10360: na tarhy evaṃ vādī nigṛhyata iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:10364: yathā ca sādhyasiddhyanaṅgasya vacane nigraho 'vaśyam bhāvī,
GSP28durdhpru:10366: tathā vādanyāye 'vādīn nyāyavādīti tatas tad apekṣitavyaḥ tato 'yam artho vaktṛdoṣa eva na hetudoṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10370: na tāvat siddhasādhanaṃ sādhana[m a]siddhatvādyanyatamadoṣadūṣitaṃ sādhyasādhanasāmarthyāpracyuter iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10374: tatrāsāmarthya eva doṣo vārttikakāreṇā 'nantaroktena krameṇa tridhā darśitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10376: siddhasādhānaṃ tu vaiyarthyalakṣaṇo 'nya evāyaṃ hetoḥ svagatoḥ svagato doṣa iti kasmād asyāntarbhāvaś cintanīyaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:10381: yathāyogaṃ paripūrṇasādhanarūpābhidhānād anupayuktānabhidhānāc ca vaktur aduṣṭatvāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10385: trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇām asiddhau[698] sandehe ca[699] hetudoṣānupapādyopasaṃharann āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:10390: [700]evam eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇām ekaikasya dvayor dvayor vā rūpayor asiddhau sandehe vā[701]yathāyogam asiddhaviruddhānaikāntikās trayo hetvābhāsāḥ III-109
GSP28durdhpru:10396: eṣāṃ madhya ekaikaṃ rūpaṃ [702]yadā 'siddhaṃ sandigdhaṃ vā[703] bhavati,
GSP28durdhpru:10397: dve dve vā[704] 'siddhe saṃdigdhe vā bhavataḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:10398: tadāsiddhaś ca viruddhaś cānaikāntikaś ca te hetvābhāsāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10399: yathāyogam iti yasyāsiddhau saṃdehe vā yo hetvābhāso yujyate sa tsyā 'siddheḥ saṃdehāc ca vyavasthāpyata iti yasya yasya yena [705]yena yogo yathāyogam iti //
GSP28durdhpru:10407: sa iha kasmān na uktaḥ III-110
GSP28durdhpru:10408: nanu cā ''cāryeṇa viruddhāvyabhicāry api saṃśayahetur uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10410: yadi vā viruddhaś cāsau sādhanāntarasiddhasya dharmasya viruddhasādhanāt,
GSP28durdhpru:10416: svato '(to) duṣṭs tato vaktṛdoṣo yujyata eveti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:10418: śakyate hi tatrāpy evam abhidhātum --- vaktā 'yam ananurūpe sādhye prayukte viparyayasādhānād viruddhatām anubhavati na tv ayaṃ svato duṣṭo nāmeti /
GSP28durdhpru:10419: vivakṣitārthasādhanāsāmarthyaṃ svato 'stīti kathaṃ na vaiyarthyaṃ tasya doṣa iti cintyatām iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10421: siddhi[ḥ] sādhānaṃ tad aṅgaṃ dharmo yasyārthasya vivādāśrayasya vādaprastāvād hetoḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10423: tathā yo na bhavati tasyāprastutasyābhidhānād iti kṛtveti sarvam evāvadātam /
GSP28durdhpru:10426: yathā ca teṣāṃ prayatir yathā tad abhajamānam abhidhānaṃ tathā svayuthyavicāra evābhihita iti tata evāpekṣitavya iti //
GSP28durdhpru:10427: trayāṇām ityādi vyavasthāpyata ity etad antaṃ subodham /
GSP28durdhpru:10429: sarvahetvābhāsasaṅgrahaṇārthaṃ yasyeti dviruktaṃ yena [75b] yena doṣena yogaḥ sambandhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10432: nanu cetyādīty āhety etad antaṃ sugamam /
GSP28durdhpru:10446: prāmāṇasiddhe hi trairūpye prastute sa eva hetvābhāsaḥ sambhavati yasya pramāṇasiddhaṃ rūpam /
GSP28durdhpru:10447: na ca viruddhāvyabhicāriṇaḥ pramāṇasiddham asti rūpam /
GSP28durdhpru:10457: na hi sambhavo 'sti kāryasvabhāvayor uktalakṣaṇayor anupalambhasya ca[712]viruddhatāyāḥ III-112
GSP28durdhpru:10461: na hīti / yasmān na sambhavo 'sti viruddhatāyāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10462: kāryaṃ ca svabhāvaś ca tayor uktalakṣaṇayor iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10469: kamsāt tatra viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo 'sambhava ity āha --- pramāṇeti /
GSP28durdhpru:10471: sa eva hetvābhāso viruddhāvyabhicārāryākhyaḥ sambhvati yasya pramāṇena siddhaṃ rūpaṃ pakṣadharmānvayavyatirekātmakam iti vivakṣitam /
GSP28durdhpru:10472: ayam āśayaḥ --- yadi tad ekena dvābhyām vā rūpābhyāṃ hīnaṃ syāt tad eṣv eva hetvābhāseṣv antarbhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:10473: na tv etad atirikto viruddhāvyabhicārī nāma hetvābhāso bhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:10474: bhavatā tv anena pramāṇasiddhatrairūpyeṇaiva bhāvyam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10475: astu tasya tathātvam ity āha --- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:10477: vyaktam etad ity asminn arthe vā /
GSP28durdhpru:10478: evaṃ bruvataś cāsyāyam abhiprāyaḥ --- vastunaḥ parasparaviruddharūpadvarūpadvayāsambhavād avaśyam anayor ekam asampūrṇāṅgam iti //
GSP28durdhpru:10479: kutaḥ punar anumānviṣaye 'syāsambhavo 'vasīyata ity abhipretya pṛdcchati paraḥ --- kasmād iti
GSP28durdhpru:10484: sa katham ātmavāraṇaṃ vyāpakaṃ ca svabhāvaṃ parityajya bhaved yena viruddhaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10502: kva tarhy ācāryadignāgenāyaṃ hetudoṣa ukta ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:10503: tasmād avastudarśanabalapravṛttam āgamāśrayam anumānam āśritya tadarthavicāreṣu viruddhāvyabhicārī sādhanadoṣa uktaḥ III-114
GSP28durdhpru:10504: yasmād vastubalapravṛtte 'numāne na sambhavati tasmād āgamāśrayam anumānam āśrityavyabhicāryuktaḥ iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10505: āgamasiddhaṃ hi yasyānumānasya liṅgatairūpyaṃ tasyāgama āśrayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10506: nanu cāgam asiddham api trairūpyaṃ pramāṇasiddham ity āha --- avastudarśanabalapravṛttam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10507: avastuno darśanaṃ vikalpamātram tasya balaṃ sāmarthyam /
GSP28durdhpru:10508: tataḥ pravṛttam --- apramāṇād vikalpamātrād vyasthitaṃ trairūpyam āgamasiddham anumānasya /
GSP28durdhpru:10510: na hītiy atrasthasya hiśabdasyārtho yasmād ity anenoktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10512: etad uktaṃ bhavati --- svasādhyāvyabhicāriṇā hi bhavatā kāryeṇa svabhāvena vā bhāvyam /
GSP28durdhpru:10513: na ca vastunas tadatatsvabhāvau sto yena tadatatsvabhāvāvyabhicāriṇau dvau hetū sannipatantau viruddhāvyabhicāriṇau syātām iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10514: yena kāryasvabhāvayoḥ kāraṇavyāpakavidhinā kṛsatadbhāvena viruddhaṃ tatraiva dharmiṇi hetvantarasādhitārthaṃ viruddhasādhanaṃ bhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:10515: yady evam anupalambhe tatsambhaviṣyatīty āha --- anupalambhasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:10517: yata etad atirikto 'vyabhicārī [na] sammata [ata] evāsmād eva kāraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10519: katham āgamāśrayatvam anumāsyety āha --- āgamasiddham iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10521: sati tasminn āgame 'numānasya pravṛtter asāv āśrayas tasya //
GSP28durdhpru:10523: tat tarhy anumānam [717]āgamasiddhatrairūpyaṃ[718] kvādhikṛtam ity āha ---[719] tad artheti /
GSP28durdhpru:10524: tasyāgamasya yo 'rtho 'tīndiryaḥ pratyakṣāṇumānābhyām aviṣayīkṛtaḥ sāmānyādis tasya vicāreṣu prakrānteṣu āgamāśryam anumānaṃ sambhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:10531: kasmāt punar āgamāśraye 'py[720] anumāne sambhava ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:10540: śāstrakṛtāṃ viparītasya vastuviruddhasya svabhāvasya upasaṃhāro ḍhaukanam artheṣu /
GSP28durdhpru:10543: viparyastā hi śāstrakārāḥ[723] santam asantaṃ svabhāvam āropayantīti //
GSP28durdhpru:10548: anyeṣv api puruṣeṣu ka āśvāsa ity āha ---
GSP28durdhpru:10549: na hy asya sambhavo[724]yathā avasthitavastusthitiṣv ātmakāryānupalambheṣu[725] III-116
GSP28durdhpru:10554: na hīti / na hetuṣu kalpanayā hetutvavyavasthā /
GSP28durdhpru:10556: tato yathā avasthitavastusthitiṣv ātmakāryānupalambheṣv asya sambhavo nāsti /
GSP28durdhpru:10557: avasthitaṃ paramārthasadvas tu tadantikrāntā yathāvasthitā [726]vastusthitir vyavasthā[727] yeṣāṃ te yathāvasthitavastusthitayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10558: te hi yathā vastu sthitaṃ tathā sthitā[728] /
GSP28durdhpru:10560: [729]tatas teṣu na bhrānter avakāśo 'sti yena viruddhāvyabhicārisambhavaḥ syāt //
GSP28durdhpru:10568: nanu cetyādi viparyastā hīty etad antaṃ sugamam /
GSP28durdhpru:10572: yathāvasthitavastusthatiṣv iti --- asya tātparyārtham āha --- na hetuṣv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10576: kathaṃ te tathārūpāity āha --- te hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:10579: yatas te yathāvasthitayas tatas teṣv a(ṣu)
GSP28durdhpru:10581: satyāṃ sthitau kiṃ na sambhava ity āha --- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10583: [730]tatra udāharaṇam --- yat[731]sarvadeśāvasthitaiḥ svasambandhibhir yugapad abhisambadhyate tat sarvagatam,
GSP28durdhpru:10585: [732]abhisambadhyate ca[733]sarvadeśāvasthitaiḥ svasambandhibhir yugapat sāmānyam iti III-117
GSP28durdhpru:10592: yat sarvasmin deśāvasthitaiḥ svasambandhibhir yugapad abhisambadhyate [734]iti sarvadeśāvasthitar abhisambadhyamānatvaṃ sāmānyasya anūdya sarvagatatvaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP28durdhpru:10593: tena yugapad abhisambadhyamānatvaṃ sarvagatatve niyataṃ tena vyāptaṃ kathyate /
GSP28durdhpru:10597: iha sāmānyaṃ kaṇādamaharṣiṇā niṣkrayaṃ dṛśyam ekaṃ[735] coktam /
GSP28durdhpru:10598: yugapac ca sarvaiḥ svaiḥ [736]sambandhibhiḥ samavāyena saṃbaddham /
GSP28durdhpru:10599: tatra pailukena kaṇādaśiṣyeṇa vyaktaṣu vyaktarahiteṣu ca
GSP28durdhpru:10605: yatas te kalpanayā na sthāpitās tataḥ kāraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10608: kasyānuvādenātra kasya vidhir ity [76a] āha --- sarveti /
GSP28durdhpru:10611: nanu sarvaiḥ svasambandhibhir yugapadabhisambandho nāma sāmānyasya yugapat sarvasambandhisamavāya eva /
GSP28durdhpru:10613: katham anayor vyāvṛttito 'pi bhedasambandhabhāvato gamyagamakabhāva iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:10615: nānādeśasthaiḥ svasambandhibhiḥ śāvaleyādibhir yugapad abhisambandho hetuḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10616: sambandhideśatad antarālavyāpitvaṃ tu sādhyam iti gamyagamakabhāvo na virudhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:10617: sarvasambandhibhir yugapad abhisambadndhaś cāgatvā 'nāgacchadbhir iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:10619: vyabhicāriprasavabījaṃ dharmadvayayoḥ kim abhyupagataṃ yena tayoḥ sannipātād viruddha(ddhā)
GSP28durdhpru:10623: rūḍhīvaśāc cāyaṃ śabdaḥ kāśyape munau varttate /
GSP28durdhpru:10626: evaṃ tasya hi kāṣṭhāgatā niḥspṛhatā yato 'nyaravo(?)
GSP28durdhpru:10627: svabhojyādikam api parityajya kaṇamātraṃ bhuktvā dhyānādikam ācarati /
GSP28durdhpru:10633: na tu samvāyād ekaṃ trilokyāṃ sāmānyam,
GSP28durdhpru:10637: deśeṣu sāmānyaṃ sthitaṃ sādhayituṃ [737]pramāṇam idaṃ upanyastam yathā ākāśam iti --- vyāptipradarśanaviṣayo dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10638: ākāśam api hi sarvadeśāvasthitair vṛkṣādibhiḥ svasaṃyogibhir yugapad abhisambadhyamānaṃ sarvagataṃ ca /
GSP28durdhpru:10639: abhisambadhyate ca[738] sarvadeśāvasthitaiḥ svasambandhibhir iti hetoḥ pakṣadharmatvapradarśanam //
GSP28durdhpru:10650: teṣāṃ sarvadeśāvasthitānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ sāmānyasya svabhāvaḥ sa eva tatsambandhisvabhāvamātram /
GSP28durdhpru:10654: taddeśe saṃnihitaḥ svabhāvo yasya tat taddeśasaṃnihitasvabhāvam[740] /
GSP28durdhpru:10656: yasya hi yeṣāṃ sambandhī svabhāvaḥ tanniyamena teṣāṃ deśe sannihitaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:10663: caḥ pūrvāpekṣayā samucyaye samavāyena sambandhena sambaddhatvam /
GSP28durdhpru:10668: tenāvivakṣitā ''ntarabhedasya yugapat sarvasambandhamātra hetutvād ākāraśasya dṛṣṭāntarūpatā draṣṭavyā /
GSP28durdhpru:10669: na tu sāmānyasyevāsya sambandhiḥ samavāyena sambandhaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10682: etac ca tasya bhāva ity ed antaṃ sugamam /
GSP28durdhpru:10684: na tu tad dhitapratyayānte pañcamy asti yāṃ vyācakṣīta /
GSP28durdhpru:10685: ayaṃ tv asyārthaḥ --- yasmād yugapat sarvadeśāvasthitasambandhisambandhaḥ svasattāmātrānubandhini sādhye hetuḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:10690: nanu tatsambandhino 'pi taddeśasannihitasvabhāvataiva kutao yenaivaṃ bhavatīty āha --- yasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:10704: na hi yo yatra na asti taddeśam ātmanā vyāpnoti iti svabhāvahetuprayogaḥ III-119
GSP28durdhpru:10705: na hīti / yo yatra deśe nāsti sa deśo yasya sa taddeśaḥ taṃ na vyāpnotyātmanā svarūpeṇa /
GSP28durdhpru:10708: [746]tena yatra yat samavetaṃ [747]tat [748]tadātmī na rūpeṇa kroḍīkurvat [749]samavāyirūpadeśe svātmānaṃ niśeśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:10721: hir avadhāraṇe sambandhīty asmāt paro draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10722: tad vastu niyamenāvaśyaṃtayā teṣāṃ sambandhīnāṃ deśe sannihitaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:10737: yatra tu tasya bhāvas tatteti pāṭhaḥ tatra sarvam avadātam //
GSP28durdhpru:10738: nanu caikadeśastham eva sāmānyaṃ yugapat sarvaiḥ sambandhibhir abhisambantsyate /
GSP28durdhpru:10739: tat kiṃ tasya vyāpārāsambhavenāveditenety āha --- iheti /
