GSP28durdhpru:10742: abhinnadeśayor iti lokaprasiddhadeśāpekṣayoktam na tu śāstraprasiddhadeśāpeṣayeti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:10753: tenāyam arthaḥ --- kuṇḍabadaravad yatra dvāv api sambandhinau bhinnadeśau na tayoḥ samavāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10754: yayos tv ekatarasyānyataro deśas tayo samavāya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10755: evañ ca paṭatantūnāṃ sāmānyatadvatoś ca nāsaṅgraha iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10756: yena kāraṇenābhinnadeśayor eva samvāyas tena prathamavyākhyāne samavāyirūpasya samavāyisvabhāvasya deśa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10757: dvitīyavyākhāne samavāyirūpam eva samavāyisvabhāva eva deśa iti vigṛhya tasminn iti
GSP28durdhpru:10764: tasmād yad yatra samavetaṃ [752]tat taddravyaṃ vyāpnuvadātmanā taddeśe saṃnnihitaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:10768: tad ayam arthaḥ --- taddeśasthavastuvyāpanaṃ taddeśasattayā vyāptam /
GSP28durdhpru:10769: taddeśattā 'bhāve[753] tadvyāpanābhāvād vyāpanalakṣaṇaḥ samavāyasambandho na syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10777: dvitīyo api prayogaḥ --- yad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ san na upalabhyate na tat tatra asti /
GSP28durdhpru:10780: ayam anupalambhaḥ[755]svabhāvaś ca parasparaviruddhārthasādhanād ekatra saṃśayaṃ janayataḥ III-120
GSP28durdhpru:10786: yad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ viṣayatāṃ prāptaṃ dṛśyam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10787: etena dṛśyānupalabdhim anūdya `na [756]tat tatrāsti' ity asad vyavahāryatvaṃ vihitam[757] /
GSP28durdhpru:10789: tad yathā, kvacid avidyamāno ghaṭaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10799: tat kathaṃ sambandhini svātmani niveśanaṃ vyākhyāyata ity āha --- taddeśa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10800: sa cāsau deśaś ca tatra rūpasya svarūpasya niveśanam upanayanam /
GSP28durdhpru:10805: na ca taddeśasannihitasvabhāvatety āśaṅkyāha --- tad ayam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10806: yata ātamanā tadvyāpanalakṣaṇena sambandhena tadvyāpyamānadeśasannidhānam ukataṃ tat tasmād ayaṃ tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10807: sa cāsau deśaś ca tatrasthavastuvyāpanaṃ lokaprasiddhadeṣāpekṣayā tasya deśas taddeśas tatra yā sattā vidyamānatā tayā vyāptam /
GSP28durdhpru:10808: anyathā tu svarūpeṇa vyāpanāsambhavād ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10810: nāsty evāyaṃ sambandha iti [ced āha ---] asti ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:10813: tat tasmād ayaṃ yugapat sarvasambandhyabhisambandhalakṣāṇo hetuḥ svabhāvaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:10815: pakṣadharmatvaṃ darśayitum āha --- na upalabhyate ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:10817: dṛśyam api kasyāṃcid vyaktau gosāmānyam aśvādiṣu vyakty antareṣu vyaktiśūnye[759] cākāśe [760]nopalabhyate /
GSP28durdhpru:10824: ayam anupalambhaḥ pūrvoktaś ca svabhāvaś [761]parasparasya viruddhau yāv arthau tayoḥ sādhanād tāv [762]ekasmin dharmaṇi saṃśayaṃ janayataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10825: na hy eko 'rthaḥ parasparaviruddhasvabhāvo bhavitum arhati /
GSP28durdhpru:10826: ekena cātra [763]vyakty antareṣu vyaktiśūnye cākāśe sattvam,
GSP28durdhpru:10835: pūvavad upcārāti piṭharaśabdas tena vyavaharatīti tathoktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10840: ayaṃ tu kiṃsaṃjñako hetur ity āha --- ayam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10843: tāv etau hetū dharmiṇy ekasmin sāmānyākhye /
GSP28durdhpru:10844: saṃśayaṃ prakṛtayoḥ sādhyayor ity arthāt kathaṃ saṃśayaṃ janayata ity āha /
GSP28durdhpru:10845: ekasyaiva tau vivakṣitasarvagatatvāsarvaṃgatatvalakṣaṇau svabhāvau bhaviṣyata ity āha --- na hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:10848: nanu cātra viruddhāv eva dharmāv ekasya sāmānyasya dvābhyām etābhyāṃ siddhyete iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10849: tat kim etad ucyata ity āha --- keneti /
GSP28durdhpru:10852: apareṇeti vyaktyantarāle sāmānyasya sattvam asattvaṃ ca etau hetū kā kṣatir iha --- ity āha --- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:10854: sattvam asattvaṃ ca dvayor dvābhyāṃ sādhane kim anupannam ity āśaṅkyāha --- ekasyāpi /
GSP28durdhpru:10855: kālabhede kin naivaṃ sambhāvatīty āśaṅkyāha --- ekadaiveti /
GSP28durdhpru:10856: kasyāpy ekadaivādhikaraṇabhede 'py etad ity āśaṅkyāha --- ekatreti /
GSP28durdhpru:10857: katham ayukatam ity āha --- tayor iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10860: kathaṃ punar āgamāśrayānumānāśrayatvaṃ niruddhāvyabhicāri[ṇī]ty āśaṅkyopasaṃhāravyājena yathā 'nayos tathātvaṃ tathā darśayann āha --- tad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10861: yata evaṃ tattadvadekaṃ sāmānyaṃ kaṇadena uktam,
GSP28durdhpru:10862: tadrūpavicāre taccchiṣyābhām evaṃ prakrāntaṃ tat tasmād āgamasiddhasyāgamapratipāditasyānupalambhenāpi vyaktatyantarālāsattvapratipādanadvāram(dvārā ')
GSP28durdhpru:10866: viruddhāvyabhicāritvam evānayor upadarśann āha --- yata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10872: [765]tadāgamasiddhasya sāmāyasya sarvagatatvāsarvagatatvayoḥ sādhyayo etau viruddhāvyabhicāriṇau jātau /
GSP28durdhpru:10877: tataḥ [769]śāstrakāreṇaiva viruddhavyāptatvam apaśyatā viruddhavyāptau dharmāv uktvā[770] viruddhāvyabhicāryavakāśo datta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10896: nanu ca sādhanāvayavatvād yathā hetava uktās tatprasaṅgena [773]ca hetvābhāsāḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:10898: tathā sādhanāvayavatvād dṛṣṭāntā vaktavyās tatprasaṅgena ca dṛṣṭāntābhāsāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10905: anupalambhe 'pi katham asarvagatatvaṃ niścetuṃ śakyata ity āha --- dṛśyatvāt tata ity anuvarttate /
GSP28durdhpru:10909: kevalam anupalambhād anupalambhavyavahārād ity arthavivakṣitatvād adoṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10912: nanu yad śāstrātmakā ''gamakāreṇāsya parasparaviruddhasvabhāvāvahaṃ kiñcid dvayam uktaṃ bhavet,
GSP28durdhpru:10914: yāvatedam eva nāstīty āśaṅkāpanodavyājenopasaṃharann āha --- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10915: [77b] yata evaṃ śāstrakāreṇaivedañ cedañ cābhyupagataṃ tatas tasmāt śāstrakāeṇaiva prakaraṇāt kaṇādena viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo 'vakāśo dattaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10916: kiṃ kṛtvā tena tadavakāśo datta ity āha --- viruddheti /
GSP28durdhpru:10919: dṛśyatvaviṣayasyānupalambhasya viruddhavyāptatvād dṛśyatvaṃ viruddhavyāptatvād dṛśyatvaṃ viruddhavāptam iti tu draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:10920: kathaṃ punas tayor dharamayoḥ parasparaviruddhārthavyāptatvaṃ viduṣā tenaivam ucyeta yena tadavakāśadānaṃ tasya kalpyata ity āha --- viruddhavyāptatvam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10922: apaśyatā anālocayatā bhrāntyā tāvad abhidhāyeti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:10924: tenāyam arthaḥ --- evam uktena prakāreṇoktāḥ kathitā hetvābhāsāḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:10926: sāmprataṃ hetau tadābhāse ca kathite tulyanyāyatayā 'param api svābhāsasahitaṃ kiṃ notam iti
GSP28durdhpru:10929: tāvatā[775]ca arthapratītir iti na pṛthag dṛṣṭānto nāma sādhanāvayavaḥ kaścid /
GSP28durdhpru:10930: tena na asya lakṣaṇaṃ pṛthag ucyate gatārthatvāt III-121
GSP28durdhpru:10939: syād etat --- tāvatā nārthapatītir ity āha --- tāvatā [776]ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:10945: tena na asya dṣṭāntasya lakṣaṇaṃ hetulakṣanāt pṛthag ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:10950: kathaṃ tarhi hetor vyāptiniścayo yady adṛṭāntako hetur iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:10952: api tu na hetoḥ pṛthag dṛṣṭānto nāma hetvantarbhūta eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:10953: ata evoktaṃ na asya lakṣaṇaṃ pṛthag ucyate [778]iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10954: na tv evam uktam --- nāsya lakṣaṇām ucyata iti[779] /
GSP28durdhpru:10960: atha kathaṃ sādhanāvayavatvaṃ hetūnāṃ yena sādhanāvayatvād yathā hetava uktā ity ucyate?
GSP28durdhpru:10961: tathā hi sādhyate niścīyate sādhyam aneneti sādhanam /
GSP28durdhpru:10963: tadākhyānād eva ca vākyam api sādhanam ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:10964: na tu vākyāt sādhyasiddhyupayogitayā hetur api tad eva tad vacanam apīti /
GSP28durdhpru:10965: dvedhā 'pi taṃ samudāyam apekṣyāsyāvayavatvaṃ yenaivam ucyate iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10973: tatra yathā samudāyāpekṣayā heturūpo 'vayava uktas tadābhāsaś ca tathā sādhanāvayavatvāviśeṣatvād dṛṣṭāntarūpo 'paro 'yam avayavaḥ sapratipakṣaḥ kin nokta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10974: evañ codayann ayam eva sādhanāvayavatvādyabhidhānam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10982: sa eva gamayati pratyāyati sādhyam iti kṛtvā ucyate,
GSP28durdhpru:10984: yasmād hetor eva gamakatvaṃ tatas tasmāt tasya hetos trirūpasya vacanaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhanābhidhānaṃ na dṛṣṭāntasyety arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10985: tāvatā cārthapratītir iti maulam itiśabdam apekṣya na pṛthag dṛṣṭānto nāma sādhanāvayava iti mūlaṃ vyācaṣṭe na dṛṣṭāta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:10989: hetv antarar bhūtatvaṃ ca vyāptigrāhakapramāṇādhikaraṇatayā hetāv upayogāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10992: yady evaṃ hetūpayogino 'pi lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam evety āha --- gatārthatvāt--- gato 'rthaḥ prayojanam abhidheyaṃ vā yasya dṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇasya /
GSP28durdhpru:10996: dṛṣṭāntalakṣāṇaṃ hy acyate dṛṣṭāntapratītir yathā syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:10998: tato dṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇasya yat prayojanam --- dṛṣṭāntapratītis tad gataṃ niṣpannam /
GSP28durdhpru:11008: hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvam asapakṣāc ca sarvato vyāvṛttī[783]rūpam uktam abhedena /
GSP28durdhpru:11009: punar viśeṣeṇa[784]kāryasvabhāvayor uktalakṣaṇayor janmatanmātrānubandhau darśanīyāv aktau /
GSP28durdhpru:11012: asaty agnau na kvacid dhūmo yathā mahānasetarayoḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:11015: na hy anyathā sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sadasattve yathoktaprakāre śakye darśayitum /
GSP28durdhpru:11017: [789]asmiṃś ca arthe darśite darśita eva dṛṣṭānto bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:11031: sādhāraṇaṃ kāryasvabhāvānupalambhānām etal lakṣaṇām ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11040: na ca sāmānyam uktam api śaktyaṃ jñātum /
GSP28durdhpru:11042: ataḥ punar viśeṣeṇa viśeṣavantau janmatanmātrānubandhau darśanīyāvaktau /
GSP28durdhpru:11044: janmni hi [793]jñāte kāryasya sapakṣā eva sattvaṃ vipakṣāc ca sarvasmād vyāvṛttir jñātā
GSP28durdhpru:11053: gatyarthānāṃ jñānārthatvād api gataṃ jñātam ity api coktam //
GSP28durdhpru:11056: tac cet kathitaṃ kiṃ viśeṣalakṣāṇakathanenety āha --- na ce ti /
GSP28durdhpru:11067: vipakṣāc ca sarvasmād vyāvṛttir jñātā bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:11073: [796] atha sādhanadharmamātrānubandhaḥ sādhyasya tathāpi tādātmyaṃ na syād ity āha --- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:11076: tad evaṃ[798] sāmānyalakṣaṇam viśeṣātmakaṃ jñātvyaṃ nānyathā /
GSP28durdhpru:11081: kim ato[799] yadi nāmaiva[800] ity āha --- tac ca[801] sāmānyalakṣāṇaṃ darśayitukāmena viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ darśayataivam[802],
GSP28durdhpru:11083: yatra dhūmas tatra agniḥ iti kāryahetovyāptir darśitā /
GSP28durdhpru:11094: lakṣaṇaṃ na śakyaṃ jñātum iti pravṛttyupayogitayā na śayam iti mantavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:11095: na tu sāmānyalakṣaṇasya vākyāt pratītir na bhavaty eva /
GSP28durdhpru:11098: nanūkte 'py asmin yadi sāmānyalakṣaṇapratītir nāsti kim anenoktenāpīti /
GSP28durdhpru:11101: nanu svabhāvahetau sādhanasvabhāvatā sādhyasya darśayituṃ yujyate,
GSP28durdhpru:11102: tat kiṃ tanmātrānubandho darśanīya ukta ity āha --- tanmātreti /
GSP28durdhpru:11104: atha tanmātrānubandhe darśite 'pi kathaṃ sāmānyalaṣaṇapratipattir ity āha --- sādhanasyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:11106: anupalabdheś cānayor evāntarbhāvān na pṛthag viśiṣṭalakṣaṇābhidhānam ity avaseyam /
GSP28durdhpru:11107: atha kiṃ hetor anvayavyatirekāv eva lakṣaṇaṃ yenaitad dvayam eva lakṣaṇātayā smaryate /
GSP28durdhpru:11108: na caitat pakṣadharmatāyā api lakṣaṇatvād abhihitatvāc ceti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:11110: kevalaṃ na hetoḥ sarvarūpam iha prakrāntam /
GSP28durdhpru:11111: kin tu yad rūpapradarśanena dṛṣṭāntapradarśanaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati tatprakṛtam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11112: yady apy evaṃ yadi nāma sāmāyaviśeṣalakṣaṇā 'bhidhānam ato 'bhidhānāt kiṃ bhavati?
GSP28durdhpru:11117: vyāptipradarśane 'pi kathaṃ dṛṣṭāntākhyānam avataratīty āha --- vyāptiś ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11120: tathāpi dṛṣṭāntaḥ kathaṃ prakṛto bhavatīty āha --- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11121: dṛṣṭāntam antareṇa tad eva pramāṇaṃ na pravartteta /
GSP28durdhpru:11122: tad apravṛttau ca sāmānyalakṣaṇam eva na jñāyeteti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11124: asaty agnau na bhavaty eva dhūma iti vyatireko darśitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11128: yatra kṛtakatvaṃ tatra anityatvam iti svabhāvahetor vyāptir darśitā /
GSP28durdhpru:11129: anityatvābhāve na bhavaty eva kṛtakatvam iti vyatireko darśitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11131: prasiddhavāptikasya ca hetoḥ sādhyanivṛttau nivṛttir niyatā[805] darśaṇīyā /
GSP28durdhpru:11138: kasmād evam ity āha --- na hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:11139: yasmād anyathā sāmānyalakṣaṇarūpe sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sadasattve yathoktaprakāre iti niyate --- sapakṣa eva sattvam,
GSP28durdhpru:11140: vipakṣe 'sattvam eveti niyamo yathoktaprakāraḥ --- te na śakye darśyitum /
GSP28durdhpru:11141: viśeṣalakṣaṇe hi darśite yathoktaprakāre[806] sadasattve darśite bhavataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11142: na ca viśeṣalaṣaṇam anyathā śakyaṃ darśayitum /
GSP28durdhpru:11148: anvayapradarśanena sādharmyadṛṣṭāntākhyānam ākhyāya vyatirekoktyā 'pi vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntau kiṃ (dṛṣṭāntoktiṃ)
GSP28durdhpru:11150: vyatirekapradarśaṇe 'pi kathaṃ dṛṣṭātā ''patanam iti āśaṅkyāha --- sa ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11153: yatra kayościd vyāpyavyāpakabhāvo darśayitavyas tatrās tu dṛṣṭāntopanipātaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:11156: atrāpi vidhyor viparyayeṇa vyāpyavyāpakabhāvo darśayitavya ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11157: etac ca vyatirekākhyānaṃ dṛṣṭāntopadarśanam uddiṣṭaviṣayaṃ prayogam adhikṛtyoktam ity adhigantavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:11158: yatretyādinā svabhāvahetum adhikṛtya dṛṣṭāntasya gatārthatvaṃ darśayitum upakramate /
GSP28durdhpru:11167: yady evaṃ vyatireka [78b] pradarśane kṛṭe dṛṣṭāntenety āha --- prasiddheti /
GSP28durdhpru:11169: tathāpi dṛṣṭānopanipātaḥ katham ity āha --- tad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11171: sac cāsac ca sadasattī tayor bhāvas te pradarśanakriyāpekṣayā ca dvitīyādvivacanāntam etat /
GSP28durdhpru:11172: yādṛśa ukto yathoktaḥ prakāraḥ svarūpaṃ yayos te tathokte /
GSP28durdhpru:11174: sapakṣāsapakṣasasattvayor uktam eva prakāraṃ spaṣṭayann āha --- sapakṣa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11177: kathaṃ te na śakye darśayitum ity āha --- viśeṣeti /
GSP28durdhpru:11180: dṛṣṭāntasya tu kim āyātam ity āha --- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11183: dṛṣṭāntasya tu kim ayātam ity āha --- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11185: yad viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntam antareṇāśakyapradarśanaṃ tat svarūpākhyānam /
GSP28durdhpru:11190: svabhāvaliṅgasya ca svabhāvena sādhyena vyāptir viśeṣalakṣaṇarūpā na śakyā darśayitum /
GSP28durdhpru:11191: yasmāt kāryakāraṇabhās tādātmyaṃ ca mahānase ghaṭe ca jñātavyam,
GSP28durdhpru:11193: vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntas tu prasiddhe tatkāryatve kāraṇābhāve kāryābhāvapratipatty artham[808] /
GSP28durdhpru:11195: kāraṇābhāve kāryābhāvo vastuny avastuni vā bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:11196: tato vastv astu vā vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta iṣyate /
GSP28durdhpru:11201: tasmād dṛṣṭāntam antareṇa[809] na hetor 'nvayo vyatireko vā[810] śakyo darśayitum ato heturūpākhyānād eva hetor vyāptisādhanasya[811] pramāṇasya darśakaḥ ṣādharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ/
GSP28durdhpru:11207: prasiddhavyāptikasya sādhyābhāve [812]hetvabhāvapradarśanād vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta upādeya iti ca[813] darśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:11212: lakṣaṇāsya svarūpam ākhyāyākhyān yathāpradarśanāśakyatvaṃ darśayann āha --- so 'yam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11213: vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntas tarhi na pradarśanīya ity āha --- vaidharmyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:11215: etac ca yadā vyatirekamukheṇa prayogaḥ kriyate,
GSP28durdhpru:11217: na tv ekasmin prayoge dvayopanyāsaḥ sambhavī /
GSP28durdhpru:11219: yataḥ prasiddhe tatkāryatve kāraṇābhāve kāryabhāvapratipattyarthaṃ darśanīyo vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntas tata eva tasmād eva kāraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:11222: yadi hi kasyacid vidhinā kasyacid vidhir darśayitavyaḥ syāt,
GSP28durdhpru:11224: dir asan kathaṃ kasyacid ādhāraḥ syād iti,
GSP28durdhpru:11226: yadā tv ekasya vyāpyasyābhāve aparasya vyāpakasyābhāvo darśayitavyas tadā vyāpakasyā 'bhāve 'vastuni suṣṭhu sambhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:11230: vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntagrahaṇaṃ caitad ekadharmābhāvenāparadharmābhāvopadarśanaviṣayopalakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyan anyathā sādharmyadṛṣṭānte tv avaśyaṃ vastu sa āśraya iṣṭa iti syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:11231: tathā ca sati bahvasamañjasaṃ syād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11232: yataḥ kāraṇābhāvāt kāryābhāvo vastuny avastuni ca bhavati tataḥ kāraṇād vastu mahāhradādi /
GSP28durdhpru:11237: yady evaṃ sādhyasādhakavyāptiprasādhakapramāṇapradarśakatvāt sādharmyadṛṣṭānta evopādeyo na vaidharyadṛṣṭāta ity āha --- prasiddheti /
GSP28durdhpru:11238: vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta upādeya iti yojayitvā kuta upādeya ity āśaṅkāyāṃ prasiddhetyādihetupadaṃ yojyam /
GSP28durdhpru:11241: yad vā pradarśyate 'sminn iti pradarśayatīti vā pradarśano hetvabhāvasya pradarśana iti tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:11244: asmiṃś cārthe darśite darśita eva dṛṣṭāānto bhavati /
GSP28durdhpru:11245_0: yo 'yam artho vyāptisādhanapramāṇapradarśanaḥ[814] kaścid upādeyo nivṛttipradarśanaś[815]
GSP28durdhpru:11245_1: ca --- ity asminn arthe [816]darśite darśito dṛṣṭānta [817]ity āha --- etāvanmātraṃ
GSP28durdhpru:11245_2: rūpaṃ yasya tasya bhāvas tattvam, tasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11249: [821]etac ca heturūpākhyānād evākhyātam iti kiṃ dṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇena?
GSP28durdhpru:11261: etena eva dṛṣṭāntadoṣā api nirastā bhavanti III-123
GSP28durdhpru:11262: etena eva ca heturūpākhyānād dṛṣṭāntatvapradarśanena dṛṣṭāntadoṣā[822] kathitā [823]bhavanti /
GSP28durdhpru:11263: tathāhi --- pūrvoktasiddhaye ya upādīyamāno 'pi[824] dṛṣṭānto na samarthaḥ svakāryaṃ sādhayituṃ sa dṛṣṭāntadoṣa iti sāmyarthyād uktaṃ[825] bhavati //
GSP28durdhpru:11270: asmiṃś ce tyādi mūlam anūdya vyācaṣṭe yo 'yam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11273: prasiddhāyāṃ vyāptau sādhyābhāve [79a] hetor nivṛttipradarśaḥ ity artho draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11275: anyad apy asya rūpam astīty āha --- etāvad eveti /
GSP28durdhpru:11276: hir yasmād etat parimāṇam asyeti tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:11278: kiṃ tad rūpam ity āha --- yad uteti /
GSP28durdhpru:11279: nipātasamudāyaś cāyaṃ yad etad ity asyārthe //
GSP28durdhpru:11281: raṇāsāmarthye doṣaḥ sambhavati te kutaścit sāmānyād dṛṣṭāntavadābhāsamānā dṛṣṭāntābhāsā bhavantīti arthaṃ nyāyam āśrityāha --- dṛṣṭāntadoṣā dṛṣṭāntābhāsāḥ kathitā bhavantīti /
GSP28durdhpru:11282: yasmāt te dṛṣṭāntābhāsatve[na] katitā bhavanty ata eva dṣṭāntatvena nirastā bhavatīty ata eva mūlam arthato vyākhyātam ity avagantavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:11284: kathanaṃ kṛṭaṃ bhavati tathā darśayituṃ tathā hītyādinopakramate /
GSP28durdhpru:11287: siddhavyāptikasya ca hetoḥ sādhyābhāve sādhananivṛttipradarśanalakṣaṇaṃ ca sādhayituṃ ya upādīyamāno 'pi na samarthaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:11296: yathā [826]nityaḥ śabdo iti [827]śabdasya nitytve sādhye 'mūrtatvād iti hetuḥ/
GSP28durdhpru:11297: sādharmyeṇa karmavat paramāṇuvad ghaṭavad ity ete dṛṣṭātā upānyastāḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11322: asarvajño ayaṃ rāgādimatvād rathyāpuruṣavad iti III-125
GSP28durdhpru:11323: tathā[832] sandigdhaḥ sādhyadharmo yasmin sa sandigdhasādhyadharmaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11331: dṛṣāntābhāsān ityādi paramāṇūnām ity etad antaṃ sugamam /
GSP28durdhpru:11332: kathaṃ paramāṇavaḥ sādhanavikalā na sādhyavikalā ity āha --- asarveti /
GSP28durdhpru:11336: tatra yadi dravyaparimāṇaṃ mūrttir ity eva tāvad ucyate tadā ''kāśāder api dravyasya paramamahattvanām adheyaṃ parimāṇam astīti mūrttatvaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:11338: tatra paramāṇoḥ paramāṇaṃ bhavaty asarvagatasya dravyasyeti darśayann āha --- asarvagatāś ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11339: samavāyikāraṇaṃ dravyaṃ guṇavad veti dravyalakṣṇayogād dravyarūpaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11341: tat punaḥ paramāṇoḥ parimāṇaṃ pārimāṇḍalasaṃjñakaṃ jñātavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:11343: sādhyāvaikalyaṃ darśayann āha --- nityās tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11347: atha [vā] ṣaṭpadārthīpratipādakatayā viśiṣyate tad anyasmāc chāstrād iti viśeṣaḥ kāṇādaṃ śāstraṃ vivakṣitam /
GSP28durdhpru:11348: [834]“tad vidanty adhīyate vā” iti vaiśeṣikās tair iṣyanta iti vacanavyaktyā ceṣṭimātram etan na punar atra pramāṇam astīti sūcayati /
GSP28durdhpru:11374: anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ghaṭavad iti III-126
GSP28durdhpru:11379: yasmin dṛṣṭānte dṛṣṭānte sādhyasādhanayoḥ sambhavamātraṃ dṛśyate,
GSP28durdhpru:11382: apradarśitānvayaś ca --- yasmin dṛṣṭānte vidyamāno 'py anvayo na pradarśito vaktrā so 'pradarśitānvayaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11384: yo ukteti vaktṛtvam anūdya sa rāgādimān iti rāgādimattvaṃ[837] vihitam /
GSP28durdhpru:11390: tena vaktṛtvarāgādimattvayoḥ sattvamātram iṣṭe puruṣe siddham /
GSP28durdhpru:11403: tata ityādi maraṇadharmatvam ity etad antaṃ sujñānam/
GSP28durdhpru:11404: nanu maraṇadharmatvam apy asya kathaṃ niściṃtaṃ yena hetur eva sandigdha ucyate iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:11409: yatra tu tan nāsti kevalaṃ sambhavamātraṃ sāhacaryamātraṃ dṛśyata ity abhiprāyaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:11410: vaktṛtvasya heto rāgādimattve [79b] sādhye pratiniyamaḥ pratiniyatatvam uktam iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11411: tena sādhyaniyatatvena vyāptir anayor uktā pradarśitā /
GSP28durdhpru:11412: evaṃvidhānuvādavidhyupakarśane tathā pratīter āhatyodayād vyāptir uktety uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:11414: yato dvayor api vādiprativādinor dṛṣṭātatvena saṅgrahaḥ tena hetunā sattvamātraṃ sambhavamātraṃ sāhacaryamātram iti yāvat /
GSP28durdhpru:11415: asti ceṣṭiḥ sahamātropakarśanam adoṣāvaham ity āha --- vyāptis tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11421: iha yady api kṛṭaktvena ghaṭasadṛśaḥ śabdas tathāpi nānityatvenāpi sadṛśaḥ pratyetuṃ śakyate[840] 'tiprasaṅgāt[841] /
GSP28durdhpru:11422: yadi tu kṛṭakatvam [842]anityasvabhāvaṃ [843]vijñātaṃ bhavaty [844]evaṃ kṛtakatvād anityatvapratītiḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:11423: tasmād yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityam iti kṛtakatvam anityatve[845] niyatam abhidhāya niyamasādhanāyānvayavākyārthapratipattiviṣayo dṛṣṭānta upādeyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11425: anena tv anvayavākyam anuktvaiva dṛṣṭānta upāttaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11438: nanu ghaṭopadarśanena kṛtakatvena tād ghaṭasadṛśaḥ śabdo darśitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11439: tathā cānityatvenāpi sadṛśo darśitas tataś ca vyāptir darśitaivety āha --- iheti /
GSP28durdhpru:11441: kutas tathā pratyetum aśakya ity āha --- atiprasaṅgād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11446: na tarhi kṛtakatvād anityatvaṃ kadācid api pratyetavyam ity āha --- yadi tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11449: vidhānenārthāntaratve sati na nityatvasvabhāvaṃ kṛtakatvaṃ pratītaṃ bhavaty evaṃ tatsvābhāvyena pratipattau kṛtakatvād anityatvapratītiḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:11450: yataḥ kṛtakatvasyānityatvasvabhāvāvagamāt tatas tatpratītir nānyathā tasmād hetoḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11453: anvayavākyārthapratipattiviṣayo 'pi dṛṣṭānto yady apradarśitānvayas tadā so 'pi nirupayogaḥ kim ity upādeya ity āha --- sa ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11455: anena kathaṃ nāmāyam upātto yenaivam abhidhīyata ity āha --- aneneti /
GSP28durdhpru:11460: athaivam upātto 'pi yady upayujyate tadā kā kṣatir ity āha --- īdṛśaś ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11462: samānaḥ prakaraṇād ghaṭena sadṛśo dharmo yasyāsau sadharmā /
GSP28durdhpru:11468: athaitat padadarśitāt sādharmyād api yadi sādhyam siddhyate tadā katham ayam anupayukta ity āha --- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11470: evaṃ bruvato 'yaṃ bhāvaḥ --- anena khalu sādharmyaṃ pradarśanīyam /
GSP28durdhpru:11471: kṛtakatvenaiva ca sādharmyaṃ pradarśyāyañ caritārtho bhaviṣyati /
GSP28durdhpru:11472: na ca kṛtakatvena ghaṭasādharmye śabdasyāvagate 'py anityatvenāpi tatsādharmyāvagamo 'vaśyambhāvīti śakyam abhidhātum /
GSP28durdhpru:11474: yataḥ sādharmyamātrān na sādhyasiddhir ataḥ kāraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:11475: anvayo 'nvīyamānatvaṃ sādhanasya sādhyena so 'rthaḥ prayojanaṃ [80a] yasya sa tathā na sādharmyamātrapradarśanārtha ity arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:11476: anenāpy anvayārtha evāyam upātta ity āha --- tadarthaś ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11480: kim arthas tarhy anenāyam upātta ity āha --- sādharmyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:11485: tato yadi nāma na duṣṭaṃ vastu tathāpi vaktrā duṣṭaṃ darśatam iti duṣtam eva //
GSP28durdhpru:11486: tathā viparītānvayaḥ --- yad anityaṃ tat kṛtakam iti III-127
GSP28durdhpru:11487: tathā viparītānvayo yasmin dṛṣṭāte sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11488: tam evodārati --- yad anityaṃ tat kṛtakam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11491: atra tv anityatvaṃ kṛtakatve[847] niyataṃ darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:11493: [849] tato yādṛśam iha kṛtatvam aniyatam anityatve [850]darśitaṃ tādṛśān nāsty anityatvapratītiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11494: tathā hi --- yad anityam ity anityatvam anūdya tat kṛtakam iti kṛtakatvam vihitam /
GSP28durdhpru:11497: tato yathā 'nityatvād aniyatāt prayatnānantarīyakatve na prayatnāntarīyakatvapratīti,
GSP28durdhpru:11504: [849] atra `tataḥ kṛtakatvam anityatve niyatam eva' ity adhikaḥ pāṭho 'sti /
GSP28durdhpru:11507: sādharmyārthaḥ sādharmyapratipādanaprayojana upāttas tasmān nirupayogaḥ sa /
GSP28durdhpru:11511: tat kathaṃ vidyamāne 'pi tasmin tathā 'pradarśanamātreṇāsau dṛṣṭānto duṣyatīty āha --- vaktṛdoṣād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11519: kim etāvatā tad akaraṇaṃ tasya nāsty eveti sūktaṃ vaktṛdoṣād ayamṇ dṛṣṭāntadoṣa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11520: viparīto 'nvaya iti vaiparītyena pradarśanād viparīta ukto na tu viparīto 'nvayo 'sty eva /
GSP28durdhpru:11521: kīdṛśo 'viparīto 'nvayo yasmād ayaṃ viparīta ity āha --- kṛtakatvam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11522: evaṃ pradarśane ko guṇa ity āha --- evam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11524: atra punaḥ kutra kiṃ niyatam ity āha --- atreti /
GSP28durdhpru:11526: anityatvānuvādena kṛtaktvasya vidhānād vidhīyamānasya vyāpakatayā niyamaviṣayatvād ity abhisandhiḥ kṛtakatvaṃ punaḥ kīdṛśaṃ darśitam ity āha ---[kṛtakatvam iti] /
GSP28durdhpru:11529: nityatvaṃ pratipaśyeta ity āha --- tata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11530: yata evam anuvādavidhikrame kṛtakatvam anityatvāniyataṃ darśataṃ bhavati,
GSP28durdhpru:11533: pūrvam evaṃ vādinā 'nityatvaṃ kṛtakatve niyataṃ darśitam,
GSP28durdhpru:11534: na kṛtakatvam nityatve ceti pratijñāmātreṇoktam adhunā tu yena prakāreṇa tasyaiva pradarśanam āyātaṃ tathā hītyādinā tad darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:11537: yady api ca kṛtakatvaṃ vastusthityā 'nityatve niyataṃ [851]tathāpy anityataṃ vaktrā [852]darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:11547: parārthānumāne ca[855] vaktur api [856]doṣaś cintyata iti //
GSP28durdhpru:11565: vaidharmyeṇa api --- paramāṇuvat karmavat ākāśavad iti sādhyādyavyatirekiṇaḥ III-129
GSP28durdhpru:11566: nityatve śabdasya sādhye hetāv amūttatve [861]paramāṇur vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyāvyatirekī /
GSP28durdhpru:11576: tatra yathā 'nityatvāt prayatnānantarīyakatvāpratītis tadvat kṛtakatvād apy anitya[tva]nityatvapratītir bhavitum arhati /
GSP28durdhpru:11577: nanu bhavatu anityatvāt prayatnānantarīyakatvāpratītir vastutas tasya tatrāniyatatvāt kṛtakatvaṃ tu paramārthato niyatam nityatve /
GSP28durdhpru:11578: tat kutas tasmāt tasyāpratītir ity āha --- yady apītyādi /
GSP28durdhpru:11579: evaṃ bruvato 'yaṃ bhāvaḥ --- vastutaś chedanasvabhāvo 'pi paraśur yadācchedakena bhrāntyā 'nyathā vā udvarttya bāhum udyamya dvaidhībhāvārthaṃ dhavādau nipātyate,
GSP28durdhpru:11580: tadā tena svayam aduṣṭenāpi yathā chidā na sampādyate,
GSP28durdhpru:11583: yasmād evaṃ tasmād [80b] hetor vaktur anumāpayitur aparādhād doṣād viparītānvayo 'pi dṛṣṭāntadoṣa iti doṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11584: na kevalam apradārśitānvaya ity āha --- parārtheti /
GSP28durdhpru:11585: na kevalaṃ sādhanasya doṣaś cintyata ity api śabdāt //
GSP28durdhpru:11586: yato 'lpīyo nāsti sa paramāṇuḥ vaidharmyapratipāda [na] viṣayopāttatvān vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta uktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11589: sādhyam ādir yeṣām tāni sādhyādīni sādhyasādhanobhayāni /
GSP28durdhpru:11599: yathā asarvajñāḥ kapilādayo anāptā vā avidyamānasarvajñatāptatāliṅgabhūtapramāṇātiśayaśāsanatvād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11600: atra[863]vaidharmyodāharaṇam --- yaḥ sarvajña āpto vā sa jyotirjñānādikam upadiṣṭavān,
GSP28durdhpru:11617: sarmvajñātā ca āptatā ca tayor liṅgabhūtaḥ pramāṇātiśayo liṅgātmakaḥ pramāṇaviśeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11618: avidyamānaḥ sarvajñātāptatāliṅgabhūtaḥ pramāṇātiśo yasmin tat tathoktaṃ śāsanam /
GSP28durdhpru:11623: yadi hi kapilādayaḥ sarvajñā āpto vā syus tadā jyotirjñānādikam kamān nopadiṣṭavntaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:11630: yaḥ sarvajña āpto vā sa jyotirjñānādikaṃ sarvajñatāptatā liṅgabhūtam uapadiṣṭavān /
GSP28durdhpru:11631: yathā ṛṣabho vardhamānaś ca tāv ādī yasya sa ṛṣabhavardhamānādir digambarāṇāṃ
GSP28durdhpru:11632: prakaraṇāt kṣīṇadoṣatvam āptatvakṣaṇamasya vivakṣitam iti tat vā anāptā akṣīṇadoṣā iti vyācaṣṭe /
GSP28durdhpru:11636: nanu teṣām api śāsane liṅgātmakaḥ pramāṇātiśayo 'neko 'sty eva /
GSP28durdhpru:11637: tat kathaṃ hetur ayam asiddho na bhavatīty āha --- pramāṇātiśaya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11640: tad ayaṃ samudāyārthaḥ --- yasmāt tair jyotirjñānam anyātīndriyajñānaṃ ca svaśāsane nopadiṣṭaṃ tasmāt te na tathārūpā iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11644: tad iha vaidharmyodāharaṇād ṛśabhāder asarvajñatvasyānāptatāyāś ca vyatireko vyāvṛttiḥ saṃdigdhā /
GSP28durdhpru:11645: yato jyotirjñānaṃ copadaiśed asarvajñāś ca bhaved anāptā vā /
GSP28durdhpru:11647: naimattikam etaj jñānaṃ vyabhdicāri na sarvajñatvam anumāpayet //
GSP28durdhpru:11656: sarvajñaś cāptaś cety anena dvayasyāpi sādhyasyābhāvaṃ darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:11657: yad āha --- akalaṅkaḥ --- “yadi sūkṣme vyavahite vā vastuni buddhir atyantaparokṣe na syāt kathaṃ tarhi jyotirjñānāvisaṃvādaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:11660: dhīr atyantaparokṣe 'rthe na cet puṃsāṃ kuta punaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11663: kathaṃ punaḥ saty api jyotirjñānādy uapadeśe vipakṣād ṛṣabhāder asarvajñatvāder vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdhety āha --- yata iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11664: atra sarvajñatāyām aniṣṭāyāṃ satyām api jyotirjñānāy uapdeśe ko virodho 'nupapattiḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:11665: kṣepe kimaḥ prayogān na kaśdcid ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11666: athāsarvajñatve tasyaitasmād idaṃ grahoparāgādi bhāvi tataś caivaṃ bhāvīti jñānaṃ kathaṃ vṛttaṃ yena samvādi tathopadiśet /
GSP28durdhpru:11667: tasmāt sarvajña evāsāv iti niścaya ity āśaṅkyāha --- naimittakam etad iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11669: viṣayeṇa ca viṣayiṇo nirdeśānnimittadarśanād āgataṃ naimittakam,
GSP28durdhpru:11670: ata eva tad upadeṣṭuḥ sarajñatā vyabhicaratīti /
GSP28durdhpru:11671: tathā sarvajñatām antareṇāpi bhavatīdānīntanajyotiṣikāṇām ivā'tīndriyoparāgādijñānam ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11672: tathābhūtaṃ jñānaṃ na sarvajñatām anumāpayed anumāpayituṃ śaknoti /
GSP28durdhpru:11673: nanu ca tathābhūtena bhāvivastunā saha kasyacit kāryakāraṇabhāva eva tena kaścid jñātaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11674: yady [81a] asāv asarvajño bhaved asarvajñaś ca katham upadiśed iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:11679: yena sa evādyas tathā jñānī sarvajñaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:11680: sa cāsmākam ṛṣabhādir ity apy ucyeta /
GSP28durdhpru:11681_0: atha vā --- yady asau asarvajñas tadā tasya tathābhūtasya sādhyasādhanabhāvasyāviduṣa
GSP28durdhpru:11681_1: upadeśād asmād ādīnām atīndriyoparāgādijñānaṃ saṃvādi ca kathaṃ bhaved ity āśaṅky
GSP28durdhpru:11685: etac ca vyabhicāri jñānam upadiśyamānaṃ nopadeṣṭuḥ sarvajñatām anumāpayituṃ kalpyate /
GSP28durdhpru:11686: atha tad eva tasya tathā bhūtasya kāraṇavastunas tat tad bhāvivastu pratikāraṇātvaṃ kathaṃ jānīyāt kathaṃ copadiśed yady asāv asarvajña iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:11691: na trayīvidā brāhmaṇena grāhyavacanaḥ kaścid[870]vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimattvād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11692: atra vaidharmyodāharaṇam --- ye grāhyavacanā na te rāgādimantaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11694: gautamādibhyo rāgādimattvasya sādhanadharmasya vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdhā III-131
GSP28durdhpru:11702: ṛksāmayajūṃṣi triṇi trayī tām vetīti[873] trayīvid /
GSP28durdhpru:11703: tena na grāhaṃ vacanaṃ yasyeti sādhyam /
GSP28durdhpru:11709: atra pramāṇe vaidharmyodāharaṇam --- sādhayābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāvena [874]yatra vyāpto darśyate tad vaidharmodāharaṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:11710: grāhyaṃ vacanaṃ yeṣāṃ te grāhyavacanā iti sādhyanivṛttim anūdya na te rāgādimanta iti sādhanābhāvo vihitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11711_0: gautamādayo ādir yeṣāṃ te tathoktā manvādayo dharmaśāstrāṇi smṛtayas teṣāṃ karttāraḥ
GSP28durdhpru:11711_1: trayīvidā hi brāhmyaṇena grāhyavacanā dharmaśāstrakṛto vītarāgāś ca ta itīha [875]dharmī
GSP28durdhpru:11713: yady api te grāhyavacanās trayīvidas tathāpi [876]kiṃ sarāgā uta vītarāgā iti sandehaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:11723: atra vaidharmyeṇa udāharaṇam --- yo vītarāgo na tasya parigrahāgrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11725: anādiś ca saṃsāra iti katham etāvanmātreṇa vardhamānāheḥ sarvajñatvasiddhir iti //
GSP28durdhpru:11726: trayo 'vayavā yasyāḥ saṃhater iti trayīty adantāt ṅīp /
GSP28durdhpru:11727: kim atra sādhyā [bhāvā]nuvādena sādhanā bhāo vihito yenaitad vaidharmyodāharaṇaṃ bhavatīty āśaṅkyāha --- sādhyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:11732: dharmitvamātrajijñāpiṣayā dharmivyatirekaviṣaya iti abhidhāya tasyeiva viśeṣaniṣṭhpratipādanecchayā gautamādaya ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:11734: nam ity ādivat tasmād vaidharmī dṛṣṭānto gautamādir iti vākyārthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11735: tathātvaṃ ca teṣāṃ tathātvenopādānānna tu paramārthata ity avaseyam /
GSP28durdhpru:11736: grāhyavacanatve 'pi teṣāṃ kathaṃ tādrūpyasandeha ity āha --- yady apīti /
GSP28durdhpru:11740: ṛṣabhāder avītarāgatvaparigrahāgrahayogayoḥ sādhyasādhanadharmayoḥ sandigdho vyatirekaḥ III-132
GSP28durdhpru:11749: svīkārād ūrdhvaṃ yad gārdhyaṃ mātsaryaṃ sa āgrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11750: parigrahaś ca āgrahaś ca tābhyāṃ yogāt /
GSP28durdhpru:11751: kapilādayo labhyamānaṃ svīkrvanti svīkṛtaṃ na muñcanti --- iti te rāgādimanto gamyante /
GSP28durdhpru:11752: atra pramāṇe vaidharmyodāharaṇam --- yatra sādhyābhāve sādhanābhāo darśayitavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11754: na tasya parigrahāgrahāv iti sādhanābhāo vihitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11756: etasmād ṛṣabhāder dṛṣṭāntād avītarāgatvasya sādhyasya parigrahāgrahayogasya[878] ca sādhanasya [879]nivṛttiḥ sandigdhā /
GSP28durdhpru:11757: ṛṣabhādīnāṃ hi parigrahāgrahayogo 'pi sandigho vītarāgatvaṃ ca /
GSP28durdhpru:11758: yadi nāma tatsiddhānte vītarāgāś ca niṣparigrahāś ca [880]paṭhyante tathāpi sandeha eva //
GSP28durdhpru:11770: [883]vaidharmyeṇa udāharaṇam ---[884]yatra avītarāgatvaṃ na asti[885]na sa vaktā,
GSP28durdhpru:11772: yady apy upalakhaṇḍād ubhayaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ[886]tathā api sarvo vītarāgo na vaktā iti vyāptyā vyatirekāsiddher avyatirekaḥ III-133
GSP28durdhpru:11785: bdasya dvivacanāntasya prayogadarśanādubhayor ity ubhaśabdenārtham āha /
GSP28durdhpru:11787: ti tu viśeṣo 'tra mātsaryam abhipreta āgrahaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11791: nānyatheti draḍhayitum uktam api smārayann āha --- yatreti /
GSP28durdhpru:11792: ṛṣabhāvīnām ity anena vaidharmyodāharaṇād ṛṣabhāveḥ sādhyasādhanayor vyāvṛttisandehaṃ darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:11793: nanvasmadāgame tadguṇadvayayoginas te kathitās tatkatham anyos tato vyāvṛttiḥ sagdhyata ity āha --- yadi nāmeti /
GSP28durdhpru:11794: paṭhyata iti ca vacanavyaktyā ca pāṭhamātreṇa teṣāṃ tadguṇayogaḥ siddhaḥ na tu pramāṇeneti darśayati /
GSP28durdhpru:11801: iha vyatirekam āha --- yatra avītarāgatvaṃ nāstīti sādhyābhāvānuvādaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11802: tatra vakṛtvam api nāsti --- iti sādhanaābhāvavidhiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11811: [890]yady apy upalakhaṇḍād ubhayaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ sarāgatvaṃ ca vaktṛtvaṃ ca[891],
GSP28durdhpru:11812: tathā api vyāptyā[892] vyatireko yas tasyā asiddheḥ kāraṇād avyatireko ayam /
GSP28durdhpru:11816: [891] yatra vītarāgatvaṃ tatra vaktṛtvaṃ nāsti --- ṭi-
GSP28durdhpru:11819: kīdṛśī punar vyāptir ity āha --- sarvo vītarāga iti sādhyābhāvānuādaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11841: yāvateti tṛtīyāntapratirūpako yasmād ity asyāthe varttamāno 'tra gṛhītaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11847: nanūpalakhaṇḍāttāvad vaidhrmīdṛṣṭāntāntādubhayaṃ nivṛttaṃ darśitaṃ yena tat kim evam ucyata ity āha --- yady apīti /
GSP28durdhpru:11856: itr īdṛśyā vyāpteḥ svarūpaṃ prakāśayati yasmād arthe vā /
GSP28durdhpru:11858: sādhanāṣbhāvena sādhyābhāvanyāyena lakṣaṇā vyāptir īkṛśīty arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11859: īdṛśaṃ vyātpim antaṃ vyatirekaṃ prasādhayitum asarmarto 'yaṃ katham ayaṃ dṛśṭāno treṣṭa ity āha --- asya ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11862: prasiddhaye niścayārthaṃ dṛṣṭānta upādīyata iti śeṣaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:11864: na cāyaṃ tathāpradarśanba ity amum arthaṃ prakaraṇagamyaṃ kṛtvā /
GSP28durdhpru:11865: tat tasmāt svakāryakaraṇād duṣṭa ity uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:11873: sa śuddho 'pi svato yadi pareṇāśuddhaḥ khyāpyate sa tāv adyathā prakāśitas tathā na yuktaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11876: ato vatur aprādhād api parāthānumāne hetur dṛṣṭānto vā duṣṭaḥ syād api /
GSP28durdhpru:11886: dṛṣṭāntas tathāpy ayaṃ kathaṃ duṣṭa ity āha --- tat svakāryeti /
GSP28durdhpru:11890: atha paramārthatas tāvad dṛṣṭānte nahbasi sādhyābhāvo 'py asti,
GSP28durdhpru:11892: tatkatham apradarśitavyatireko dṛṣṭānt duṣṭ ity āha --- iheti /
GSP28durdhpru:11900: yathā prakāśito vyatirekamātravān prakāśito vyāptiśūnyaś ca prakāśitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11903: bhāvo vidhīyate dṛṣṭānte pradarśyetaivam asau hetuḥ sādhyasiddhyaṅgavytirekavān siddhyet /
GSP28durdhpru:11905: tatrpadarśanaś ca dṛṣṭānto 'duṣṭo bhaved ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11906: yadi nāma tathā na prakāśitas tathāpi tadupayogī hetur dṛṣṭānto vā tathā kiṃ na pratipadyata ity āha --- prakāśitaś ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11911: na kevalaṃ vacovyavasthitād doṣād ity apiśabdenāha /
GSP28durdhpru:11912: yady api dṛṣṭānta eva prakṛtas tathāpi hetur apy evaṃvidhaḥ svato 'duṣṭo 'pi vaktṛdoṣād eva duṣyatīti tulyanbyāyatayā prasaṅgana darśitam /
GSP28durdhpru:11913: yad vā yathaivaṃviddho hetur vaktṛdoṣād duṣṭo bhavati tadvad dṛṣṭānto 'pīti dṛṣṭāntārthaṃ hetoḥ vaktraparādhenā(na)
GSP28durdhpru:11915: [82] nanu ca yathā kṛtakatvenākāśavidharmā śabdaḥ pratīyate tathā 'nityatvenāpi tadvidharmā bhaviṣyati tat katham anupayukta ity āha --- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11917: evaṃvadato 'yam āśayaḥ --- yady ekena dharmeṇa vaidharmya(mye)
GSP28durdhpru:11921: sādṛśyād asādṛśyād veti sādharmyavaidharmyadṛṣṭāntapratipāditād iti prakāraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:11922: vyatirekavākyenāpi sādhanābhāvenāpi niyamakhyāpanadvārā sādhya eva hetor niyatatvakhyāpanād vyatirekavāyena cety uktam /
GSP28durdhpru:11927: ato vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta ihāsādṛśyamātreṇa[900] sādhaka upanyas taḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11930: ca na tathopanyas ta iti[901] ayam apradarśitavyatireko vaktur aprādhād dṛṭaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:11936: viparītavyatireko[902]yathā --- yad akṛtakaṃ tan nityaṃ bhavati iti III-135
GSP28durdhpru:11943: [903] `viparīto' ity ārabhya `tam udāharati' paryantaḥ pāṭho durvekasamīpasthaikasminn ādarśe nāsīd iti vyākhyānurodhāt jñāyate --- saṃ-
GSP28durdhpru:11947: vyatirekavākye ca sādhyābhāvam anūdya sādhanābhāvo vidhātavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11949: kasmād asau vākyadvayenāpy eva vaktavya ity āha --- anyatheti /
GSP28durdhpru:11950: asmād anyena prakāreṇa gamakaḥ parokṣārthaprakāśako noktaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:11952: dṛśṭāntas tu katham atrādikriyata ity āha --- sa iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11954: dṛṣṭāntena sādharmyavatā vaidharmyavatā ca karaṇena siddho niścito darśayitavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11955: nanv evam api na jñāyate kiṃvyāpāro dṛṣṭānta ihopayujyate ity āśaṅkyopasaṃhāravyāhenāha --- tasmād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:11958: bhidheyaḥ --- uktena prakāreṇa hetoḥ sādhyaniyatatvam --- pradarśyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11960: yad vā pradarśyate 'neneti pradarśyate 'sminn iti pradarśanaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11962: yady evam ayam api vaidharyadṛṣṭāntāntas tathākāryevātropayojyata ity āha --- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11965: vyatirekakhyāpakaṃ sāedhyābhāvānuvādena sādhanābhāvavidhāyakam vākyam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11970: yadi tanmātreṇāpi sādhakas tadā kā kṣatir ity āha --- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:11972: vādy uktena dharmeṇa sādhyadharmiṇo 'sādṛśyāvagame dharmāntareṇāpy asādṛśyāvagamo 'vaśyambhāvīti yujyate 'tiprasaṅgād ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11976: yadā ca sādhyaniyato hetur darśayitavyas tadā vyatrirekavākye sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyato darśayitavyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11977: evaṃ hi hetuḥ sādhyaniyato darśitaḥ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:11978: yadi tu sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyato nākhyāyate sādhānasattyāyām api sādhyābhāvaḥ sambhāvyeta[906] /
GSP28durdhpru:11979: tahthā ca sādhananaṃ sādhyaniyataṃ na pratīyeta[907] /
GSP28durdhpru:11980: tasmāt sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanaābhāve niyato vatavyaḥ viparītavyatireke ca sādhanābhāvaḥ sādhyābhāve niyata ucyate /
GSP28durdhpru:11982: tathā hi --- yad akṛtakam iti sādhanābhāvam anūdya tan nityaṃ bhavatīti sādhyabhāvavidhiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:11989: tathā ca sati akṛtakatvaṃ nityatve sādhyābhāve niyatvaṃ sādhanābhāve /
GSP28durdhpru:11991: tathā ca niparītavyatireko 'pi vaktur aparādhād duṣṭaḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:11992: yady evam asādhakaḥ kathaṃ nāma sādhaka ity āha --- vyatireketi /
GSP28durdhpru:11995: vyaktam etad ity asminn arthe vā /
GSP28durdhpru:11996: anenāpi tathaivopanyas ta ity āha --- na ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:12001_1: viparīto vaiparīty ena pradarśanād vyatireko yasmin dṛśānte sa tathokta iti --- vyutpattir
GSP28durdhpru:12003: yatra tu pustake viparītavyatireko yathety asya mūlasya vyākhānagrantho 'sti tatra sarvam avadātam /
GSP28durdhpru:12006: yad vaiparītyena darśanādayaṃ viparītavyatireka ucyata ity āha --- yadā ceti /
GSP28durdhpru:12009: yadā yasmin kāle rpatipādanakāla ity arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:12011: hetoḥ sādhye niyatatvapradarañcāvaśyakāryamanyathā gamako noktañ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:12014: kasmāt punar evaṃ darśayitavya ity āha --- evaṃ hīti /
GSP28durdhpru:12017: athānyathāpradarśane 'pi yadi sādhanaṃ sādhyaniyataṃ pratīyate tadā tathāpradarśanenaiva kiṃ prayojanam ity āha --- yadi tv iti /
GSP28durdhpru:12019: tathā ca sādhanasattāyām api sādhyābhāvasmbhāvanāprakāre sati /
GSP28durdhpru:12021: asimin rpayoge kiṃ mānocyata ity āha --- viparīteti /
GSP28durdhpru:12023: tathā hītyādinaitad eva pratipādayati yata evam anuvādavidhis atataḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:12027: na hy ebhir dṛṣṭāntābhāsāir hetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sapakṣa eva sattvaṃ vipakṣe ca sarvatra asattvam eva niścayena śakyaṃ darśayituṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ vā /
GSP28durdhpru:12034: ebhiś ca hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvaṃ vipakṣe ca sarvatra asattvam eva yat sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tat niścayena śakyaṃ darśayitum /
GSP28durdhpru:12035: nanu ca sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ viśeṣaniṣṭham eva pratipattavyaṃ na savata evety āha --- viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ vā /
GSP28durdhpru:12036: yadi viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ pratipādayituṃ śakyeta syād eva sāmānyalakṣaṇapratipattiḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:12037: viśeṣalakṣaṇam eva tu na śakyaem ebhiḥ prapādayitum /
GSP28durdhpru:12038: tasmād arthāpattyā sāmarthyena[909] eṣāṃ nirākraṇaṃ dṛṣṭayam /
GSP28durdhpru:12053: na nityatvaṃ sādhyābhāvalakṣaṇaṃ sādhanābhāve kṛtakatvalakṣaṇasādhanābhāve 'kṛtakatva ity arthāt /
GSP28durdhpru:12054: yata evaṃ tato tehor vyatirekavākyaṃ karttṛ hetuṃ karmabhūtaṃ na sādhyaniyatam āha /
GSP28durdhpru:12055: uktayā nītyā sādhanābhābvaḥ sādhyābhāve niytatvāttam antareṇa na bhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:12056: na tu tayatra sādhyābhāvas tatrāvaśyaṃ sāhdanābhāva iti sādhyam antareṇāpi sādhanaṃ bhavet /
GSP28durdhpru:12057: tataś ca sādhyāniyataṃ sādhanam ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:12058: tathā ca sādhyaniyatahetvapradarśanaprakāre sati vaktur evaṃvākyaprayoktuḥ //
GSP28durdhpru:12060: viśeṣaniṣṭham eva prayetavyam iti bruvato 'yaṃ bhāvaḥ --- yadi nāmābhībhiḥ sapakṣa eva sattvaṃ nipakṣe sarcatrāsattvaṃ niśayena śakyate darśayitum,
GSP28durdhpru:12061: tathāpy ete viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ sānānyalakṣaṇapratipattyaṅgaṃ pratipādayanta upayokṣyanta iti /
GSP28durdhpru:12062: atra viśeṣalakṣaṇaś cety uttaraṃ yadīty ākāraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:12065: katham amī duṣṭā yena tathātvena nirākraṇam eṣām ityāśaṅkyopasaṃharan āha --- sādhyeti /
GSP28durdhpru:12068: asāmarthyam eva kathaṃ yenāsāmarthyād [82a] duṣṭā ucyanta ity āha --- svakāryasya hetoḥ sādhyaniyatatvapradarśanalakṣaṇasyākaraṇāt /
GSP28durdhpru:12069: nanu tadakaraṇam evāsāmarthyam utam iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:12092: ye pūrvaṃ nyūnatādayaḥ sādhanadoṣā uktās teṣām udbhāvanaṃ dūṣaṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:12094: ye pūrvaṃ nyūnatāādayaḥ asiddhaviruddhānaikāntikā uktās teṣām udbhāvakaṃ yadvacanaṃ tad dūṣaṇam /
GSP28durdhpru:12096: tat kathaṃ dūṣaṇam ity āha --- tena nyūnatādivacanena pareṣām iṣṭārthaś ca tasya siddhiḥ niścayas tasyāḥ pratibandhāt /
GSP28durdhpru:12097: nāvaśyaṃ niparyaya sādhanād eva dūṣaṇaṃ viruddhaat /
GSP28durdhpru:12098: api tu parasyābhipretaniścayavibandhān[916] niścayābhāvo bhavati niścayaviparyaya ity asty eva[917] viparyayasiddhir iti /
GSP28durdhpru:12107: api dṛṣṭāntābhāsasyāsādhanāṅgavacanād vādino nigraho ādino nigraho 'sāmarthyopādānānnyāyaprātaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:12108: paropāttāś ca codanīyā iti dṛṣṭāntābhāsavyupādane vārttikakṛto 'bhiprāyaḥ pratyavya iti /
GSP28durdhpru:12109: samprati sudhagrahaṇārtham ukaprabandhasyācāryīyasya pratpāditamavacchindannāha --- iyateti trirūpaliṅgākhyānam ity ādinaitadntena,
GSP28durdhpru:12110: idaṃ parimāṇam asyetītyat teneyatā mahāvākyena sādhanam uktam ācāryeṇeti śeṣaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:12112: tad api tasyaiva sphuṭāvagamārthaṃ tatvaivopayuktam ati manyamānenoktam iyatā sādhanam uktam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:12115: etac ca tad dūṣaṇam ity antaṃ subodham /
GSP28durdhpru:12118: atra tenetyādy uttaraṃ vyācakṣāṇa āha --- tenetyādi /
GSP28durdhpru:12143: tatkathaṃ pareṣtārthasiddhapratibandhakasyāpi nyūnatādivacanasya tathātvam ucyata ity āśaṅkāmapākurvannāha --- nāvaśyaam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:12144: kin tv aparasya sisādhayiṣitārthaniścayavibadhād apy atrārthād draṣṭavyam /
GSP28durdhpru:12145: anyathā 'vaśyaṃ grahaṇamavadhāraṇaṃ viruddhavad ity api duryojaṃ syāt /
GSP28durdhpru:12146: mṛtvā śīrtvā ca tadyojane vaktur akauśalaṃ syād iti /
GSP28durdhpru:12147: yadi tv avaśyaṃ viparyayasādhanatvasyaiva dūṣaṇatvam iti nirvandhas tadā tad apy asya nyūnatādivacanasyāstīti darśayann āha --- niścayeti /
GSP28durdhpru:12150: sādṛśyārthavṛtter api jātiśabdasya darśanāj jātiśabdaḥ sādṛśyavacana ity āha /
GSP28durdhpru:12151: nanu jātiśabdaḥ sādṛśyavacanatvād astv ayam arthaḥ --- jātayaḥ sadṛśā iti /
GSP28durdhpru:12152: kāni punas tāni kena ca sadṛśānīti na jñāyata ity āśaṅkām apārkuvannāha --- uttareti /
GSP28durdhpru:12154: tad ayam arthaḥ --- jātiśabdena jātyuttaram evātra varttikakārasya vivakṣitam iti /
GSP28durdhpru:12155: kathaṃ punar dūṣaṇābhāsānāṃ jāty uttaraśabdavākyatvam ity āśaṅkyāha --- uttareti /
GSP28durdhpru:12157: vivaraṇe 'py uttarasthāne jāyamānatvāj jāyata uttaratvenābhāsanād uttarāṇīti /
GSP28durdhpru:12160: abhūtadoṣodbhāvanāni jātyuttarāṇīti bruvatā vārttikakṛtā bhūtadoṣodbhāvanaṃ tu yad dūṣaṇākhyaṃ tad evottīryate aniṣṭapakṣād anenottārayatim,
GSP28durdhpru:12163: etac ca jāty uttaravyutpādanam ācāyasya hetvābhāsavan na prayogārtham /
GSP28durdhpru:12178: ācāryadharmottaraviracitāyāṃ[927] nyāyāṃ nyāyavinduṭīkāyāṃ tṛtīyaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ //[928]
GSP28durdhpru:12188: saṃvat 1490 varṣe mārgaśira sudi 3 ravau śrī kharataragacche śrī jinarājasūripaṭṭe,
GSP28durdhpru:12196: heyajñāne hi tad viviktamuādeyaṃsujñātaṃ bhavatīti jāti(teḥ)
GSP28durdhpru:12197: hetv ābhāsānāñ ca sphuṭasvarūpaparaijñānasya prayojanam svavākye parivarjanaṃ paraprayuktānām api doṣabhāvanam itarathā vyāmohaḥ syād ity uktaprāyam /
GSP28durdhpru:12198: tatra jātyuttarasyohāraṇaṃ yathā --- anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ghaṭavad ity utke kim idaṃ kṛtatatvaṃ śabdagataṃ hetutvenopanītam āhosvid ghaṭagatam /
GSP28durdhpru:12199_0: yadi śabdagataṃ tasya ghaṭo dṛṣṭāto 'sambhavād avyāter anaikāntiko .................................
GSP28durdhpru:12204_2: uārjitaṃ tad anena tādṛśīmavasthāṃprāpya sakalasattvopakāraṃ .............. m ity
GSP28durdhpru:12206: nyāyabindoḥ kiyat .............................. kuśalamāptamataḥ kuśalādajaraṃ jñānadharmottaraṃ ca padaṃ tad avāya jagaṭupakṛtimātra [vyāpṛtiḥ] syāmiti /
GSP28durdhpru:12208: padyante gamyante 'rthā ebhir iti padāni vākyāni teṣāṃ vastupratipādyatayāsti tam abhidheyarūpaṃ .......... śeṣo jñeyaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:12217: evaṃ vidhavidhānena yat puṇyate tad avaśyamamalatayaitattulyaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:12222: atha vā jarānirdeśenaiva daṇḍāpūpanyāyena sābhyupāyasyāvabodho nivakṣitaḥ /
GSP28durdhpru:12226: yattadoś ca nityam abhisambadhena tacchabdasya labdhatvāt tadavāpyety artho 'vatiṣṭḥate /
GSP28durdhpru:12229: tadvyāpṛtir vyāpāro vyāpriyamāṇatā yasya mama yo 'haṃ tathā /
GSP28durdhpru:12230: na vārśasāviṣaye 'sminn āśīr liṅgā bhūyāsam iti śabdasiddher[naivam]nena vaktavyam tat kim evam avādīd iti cet /
GSP28durdhpru:12233: yata evaṃvidhānuṣṭhānajanmanā puṣyātiśayena evambhūtapadaprāptes tato 'pi mamaivaṃvidhakriyasyamānatvād eva ......................... yam etad ity abhiprāyāt sarvam avadātam iti //
GSP28durdhpru:12234: guror jitārer abhigamya dhīdhanaṃ mayā hi ṭīkā vivṛtā paṭīyasī /
